verses.en: The nine shall be gone at eleven, then you shall forget hardships. And I will look forward to the twenty-sixth day of the first month.

verses.en_6th_ed: By that time, the core will be settled and greed forgotten. Let all performers assemble and prepare for the Service.
verses.ro: kono aida shin mo tsukikuru yoku wasure   ninju sorote Tsutome koshirae
verses.jp1: このあいだしんもつきくるよくハすれ
verses.jp2: にんぢうそろふてつとめこしらゑ
verses.kanji: この間真も付き来る欲忘れ   人衆揃うて勤め拵え
verses.en: In the meantime the center shall be established. And everyone forgetting avarice shall prepare to perform the Service in full numbers.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the mind of God hastens to show you free and unlimited workings quickly.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   juyojizai o hayaku misetai
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp2: ぢうよじざいをはやくみせたい
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の急き込みは   自由自在を早く見せたい
verses.en: The one thing for which the mind of God is daily impatient is to manifest My omnipotence to you quickly.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, the performers will assemble and do the Service. This will truly settle Nihon.
verses.ro: korekara wa ninju sorote Tsutome suru   kore de tashikani nihon osamaru
verses.jp1: これからハにんぢうそろをてつとめする
verses.jp2: これでたしかににほんをさまる
verses.kanji: これからは人衆揃うて勤めする   これで確かに日本治まる
verses.en: From now on the Service shall be performed with the full number of performers. The peace shall surely reign all over the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: Since My aim is truly single-hearted salvation, there is nothing at all for you to fear.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni tasuke ichijo de aru karani   nanimo kowami wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつにたすけ一ぢよてあるからに
verses.jp2: なにもこわみハさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: 真実に救け一条で有るからに   何も怖みは更に無いぞや
verses.en: You need fear nothing. Because My aim is solely the true and single-hearted salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you dare to stop all works for single-hearted salvation, the regret of God will appear as a disorder of the body.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo tasuke ichijo tomeru nara   Kami no zannen mi ni sawari tsuku
verses.jp1: なにもかもたすけ一ぢよとめるなら
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんみにさハりつく
verses.kanji: 何もかも救け一条止めるなら   神の残念身に障り着く
verses.en: If you try to stop any and every work of single-hearted salvation, the regret of God shall appear as a disorder of your body.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder well! Never think that these preparations for universal salvation are human workings.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo yorozu tasuke no kono moyo   ningen waza to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: しやんせよ万たすけのこのもよふ
verses.jp2: にんけんハざとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 思案せよ万救けのこの模様   人間業と更に思うな
verses.en: Ponder deeply! Never take these arangements for every kind of salvation as the work of a mere human being.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have not been able to understand anything. There was nothing but human thinking.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanika yorozu ga wakaraide   mina ningen no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにかよろづがハからいで
verses.jp2: みなにんけんの心ばかりで
verses.kanji: 今迄は何か万が分からいで   皆人間の心ばかりで
verses.en: Until now you have not been able to understand any truth. All of you have been thinking with human thoughts alone.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall compare the minds of those in high places with the mind of God.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no kokoro to kami taru no   kokoro to kokoro no hikiyawase suru
verses.jp1: これからハ神の心と上たるの
verses.jp2: 心と心のひきやハせする
verses.kanji: これからは神の心と上たるの   心と心の引き合わせする
verses.en: From now on I will bring together the mind of God and that of the upper people.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not take this talk lightly. God truly cannot bear to look on.
verses.ro: kono hanashi chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   Kami ga shinjitsu mikanetaru yue
verses.jp1: このはなし一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 神がしんぢつみかねたるゆへ
verses.kanji: この話一寸の事やと思うなよ   神が真実見兼ねたる故
verses.en: Never take this talk to be a mere trifle! This is because God could not bear to remain as a mere spectator.

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the strength of God will be pitted against the strength of those in high places from now on.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no chikara to kami taru no   chikara kurabe o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: これからハ神のちからと上たるの
verses.jp2: ちからくらべをするとをもへよ
verses.kanji: これからは神の力と上たるの   力比べをすると思えよ
verses.en: Expect that from now on I, God, will compare My might with that of the upper people!

verses.en_6th_ed: Have your strongest come against Me. God has twice the strength.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki araba dashite miyo   Kami no ho nimo bai no chikara o
verses.jp1: いかほどのごふてきあらばだしてみよ
verses.jp2: 神のほふにもばいのちからを
verses.kanji: 如何程の強敵有らば出してみよ   神の方にも倍の力を
verses.en: However strong a man there may be, let him come against Me! I Myself have twice as much strength as he.

verses.en_6th_ed: As God in Truth is going out to the fore, know that every arrangement will be made.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami ga omote i deru kara wa   ikana moyo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつの神がをもていでるからハ
verses.jp2: いかなもよふもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 真実の神が表へ出るからは   如何な模様もすると思えよ
verses.en: I, the true God, am coming to the fore, and will do any and every arrangement. Understand it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, those of Kara have done as they pleased with Nihon. What can be done about the regret of God?
verses.ro: imamade wa kara ga nihon o mamani shita   Kami no zannen nanto shiyo yara
verses.jp1: いまゝでわからがにほんをまゝにした
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんなんとしよやら
verses.kanji: 今迄は唐が日本を侭にした   神の残念何としよなら
verses.en: Until now the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later have managed as they please the people of the region where My teachings spread early. The regret of God was so severe that I could not find any way to clear it away.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, Nihon will do as it pleases with those of Kara. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nihon ga kara o mamani suru   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: このさきハにほんがからをまゝにする
verses.jp2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: この先は日本が唐を侭にする   皆一列は承知して居よ
verses.en: Henceforth the people of the region where My teachings spread early will lead the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later. All of you, be aware and expect it!

verses.en_6th_ed: Root and branches of the same tree: branches will break, yet the root will prosper.
verses.ro: onaji ki no ne to eda to no koto naraba   eda wa orekuru ne wa sakai deru
verses.jp1: をなじきのねへとゑだとの事ならバ
verses.jp2: ゑたハをれくるねハさかいでる
verses.kanji: 同じ木の根と枝との事ならば   枝は折れ来る根は栄え出る
verses.en: They are the root and branches of the same tree. Branches may be broken, yet the root will grow prosperous.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, those of Kara were said to be great, but from now on they will only be broken.
verses.ro: imamade wa kara wa erai to yu taredo   korekara saki wa oreru bakari ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでわからハゑらいとゆうたれど
verses.jp2: これからさきハをれるはかりや
verses.kanji: 今迄は唐は偉いと言うたれど   これから先は折れるばかりや
verses.en: Until now the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later have been said to be great; henceforth they shall only be broken.

verses.en_6th_ed: Look at Nihon! It is thought to be tiny, but when the root appears, you will be overwhelmed with amazement.
verses.ro: nihon miyo chiisai yoni omotaredo   ne ga arawareba osore iru zo ya
verses.jp1: にほんみよちいさいよふにをもたれど
verses.jp2: ねがあらハればをそれいるぞや
verses.kanji: 日本見よ小さい様に思うたれど   根が現れば恐れ入るぞや
verses.en: Look at the region where My teachings spread early! Formerly it was said to be tiny. But when the might of the root appears, every one shall become overwhelmed with amazement.

verses.en_6th_ed: This power cannot be thought of as being human strength. It is the power of God which nothing can match.
verses.ro: kono chikara ningen waza to omowaren   Kami no chikara ya kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: このちからにんけんハさとをもハれん
verses.jp2: 神のちからやこれハかなわん
verses.kanji: この力人間業と思われん   神の力やこれは敵わん
verses.en: This power cannot be taken to be the work of a man. It is the might of God, which no one can match.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this world, people are living merrily, but there is no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: kono yo wa nigiwashi kurashi iru keredo   moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node
verses.jp1: このよふハにぎハしくらしいるけれど
verses.jp2: もとをしりたるものハないので
verses.kanji: この世は賑わし暮らし居るけれど   元を知るたる者は無いので
verses.en: In this world many people are living merrily. But there is no one who has understood the origin.

verses.en_6th_ed: If this origin is known in detail, there should be no cause for illness.
verses.ro: kono moto o kuwashiku shirita koto naraba   yamai no okoru koto wa nai no ni
verses.jp1: このもとをくハしくしりた事ならバ
verses.jp2: やまいのをこる事わないのに
verses.kanji: この元を詳しく知りた事ならば   病の起こる事は無いのに
verses.en: If you become aware of this origin in detail, there shall be no case in which you shall suffer from illness.

verses.en_6th_ed: These children, living their lives knowing nothing, pitiful are they in the eyes of God.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo shirazu ni kurasu kono kodomo   Kami no me niwa ijirashiki koto
verses.jp1: なにもかもしらずにくらすこの子共
verses.jp2: 神のめへにハいぢらき事
verses.kanji: 何もかも知らずに暮らすこの子供   神の目にはいじらしき事
verses.en: These children who live their lives knowing nothing about any truth are really pitiful in the eyes of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is nothing at all which should be called illness. It is only because there are paths of the mistaken mind.
verses.ro: nani nitemo yamai to yute sarani nashi   kokoro chigai no michi ga aru kara
verses.jp1: なにゝてもやまいとゆうてさらになし
verses.jp2: 心ちがいのみちがあるから
verses.kanji: 何にても病と言うて更に無し   心違いの道が有るから
verses.en: There is indeed nothing which can be called illness. It is because you are using your mind on some mistaken path.

verses.en_6th_ed: These paths are miserliness, covetousness, self-love, greed, and arrogance. They are the dusts.
verses.ro: kono michi wa oshii hoshii to kawaii to   yoku to koman kore ga hokori ya
verses.jp1: このみちハをしいほしいとかハいと
verses.jp2: よくとこふまんこれがほこりや
verses.kanji: この道は惜しい欲しいと可愛いと   欲と高慢これが埃や
verses.en: These paths are miserliness, covetousness, selfish love, avarice and arrogance. They are indeed the dust in human minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: All human beings in this world are the children of God. Listen and understand well the words of God!
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen wa mina Kami no ko ya   Kami no yu koto shikato kikiwake
verses.jp1: このよふのにんけんハみな神のこや
verses.jp2: 神のゆう事しかときゝわけ
verses.kanji: この世の人間は皆神の子や   神の言う事確と聞き分け
verses.en: All human beings in this world are children of God. Listen attentively and understand well the words of God!

verses.en_6th_ed: If only the dusts are cleanly swept away, then I shall work marvelous salvation.
verses.ro: hokori sai sukiyaka harota koto naraba   ato wa mezurashi tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: ほこりさいすきやかはろた事ならば
verses.jp2: あとハめづらしたすけするぞや
verses.kanji: 埃さい清きやか払ろた事ならば   後は珍し救けするぞや
verses.en: If only you have finished the sweeping of your mental dust, I will work remarkable salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: By this salvation given in accordance with the mind of sincerity, you shall be freed from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai no kono tasuke   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心しだいのこのたすけ
verses.jp2: やますしなずによハりなきよふ
verses.kanji: 真実の心次第のこの救け   病まず死なずに弱り無き様に
verses.en: You shall be saved according to the true sincerity of your mind. You shall not fall ill, die or become weakened.

verses.en_6th_ed: By this salvation, to fix the natural term of life at one hundred and fifteen years is the single desire of God.
verses.ro: kono tasuke hyaku ju go sai jomyo to   sadame tsuketai Kami no ichijo
verses.jp1: このたすけ百十五才ぢよみよと
verses.jp2: さだめつけたい神の一ぢよ
verses.kanji: この救け百十五才定命と   定め付けたい神の一条
verses.en: By this salvation I, God, intend single-heartedly to fix the natural term of human life at one hundred and fifteen years.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the mind of God hastens. You who are close to Me, what are you thinking of it?
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o   soba naru mono wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみを
verses.jp2: そばなるものハなんとをもてる
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の急き込みを   側なる者は何と思うて居る
verses.en: Day by day the mind of God hastens impatiently. What are you close to Me thinking of it?

verses.en_6th_ed: For fear of those in high places, you are depressed. Fear not, for God is hastening.
verses.ro: kami taru o kowai to omote izumi iru   Kami no sekikomi kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 上たるをこわいとをもていすみいる
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみこわみないぞや
verses.kanji: 上たるを怖いと思うていずみ居る   神の急き込み怖み無いぞや
verses.en: For fear of the upper people, you are hesitating. Fear not! This is the urging of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: The tightness in your chest: do not take it as an illness. It is the hastening of God being blocked.
verses.ro: mune ashiku kore o yamai to omouna yo   Kami no sekikomi tsukaetaru yue
verses.jp1: むねあしくこれをやまいとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみつかゑたるゆへ
verses.kanji: 胸悪しくこれを病と思うなよ   神の急き込み痞えたる故
verses.en: If you feel tightness in your chest, do not take it as an illness! It is nothing but the impatience of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Working miracles one after another, the mind of God hastens for your salvation.
verses.ro: dandan to Kami no kokoro to yu mono wa   fushigi arawashi tasuke sekikomu
verses.jp1: たん／＼と神の心とゆうものわ
verses.jp2: ふしぎあらハしたすけせきこむ
verses.kanji: 段々と神の心と言う物は   不思議現し救け急き込む
verses.en: Working marvels one after another, the mind of God is hastening to save you all.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think these miracles are? Sweeping the dust away, I shall complete the cleansing.
verses.ro: kono fushigi nanno koto ya to omote iru   hokori harote soji shitateru
verses.jp1: このふしきなんの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: ほこりはろふてそふぢしたてる
verses.kanji: この不思議何の事やと思うて居る   埃払うて掃除仕立てる
verses.en: What do you think these marvels mean? Sweeping dust away, I will accomplish the cleansing of your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, the pillar will be quickly put in. When it is done, the world will settle.
verses.ro: ato naru ni hayaku hashira o ireta nara   kore de kono yo no sadame tsuku nari
verses.jp1: あとなるにはやくはしらをいれたなら
verses.jp2: これでこのよのさだめつくなり
verses.kanji: 後なるに早く柱を入れたなら   これでこの世の定め着くなり
verses.en: Thereafter I will quickly set in the central pillar. Then things of this world shall become settled.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you quickly see the truth of this talk, become convinced, everyone, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono hanashi hayaku mietaru koto naraba   ikana mono demo mina tokushin se
verses.jp1: このはなしはやくみへたる事ならば
verses.jp2: いかなものでもみなとくしんせ
verses.kanji: この話早く見えたる事ならば   如何な者でも皆得心せ
verses.en: When this talk is quickly realized, be convinced of it, who-ever you may be!

verses.en_6th_ed: I have told you before about the test for proof, but you do not even understand what the Kanrodai is about.
verses.ro: imamade wa shoko tameshi to yue aredo   Kanrodai mo nanno koto yara
verses.jp1: いまゝでハしよこためしとゆへあれど
verses.jp2: かんろふだいもなんの事やら
verses.kanji: 今迄は証拠試しと言うて有れど   甘露台も何の事やら
verses.en: Hitherto I have told you that I will make the test for proof. But you do not understand yet what the meaning of Kanrodai is.

verses.en_6th_ed: Having received this one four years ago, God is holding her in a tight embrace. This is the proof.
verses.ro: kono mono o yo nen izen ni mukaitori   Kami ga dakishime kore ga shoko ya
verses.jp1: このものを四ねんいせんにむかいとり
verses.jp2: 神がだきしめこれがしよこや
verses.kanji: この者を四年以前に迎い取り   神が抱き締めこれが証拠や
verses.en: Having received this one four years ago, I, God, have been embracing her in My bosom. This is the proof.

verses.en_6th_ed: Truly, the preparation to return her quickly is the first matter in the hastening of God.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni hayaku kayasuru moyodate   Kami no sekikomi kore ga daiichi
verses.jp1: しんぢつにはやくかやするもよふたて
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみこれがたい一
verses.kanji: 真実に早く返する模様建て   神の急き込みこれが第一
verses.en: Truly I am preparing to return this one quickly. God is impatiently hastening this matter before anything else.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have often told you about My free and unlimited workings, but you have seen nothing yet.
verses.ro: koremade wa juyojizai to mama tokedo   nanimo mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: これまでハぢうよじざいとまゝとけど
verses.jp2: なにもみへたる事わなけれど
verses.kanji: これ迄は自由自在と間々説けど   何も見えたる事は無けれど
verses.en: Until now I have often told you of My omnipotence, but nothing has appeared yet.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall teach you everything beforehand. When seen, you will understand that I work freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: korekara wa ikana hanashi mo tokioite   sore mieta nara juyojizai ya
verses.jp1: これからハいかなはなしもときをいて
verses.jp2: それみゑたならじうよぢざいや
verses.kanji: これからは如何な話も説き置いて   それ見えたなら自由自在や
verses.en: From now on I will teach everything beforehand. When it is realized, it shall be the evidence of My omnipotence.

verses.en_6th_ed: Please do not speak about things in the past. I shall begin on the twenty-sixth day.
verses.ro: imamade no koto wa nan nimo yute kurena   niju roku nichi ni hajime kakeru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでの事ハなんにもゆてくれな
verses.jp2: 廿六日にはじめかけるで
verses.kanji: 今迄の事は何にも言うて呉れな   廿六日に初め掛けるで
verses.en: Please do not speak about things in the past! For I am going to begin My work on the twenty-sixth day.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall make the minds of the world spirited and prepare to settle Nihon.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekai no kokoro isame kake   nihon osameru moyo suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これからハせかいの心いさめかけ
verses.jp2: にほんをさめるもよふするぞや
verses.kanji: これからは世界の心勇め掛け   日本治める模様するぞやる
verses.en: Henceforth, I will cheer up the minds of the world, and thus arrange to bring peace to the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: The minds of human beings are indeed shallow. You talk only about things already visible.
verses.ro: ningen no kokoro to yu wa azanote   mietaru koto o bakari yu nari
verses.jp1: にんけんの心とゆうハあざのふて
verses.jp2: みへたる事をばかりゆうなり
verses.kanji: 人間の心と言うはあざのうて   見えたる事をばかり言うなり
verses.en: As you human beings are shallow-minded, you talk only about things now visible to your eyes.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall talk only about things that have not appeared. Watch the future closely.
verses.ro: korekara wa nai koto bakari toite oku   korekara saki o tashika mite iyo
verses.jp1: これからハない事ばかりといてをく
verses.jp2: これからさきをたしかみていよ
verses.kanji: これからは無い事ばかり説いて置く   これから先を確か見て居よ
verses.en: From now on I will teach solely about those things which do not yet exist. Wait and look certainly at those things which shall appear in the future!

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to tell you about whatever things step by step, but never about things already visible.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo dandan yuikakeru   mietaru koto wa sarani yuwan de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事もたん／＼ゆいかける
verses.jp2: みへたる事ハさらにゆハんで
verses.kanji: どの様な事も段々言い掛ける   見えたる事は更に言わんで
verses.en: I will begin to tell you any and everything step by step but never about the things which have already appeared.

verses.en_6th_ed: To set up quickly the central pillar of God, who began this world, is God's single desire.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no Shinbashira   hayaku tsuketai Kami no ichijo
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめた神のしんばしら
verses.jp2: はやくつけたい神の一ぢよ
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の真柱   早く着けたい神の一条
verses.en: I, God, single-heartedly desire to quickly set up the central pillar of God who created this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen and ponder step by step over the words and works of God, who is invisible to your eyes.
verses.ro: me ni men Kami no yu koto nasu koto o   dandan kiite shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: めへにめん神のゆう事なす事を
verses.jp2: たん／＼きいてしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: 目に見えん神の言う事為す事を   段々聞いて思案してみよ
verses.en: Listen and try to ponder step by step over the words and works of God who is quite invisible to your eyes!

verses.en_6th_ed: You are thinking that the present path is at the mercy of the high places, but you are mistaken. It will be as God pleases.
verses.ro: ima no michi kami no mama ya to omote iru   kokoro chigau de Kami no mama nari
verses.jp1: いまのみち上のまゝやとをもている
verses.jp2: 心ちがうで神のまゝなり
verses.kanji: 今の道上の侭やと思うて居る   心違うで神の侭なり
verses.en: The upper people are thinking that at present they can manage everything as they please. But their minds are all mistaken. Really it is ruled over by God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Those in high places are doing as they please with all the world. Do you not know the regret of God?
verses.ro: kami taru wa sekaiju o mamani suru   Kami no zannen kore o shiran ka
verses.jp1: 上たるハせかいぢううをまゝにする
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんこれをしらんか
verses.kanji: 上たるは世界中を侭にする   神の残念これを知らんか
verses.en: The upper people are managing the whole world as they please. Do you not know the severe regret of God?

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, everything in the world has gone according to those in high places. From now on, there will be changes.
verses.ro: koremade wa yorozu sekai wa kami no mama   mo korekara wa monku kawaru zo
verses.jp1: これまでハよろづせかいハ上のまゝ
verses.jp2: もふこれからハもんくかハるぞ
verses.kanji: これ迄は万世界は上の侭   もうこれからは文句変わるぞ
verses.en: Until now the upper people have managed everything in the world as they please. But henceforth things shall be changed.

verses.en_6th_ed: Since the time I began this world, I have not yet taught you everything.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara wa nanimo kamo   toite kikashita koto wa nai node
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからハなにもかも
verses.jp2: といてきかした事ハないので
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからは何もかも   説いて聞かした事は無いので
verses.en: Since I created this world, I have taught you nothing yet.

verses.en_6th_ed: Those in high places are thinking of the whole world on their own terms, but their minds are wrong.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sekaiju o waga mamani   omote iru no wa kokoro chigau de
verses.jp1: 上たるハせかいぢううをハがまゝに
verses.jp2: をもているのハ心ちかうで
verses.kanji: 上たるは世界中を我侭に   思うて居るのは心違うで
verses.en: The upper people are thinking that they can manage the whole world as they please, but it is quite a mistake.

verses.en_6th_ed: The trees which grow in the high mountains and the trees which grow in the low valleys are all the same.
verses.ro: takayama ni sodatsuru kii mo tanisoko ni   sodatsuru kii mo mina onaji koto
verses.jp1: 高山にそだつる木もたにそこに
verses.jp2: そたつる木もみなをなじ事
verses.kanji: 高山に育つる木も谷底に   育つる木も皆同じ事
verses.en: They are all on equal terms, whether they may be the trees which grow on the high mountains or the trees which grow at the bottom of the valleys.

verses.en_6th_ed: All human bodies are things lent by God. Do you not know the free and unlimited workings of God?
verses.ro: ningen wa minamina Kami no kashimono ya   Kami no juyo kore o shiran ka
verses.jp1: にんけんハみな／＼神のかしものや
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふこれをしらんか
verses.kanji: 人間は皆々神の貸し物や   神の自由これを知らんか
verses.en: Human bodies are all things lent by God. Do you not know the　omnipotence of God?

verses.en_6th_ed: Let all of you in the world take care. There is no knowing when or where God will go.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa minamina waga mi ki o tsuke yo   Kami ga nandoki doko e iku yara
verses.jp2: 神がなんどきとこへいくやら
verses.kanji: 一列は皆々我が身気を付けよ   神が何時何処へ行くやら
verses.en: All of you must equally take care of yourselves because there is no knowing when and for where God is leaving.

verses.en_6th_ed: Just a word: the hastening in the mind of God is solely to prepare to assemble useful timber.
verses.ro: choto hanashi Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   yoboku yoseru moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: 一寸はなし神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp2: よふぼくよせるもよふばかりを
verses.kanji: 一寸話神の心の急き込みは   用木寄せる模様ばかりを
verses.en: Just a word! The mind of God is single-heartedly hastening to call together useful timber.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though there are many and varied trees, perhaps no one knows which will become useful timber.
verses.ro: dandan to oku tachiki mo aru keredo   dore ga yoboku naru ya shiremai
verses.jp1: たん／＼とをふくたちきもあるけれど
verses.jp2: どれがよふほくなるしれまい
verses.kanji: 段々と多く立ち木も有るけれど   どれが用木成るや知れまい
verses.en: One by one a lot of trees are coming together, but perhaps no one can know which shall turn out to be useful timber.

verses.en_6th_ed: Of these timbers, it is not to be just a few. I desire a great number of timbers.
verses.ro: yoboku mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   oku yoki ga hoshii koto kara
verses.jp1: よふぼくも一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp2: をふくよふきがほしい事から
verses.kanji: 用木も一寸の事では無い程に   多く用木が欲しい事から
verses.en: I desire to collect My useful timber not in a few but in great numbers.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, I shall tend those trees which are to become My useful timber. Never take it to be illness.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni yoboku nitewa teiri suru   doko ga ashiki to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: にち／＼によふほくにてわていりする
verses.jp2: どこがあしきとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 日々に用木にては手入りする   何処が悪しきと更に思うな
verses.en: Day after day I will use My hand to trim those trees which are to be taken as My useful timber. Never take it as an illness!

verses.en_6th_ed: Among the trees, there will be some that I shall tend step by step and others that I shall let fall as they are.
verses.ro: onaji ki mo dandan teiri suru mo ari   sono mama kokasu kii mo aru nari
verses.jp1: をなじきもたん／＼ていりするもあり
verses.jp2: そのまゝこかすきいもあるなり
verses.kanji: 同じ木も段々手入りするも有り   その侭倒す木も有るなり
verses.en: Among those similar trees, some of them shall be trimmed by My hand by degrees, and others shall soon be brought down just as they are.

verses.en_6th_ed: This test for proof of all of My free and unlimited workings, I shall never do at any other place.
verses.ro: ika naru no juyojizai no kono tameshi   hoka naru toko de sarani sen zo ya
verses.jp1: いかなるのぢうよじざいのこのためし
verses.jp2: ほかなるとこでさらにせんぞや
verses.kanji: 如何なるの自由自在のこの試し   他なる所で更にせんぞや
verses.en: This test of any and every omnipotence, I will never do at any other place.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have often taught you, saying that it is to be a test. Now at this time, I shall end the test.
verses.ro: imamade mo tameshi to yute toitaredo   mo konotabi wa tameshi osame ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでもためしとゆうてといたれど
verses.jp2: もふこのたびハためしをさめや
verses.kanji: 今迄も試しと言うて説いたれど   もうこの度は試し納めや
verses.en: Hitherto I have often told you about the test. But this is final.

verses.en_6th_ed: This universe is the body of God. Ponder this in all matters step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo kono yo wa   Kami no karada ya shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: たん／＼となに事にてもこのよふわ
verses.jp2: 神のからだやしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: 段々と何事にてもこの世は   神の身体や思案してみよ
verses.en: Any and everything of this universe is all the body of God. Ponder deeply and understand it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, as God is openly revealed, I shall teach you any and all things.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i deteru kara   yorozu no koto o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このたびハ神がをもていでゝるから
verses.jp2: よろづの事をみなをしへるで
verses.kanji: この度は神が表へ出てるから   万の事を皆教えるで
verses.en: This time I, God, have come to the fore; I will teach you any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: So long as you remain unknowing that the body is a thing borrowed, you can understand nothing at all.
verses.ro: meme no minouchi yori no karimono o   shirazu ni ite wa nanimo wakaran
verses.jp1: めへ／＼のみのうちよりのかりものを
verses.jp2: しらずにいてハなにもわからん
verses.kanji: 銘々の身の内よりの借り物を   知らずに居ては何も分からん
verses.en: So long as you remain ignorant of the truth that you borrow your body from God, you can understand nothing at all.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over it! There is nothing at all which should be called illness. It is but a road sign or an admonition from God.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo yamai to yute sarani nashi   Kami no michiose iken naru zo ya
verses.jp1: しやんせよやまいとゆうてさらになし
verses.jp2: 神のみちをせいけんなるぞや
verses.kanji: 思案せよ病と言うて更に無し   神の道教え意見なるぞや
verses.en: Ponder over it deeply! There is nothing which should be called illness. They are all signposts or admonitions by God.

verses.en_6th_ed: A slight ailment of the eyes, swellings, dizziness, and pain are but the guidance of God.
verses.ro: choto shitaru me no ashiku mo dekimono ya   nobose itami wa Kami no tebiki ya
verses.jp1: 一寸したるめへのあしくもできものや
verses.jp2: のぼせいたみハ神のてびきや
verses.kanji: 一寸したる目の悪しくも出来物や   逆上せ痛みは神の手引きや
verses.en: A slight sore of the eyes, swelling and dizziness, they are all the guidance of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, among the high mountains no useful timber has yet appeared.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to yuta tote   yoboku mieta koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ高い山やとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: よふほくみへた事ハなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は高い山やと言うたとて   用木見えた事は無けれど
verses.en: Until now, even though there are many trees on the high mountains, I have not been able to find My useful timber among them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall make preparations to find useful timber step by step even in the high mountains.
verses.ro: konosaki wa takayama nitemo dandan to   yoboku midasu moyo suru zo ya
verses.jp1: このさきハ高山にてもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: よふぼくみだすもよふするぞや
verses.kanji: この先は高山にても段々と   用木見出す模様するぞや
verses.en: But henceforth I will arrange to find them one by one also on the high mountains.

verses.en_6th_ed: This preparation is for saving all humankind quickly. I shall make the minds of both the high and the low be spirited.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni hayaku tasukeru kono moyo   kami shimo tomoni kokoro isamete
verses.jp1: いちれつにはやくたすけるこのもよふ
verses.jp2: 上下ともに心いさめで
verses.kanji: 一列に早く救けるこの模様   上下共に心勇めて
verses.en: As I am arranging to save all mankind equally, I will make the minds of both the upper and lower people all cheerful.

verses.en_6th_ed: If the minds of the world are spirited day after day, the growth of all crops will be spirited, too.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sekai no kokoro isamu nara   mono no ryuke wa mina isami deru
verses.jp1: にち／＼にせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp2: ものゝりうけハみないさみでる
verses.kanji: 日々に世界の心勇むなら   物の立毛は皆勇み出る
verses.en: Day by day, when the minds of the world become cheerful, all crops shall also come up abundantly.

verses.en_6th_ed: Since My intent is single-hearted salvation in all matters, I desire to cut off the root of rebellion quickly.
verses.ro: nani nitemo tasuke ichijo de aru karani   muhon no ne o hayaku kiritai
verses.jp1: なにゝてもたすけ一ちよであるからに
verses.jp2: むほんねへをはやくきりたい
verses.kanji: 何にても救け一条で有るからに   謀反の根を早く切りたい
verses.en: As I am single-heartedly hastening to save you all in any and every matter, I desire first to cut off the root of rebellion.

verses.en_6th_ed: The present path is covered with dust. Take up a broom and do the sweeping.
verses.ro: ima no michi hokori darake de aru karani   hoke o mochite soji o shitate
verses.jp1: いまのみちほこりだらけであるからに
verses.jp2: ほふけをもちてそうぢふしたて
verses.kanji: 今の道埃だらけで有るからに   箒を持ち掃除を仕立て
verses.en: The present way is indeed too dusty. So take a broom and sweep it away!

verses.en_6th_ed: The path thereafter will be broad and clear. Take along with you as many others as you wish.
verses.ro: ato naru wa michi wa hirokute gomoku nashi   ikutari nari to tsurete tore yo
verses.jp1: あとなるハみちハひろくでごもくなし
verses.jp2: いくたりなりとつれてとふれよ
verses.kanji: 後なるは道は広くてごもく無し   幾たりなりと連れて通れよ
verses.en: Thereafter the way shall become broad and clear. Then you may pass through it, bringing as many persons as you wish.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to speak at five on the twenty-second of the second month and teach you the causality of everything.
verses.ro: nii nii no nii no itsutsu ni hanashi kake   yorozu innen mina tokikikasu
verses.jp1: 二二の二の五つにはなしかけ
verses.jp2: よろついんねんみなときゝかす
verses.kanji: 二二の二の五つに話し掛け   万因縁皆説き聞かす
verses.en: Beginning My talk at eight o'clock in the evening on the twenty-second day of the second month, I will teach you the causality concerning any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: After listening to the sermons of those on the high mountains, listen to the teachings of God in Truth and ponder.
verses.ro: takayama no sekkyo kiite shinjitsu no   Kami no hanashi o kiite shiyan se
verses.jp1: 高山のせきゝよきいてしんしつの
verses.jp2: 神のはなしをきいてしやんせ
verses.kanji: 高山の説教聞いて真実の   神の話を聞いて思案せ
verses.en: After listening to the sermons of the high mountains, listen to the teachings of this true God and then ponder over them deeply!

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, listen to the teachings of God step by step and enjoy them. It is the Divine Record.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no hanashi o dandan to   kiite tanoshime Koki naru zo ya
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のはなしをたん／＼と
verses.jp2: きいてたのしめこふきなるぞや
verses.kanji: 日々に神の話を段々と   聞いて楽しめこうきなるぞや
verses.en: Listen and enjoy the talk of God day after day and one after another! It is the Koki, the Divine Record, of salvation for eternity.

verses.en_6th_ed: The present path: what kind of path do you think it is? Though it seems to you to be unclear,
verses.ro: ima no michi nanno michi ya to omote iru   nanika wakaran michi de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまのみちなんのみちやとをもている
verses.jp2: なにかわからんみちであれども
verses.kanji: 今の道何の道やと思うて居る   何か分からん道で有れども
verses.en: What do you think this present way is? Even though it is indeed a way which you cannot take to be trustworthy,

verses.en_6th_ed: I already see a broad path ahead. You are saying that it is over there, but it is already before you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa okwan michi ga miete aru   mo ako ni aru koko i kita nari
verses.jp1: このさきハをふくハんみちがみへてある
verses.jp2: もふあこにあるこゝいきたなり
verses.kanji: この先は往還道が見えて有る   もうあこに有る此処へ来たなり
verses.en: In the near future, a broad way is coming into sight. While you are saying that it is over there, it is already before you.

verses.en_6th_ed: When do you think this day will come? On the fifth of the fifth month, it will definitely appear.
verses.ro: kono higara itsu no koto ya to omote iru   go gatsu itsuka ni tashika detekuru
verses.jp1: このひがらいつの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: 五月五日にたしかでゝくる
verses.kanji: この日柄何時の事やと思うて居る   五月五日に確か出て来る
verses.en: When do you think this day will come? On the fifth day of the fifth month people will surely come here to call upon Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: Then a thanksgiving pilgrimage will begin. Look for it. People will come whether it be night or day.
verses.ro: sore yori mo okage hajimaru kore o miyo   yoru hiru shiren yoni naru zo ya
verses.jp1: それよりもをかけはぢまるこれをみよ
verses.jp2: よるひるしれんよふになるぞや
verses.kanji: それよりもお蔭初まるこれを見よ   夜昼知れん様になるぞや
verses.en: Thence the thanksgiving pilgrimage similar to the okagemairi will begin. Wait and see it! The distinction between day and night will be forgotten.

verses.en_6th_ed: By and by, when the sixth month comes, know that I shall grant the Proof-Amulet.
verses.ro: dandan to roku gatsu ni naru koto naraba   Shoko Mamori o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: たん／＼と六月になる事ならば
verses.jp2: しよこまむりをするとをもへよ
verses.kanji: 段々と六月になる事ならば   証拠守りをすると思えよ
verses.en: Step by step promoting the preparation, when the sixth month comes, I will begin to grant the Shoko-mamori, the Amulet in proof of returning to the Jiba.

verses.en_6th_ed: After that, I shall hasten the construction step by step, and it will become busy in all matters.
verses.ro: sorekara wa dandan fushin sekikonde   nanika isogashi koto ni naru nari
verses.jp1: それからハたん／＼ふしんせきこんで
verses.jp2: なにかいそがし事になるなり
verses.kanji: それからは段々普請急き込んで   何か忙しい事になるなり
verses.en: After that I will hasten the construction more and more. So you will become busy in everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, the mind of God will hasten day by day. Be aware of it.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no kokoro wa nichinichi ni   sekikomi aru to omoikoso shire
verses.jp1: これからハ神の心ハにち／＼に
verses.jp2: せきこみあるとをもいこそしれ
verses.kanji: これからは神の心は日々に   急き込み有ると思いこそ知れ
verses.en: From now on you must be convinced that the mind of God is impatiently hastening day by day.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how great My haste may be, I shall say nothing by word of mouth.
verses.ro: ika hodono oku sekikomi aru totemo   kuchi dewa nanimo yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いかほどのをふくせきこみあるとても
verses.jp2: くちでハなにもゆうでないぞや
verses.kanji: 如何程の多く急き込み有るとても   口では何も言うで無いぞや
verses.en: However impatient I may be, I will speak nothing by mouth.

verses.en_6th_ed: I wish to let you know quickly of the many people that will come in the future.
verses.ro: konosaki wa oku miekuru hitobito o   hayaku shirashite oko to omoedo
verses.jp1: このさきハをふくみへくる人ゞを
verses.jp2: はやくしらしてをことをもゑど
verses.kanji: この先は多く見え来る人々を   早く知らして置こうと思えど
verses.en: Though I wish to let you know of the numerous people who will appear in the near future,

verses.en_6th_ed: I see new faces coming one after another. Is there no one who can see them with his own eyes?
verses.ro: dandan to mezurashi hito ga miete aru   tare ga me nimo kore ga mien ka
verses.jp1: だん／＼とめつらし人がみへてある
verses.jp2: たれがめへにもこれがみゑんか
verses.kanji: 段々と珍しい人が見えて有る   誰が目にもこれが見えんか
verses.en: One by one new faces are coming into My sight. Can you not see them with your own eyes?

verses.en_6th_ed: Watch this marvelous path. There will be a mountain of stories about it from now on.
verses.ro: korekara no ato naru hanashi yamayama no   michi o mite iyo mezurashiki michi
verses.jp1: これからのあとなるはなし山／＼の
verses.jp2: みちをみていよめづらしきみち
verses.kanji: これからの後なる話山々の   道を見て居よ珍しき道
verses.en: Look at the way about which I will tell you much about it from now on! You will wonder how remarkable it is.

verses.en_6th_ed: How delightful it will be! So many people will assemble, coming to ask for the gifts of heaven.
verses.ro: omoshiro ya oku no hito ga atsumarite   ten no atae to yute kuru zo ya
verses.jp1: をもしろやをふくの人があつまりて
verses.jp2: 天のあたゑとゆうてくるそや
verses.kanji: 面白や多くの人が集まりて   天の与えと言うて来るぞや
verses.en: How delightful it should be! So many people flocking together will come to Me, praying for the Gift of Heaven.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, disorders will befall you, and you will come again. But no one knows how impatiently God waits.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mi ni sawari tsuku mata kita ka   Kami no machikane kore o shirazu ni
verses.jp1: にち／＼にみにさハりつくまたきたか
verses.jp2: 神のまちかねこれをしらすに
verses.kanji: 日々に身に障り付くまた来たか   神の待ち兼ねこれを知らずに
verses.en: Day after day people will come back here so often, because they feel disorders in their bodies. But no one is aware of the impatient waiting of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, the performers of the Service will all assemble. Taking this as a sign, I shall begin all My workings.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsutome no ninju te ga soroi   kore o aizu ni nanimo dekakeru
verses.jp1: だん／＼とつとめのにんぢうてがそろい
verses.jp2: これをあいつになにもでかける
verses.kanji: 段々と勤めの人衆手が揃い   これを合図に何も出掛ける
verses.en: One by one the members of the Service will all assemble. Then taking that as a signal, I will start any and every working.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, I desire to make the mind of God quickly known to the minds of the high places step by step.
verses.ro: nichinichi no Kami no kokoro wa dandan to   kami no kokoro ni hayaku misetara
verses.jp1: にち／＼の神の心わだん／＼と
verses.jp2: 上の心にはやくみせたら
verses.kanji: 日々の神の心は段々と   上の心に早く見せたら
verses.en: Day after day I desire to make the mind of God known to the upper people step by step.

verses.en_6th_ed: Knowing nothing, those in high places obey those of Kara. How pitiful are such minds.
verses.ro: kami taru wa nanimo shirazu ni tojin o   shitagau kokoro kore ga okashii
verses.jp1: 上たるわなにもしらずにとふぢんを
verses.jp2: したがう心これがをかしい
verses.kanji: 上たるは何も知らずに唐人を   従う心これが可笑しい
verses.en: It is ridiculous that because of their ignorance of the truth the upper people follow those who shall understand My teachings later.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the mind of God impatiently awaits those of Kara to replace their minds entirely.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   tojin korori kore o matsu nari
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp2: とふぢんころりこれをまつなり
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の急き込みは   唐人ころりこれを待つなり
verses.en: Day by day the mind of God is impatiently waiting for those who will understand Me later to completely convert their minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: Remember what followed the epidemic of the cows in the past. Let all of you in high places beware.
verses.ro: imamade no ushi no sakimichi omote miyo   kami taru tokoro mina ki o tsuke yo
verses.jp1: いまゝでのうしのさきみちをもてみよ
verses.jp2: 上たるところみなきをつけよ
verses.kanji: 今迄の牛の先道思うてみよ   上たる所皆気を付けよ
verses.en: Remember the forerunning epidemics of the cows in the past! All of those who are in the upper place must be attentive.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only all of this comes to be seen, all the minds of the world will be spirited.
verses.ro: kore saika mina mie kitaru koto naraba   sekai no kokoro mina isami kuru
verses.jp1: これさいかみなみへきたる事ならば
verses.jp2: せかいの心みないさみくる
verses.kanji: これさいか皆見え来たる事ならば   世界の心皆勇み来る
verses.en: If only this is truly realized, all the minds of the world will become cheered up.

verses.en_6th_ed: If the minds of the world are spirited in all matters, the mind of God, also, will be spirited.
verses.ro: nani nitemo sekai no kokoro isamu nara   Kami no kokoro mo mina isamu nari
verses.jp1: なにゝてもせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp2: 神の心もみないさむなり
verses.kanji: 何にても世界の心勇むなら   神の心も皆勇むなり
verses.en: When the minds of the world become cheered about any and everything, the mind of God will also become cheered up.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think the path of today is about? Marvelous things will come into sight.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa ika naru michi to omou kana   mezurashi koto ga miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp1: けふの日ハいかなるみちとをもうかな
verses.jp2: めづらし事がみゑてくるぞや
verses.kanji: 今日の日は如何なる道と思うかな   珍しい事が見えて来るぞや
verses.en: What do you think of the way of today? A truly remarkable affair will come into sight.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, all things will come into sight. Whatever your path may be, take delight in it all.
verses.ro: dandan ni nanika no koto mo miete kuru   ika naru michi mo mina tanoshime yo
verses.jp1: だん／＼になにかの事もみへてくる
verses.jp2: いかなるみちもみなたのしめよ
verses.kanji: 段々に何かの事も見えて来る   如何なる道も皆楽しめよ
verses.en: Step by step any and everything will appear. So take delight in your path, whatever it may be!

verses.en_6th_ed: If the hand movements of the Joyous Service are learned day by day, how delighted God will be.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Yoki-zutome no te ga tsukeba   Kami no tanoshimi ika hodono koto
verses.jp1: にち／＼によふきづとめのてがつけば
verses.jp2: 神のたのしゆみいかほとの事
verses.kanji: 日々に陽気勤めの手が付けば   神の楽しみ如何程の事
verses.en: If you become learned in the hand-gestures of the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service, day by day, how delighted God would be!

verses.en_6th_ed: I impatiently await the performers of the Service to gather quickly. What are you close to Me thinking?
verses.ro: hayabaya to Tsutome no ninju machikaneru   soba na kokoro wa nani o omou ya
verses.jp1: はや／＼とつとめのにんぢうまちかねる
verses.jp2: そばな心わなにをふもうや
verses.kanji: 早々と勤めの人衆待ち兼ねる   側な心は何を思うや
verses.en: I am impatiently waiting for the members of the Service to gather quickly. What are you close to Me thinking of it?

verses.en_6th_ed: Nothing should be called illness. Should your body be afflicted, it is God's call for your service.
verses.ro: ika naru no yamai to yute nai keredo   mi ni sawari tsuku Kami no yomuki
verses.jp1: いかなるのやまいとゆうてないけれど
verses.jp2: みにさわりつく神のよふむき
verses.kanji: 如何なるの病と言うて無いけれど   身に障り付く神の用向き
verses.en: There is nothing which can be called illness. But if a disorder comes to your body, it is a sign from God of an errand.

verses.en_6th_ed: This call for your service might not easily be understood, for the thoughts of God are mountainous.
verses.ro: yomuki mo nanino koto yara choto shiren   Kami no omowaku yamayama no koto
verses.jp1: よふむきもなにの事やら一寸しれん
verses.jp2: 神のをもわくやま／＼の事
verses.kanji: 用向きも何の事やら一寸知れん   神の思惑山々の事
verses.en: Perhaps you cannot easily understand what kind of errand it is. There are so many intentions of God piled up.

verses.en_6th_ed: If all the thoughts of God about everything are taught to you, your minds will be spirited.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami no omowaku nani nitemo   mina toita nara kokoro isamu de
verses.jp1: なにもかも神のをもハくなにゝても
verses.jp2: みなといたなら心いさむで
verses.kanji: 何もかも神の思惑何にても   皆説いたなら心勇むで
verses.en: When I explain any and every intention of God, you will become cheered up.

verses.en_6th_ed: When I have taught you all of My thoughts step by step, your bodies, too, will be refreshed.
verses.ro: dandan ni nanimo omowaku tokikireba   minouchi yori mo susuyaka ni naru
verses.jp1: だん／＼になにもをもハくときゝれば
verses.jp2: みのうちよりもすゝやかになる
verses.kanji: 段々に何も思惑説き切れば   身の内よりも涼やかになる
verses.en: When I explain any and every intention step by step, you will feel refreshed and become healthy.

verses.en_6th_ed: Again, I impatiently await the coming Joyous Service. What it is, is the Kagura Service.
verses.ro: matasaki no Yoki-zutome o machikaneru   nanno koto nara Kagura-zutome ya
verses.jp1: またさきのよふきづとめをまちかねる
verses.jp2: なんの事ならかぐらつとめや
verses.kanji: また先の陽気勤めを待ち兼ねる   何の事なら神楽勤めや
verses.en: I am waiting impatiently for the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service, in the future. If you ask what it is, it is the Kagura-Zutome, the Service with the Holy Masks.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though there are many people throughout the world, there is no one who knows the mind of God.
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no hito de aru keredo   Kami no kokoro o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: せかいぢうをふくの人であるけれど
verses.jp2: 神の心をしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 世界中多くの人で有るけれど   神の心を知りた者無し
verses.en: There are many people in the whole world, but no one can comprehend the mind of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall teach you in detail all of the truth in the mind of God.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami no kokoro no shinjitsu o   nanika isai o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このたびハ神の心のしんぢつを
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この度は神の心の真実を   何か委細を皆教えるで
verses.en: This time I will teach you any and every detail of the truth of the mind of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: In all matters, if you come to know the truth of single-heartedness with God, you will never be overcome by Kara.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami ichijo o shirita nara   kara ni makeso na koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なにゝても神一ちよをしりたなら
verses.jp2: からにまけそな事ハないぞや
verses.kanji: 何にても神一条を知りたなら   唐に負けそうな事は無いぞや
verses.en: If you become convinced of the way of single-hearted devotion to God in any and every case, you will never be defeated by those who will understand My teachings later.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, My only concern will be the preparations quickly to distinguish between Kara and Nihon step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa kara to nihon o sumiyaka ni   dandan wakeru moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: このさきハからとにほんをすみやかに
verses.jp2: だん／＼ハけるもよふばかりを
verses.kanji: この先は唐と日本を速やかに   段々分ける模様ばかりを
verses.en: Henceforth I will hasten solely arrangements to distinguish step by step the region where My teachings spread early from the region where My teachings shall spread later.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only this distinction is made quickly, the regret of God will be cleared away.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku wakarita koto naraba   Kami no zannen hareru koto nari
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくわかりた事ならば
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんはれる事なり
verses.kanji: これさいか早く分かりた事ならば   神の残念晴れる事なり
verses.en: If only this is clearly distinguished, the regret of God will entirely disappear.

verses.en_6th_ed: If the regret of God in Truth is cleared away, all minds in the world will be spirited.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami no zannen hareta nara   sekai no kokoro mina isami deru
verses.jp1: しんぢつの神のざんねんはれたなら
verses.jp2: せかいの心みないさみでる
verses.kanji: 真実に神の残念晴れたなら   世界の心皆勇み出る
verses.en: When the regret of the true God becomes cleared away, the minds of the world will become cheered up.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I am solely making preparations truly to save the whole world.
verses.ro: dandan to sekaiju o shinjitsu ni   tasukeru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼とせかいぢううをしんぢつに
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふはかりするぞや
verses.kanji: 段々と世界中を真実に   救ける模様ばかりするぞや
verses.en: Step by step I am single-heartedly preparing to truly save people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: After that, you may stay as long as you wish, without illness, death, or weakening.
verses.ro: sono nochi wa yamazu shinazu ni yowarazu ni   kokoro shidai ni itsu made mo iyo
verses.jp1: そのゝちハやまずしなすによハらすに
verses.jp2: 心したいにいつまでもいよ
verses.kanji: その後は病まず死なずに弱らずに   心次第に何時迄も居よ
verses.en: After that you may live as long as you like, never falling ill, dying or becoming weakened.

verses.en_6th_ed: Further, after the passage of long years, there will be no aging at all.
verses.ro: matasaki wa nengen tachita koto naraba   toshi o yoru me wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: またさきハねんけんたちた事ならば
verses.jp2: としをよるめハさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: また先は年限経ちた事ならば   年を寄るめは更に無いぞや
verses.en: Further, after the lapse of long years, there shall be no fear of aging at all.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have known nothing, but from now on I shall teach you everything.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanino koto demo shirenanda   korekara saki wa mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにの事でもしれなんだ
verses.jp2: これからさきハみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: 今迄は何の事でも知れなんだ   これから先は皆教えるで
verses.en: Until now you have known nothing of any matter, but henceforth I will teach you any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: At present, the minds of all, as well as the minds of those within, are greatly mistaken.
verses.ro: ima dewa na mina no kokoro to uchi naru no   kokoro ga oi chigai naredomo
verses.jp1: いまてハなみなの心とうちなるの
verses.jp2: 心かをふいちがいなれども
verses.kanji: 今ではな皆の心と内なるの   心が大い違いなれども
verses.en: Now there is a large difference between the minds of those familiar with Me and the minds of all the other people.

verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow on, I shall begin to request anything of you. You must follow the words of God.
verses.ro: asunichi wa nandemo tanomi kakeru de na   Kami no iijo ni tsukaneba naran
verses.jp1: あすにちハなんでもたのみかけるでな
verses.jp2: 神のいぢよにつかねばならん
verses.kanji: 明日日は何でも頼み掛けるでな   神の言い条に付かねばならん
verses.en: From tomorrow I will begin to request anything from you. You should obey the words of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, disorders will come to your bodies. Ponder over it! God is informing you of your mistaken minds.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mi ni sawari tsuku tokushin se   kokoro chigai o Kami ga shirasuru
verses.jp1: にち／＼にみにさハりつくとくしんせ
verses.jp2: 心ちがいを神がしらする
verses.kanji: 日々に身に障り付く得心せ   心違いを神が知らする
verses.en: Day after day disorders will appear in your bodies. Ponder over it! It is a warning from God that your minds are mistaken.

verses.en_6th_ed: Each of you, after pondering over the body, resolve the mind and lean on God.
verses.ro: meme no minouchi yori mo shiyan shite   kokoro sadamete Kami ni motare yo
verses.jp1: めへ／＼のみのうちよりもしやんして
verses.jp2: 心さだめて神にもたれよ
verses.kanji: 銘々の身の内よりも思案して   心定めて神に凭たれよ
verses.en: Everyone of you, pondering over your body, lean upon God with your mind firmly determined!

verses.en_6th_ed: The thoughts of God about all matters are profound, but you close to Me are unaware of this.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no omowaku fukaku aru   soba naru mono wa sore o shirazu ni
verses.jp1: なにゝても神のをもわくふかくある
verses.jp2: そばなるものハそれをしらすに
verses.kanji: 何にても神の思惑深く有る   側なる者はそれを知らずに
verses.en: The intention of God is deep in whatever kinds of things. But you close to Me are unaware of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have not been able to see any path whatever. It can be seen quickly. Ponder and resolve.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani yono michi mo miene domo   hayaku mieru de shiyan sadame yo
verses.jp1: けふまでハなによのみちもみへねども
verses.jp2: はやくみゑるでしやんさだめよ
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何よの道も見えねども   早く見えるで思案定めよ
verses.en: Until today no way of any kind has appeared. But now they will soon appear. Therefore, determine your mind!

verses.en_6th_ed: Though I wish to have you know this path quickly, it is difficult because there is no understanding.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku shiraso to omoe domo   satori ga note kore ga mutsukashi
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくしらそとをもへども
verses.jp2: さとりがのふてこれがむつかし
verses.kanji: この道を早く知らそうと思えども   悟りが無うてこれが難し
verses.en: I am impatient to let you know this way quickly. But it is difficult because you are not spiritually awakened.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though I have made it known by My writing brush step by step, your lack of understanding is the regret of God.
verses.ro: dandan to fude ni shirashite aru keredo   satori nai no ga Kami no zannen
verses.jp1: たん／＼とふでにしらしてあるけれど
verses.jp2: さとりないのが神のざんねん
verses.kanji: 段々と筆に知らして有るけれど   悟り無いのが神の残念
verses.en: Step by step I have informed you with My writing brush. But you have not become awakened. This is the cause of the regret of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: In everything, listen closely to the words of God. Everything depends on the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   mina meme no kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: なにゝても神のゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp2: みなめゑめの心しだいや
verses.kanji: 何にても神の言う事確と聞け   皆銘々の心次第や
verses.en: Listen attentively to anything which I, God, say! Everything depends on your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Truly be spirited and ponder. Then lean on God and do the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro isande shiyan shite   Kami ni motarete Yoki-zutome o
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心いさんでしやんして
verses.jp2: 神にもたれてよふきづとめを
verses.kanji: 真実に心勇んで思案して   神に凭れて陽気勤めを
verses.en: Truly cheer up your mind, ponder deeply and then lean upon God! And thus perform the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service!

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder what this talk is about. It is solely about the matter of the fertilizer.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto ya to omouna yo   koe ichijo no hanashi naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このはなしなにの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: こゑ一ぢよのはなしなるぞや
verses.kanji: この話何の事やと思うなよ   肥一条の話なるぞや
verses.en: Never wonder what the meaning of this talk is! I am talking to you single-heartedly about the matter of fertilizer.

verses.en_6th_ed: This fertilizer: do not wonder what is effective. The mind's true sincerity is its effectiveness.
verses.ro: koe ya tote nani ga kiku towa omouna yo   kokoro no makoto shinjitsu ga kiku
verses.jp1: こへやとてなにがきくとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 心のまことしんぢつがきく
verses.kanji: 肥やとて何が効くとは思うなよ   心の誠真実が効く
verses.en: Speaking of the fertilizer, never wonder what is effective on the crop! It is the true sincerity of your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: When I have discerned your mind of sincerity, know that I shall provide any protection.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro misadame tsuita nara   ikana shugo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心みさだめついたなら
verses.jp2: いかなしゆこふもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 真実の心見定め付いたなら   如何な守護もすると思えよ
verses.en: When I have ascertained the sincerity of your mind, I will surely work whatever kind of protection.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen closely! I teach all things to everyone. I do not discriminate among any of you ever.
verses.ro: shikato kike yorozu no koto o mina oshie   doko ni hedate wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: しかときけよろつの事をみなをしへ
verses.jp2: どこにへだてわさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け万の事を皆教え   何処に隔ては更に無いぞや
verses.en: Listen attentively! I teach whatever kinds of things to you all, and never make any discrimination at all.

verses.en_6th_ed: People come to Me from whatever places. It is because they all are of the original causality.
verses.ro: dono yona tokoro no hito ga detekite mo   mina innen no mono de aru kara
verses.jp1: どのよふなところの人がでゝきても
verses.jp2: みないんねんのものであるから
verses.kanji: どの様な所の人が出て来ても   皆因縁の者で有るから
verses.en: From whatever places people may come to visit Me, it is because they all have original affinities to Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: This is the Residence where I began human beings. Because of this causality, it is here that I descended.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime dashitaru yashiki nari   sono innen de amakudarita de
verses.jp1: にんけんをはじめだしたるやしきなり
verses.jp2: そのいんねんであまくたりたで
verses.kanji: 人間を初め出したる屋敷なり   その因縁で天降りたで
verses.en: This is the Residence where I have created human beings. Because of this Preordination, here I have revealed Myself.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall teach all about My workings for the salvation of everyone throughout the world.
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju o ichiretsu ni   tasuke shugo o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このさきハせかいぢううを一れつに
verses.jp2: たすけしゆごふをみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この先は世界中を一列に   救け守護を皆教えるで
verses.en: Henceforth I will teach the protection of salvation to people all over the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall teach all about universal salvation step by step, and solely distinguish between Kara and Nihon.
verses.ro: dandan to yorozu tasuke o mina oshie   kara to nihon o wakeru bakari ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼とよろづたすけをみなをしへ
verses.jp2: からとにほんをわけるばかりや
verses.kanji: 段々と万救けを皆教え   唐と日本を分けるばかりや
verses.en: Step by step I will teach any and every kind of salvation. And thus I will solely distinguish the region where My teachings shall spread later from the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the path that distinguishes between Kara and Nihon: this is the single intent of God's hastening.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kara to nihon o wakeru michi   Kami no sekikomi kore ga ichijo
verses.jp1: にち／＼にからとにほんをわけるみち
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみこれが一ぢよ
verses.kanji: 日々に唐と日本を分ける道   神の急き込みこれが一条
verses.en: I, God, am single-heartedly hastening day by day to distinguish the region where My teachings shall spread later from the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: If this path is quickly distinguished, everything will proceed as God intends.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku waketaru koto naraba   ato no yorozu wa Kami no mama nari
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくわけたる事ならば
verses.jp2: あとのよろづハ神のまゝなり
verses.kanji: この道を早く分けたる事ならば   後の万は神の侭なり
verses.en: If this way is quickly distinguished, thereafter everything will be managed as God intends.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today is the beginning of marvelous things. All of you will come along with Me because of the original causality.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanika mezurashi hajime dashi   yorozu innen mina tsuite kuru
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにかめづらしはじめだし
verses.jp2: よろづいんねんみなついてくる
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何か珍し初め出し   万因縁皆付いて来る
verses.en: Today I will begin something completely remarkable, and all who have affinities to Me will come along with Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: About causality: though people are numerous, never think that I discriminate among any of you.
verses.ro: innen mo oku no hito de aru karani   doko ni hedate wa aru to omouna
verses.jp1: いんねんもをふくの人であるからに
verses.jp2: とこにへだてハあるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 因縁も多くの人で有るからに   何処に隔ては有ると思うな
verses.en: Though there are numerous kinds of people, never think that there is any discrimination whatsoever between the affinity of one person and that of others!

verses.en_6th_ed: To God, who began this world, all of you in the world are equally My beloved children.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no koto naraba   sekai ichiretsu mina waga ko nari
verses.jp1: このよふを初た神の事ならば
verses.jp2: せかい一れつみなわがこなり
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の事ならば   世界一列皆我が子なり
verses.en: For Me, God, who created this world, all human beings are My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because of My love for all My children, I exhaust My mind in every kind of way.
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kodomo ga kawai sore yue ni   iroiro kokoro tsukushi kiru nari
verses.jp1: いちれつのこともがかハいそれゆへに
verses.jp2: いろ／＼心つくしきるなり
verses.kanji: 一列の子供が可愛いそれ故に   色々心尽くし切るなり
verses.en: Because of My love for all My children, I exert My mind and heart in every kind of way.

verses.en_6th_ed: I desire to teach everything to you children quickly. Take notice of this hastening in the mind of God!
verses.ro: kono kodomo nanimo oshiete hayabaya to   Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o miyo
verses.jp2: 神の心のせきこみをみよ
verses.kanji: この子供何も教えて早々と   神の心の急き込みを見よ
verses.en: I am in haste to teach you children any and everything. Look at this impatience of the mind of God!

verses.en_6th_ed: I wait impatiently for My children to awaken to the truth. There is nothing else in the thoughts of God.
verses.ro: dandan to kodomo no shusse machikaneru   Kami no omowaku kore bakari nari
verses.jp1: だん／＼とこどものしゆせまちかねる
verses.jp2: 神のをもわくこればかりなり
verses.kanji: 段々と子供の出世待ち兼ねる   神の思惑こればかりなり
verses.en: I am impatienly waiting for the spiritual awakening of you children step by step. This is the single truth of the intention of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: If I can only bring My children out into the open, I shall change Kara into Nihon.
verses.ro: kodomo sai hayaku omote i dashita nara   kara o nihon no jii ni suru nari
verses.jp1: こどもさいはやくをもていだしたなら
verses.jp2: からをにほんのぢいにするなり
verses.kanji: 子供さい早く表へ出したなら   唐を日本の地にするなり
verses.en: If only I can bring My children out to the fore, I will make the region where My teachings shall spread later into the region where My teachings spread.

verses.en_6th_ed: Make your minds truly firm, all My children! The mind of God only hastens.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kodomo no kokoro shikato seyo   Kami no kokoro wa seku bakari ya de
verses.jp1: しんぢつにこどもの心しかとせよ
verses.jp2: 神の心ハせくばかりやで
verses.kanji: 真実に子供の心確とせよ   神の心は急くばかりやで
verses.en: Truly affirm your minds, all My children! The mind of God is solely hastening it impatiently.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, God hastens in agony. Please, quickly make preparations for salvation.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no sekikomi kono nayami   hayaku tasukeru moyo shite kure
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のせきこみこのなやみ
verses.jp2: はやくたすけるもよふしてくれ
verses.kanji: 日々に神の急き込みこの悩み   早く救ける模様して呉れ
verses.en: I, God, ask you to arrange to accomplish My salvation, to drive away this daily impatience and agony of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Thinking of the high places, those of you within are depressed. But fear not, for God assures you.
verses.ro: uchi naru wa kami o omote izumi iru   kowami nai zo ya Kami no ukeyai
verses.jp1: うちなるハ上をふもふていづみいる
verses.jp2: こわみないぞや神のうけやい
verses.kanji: 内なるは上を思うていずみ居る   怖み無いぞや神の請け合い
verses.en: The people who are familiar with Me are hesitating, because they are afraid of the upper people. But there is nothing to be afraid of as I, God, assure it.

verses.en_6th_ed: The path already differs from what it once was. Hurry! Hasten to the broad path!
verses.ro: imamade to michi ga kawarite aru hodoni   hayaku sekikomi okwan no michi
verses.jp1: いまゝでとみちがかわりてあるほどに
verses.jp2: はやくせきこみをふくハんのみち
verses.kanji: 今迄と道が変わりて有る程に   早く急き込み往還の道
verses.en: The way has already been changed from what it was. Hurry and go out to the broad way!

verses.en_6th_ed: You are wondering when this path will come. Come out quickly, now is the time!
verses.ro: kono michi wa itsu no koto ya to omote iru   hayaku dete miyo mo ima no koto
verses.jp1: このみちハいつの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: はやくてゝみよもふいまの事
verses.kanji: この道は何時の事やと思うて居る   早く出て見よもう今の事
verses.en: You are wondering when such a way will come. Go out quickly! It is an immediate matter.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I have informed you by My writing brush. Quickly awaken your mind to it!
verses.ro: dandan to fude ni shirashite aru hodoni   hayaku kokoro ni satori toru yo
verses.jp1: だん／＼とふてにしらしてあるほどに
verses.jp2: はやく心にさとりとるよふ
verses.kanji: 段々と筆に知らして有る程に   早く心に悟り取るよう
verses.en: Indeed, step by step I have informed you with My writing brush. Quickly awaken your mind to it!

verses.en_6th_ed: If you only come to understand this quickly, your sufferings of the body will be cleared away.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku satori ga tsuita nara   minouchi nayami suzuyaka ni naru
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくさとりがついたなら
verses.jp2: みのうちなやみすゞやかになる
verses.kanji: これさいか早く悟りが付いたなら   身の内悩み涼やかになる
verses.en: If only you become convinced of this truth, the suffering of your body will be cleared away.

verses.en_6th_ed: About the Service: first the Teodori, then the Kagura. Thus, I have opened just a narrow path.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo hajime Teodori mata Kagura   choto no hosomichi tsukete aredomo
verses.jp1: つとめても初てをどりまたかぐら
verses.jp2: 一寸のほそみちつけてあれども
verses.kanji: 勤めでも初め手踊りまた神楽   一寸の細道付けて有れども
verses.en: Concerning the Service, I have taught the Teodori at first and then the Kagura. Thus I have already opened a narrow path.

verses.en_6th_ed: But weeds have gradually grown thick and the path is obscure. Quickly, the preparations to open the main path!
verses.ro: dandan to kusa ga shikorite michi shirezu   hayaku honmichi tsukeru moyo o
verses.jp1: だん／＼とくさがしこりてみちしれす
verses.jp2: はやくほんみちつけるもよふを
verses.kanji: 段々と草がしこりて道知れず   早く本道付ける模様を
verses.en: But weeds have gradually grown thick and the path is obscure. So, quickly begin arrangements for opening the main road!

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, hasten with spirited minds. If only the main path be quickly opened...
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kokoro isande sekikome yo   hayaku honmichi tsuketa koto nara
verses.jp1: にち／＼に心いさんでせきこめよ
verses.jp2: はやくほんみちつけた事なら
verses.kanji: 日々に心勇んで急き込めよ   早く本道付けた事なら
verses.en: Cheer up your mind day by day, and hurry up! If only the main road be quickly opened,

verses.en_6th_ed: When this main path is truly opened, thereafter you will lead a life full of joy and promise.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kono honmichi ga tsuita nara   sue wa tanomoshi yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつにこのほんみちがついたなら
verses.jp2: すへハたのもしよふきづくめや
verses.kanji: 真実にこの本道が付いたなら   末は頼もし陽気ずくめや
verses.en: When this main road is truly opened, you will enjoy the delightful and all joyous life in the future.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even more do I hasten to save the villagers. Please ponder quickly!
verses.ro: murakata wa naomo tasuke o sete iru   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: 村かたハなをもたすけをせへている
verses.jp2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: 村方は尚も救けを急いて居る   早く思案をして呉れるよう
verses.en: I am hastening to save the villagers still more quickly! Please ponder over it in haste!

verses.en_6th_ed: To God, people throughout the world are all My children. All of you equally, know that I am your Parent!
verses.ro: sekaiju Kami no ta niwa mina waga ko   ichiretsu wa mina Oya to omoe yo
verses.jp1: せかいぢう神のたあにハみなわがこ
verses.jp2: 一れつハみなをやとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 世界中神のたあには皆我が子   一列は皆親と思えよ
verses.en: For God, people of the whole world are all My children. All of you equally must understand that I am your Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: Throughout the world, I have begun what is known as sermons. When they are delivered, you may go and hear them.
verses.ro: sekaiju sekkyo to shite hajime kake   toite kikasuru kiki ni iku nari
verses.jp1: せかいぢうせきゝよとしてはちめかけ
verses.jp2: といてきかするきゝにいくなり
verses.kanji: 世界中説教として初め掛け   説いて聞かする聞きに行くなり
verses.en: All around the world, I have begun various sermons. When those are delivered, you may go and hear them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever may be said about things already seen, unless the origin is known, there can be no understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mietaru koto o yuta tote   moto o shiraneba wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp1: いかほどにみゑたる事をゆうたとて
verses.jp2: もとをしらねばハかるめハなし
verses.kanji: 如何程に見えたる事を言うたとて   元を知らねば分かるめは無し
verses.en: However skillfully they may preach things which have already appeared, the truth will not be expounded. Because they do not know the origin.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall tell you solely about things unknown. When they appear, you will know that it is the truth.
verses.ro: dandan to nai koto bakari yute oite   sore deta naraba kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼とない事ばかりゆてをいて
verses.jp2: それでたならばこれがまことや
verses.kanji: 段々と無い事ばかり言うて置いて   それ出たならばこれが誠や
verses.en: One by one I will tell you things which do not yet exist. When it is realized, you will understand that My word is true.

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you children who lean on God, quickly make preparations to go out into the open.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni Kami ni motareru kono kodomo   hayaku omote i deru moyo seyo
verses.jp1: 一れつに神にもたれるこのこども
verses.jp2: はやくをもていでるもよふせよ
verses.kanji: 一列に神に凭れるこの子供   早く表へ出る模様せよ
verses.en: All of you children who lean upon God, quickly prepare to go out to the fore!

verses.en_6th_ed: If you truly desire to go out into the open, calm your mind and seek the core.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni omote deyo to omou nara   kokoro shizumete shin o tazune yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつにをもてゞよふとをもうなら
verses.jp2: 心しづめてしんをたづねよ
verses.kanji: 真実に表へ出ようと思うなら   心静めて真を訪ねよ
verses.en: If you truly wish to go out to the fore, calm your mind and look for the core of the world!

verses.en_6th_ed: You children, when the innermost heart has been truly ascertained, you shall have all My arrangements.
verses.ro: kono kodomo shinjitsu yori mo mune no uchi   misadame tsukeba ikana moyo mo
verses.jp1: このこどもしんぢつよりもむねのうち
verses.jp2: みさだめつけばいかなもよふも
verses.kanji: この子供真実よりも胸の内   見定め付けば如何な模様も
verses.en: When I truly ascertain the innermost hearts of these children, I will prepare any and every work.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though the mind of God hastens day after day, there is no understanding in the minds of you children.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro wa sekikomedo   kodomo no kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心わせきこめど
verses.jp2: こともの心わかりないので
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心は急き込めど   子供の心分かり無いので
verses.en: Day by day the mind of God is impatiently hastening. But the minds of children cannot understand it.

verses.en_6th_ed: With My children, as their number is not small, there are so many whose heart is yet without understanding.
verses.ro: kodomo demo chotto no hito dewa nai karani   oku no mune ga sarani wakaran
verses.jp1: こともでも一寸の人でハないからに
verses.jp2: をふくのむねがさらにハからん
verses.kanji: 子供でも一寸の人では無いからに   多くの胸が更に分からん
verses.en: Speaking of My children, as their number is not small, it is more difficult to open so many minds to reason.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though people speak highly of a thing called learning, no one knows of things yet unseen.
verses.ro: imamade wa gakumon nazo to yuta tote   miete nai koto sarani shiromai
verses.jp1: いまゝでハがくもんなぞとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: みゑてない事さらにしろまい
verses.kanji: 今迄は学問なぞと言うたとて   見えて無い事更に知ろまい
verses.en: Until now there has been a matter which is called learning. But you can never know things which have not yet appeared.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall teach you any and all things yet unseen, step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa miete nai koto dandan to   yorozu no koto o mina toite oku
verses.jp1: このさきハみへてない事だん／＼と
verses.jp2: よろずの事をみなといてをく
verses.kanji: この先は見えて無い事段々と   万の事を皆説いて置く
verses.en: Henceforth I will teach you one by one all matters which have not yet appeared.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, step by step, I shall teach you the Service unknown since this world began and train you in its hand movements.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono yo hajimete nai Tsutome   dandan oshie te o tsukeru nari
verses.jp1: これからハこのよはじめてないつとめ
verses.jp2: だん／＼をしへてをつけるなり
verses.kanji: これからはこの世初めて無い勤め   段々教え手を付けるなり
verses.en: From now on I will teach you the Service which has never existed since the creation of this world, and train you in the hand-gestures of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: This Service is the path of salvation for the entire world. I shall enable even a mute to speak.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome sekaiju no tasuke michi   oshi demo mono o yuwasu koto nari
verses.jp1: このつとめせかいぢううのたすけみち
verses.jp2: をしでもものをゆハす事なり
verses.kanji: この勤め世界中の救け道   唖でも物を言わす事なり
verses.en: Verily this Service is the way to save the whole world. Through this even a mute begins to speak.

verses.en_6th_ed: Be firm day after day, you performers of the Service! Calm your minds and learn the hand movements quickly!
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsutome no ninju shikato seyo   kokoro shizumete hayaku te o tsuke
verses.jp1: にち／＼につとめのにんぢうしかとせよ
verses.jp2: 心しづめてはやくてをつけ
verses.kanji: 日々に勤めの人衆確とせよ   心静めて早く手を付け
verses.en: Determine your minds day after day, you the members of the Service! You must learn the hand-gestures quickly, keeping your minds calm.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this Service is about? It is solely to bring peace to the world and salvation to all.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome nanino koto ya to omote iru   sekai osamete tasuke bakari o
verses.jp1: このつとめなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: せかいをさめてたすけばかりを
verses.kanji: この勤め何の事やと思うて居る   世界治めて救けばかりを
verses.en: What do you think this Service is? Through it I will bring peace to the world and thus single-heartedly save all mankind.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this path is clearly seen, the root of illness will be cut off entirely.
verses.ro: kono michi ga tashika mietaru koto naraba   yamai no ne wa kirete shimau de
verses.jp1: このみちがたしかみゑたる事ならば
verses.jp2: やまいのねゑわきれてしまうで
verses.kanji: この道が確か見えたる事ならば   病の根は切れてしまうで
verses.en: When this way is surely realized, the root of disease will be cut off.

verses.en_6th_ed: According to your mind of sincerity, I deny My protection to no one, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai ni izukata mo   ikana shugo mo sen to yuwan de
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心しだいにいづかたも
verses.jp2: いかなしゆごふもせんとゆハんで
verses.en: If only I find sincerity in your mind, I will not deny any protection to you, whoever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: About the present path: God is hastening. Those of you within need not worry. Watch carefully!
verses.ro: ima no michi Kami no sekikomi uchi naru wa   anji nai zo ya shikato mite iyo
verses.jp1: いまのみち神のせきこみうちなるハ
verses.jp2: あんぢないぞやしかとみていよ
verses.kanji: 今の道神の急き込み内なるは   案じ無いぞや確と見て居よ
verses.en: As it is God who is impatiently hastening the present way, there is nothing to fear for those who are familiar with Me. Wait and watch carefully!

verses.en_6th_ed: I have already told you the path will be changed from what it was until now. There is no mistake in what God says.
verses.ro: koremade to michi ga kawaru to yute aru   Kami wa chigota koto wa yuwan de
verses.jp1: これまでとみちがかわるとゆうてある
verses.jp2: 神ハちごふた事ハゆハんで
verses.kanji: これ迄と道が変わると言うて有る   神は違うた事は言わんで
verses.en: I have foretold you that the way will be changed. God never says what shall not be realized.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall not be able to tell you of this growing impatience in the mind of God, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o   kuchi dewa domu yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp1: このさきハ神の心のせきこみを
verses.jp2: くちでハどふむゆうにゆハれん
verses.kanji: この先は神の心の急き込みを   口ではどうも言うに言われん
verses.en: Henceforth I cannot tell you by mouth the impatience of the mind of God, even though I may endeavor to do so.

verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult it may be, if things are left untold, there will be no chance of understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   tokazu ni ite wa wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: とかすにいてハわかるめハなし
verses.kanji: 如何程に難し事と言うたとて   説かずに居ては分かるめは無し
verses.en: However difficult it may be, unless I teach it to you, you　will not be able to understand.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day and step by step, I shall teach you the thoughts of God. Please listen to Me.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no omowaku dandan to   toite oku zo ya kore kiite kure
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のをもわくだんだんと
verses.jp2: といてをくぞやこれきいてくれ
verses.kanji: 日々に神の思惑段々と   説いて置くぞやこれ聞いて呉れ
verses.en: Day after day I will reveal to you the divine intention of God. Please listen and understand it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: This path may be somewhat difficult, but it is marvelous indeed. Watch it carefully.
verses.ro: kono michi wa nanika mutsukashi mezurashii   michi de aru zo ya tashika mite iyo
verses.jp1: このみちハなにかむつかしめつらしい
verses.jp2: みちであるぞやたしかみていよ
verses.kanji: この道は何か難し珍しい   道で有るぞや確か見て居よ
verses.en: This way is somewhat difficult but remarkable indeed. Wait and watch it surely!

verses.en_6th_ed: After you have completed taking this path, Kara will have become part of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono michi o torinuketara sonosaki wa   kara wa nihon no jii ni shite aru
verses.jp1: このみちをとふりぬけたらそのさきハ
verses.jp2: からハにほんのぢいにしてある
verses.kanji: この道を通り抜けたらその先は   唐は日本の地にして有る
verses.en: When we have passed through this way, the region where My teachings shall spread later will be made the region where My teachings spread.

verses.en_6th_ed: When Kara becomes Nihon, this will be the passage to eternal joy.
verses.ro: kara no ji o nihon no jii ni shita naraba   kore matsudai no iki dori nari
verses.jp1: からのぢをにほんぢいにしたならば
verses.jp2: これまつだいのいきどふりなり
verses.kanji: 唐の地を日本の地にしたならば   これ末代の生き通りなり
verses.en: When the region where My teachings shall spread later is made the region where My teachings spread, this joy will continue living eternally.

verses.en_6th_ed: The high places rule this world, but Heaven is also high. I shall make a distinction between the minds of the high places and the mind of God.
verses.ro: kono yo o osameru mo kami ten mo Kami   kami to Kami to no kokoro wakeru de
verses.jp1: このよふを納も上天もかみ
verses.jp2: 上と神との心わけるで
verses.kanji: この世を治めるも上天も神   上と神との心分けるで
verses.en: Those who govern this world are called kami, and Heaven is also called Kami, and I will distinguish the mind of God from those of the upper people.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall tell you about things yet unseen. When they come into sight in the future, it is God!
verses.ro: dandan to mien koto oba yute oite   saki de mietara kore ga Kami ya de
verses.jp1: だん／＼とみゑん事をばゆてをいて
verses.jp2: さきでみゑたらこれが神やで
verses.kanji: 段々と見えん事をば言うて置いて   先で見えたらこれが神やで
verses.en: One by one I will foretell you things yet unseen. When they are realized, it is the proof that these are the words of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter what people say about things already seen, if what is said is not seen in the future, perhaps there is no understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mietaru koto o yuta tote   saki de mieneba wakari arumai
verses.jp1: いかほどにみゑたる事をゆうたとて
verses.jp2: さきでみゑねはわかりあるまい
verses.kanji: 如何程に見えたる事を言うたとて   先で見えねば分かり有るまい
verses.en: However minutely one can explain things which are already visible, if one's words are not realized in the future, one cannot be said to know everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall bring understanding by making a distinction in the innermost hearts of both the high and the low all over the world.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekaiju no mune no uchi   kami shimo tomoni wakete miseru de
verses.jp1: これからハせかいぢううのむねのうち
verses.jp2: 上下ともにわけてみせるで
verses.kanji: これからは世界中の胸の内   上下共に分けて見せるで
verses.en: Henceforth I will distinguish between the innermost hearts of people of the whole world, the upper and lower people equally.

verses.en_6th_ed: Watch! I shall cleanse the innermost hearts of those within and all others in the world without discrimination.
verses.ro: kore o miyo sekai mo uchi mo hedate nai   mune no uchi yori soji suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これをみよせかいもうちもへたてない
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりそふぢするぞや
verses.kanji: これを見よ世界も内も隔て無い   胸の内より掃除するぞや
verses.en: Look at this! I will clean up the innermost hearts of both those who are familiar with Me and the worldly people without any discrimination.

verses.en_6th_ed: This cleansing will be a difficult matter, but I say to you beforehand: there is nothing to be called illness.
verses.ro: kono soji mutsukashi koto de aru keredo   yamai to yu wa nai to yute oku
verses.jp1: このそふぢむつかし事であるけれど
verses.jp2: やまいとゆうわないとゆてをく
verses.kanji: この掃除難し事で有るけれど   病と言うは無いと言うて置く
verses.en: This sweeping may be difficult to accomplish. But I warn you: there is nothing to be called illness.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever pains, sufferings, tumors, fevers, or looseness of the bowels: all are from dust.
verses.ro: dono yona itami nayami mo dekemono ya   netsu mo kudari mo mina hokori ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふないたみなやみもでけものや
verses.jp2: ねつもくだりもみなほこりやで
verses.kanji: どの様な痛み悩みも出来物や   熱も下りも皆埃やで
verses.en: Whatever kinds of pains, sufferings, swellings, fevers or loose bowels are nothing but dust.

verses.en_6th_ed: Not since I began this world have I taught everything to those in high places.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nanimo kamo   kami e oshieta koto wa arumai
verses.jp1: このよふを初てからになにもかも
verses.jp2: 上ゑをしへた事ハあるまい
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに何もかも   上へ教えた事は有るまい
verses.en: Since the creation I have never taught anything to the upper people.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, if I should inform those in high places about the truth of any and all matters,
verses.ro: konotabi wa nanika yorozu o kami taru e   shirashite oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このたびハなにかよろづを上たるゑ
verses.jp2: しらしてをいた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この度は何か万を上たるへ   知らして置いた事で有るなら
verses.en: But this time I will teach any and everything to the upper people.

verses.en_6th_ed: Then, some among them may ponder. And if they all gather and speak to one another,
verses.ro: sorekara wa naka niwa shiyan suru mo aro   mina yoriyote hanashi shita nara
verses.jp1: それからハなかにハしやんするもあろ
verses.jp2: みなよりよふてはなししたなら
verses.kanji: それからは中には思案するも有ろう   皆寄り合うて話したなら
verses.en: Then someone among them may ponder and, gathering altogether, talk about the matter to each other.

verses.en_6th_ed: Some among them will understand and truly feel hopeful over the teachings.
verses.ro: sono naka ni shinjitsu kokoro tanomoshii   omote shiyan o suru mono mo aru
verses.jp1: そのなかにしんぢつ心たのもしい
verses.jp2: をもてしやんをするものもある
verses.kanji: その中に真実心頼もしい   思うて思案をする者も有る
verses.en: Among them there may be some who think that this is indeed the true and trustworthy teaching.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this path reaches through to the high places, God will reveal free and unlimited workings at once.
verses.ro: kono michi o kami e torita koto naraba   Kami no juyo suguni arawasu
verses.jp1: このみちを上ゑとふりた事ならば
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふすぐにあらわす
verses.kanji: この道を上へ通りた事ならば   神の自由直ぐに表す
verses.en: When this way becomes understood by the upper people, I will manifest My omnipotence at once.
