verses.en_6th_ed: I have not yet shown you any of the free and unlimited workings of God, who began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no juyo o   misetaru koto wa sarani nai node
verses.jp1: このよふを初た神のぢうよふを
verses.jp2: みせたる事ハさらにないので
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の自由を   見せたる事は更に無いので
verses.en: I have not yet manifested the omnipotence of God who created this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: In everything, as long as you know nothing, you remain as you are. But if I let you know of God's free and unlimited workings,
verses.ro: nani nitemo shiran aida wa sono mama ya   Kami no juyo shirashitaru nara
verses.jp1: なにゝてもしらんあいだハそのまゝや
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふしらしたるなら
verses.kanji: 何にても知らん間はその侭や   神の自由知らしたるなら
verses.en: On whatever kinds of things, as long as you know nothing, you remain as you were. But if I let you know the omnipotence of God,

verses.en_6th_ed: On hearing of it, all of you in the world must ponder. Any and all matters are according to the mind.
verses.ro: kore kiite mina ichiretsu wa shiyan seyo   nanika yorozu wa kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: これきいてみな一れつわしやんせよ
verses.jp2: なにかよろつハ心しだいや
verses.kanji: これ聞いて皆一列は思案せよ   何か万は心次第や
verses.en: On hearing this, all of you must ponder over it deeply. Any and everything will be manifested in accord with the working of your minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, nothing can be seen, but be watchful! In the sixth month, everything will begin to appear.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani ga mieru ya nai keredo   roku gatsu o miyo mina dekakeru de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにがみへるやないけれど
verses.jp2: 六月をみよみなでかけるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何が見えるや無いけれど   六月を見よ皆出掛けるで
verses.en: At present you can see nothing. But look on the sixth month! Everything will begin to appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, the high mountains have been boastful while the low valleys withered.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to yute iru   tanisoko nitewa shiken bakari o
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ高い山やとゆうている
verses.jp2: たにそこにてハしけんばかりを
verses.kanji: 今迄は高い山やと言うて居る   谷底にては時化んばかりを
verses.en: Hitherto some have been boasting on the high mountains, and others were going to wither at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall teach both the high mountains and the low valleys about the beginnings of origin.
verses.ro: korekara wa takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   moto hajimari o yute kikasuru
verses.jp1: これからわ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: もとはじまりをゆうてきかする
verses.kanji: これからは高山にても谷底も   元初まりを言うて聞かする
verses.en: From now on I will teach you both on the high mountains and at the bottoms of the valleys how this world was created.

verses.en_6th_ed: The beginning of this universe was a muddy ocean. Therein were only loaches.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi wa doro no umi   sono naka yori mo dojo bakari ya
verses.jp1: このよふのはぢまりだしハとろのうみ
verses.jp2: そのなかよりもどちよばかりや
verses.kanji: この世の初まり出しは泥の海   その中よりも泥鰌ばかりや
verses.en: At the beginning this universe was a muddy ocean. And therein were living only a numerous number of loaches.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think these loaches were? They were the very seeds of human beings.
verses.ro: kono dojo nanino koto ya to omote iru   kore ningen no tane de aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このどぢよなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: これにんけんのたねであるそや
verses.kanji: この泥鰌何の事やと思うて居る   これ人間の種で有るぞや
verses.en: What do you think these loaches were? They were the very seeds of human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: God drew them up and consumed them all, and through providence brought them up into human beings step by step.
verses.ro: kono mono o Kami ga hikiage kute shimote   dandan shugo ningen to nashi
verses.jp1: このものを神がひきあけくてしもて
verses.jp2: だん／＼しゆごふにんけんとなし
verses.kanji: この者を神が引き上げ喰うてしもて   段々守護人間と成し
verses.en: Dipping them up, God ate all of them and step by step through divine protection brought them up into human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: From that time on, God's providence has been by no means an easy matter.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Kami no shugo to yu mono wa   nami taitei na koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: それよりも神のしゆことゆうものわ
verses.jp2: なみたいていな事でないぞや
verses.kanji: それよりも神の守護と言うものは   並大抵な事で無いぞや
verses.en: From that time on God has exerted an extraordinary effort to protect the growth of man.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of this talk as being trivial. I desire to save all people in the world.
verses.ro: kono hanashi chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   sekai ichiretsu tasuketai kara
verses.jp1: このはなし一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: せかい一れつたすけたいから
verses.kanji: この話一寸の事やと思うなよ   世界一列救けたいから
verses.en: Never think that this talk is a mere trifle! I wish indeed to save all people of the world equally.

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the mind of God is truly filled with deep concerns for you day after day.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no shinjitsu wa   fukai omowaku aru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のしんぢつわ
verses.jp2: ふかいをもわくあるとをもへよ
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の真実は   深い思惑有ると思えよ
verses.en: You must understand that day after day there is deep intention in the true sincerity of the mind of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, to God's regret, Nihon has been dominated, obeying those of Kara.
verses.ro: imamade wa nihon ga kara ni shitagote   mamani shirareta Kami no zannen
verses.jp1: いまゝでハにほんかからにしたごふて
verses.jp2: まゝにしられた神のざんねん
verses.kanji: 今迄は日本が唐に従ごうて   侭にしられた神の残念
verses.en: Until now the people of the region where My teachings spread early have been following after and have been under the control of the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later. This is the reason of the regret of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Watch the workings of God given in return! No one will be able to imitate Me, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: kono kayashi Kami no hataraki kore o miyo   ikana mono demo mane wa dekemai
verses.jp1: このかやし神のはたらきこれをみよ
verses.jp2: いかなものでもまねわでけまい
verses.kanji: この返し神の働きこれを見よ   如何な者でも真似は出来まい
verses.en: In return for this I, God, will manifest My work. Look at this! No one will be able to imitate it, whoever he may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how strong they may be, if God should withdraw, they will be powerless.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki taru to yuta tote   Kami ga shirizoku kore kanaimai
verses.jp1: いかほどのごふてきたるとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 神がしりぞくこれかないまい
verses.kanji: 如何程の強敵たると言うたとて   神が退くこれ敵いまい
verses.en: However strong you may be; you will be able to do nothing, if God withdraws from your body.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is the same as this for everyone in all matters. Know that God will work freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: nani nitemo mina ichiretsu wa kono dori   Kami ga juyo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: なにゝてもみな一れつハこのどふり
verses.jp2: 神がぢうよふするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 何にても皆一列はこの道理   神が自由すると思えよ
verses.en: It is the same as this for any and every person and on whatever kinds of matters. You must understand the omnipotence of God in all cases.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder well! No matter how young, old, or weak you may be, I shall give you My free and unlimited workings according to your mind.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo wakai toshiyori yowaki demo   kokoro shidai ni ikana juyo
verses.jp1: しやんせよハかいとしよりよハきでも
verses.jp2: 心しだいにいかなぢうよふ
verses.kanji: 思案せよ若い年寄り弱きでも   心次第に如何な自由
verses.en: Ponder over it well! No matter how young, old or weak you may be, you will be protected with My omnipotence as your mind deserves.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though you have lived in the same way, none of you has known of God's free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: imamade mo onaji kurashite itaru tomo   Kami no juyo shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: いまゝでもをなぢくらしていたるとも
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 今迄も同じ暮らして居たるとも   神の自由知りた者無し
verses.en: Until now you have been living just as you do now. But there has been no one who understands the omnipotence of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall teach you about any and all matters. Make certain you make no errors of the mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa yorozu no koto o mina tokude   kokoro chigai no nai yoni seyo
verses.jp1: これからハよろづの事をみなとくで
verses.jp2: 心ちがいのないよふにせよ
verses.kanji: これからは万の事を皆説くで   心違いの無い様にせよ
verses.en: Henceforth I will teach you any and everything. Take care lest you should misuse your mind!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been much talk of rebirth as oxen or horses, but there has been no one who knows his past or future.
verses.ro: imamade wa gyuba to yu wa mama aredo   ato saki shireta koto wa arumai
verses.jp1: いまゝでハぎうばとゆうハまゝあれど
verses.jp2: あとさきしれた事ハあるまい
verses.kanji: 今迄は牛馬と言うは侭有れど   後先知れた事は有るまい
verses.en: Until now it has been said that some people will occasionally be reborn as oxen or horses. But there has been no one who knows one's previous and future lives.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall make your future known in this life: look at the disorder of the body!
verses.ro: konotabi wa saki naru koto o kono yo kara   shirashite oku de mi ni sawari miyo
verses.jp1: このたびハさきなる事を此よから
verses.jp2: しらしてをくでみにさハりみよ
verses.kanji: この度は先なる事をこの世から   知らして置くで身に障り見よ
verses.en: This time I will let you know your future life while you are still alive. Look at the disorders in your own bodies!

verses.en_6th_ed: In this world, however much you may be concerned about yourself, you are helpless against the anger of God.
verses.ro: kono yo wa ika hodo waga mi omotemo   Kami no rippuku kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: このよふハいかほどハがみをもふても
verses.jp2: 神のりいふくこれハかなハん
verses.kanji: この世は如何程我が身思うても   神の立腹これは敵わん
verses.en: In this world, however well you may think of your own selves, you are not match against the anger of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: None of you needs self-centered concern. God will distinguish between each of you.
verses.ro: meme ni waga mi shiyan wa iran mono   Kami ga sorezore miwake suru zo ya
verses.jp1: めへ／＼にハがみしやんハいらんもの
verses.jp2: 神がそれ／＼みわけするぞや
verses.kanji: 銘々に我が身思案は要らんもの   神がそれぞれ見分けするぞや
verses.en: Each of you need not worry about yourselves. God will distinguish between each of you just as you deserve.

verses.en_6th_ed: Among those living in the same residence, know that there are both god and buddha.
verses.ro: hito yashiki onaji kurashite iru uchi ni   Kami mo hotoke mo aru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 一やしきをなじくらしているうちに
verses.jp2: 神もほとけもあるとをもへよ
verses.kanji: 一屋敷同じ暮らして居るうちに   神も仏も有ると思えよ
verses.en: Among the members of a family living in one residence, there is as great a difference as that between god and Buddha.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you see this, be convinced, whoever you may be: God will distinguish between good and evil.
verses.ro: kore o mite ikana mono demo tokushin se   zen to aku to o wakete miseru de
verses.jp1: これをみていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp2: 善とあくとをわけてみせるで
verses.kanji: これを見て如何な者でも得心せ   善と悪とを分けて見せるで
verses.en: Looking at this, whatever kind of person you may be, you must become convinced of the truth that I, God, will distinguish good from evil.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over this talk, all of you in the world. There is no mind the same as another.
verses.ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu wa shiyan seyo   onaji kokoro wa sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このはなしみな一れつハしやんせよ
verses.jp2: をなじ心わさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この話皆一列は思案せよ   同じ心は更に有るまい
verses.en: Ponder deeply over this talk, all of you! There is indeed no mind which is completely the same as another.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even between parent and child, husband and wife, and brothers and sisters: their minds all differ from one another.
verses.ro: oyako demo fufu no naka mo kyodai mo   mina meme ni kokoro chigau de
verses.jp1: をやこでもふう／＼のなかもきよたいも
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼に心ちがうで
verses.kanji: 親子でも夫婦の仲も兄弟も   皆銘々に心違うで
verses.en: Even between parents and children, husband and wife or brothers and sisters, their minds all differ from each other.

verses.en_6th_ed: Indicating no one in the world in particular, I say to you: dust in the mind causes disorders of the body.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no mono towa yuwan de na   kokoro no hokori mi ni sawari tsuku
verses.jp1: せかいぢうどこのものとハゆハんでな
verses.jp2: 心のほこりみにさハりつく
verses.kanji: 世界中何処の者とは言わんでな   心の埃身に障り付く
verses.en: I do not indicate any person or place in the world in particular. The dust of the mind causes disorders of the body.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over your sufferings of the body and then ponder the mind that leans on God.
verses.ro: minouchi no nayamu koto oba shiyan shite   Kami ni motareru kokoro shiyan se
verses.jp1: みのうちのなやむ事をばしやんして
verses.jp2: 神にもたれる心しやんせ
verses.kanji: 身の内の悩む事をば思案して   神に凭れる心思案せ
verses.en: Pondering over the suffering of your body, determine your mind to lean upon God!

verses.en_6th_ed: It does not matter how difficult your condition may be, for God desires to reveal free and unlimited workings quickly.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami no juyo hayaku misetai
verses.jp1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふはやくみせたい
verses.kanji: どの様な難し事と言うたとて   神の自由早く見せたい
verses.en: However difficult your circumstances may be, I desire to reveal quickly the omnipotence of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been no one who knows the truth of God's free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami no juyo shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nai node
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ神のぢうよふしんぢつを
verses.jp2: しりたるものさらにないので
verses.kanji: 今迄は神の自由真実を   知りたる者は更に無いので
verses.en: Until now there has been no one who knows the truth of the omnipotence of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, no matter how serious your illness may be, nothing is incurable. It depends on your mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa ikana mutsukashi yamai demo   kokoro shidai ni naorande nashi
verses.jp1: これからハいかなむつかしやまいでも
verses.jp2: 心したいになをらんでなし
verses.kanji: これからは如何な難し病でも       心次第に直らんで無し
verses.en: From now on, however serious your illness may be, you will be cured, depending on the way you use your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: If God accepts your mind of sincerity, I shall work freely and unlimitedly in any matter.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro o Kami ga uketoreba   ikana juyo shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心を神がうけとれば
verses.jp2: いかなぢうよふしてみせるてな
verses.kanji: 真実の心を神が受け取れば   如何な自由して見せるでな
verses.en: When I, God, have accepted the true sincerity of your mind, I will work any and every kind of omnipotence.

verses.en_6th_ed: You close to Me, quickly become enlightened in this teaching of the truth of God.
verses.ro: kora hodono Kami no shinjitsu kono hanashi   soba naru mono wa hayaku satore yo
verses.jp1: こらほどの神のしんぢつこのはなし
verses.jp2: そばなるものハはやくさとれよ
verses.kanji: こら程の神の真実この話   側なる者は早く悟れよ
verses.en: You who are close to Me must quickly understand this true sincerity of God who is admonishing you so earnestly.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you quickly become enlightened in this one matter, everything will proceed accordingly.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku satori ga tsuita nara   nani ni tsuitemo mina kono dori
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくさとりがついたなら
verses.jp2: なにゝついてもみなこのどふり
verses.kanji: これさいか早く悟りが付いたなら   何に就いても皆この道理
verses.en: If only you can quickly understand this, it will be the same for everything else.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, I have never hastened you in any way. Now, I hasten you toward the broad path.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani yono koto mo sekane domo   mo sekikomu de okwan no michi
verses.jp1: けふまでハなによの事もせかねとも
verses.jp2: もふせきこむでをふくハんのみち
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何よの事も急かねども   もう急き込むで往還の道
verses.en: Until today I have never hastened you in any matters. But now I hasten your going out to the broad way.

verses.en_6th_ed: Never think this path is worldly common. It is the beginning of the Divine Record for eternity.
verses.ro: kono michi wa sekainami towa omouna yo   kore matsudai no Koki hajimari
verses.jp1: このみちハせかいなみとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: これまつだいのこふきはぢまり
verses.kanji: この道は世界並とは思うなよ   これ末代のこうき初まり
verses.en: Never take this way to be wordly common! This is the beginning of the Koki, the Divine Record, for eternity.

verses.en_6th_ed: I do not say where the performers will be found. All will come because of disorders of the body.
verses.ro: kono ninju doko ni aru towa yuwan de na   minouchi sawari mina kuru de aro
verses.jp1: このにんぢうとこにあるとハゆハんでな
verses.jp2: みのうちさハりみなくるであろ
verses.kanji: この人衆何処に有るとは言わんでな   身の内障り皆来るで有ろ
verses.en: I do not mention where these performers will be found. All shall gather around Me on account of the disorders of their bodies.

verses.en_6th_ed: These disorders are from My guidance, admonition, or anger. Ponder, each of you.
verses.ro: kono sawari tebiki iken mo rippuku mo   mina meme ni shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: このさハりてびきいけんもりいふくも
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼にしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: この障り手引き意見も立腹も   皆銘々に思案して見よ
verses.en: Among these disorders are included My guidance, admonition and anger. Ponder over your own case, each of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: What are your thoughts on hearing this talk? I appeal to you repeatedly out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   kawai amarite kudoku koto nari
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp2: かハいあまりてくどく事なり
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて聞いて居る   可愛い余りて口説く事なり
verses.en: With what feeling are you listening to My words? I persuade you repeatedly out of My profound love for you.

verses.en_6th_ed: However I may express My admonition or anger, I shall never say that you will not be saved.
verses.ro: dono yoni iken rippuku yuta tote   kore tasuken to sarani yuwan de
verses.jp1: どのよふにいけんりいふくゆうたとて
verses.jp2: これたすけんとさらにゆハんで
verses.kanji: どの様に意見立腹言うたとて   これ救けんと更に言わんで
verses.en: However strongly I may show anger and admonition, I will never say that any case is beyond My salvaton.

verses.en_6th_ed: Think of you humans admonishing your children. The anger, too, comes from love.
verses.ro: ningen no waga ko no iken omote miyo   hara no tatsu no mo kawai yue kara
verses.jp1: にんけんのハがこのいけんをもてみよ
verses.jp2: はらのたつのもかハいゆへから
verses.kanji: 人間の我が子の意見思うて見よ   腹の立つのも可愛い故から
verses.en: Think of a man admonishing his own children! The anger comes from his parmental love.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder and come follow Me with firm resolve. There is a path of hope in the future.
verses.ro: shiyan shite kokoro sadamete tsuitekoi   sue wa tanomoshi michi ga aru zo ya
verses.jp1: しやんして心さためてついてこい
verses.jp2: すゑハたのもしみちがあるぞや
verses.kanji: 思案して心定めて随いて来い   末は頼もし道が有るぞや
verses.en: After deep consideration, follow Me with resolute determination! In the future there shall appear a road of hope before you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, because the day had not yet come, I have overlooked your mistaken minds.
verses.ro: imamade wa kokoro chigai wa arita tote   hi ga kitarande miyurushite ita
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ心ちがいわありたとて
verses.jp2: ひがきたらんてみゆるしていた
verses.kanji: 今迄は心違いは有りたとて   日が来たらんで見許して居た
verses.en: Until now I have overlooked your misuse of the mind, because the day has not yet come.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I shall sweep clean your innermost heart. Be forewarned!
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo mune no uchi   soji o suru de mina shochi seyo
verses.jp1: このたびはなんでもかでもむねのうち
verses.jp2: そうちをするでみなしよちせよ
verses.kanji: この度は何でもかでも胸の内   掃除をするで皆承知せよ
verses.en: But this time I will by all means sweep dust from yourinnermost hearts. Be aware of it, all of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: The reason for this sweeping of your innermost heart is that the intent of God is deep.
verses.ro: mune no uchi soji o suru to yu no mo na   Kami no omowaku fukaku aru kara
verses.jp1: むねのうちそふぢをするとゆうのもな
verses.jp2: 神のをもハくふかくあるから
verses.kanji: 胸の内掃除をすると言うのもな   神の思惑深く有るから
verses.en: It is from the deep intention of God that I am going to sweep dust from your innermost hearts.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unless the sweeping is thoroughly accomplished, you will not understand the truth of My heart.
verses.ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitate sen koto ni   mune no shinjitsu wakari nai kara
verses.jp1: このそふぢすきやかしたてせん事に
verses.jp2: むねのしんぢつわかりないから
verses.kanji: この掃除清きやか仕立てせん事に   胸の真実分かり無いから
verses.en: Unless this sweeping clear is accomplished, you will remain ignorant of the true sincerity of My heart.

verses.en_6th_ed: When you have truly come to understand My mind, I shall teach you the hand movements of the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono kokoro shin kara wakari tsuita nara   kono yo hajimari te o tsukeru nari
verses.jp1: この心しんからわかりついたなら
verses.jp2: このよはぢまりてをつけるなり
verses.kanji: この心真から分かり付いたなら   この世初まり手を付けるなり
verses.en: When you have thoroughly understood My intention, I will teach you the hand-gestures of the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Take no short cuts. Have no greed or arrogance. Come out to the single and straight main path.
verses.ro: chikamichi mo yoku mo koman nai yoni   tada hitosuji no honmichi ni deyo
verses.jp1: ちかみちもよくもこふまんないように
verses.jp2: たゞ一すぢのほんみちにでよ
verses.kanji: 近道も欲も高慢無い様に   ただ一筋の本道に出よ
verses.en: Never be tempted by a short cut, avarice or arrogance! Go out to the single and straight main road!

verses.en_6th_ed: When you have come onto this path, this will be the Divine Record forever in Nihon.
verses.ro: kono michi ni tsuitaru naraba itsu made mo   kore nippon no Koki naru no ya
verses.jp1: このみちについたるならばいつまても
verses.jp2: これにいほんのこふきなるのや
verses.kanji: この道に付いたるならば何時迄も   これ日本のこうきなるのや
verses.en: If you firmly follow this way, it will become the Koki, the Divine Record, for eternity achieved in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: When the Divine Record is made in Nihon, I shall by all means manage Kara as I please.
verses.ro: nihon nimo Koki ga deketa koto naraba   nandemo kara o mamani suru nari
verses.jp1: にほんにもこふきがでけた事ならば
verses.jp2: なんでもからをまゝにするなり
verses.kanji: 日本にもこうきが出来た事ならば   何でも唐を侭にするなり
verses.en: When the Koki, the Divine Record, is written in the region where My teachings spread early, by all means I will make the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later understand Me as freely as I please.

verses.en_6th_ed: I have not spoken yet about the truth of those things that came after I began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara no shinjitsu o   mada imamade wa yuta koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふをはぢめてからのしんぢつを
verses.jp2: またいまゝでハゆうた事なし
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからの真実を   未だ今迄は言うた事無し
verses.en: Until now I have never told you about the truth since the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: This talk will be difficult to understand, but if it is left untold, no one will know.
verses.ro: kono hanashi mutsukashi koto de aru keredo   yuwazu ni ireba tare mo shiran de
verses.jp1: このはなしむつかし事であるけれど
verses.jp2: ゆハずにいればたれもしらんで
verses.kanji: この話難し事で有るけれど   言わずに居れば誰も知らんで
verses.en: This talk will be difficult to understand. But, if it is left untold, no one will be able to understand it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall tell you of any and all matters. Calm your mind and listen closely!
verses.ro: dandan to dono yona koto mo yute kikasu   kokoro shizumete shikato kiku nari
verses.jp1: たん／＼とどのよな事もゆてきかす
verses.jp2: 心しずめてしかときくなり
verses.kanji: 段々とどの様な事も言うて聞かす   心静めて確と聞くなり
verses.en: Step by step I will teach you any and everything. Therefore, calm your mind and listen attentively to My remarks!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been talk about various magical rites. From now on, they shall have no effect.
verses.ro: imanade wa ika naru ho to yuta tote   mo korekara wa ho wa kikande
verses.jp1: いまゝでハいかなるほふとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: もふこれからハほふハきかんで
verses.kanji: 今迄は如何なる法と言うたとて   もうこれからは法は効かんで
verses.en: Until now incantations have been said to be effective, but henceforth such rites shall become ineffective.

verses.en_6th_ed: In the past, such magical rites have been taught to the branches, but watch the future.
verses.ro: koremade wa edasaki nitewa ho nazo to   oshiete aredo saki o mite iyo
verses.jp1: これまてハゑださきにてわほふなぞと
verses.jp2: をしへてあれどさきをみていよ
verses.kanji: これ迄は枝先にては法なぞと   教えて有れど先を見て居よ
verses.en: Hitherto I have taught such rites at the twig part of the world. But look at things which shall appear in the future!

verses.en_6th_ed: Nihon has known nothing until now, but look forward to the future path.
verses.ro: nihon niwa imamade nanimo shirai demo   korekara saki no michi o tanoshume
verses.jp1: にほんにハいまゝでなにもしらいでも
verses.jp2: これからさきのみちをたのしゆめ
verses.kanji: 日本には今迄何も知らいでも   これから先の道を楽しめ
verses.en: The people of the region where My teachings spread early have known nothing until now. But anticipate the delightful way which shall appear in the future!

verses.en_6th_ed: About magical rites: do not wonder who is making them effective. They are worked by God, who began this world.
verses.ro: ho ya tote tare ga suru towa omouna yo   kono yo hajimeta Kami no nasu koto
verses.jp1: ほふやとてたれがするとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: このよ初た神のなす事
verses.kanji: 法やとて誰がするとは思うなよ   この世初めた神の為す事
verses.en: Never wonder who was making the incantations effective! It was also the work of God who created this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult matters may be, if only your sincerity is accepted by God...
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami ga shinjitsu uketorita nara
verses.jp1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 神がしんちつうけとりたなら
verses.kanji: どの様な難し事と言うたとて   神が真実受け取りたなら
verses.en: However serious your case may be, if only your sincerity is accepted by God, you shall all be saved.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been talk about Kara and Nihon, but from now on there will only be Nihon.
verses.ro: imamade wa kara ya nihon to yutaredo   korekara saki wa nihon bakari ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでハからやにほんとゆうたれど
verses.jp2: これからさきハにほんばかりや
verses.kanji: 今迄は唐や日本と言うたれど   これから先は日本ばかりや
verses.en: Hitherto I have spoken of the regions where My teachings shall spread early, later and last. But henceforth all shall become the region where My teachings spread.

verses.en_6th_ed: The branches may look big, but they are weak and break when handled. Watch the future.
verses.ro: edasaki wa oki ni miete akan mono   kamaeba oreru saki o mite iyo
verses.jp1: ゑださきハをふきにみへてあかんもの
verses.jp2: かまへばをれるさきをみていよ
verses.kanji: 枝先は大きに見えてあかんもの   かまえば折れる先を見て居よ
verses.en: The twigs may look bulky at a glance. But it will be easily snapped off at a touch. Look at the future!

verses.en_6th_ed: The origin may seem small, but the root is great. In all things, know the origin!
verses.ro: moto naru wa chiisai yo de ne ga erai   dono yona koto mo moto o shiru nari
verses.jp1: もとなるハちいさいよふでねがえらい
verses.jp2: とのよな事も元をしるなり
verses.kanji: 元なるは小さい様で根が偉い   どの様な事も元を知るなり
verses.en: The origin may look tiny. But the work of the root is great. So, on whatever kinds of things, it is necessary to know the origin.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think that incantations or magical arts are great. The mind's sincerity is the true art.
verses.ro: jitsu ya tote ho ga erai to omouna yo   kokoro no makoto kore ga shinjitsu
verses.jp1: ぢつやとてほふがへらいとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: こゝろのまことこれがしんぢつ
verses.kanji: 術やとて法が偉いと思うなよ   心の誠これが真実
verses.en: Never think that incantations or magical arts are great! True sincerity in your mind is itself the true art.

verses.en_6th_ed: As you humans are shallow, you say that all marvels are magic.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   mezurashi koto o ho nazo to yu
verses.jp1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp2: めづらし事をほふなぞとゆう
verses.kanji: 人間はあざないもので有るからに   珍し事を法なぞと言う
verses.en: As man is shallow-minded, he may attribute something remarkable to incantations or magic.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though God is openly revealed, there is yet no one who knows the truth.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami ga araware detaru tote   mada shinjitsu o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ神があらハれでたるとて
verses.jp2: まだしんぢつをしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 今迄は神が現れ出たるとて   未だ真実を知りた者無し
verses.en: Hitherto, though I, God, have already revealed Myself, there has been no one who knows the truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, when I have taught you the truth of all things,
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   oshiete oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このさきハどのよな事もしんじつを
verses.jp2: をしへてをいた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事も真実を   教えて置いた事で有るなら
verses.en: Henceforth I will teach you the truth of whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Then, I shall show you God's free and unlimited workings in all matters.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Kami no hataraki nanimo kamo   juyojizai o shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: それからハ神のはたらきなにもかも
verses.jp2: ぢうよじざいをしてみせるでな
verses.kanji: それからは神の働き何もかも   自由自在をして見せるでな
verses.en: Then I, God, will manifest the omnipotence of My working on any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: When God in Truth begins to work, the minds of all in the world will be purified.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami no hataraki shikaketara   sekai ichiretsu kokoro sumikiru
verses.jp1: しんぢつの神のはたらきしかけたら
verses.jp2: せかい一れつ心すみきる
verses.kanji: 真実の神の働き仕掛けたら   世界一列心澄み切る
verses.en: When I, the true God, begin to work, the minds of the whole world shall become purified.

verses.en_6th_ed: What are your thoughts concerning My workings? I shall give returns when I accept your minds.
verses.ro: hataraki mo ika naru koto to omou kana   kokoro uketori shidai kayashi o
verses.jp1: はたらきもいかなる事とをもうかな
verses.jp2: 心うけとりしだいかやしを
verses.kanji: 働きも如何なる事と思うかな   心受け取り次第返しを
verses.en: What do you think of My working? I will give a suitable return as soon as I accept your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think these returns are about? They will reach you though you be a thousand leagues away.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanino koto ya to omou kana   michinori sen ri hedate aritemo
verses.jp1: このかやしなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: みちのりせんりへだてありても
verses.kanji: この返し何の事やと思うかな   道程千里隔て有りても
verses.en: What do you think of this return? It shall reach you at once, even if you may be living one thousand ri away.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may say or think, I shall give returns as soon as I accept your minds.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nani o yutemo omotemo   uketori shidai suguni kayashi o
verses.jp1: この事ハなにをゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp2: うけとりしだいすぐにかやしを
verses.kanji: この事は何を言うても思うても   受け取り次第直ぐに返しを
verses.en: Whatever you may say or think, I will give you a return at once as soon as I accept your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder what these returns are about. I shall give returns for both good and evil.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanno koto ya to omouna yo   zen aku tomoni mina kayasu de na
verses.jp1: このかやしなんの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: せんあくともにみなかやすてな
verses.kanji: この返し何の事やと思うなよ   善悪共に皆返すでな
verses.en: Never wonder what this return should be! I will give a return for both good and evil.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whether you speak good or think evil, I shall give returns at once as you deserve.
verses.ro: yoki koto o yutemo ashiki omotemo   sono mama suguni kayasu koto nari
verses.jp1: よき事をゆうてもあしきをもふても
verses.jp2: そのまゝすくにかやす事なり
verses.kanji: 善き事を言うても悪しき思うても   その侭直ぐに返す事なり
verses.en: Whether you may say good or think evil, I will give a return at once just as you deserve.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you begin to see this, My purification will reach any and everyone in the whole world.
verses.ro: kono koto o miekita naraba ichiretsu wa   donna mono demo mina sumiwataru
verses.jp1: この事をみへきたならば一れつわ
verses.jp2: どんなものでもみなすみわたる
verses.kanji: この事を見え来たならば一列は   どんな者でも皆澄み渡る
verses.en: When this appears, any and everyone of the whole world shall become purified.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, though nothing is seen, look toward the eighth month. Then everything will be seen.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani ga mieru ya nai keredo   hachi gatsu o miyo mina mieru de na
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにがみへるやないけれど
verses.jp2: 八月をみよみなみへるでな
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何が見えるや無いけれど   八月を見よ皆見えるでな
verses.en: Though nothing is visible today, look forward to the eighth month! Then everything shall appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: Perhaps you cannot foresee what is going to appear. From the high mountains, a broad path will open.
verses.ro: mieru no mo nanino koto yara shiremai na   takai yama kara okwan no michi
verses.jp1: みへるのもなにの事やらしれまいな
verses.jp2: 高い山からをふくハんのみち
verses.kanji: 見えるのも何の事やら知れまいな   高い山から往還の道
verses.en: Perhaps you cannot foresee what is going to appear. From the high mountains a broad way shall be opened.

verses.en_6th_ed: I have been preparing to open this path, but those of you close to Me know nothing of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o tsukeyo tote ni shikoshirae   soba naru mono wa nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: このみちをつけよふとてにしこしらへ
verses.jp2: そばなるものハなにもしらすに
verses.kanji: この道を付け様とてに仕拵え   側なる者は何も知らずに
verses.en: I have been arranging to open this way, without being noticed by you who are close to Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: Those who come here to summon or to investigate, come because it is God's intent.
verses.ro: kono toko e yobi ni kuru no mo detekuru mo   Kami no omowaku aru kara no koto
verses.jp1: このとこへよびにくるのもでゝくるも
verses.jp2: 神のをもハくあるからの事
verses.kanji: この所へ呼びに来るのも出て来るも   神の思惑有るからの事
verses.en: Those who come here to summon or investigate come because of the intention of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Knowing nothing about this, you close to Me think of it only in worldly terms.
verses.ro: sono koto o nanimo shirazu ni soba naru wa   sekainami naru koto o omote
verses.jp1: その事をなにもしらすにそばなるハ
verses.jp2: せかいなみなる事をふもをて
verses.kanji: その事を何も知らずに側なるは   世界並なる事を思うて
verses.en: Knowing nothing about this divine intention, you close to Me are thinking just as common worldly people do about this matter.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of anything in worldly terms. There is a new and marvelous path for you.
verses.ro: nani nitemo sekainami towa omouna yo   nanika mezurashi michi ga aru zo ya
verses.jp1: なにゝてもせかいなみとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: なにかめつらしみちがあるぞや
verses.kanji: 何にても世界並とは思うなよ   何か珍し道が有るぞや
verses.en: Never take whatever kinds of matters to be worldly common! There will appear some remarkable way.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though years have passed since the beginning of this world, there is yet no one who knows the truth.
verses.ro: dandan to kono yo hajimete hi wa tatedo   tare ka shinjitsu shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: だん／＼とこのよはぢめてひハたてど
verses.jp2: たれかしんぢつしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 段々とこの世初めて日は経てど   誰か真実知りた者無し
verses.en: One by one the days have passed since I created this world. But there is no one who understands the truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how the mind of God hastens, the minds of all of you are yet inattentive.
verses.ro: ika hodoni Kami no kokoro wa seta tote   mina no kokoro wa mada ukkari to
verses.jp1: いかほどに神の心わせゑたとて
verses.jp2: みなの心ハまたうゝかりと
verses.kanji: 如何程に神の心は急いたとて   皆の心は未だうっかりと
verses.en: However impatiently the mind of God may hasten, the minds of all of you are thoughtlessly ignorant.

verses.en_6th_ed: Quickly, try the pondering and then hasten. Why are you not preparing to dig up the root?
verses.ro: hayabaya to shiyan shite mite sekikome yo   ne horu moyo nande shiteden
verses.jp1: はや／＼としやんしてみてせきこめよ
verses.jp2: ねへほるもよふなんでしてでん
verses.kanji: 早々と思案してみて急き込めよ   根を掘る模様何でして出ん
verses.en: Ponder quickly over this and hurry! Why do you not prepare to dig up the root?

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no one who knows the way to dig up the root, the truth of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu ne no horikata o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nai node
verses.jp1: このよふのしんぢつねへのほりかたを
verses.jp2: しりたるものハさらにないので
verses.kanji: この世の真実根の掘り方を   知りたる者は更に無いので
verses.en: There is no one who knows how to dig up the fundamental truth of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you have but truly dug up this root, this path will become truly promising.
verses.ro: kono ne o shinjitsu horita koto naraba   makoto tanomoshi michi ni naru no ni
verses.jp1: このねへをしんぢつほりた事ならば
verses.jp2: ま事たのもしみちになるのに
verses.kanji: この根を真実掘りた事ならば   誠頼もし道になるのに
verses.en: If you have truly finished digging up this root, it will become a truly delightful way.

verses.en_6th_ed: When you have passed through this path, completing the digging, both the high and the low will be spirited.
verses.ro: kono michi o horikiri tori nuketa nara   kami shimo tomoni kokoro isamu ni
verses.jp1: このみちをほりきりとふりぬけたなら
verses.jp2: 上下ともに心いさむに
verses.kanji: この道を掘り切り通り抜けたなら   上下共に心勇むに
verses.en: If you go through this way digging up the root, both the upper and lower people will become heartily cheered up.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall make every effort solely for the preparations to make everyone in the world spirited.
verses.ro: korekara wa nandemo sekai ichiretsu o   isameru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これからハなんでもせかい一れつを
verses.jp2: いさめるもよふばかりするそや
verses.kanji: これからは何でも世界一列を   勇める模様ばかりするぞや
verses.en: From now on I will single-heartedly arrange every means to cheer up people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall teach you step by step so that there will be nothing unknown in Nihon.
verses.ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo nihon niwa   shiran koto owa nai to yu yoni
verses.jp1: だん／＼となに事にてもにほんにハ
verses.jp2: しらん事をわないとゆうよに
verses.kanji: 段々と何事にても日本には   知らん事をは無いと言う様に
verses.en: Step by step I will teach you so that there shall remain nothing unknown in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: I desire to teach the whole world about all matters. The intention of God is truly deep.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo sekaiju e oshietai   Kami no omowaku fukaku aru no ni
verses.jp1: なにもかもせかいぢうゝへをしへたい
verses.jp2: 神のをもわくふかくあるのに
verses.kanji: 何もかも世界中へ教えたい   神の思惑深く有るのに
verses.en: I desire to teach any and everything to all people of the whole world. The intention of God is truly deep.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, all the world thinks My teachings are somehow dangerous.
verses.ro: sore shirazu sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   nando abunaki yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすせかいぢうゝハ一れつに
verses.jp2: なんどあぶなきよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず世界中は一列に   何ぞ危なき様に思うて
verses.en: Unware of this, people of the whole world think that this way is somehow precarious.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say, it is the word of God. What danger can there be?
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Kami no yu koto ya   nanno abunaki koto ga aru zo ya
verses.jp1: とのよふな事でも神のゆう事や
verses.jp2: なんのあぶなき事があるそや
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも神の言う事や   何の危なき事が有るぞや
verses.en: Whatever I may say, it is all the word of God. There is nothing dangerous at all.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though people speak about any and all matters, there is no understanding.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo yorozu no koto o dandan to   yute inagara wakaritaru nashi
verses.jp1: なにもかもよろずの事をだん／＼と
verses.jp2: ゆうていながらわかりたるなし
verses.kanji: 何もかも万の事を段々と   言うて居ながら分かる目は無し
verses.en: There are many people who speak on any and everything. But there is no one who knows the truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, please quickly make preparations truly to purify your innermost heart.
verses.ro: korekara wa dozo shinjitsu mune no uchi   hayaku sumasuru moyo shite kure
verses.jp1: これからハどうぞしんぢつむねのうち
verses.jp2: はやくすまするもよふしてくれ
verses.kanji: これからはどうぞ真実胸の内   早く澄まする模様して呉れ
verses.en: From now on please hasten to arrange to truly purify your innermost heart!

verses.en_6th_ed: As there are a great number of people in the world, to purify all of them will be difficult.
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no hito de aru karani   kore sumasuru ga mutsukashii koto
verses.jp1: せかいぢうをふくの人てあるからに
verses.jp2: これすまするがむつかしい事
verses.kanji: 世界中多くの人で有るからに   これ澄まするが難しい事
verses.en: As there are such a great number of people in the world, it may seem difficult to purify all of them.

verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult it may be, see the truth through your own mind!
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   waga kokoro yori shinjitsu o miyo
verses.jp1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: わが心よりしんちつをみよ
verses.kanji: 如何程に難し事と言うたとて   我が心より真実を見よ
verses.en: However difficult it may be, see the truth through your own mind!

verses.en_6th_ed: When the mind is made pure and open to reason, the truth will be seen of its own accord.
verses.ro: kono kokoro sumushi wakarita koto naraba   sono mama mieru koto de aru nari
verses.jp1: この心すむしわかりた事ならば
verses.jp2: そのまゝみゑる事であるなり
verses.kanji: この心澄みし分かりた事ならば   その侭見える事で有るなり
verses.en: When your mind becomes pure and open to reason, the truth will become visible at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: There may be no one at all who knows the true working of God day after day.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no shinjitsu hataraki o   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のしんぢつはたらきを
verses.jp2: しりたるものハさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: 日々に神の真実働きを   知りたる者は更に有るまい
verses.en: There may be no one at all who knows the true working of God day by day.

verses.en_6th_ed: In whatever matters, I shall show you marvels through the free and unlimited workings of God.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no juyo to yu mono wa   mezurashi koto o shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: なにゝても神のぢうよとゆうものハ
verses.jp2: めづらし事をしてみせるでな
verses.kanji: 何にても神の自由と言う物は   珍し事をして見せるでな
verses.en: In whatever kinds of things, the omnipotence of God will manifest remarkable working.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever marvels you may see, they are none other than the workings of God.
verses.ro: dono yona mezurashi koto to yuta tote   Kami no suru koto nasu koto bakari
verses.jp1: とのよふなめつらし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 神のする事なす事はかり
verses.kanji: どの様な珍し事と言うたとて   神のする事為す事ばかり
verses.en: However remarkable it may be, everything is solely what God does or works.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have known nothing, but now a narrow path is coming into your sight.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo shirenanda   choto miekaketa hosoi michisuji
verses.jp1: いままでハなによの事もしれなんだ
verses.jp2: 一寸みへかけたほそいみちすじ
verses.kanji: 今迄は何よの事も知れなんだ   一寸見え掛けた細い道筋
verses.en: Until now everything has been unknown. But now a narrow lane is coming into sight.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you follow this path step by step, you will surely see the main path ahead.
verses.ro: kono michi o dandan shitoi iku naraba   nandemo muko ni mieru honmichi
verses.jp1: このみちをだん／＼しといいくならば
verses.jp2: なんてもむこにみへるほんみち
verses.kanji: この道を段々慕い行くならば   何でも向うに見える本道
verses.en: If you go along this lane step by step, you shall surely see the main road ahead.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have come through a path where there was no distinction between Kara and Nihon.
verses.ro: koremade ni torite kitaru michisuji wa   kara mo nihon mo wakari nai node
verses.jp1: これまでにとふりてきたるみちすぢハ
verses.jp2: からもにほんもわかりないので
verses.kanji: これ迄に通りて来たる道筋は   唐も日本も分かり無いので
verses.en: Hitherto you have passed through a way in which there is no distinction between the region where My teachings spread early and the region where My teachings shall spread later.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, however highly Kara is regarded, in no case will Nihon be overcome.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nanbo kara ya to yuta tote   nihon ga makeru tameshi nai zo ya
verses.jp1: このさきハなんぼからやとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: にほんがまけるためしないそや
verses.kanji: この先は何ぼ唐やと言うたとて   日本が負ける例し無いぞや
verses.en: Henceforth, it shall never occur that the people of the region where My teachings spread early will yield to the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later,however powerful the latter may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall let you dig up the root of this world's origin. If you have the strength, do your best to dig it up.
verses.ro: kono yo no moto hajimari no ne o horaso   chikara aru nara horikirite miyo
verses.jp1: このよふのもとはじまりのねをほらそ
verses.jp2: ちからあるならほりきりてみよ
verses.kanji: この世の元初まりの根を掘らそ   力有るなら掘り切りて見よ
verses.en: I will let you dig up the root of the original creation of this world. If you have enough strength, do your best to dig it up!

verses.en_6th_ed: If only you have dug up this root completely, no one will be your match, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: kono ne o horikiri saika shitaru nara   dono yona mono mo kanau mono nashi
verses.jp1: このねへをほりきりさいかしたるなら
verses.jp2: どのよなものもかなうものなし
verses.kanji: この根を掘り切りさいかしたるなら   どの様な者も敵う者無し
verses.en: If only you have dug up this root completely, no one will be able to be your match.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen carefully: whatever you may say or think, or wherever you may say or think,
verses.ro: shikato kike kuchi de yutemo omotemo   doko de yutemo omotaru tote
verses.jp1: しかときけくちでゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp2: どこでゆうてもをもふたるとて
verses.kanji: 確と聞け口で言うても思うても   何処で言うても思うたるとて
verses.en: Listen attentively!  Whatever you may say or think, and wherever you may say or think,

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall give a return just as you deserve. Beware, all of you, for God may withdraw!
verses.ro: sono mamani kayashi to yu wa kono koto ya   Kami ga shirizoku mina shochi seyo
verses.jp1: そのまゝにかやしとゆうハこの事や
verses.jp2: 神がしりぞくみなしよちせよ
verses.kanji: その侭に返しと言うはこの事や   神が退く皆承知せよ
verses.en: I will give a return just as you deserve. Be aware that God may withdraw!

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall begin to tell you something marvelous. Calm your minds and please listen.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mezurashi koto o yui kakeru   kokoro shizumete kore kiite kure
verses.jp1: このたひハめづらし事をゆいかける
verses.jp2: 心しずめてこれきいてくれ
verses.kanji: この度は珍し事を言い掛ける   心静めてこれ聞いて呉れ
verses.en: This time I will begin to speak about a remarkable matter. Keep your mind calm and listen to My words!

verses.en_6th_ed: Everything is what God says or does. I shall never cause trouble to you who are close to Me.
verses.ro: nani goto mo Kami no suru koto yu koto ya   soba ni shinpai kakeru koto nashi
verses.jp1: なに事も神のする事ゆう事や
verses.jp2: そばにしんバいかける事なし
verses.kanji: 何事も神のする事言う事や   側に心配掛ける事無し
verses.en: Everything is what God says or does. I, God, shall never trouble you close to Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you, please calm your minds and become truly convinced of this talk.
verses.ro: kono hanashi dodo shinjitsu ichiretsu wa   kokoro shizumete shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: このはなしどふどしんぢつ一れつわ
verses.jp2: 心しづめてしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: この話どうぞ真実一列は   心静めて承知して呉れ
verses.en: Calming your mind, please comply with this talk, all of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this path is? It is the true path that will settle this world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   kono yo osameru shinjitsu no michi
verses.jp1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: このよをさめるしんぢつのみち
verses.kanji: この道はどういう事に思うかな   この世治める真実の道
verses.en: What do you think of this way? This is the true way to bring peace on this earth.

verses.en_6th_ed: When the distinction between fire and water in the high places is made, joyousness will settle of its own accord.
verses.ro: kami taru no hii to mizu to o waketa nara   hitori osamaru yokizukume ni
verses.jp1: 上たるの火と水とをわけたなら
verses.jp2: ひとりをさまるよふきづくめに
verses.kanji: 上たるの火と水とを分けたなら   独り治まる陽気ずくめに
verses.en: When I distinguish fire from water among the upper people, this world will become peaceful and full of joy naturally.

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the distinction between fire and water will be made by the performance of the Joyous Service at this place.
verses.ro: kono hi mizu wakeru to yu wa kono tokoro   Yoki-zutome o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: この火水わけるとゆうハこのところ
verses.jp2: よふきづとめをするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この火水分けると言うはこの所   陽気勤めをすると思えよ
verses.en: Understand the truth that in order to distinguish fire from water I hasten to perform the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service, at this place!

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall do marvelous things, the same as My beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime kaketa mo onaji koto   mezurashi koto o shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめかけたもをなぢ事
verses.jp2: めずらし事をしてみせるでな
verses.kanji: この世を初め掛けたも同じ事   珍し事をして見せるでな
verses.en: I will manifest remarkable work, just as remarkable as My creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin a Service which has never existed since I began this world, and assuredly settle the world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nai Tsutome   mata hajime kake tashika osameru
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからにないつとめ
verses.jp2: またはじめかけたしかをさめる
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに無い勤め   また初め掛け確か治める
verses.en: Beginning the Service which has never existed since the creation, I will assuredly bring peace.

verses.en_6th_ed: There may be no one at all who knows the truth of the mind of Tsukihi of this universe.
verses.ro: kono yo no Tsukihi no kokoro shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このよふの月日の心しんぢつを
verses.jp2: しりたるものわさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この世の月日の心真実を   知りたる者は更に有るまい
verses.en: There may be no one who knows the true sincerity of Tsukihi, God the Parent, who protects this universe.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have been saying that you cannot see a god with your own eyes, whatever kind of god he may be.
verses.ro: koremade wa ika naru Kami to yuta tote   me ni mien to yute ita nari
verses.jp1: これまでハいかなる神とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: めゑにみへんとゆうていたなり
verses.kanji: これ迄は如何なる神と言うたとて   目に見えんと言うて居たなり
verses.en: Up to now you have been saying that you cannot see a god with your own eyes, whatever kind of god he may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, truly revealing whatever gods there may be, I shall speak to you.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona Kami mo shinjitsu ni   araware dashite hanashi suru nari
verses.jp1: このたびわとのよな神もしんぢつに
verses.jp2: あらハれだしてはなしするなり
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な神も真実に   現れ出して話するなり
verses.en: This time, I, the true God of all gods, reveal Myself and speak to you.

verses.en_6th_ed: From this time on, whatever you say or think will appear just as you say or think. This is the wonder.
verses.ro: imakara wa nani o yutemo omotemo   sono mama mieru kore ga fushigi ya
verses.jp1: いまからハなにをゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp2: そのまゝみへるこれがふしぎや
verses.kanji: 今からは何を言うても思うても   その侭見えるこれが不思議や
verses.en: Henceforth whatever you may say or think will appear just as it is. How marvellous it should be!

verses.en_6th_ed: At the sign of the wheat harvest, all things will begin to appear. Hurry and begin the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo aki o aizu ni mie kakeru   Yoki-zutome ni hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: なにもかもあきをあいづにみへかける
verses.jp2: よふきづとめにはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: 何もかも秋を合図に見え掛ける   陽気勤めに早く掛かれよ
verses.en: Everything shall begin to appear taking the harvest time of wheat as a signal. So hurry and begin the performance of the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service!

verses.en_6th_ed: There are a great number of people living throughout the world, but their minds are all as if in a haze.
verses.ro: sekaiju oku kurasuru sono uchi wa   ichiretsu wa mina moya no gotoku ya
verses.jp1: せかいぢうをふくくらするそのうちわ
verses.jp2: 一れつハみなもやのごとくや
verses.kanji: 世界中多く暮らするその内は   一列は皆もや(靄)の如くや
verses.en: There are a large number of people living in the whole world, but they are as if they were in a haze.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, your innermost heart will be purified and understanding will come. You will come to see the truth as you mature.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sumushi wakarishi mune no uchi   sejin shidai miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp1: にち／＼にすむしわかりしむねのうち
verses.jp2: せゑぢんしたいみへてくるぞや
verses.kanji: 日々に澄むし分かりし胸の内   成人次第見えて来るぞや
verses.en: But day by day your innermost hearts will become purified and understanding. So everything shall become visible in accordance with the growth of your minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this path is clearly seen, take delight. Your future will be promising.
verses.ro: kono michi ga tashika mietaru koto naraba   konosaki tashika tanoshun de iyo
verses.jp1: このみちがたしかみへたる事ならば
verses.jp2: このさきたしかたのしゆでいよ
verses.kanji: この道が確か見えたる事ならば   この先確か楽しんで居よ
verses.en: When this way comes surely into sight, expect your future with good hope!

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, hasten with spirited minds. I am hurrying to have you go out to the main path.
verses.ro: dandan to kokoro isande sekikome yo   hayaku honmichi isogi deru zo ya
verses.jp1: たん／＼と心いさんでせきこめよ
verses.jp2: はやくほんみちいそぎでるぞや
verses.kanji: 段々と心勇んで急き込めよ   早く本道急ぎ出るぞや
verses.en: Step by step cheer up your mind and hurry! I will hasten to go out onto the main road.

verses.en_6th_ed: When God has accepted the sincerity in the minds of the ten performers of the Service,
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Tsutome no ninju ju nin no   kokoro o Kami ga uketorita nara
verses.jp1: しんぢつのつとめの人ぢう十人の
verses.jp2: 心を神がうけとりたなら
verses.kanji: 真実の勤めの人衆十人の   心を神が受け取りたなら
verses.en: When I, God, have accepted the sincere minds of those ten performers of the Service,

verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, I shall teach you all of the thoughts of God on every matter step by step.
verses.ro: sorekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   Kami no omowaku mina tokikikasu
verses.jp1: それからハどのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp2: 神のをもわくみなときゝかす
verses.kanji: それからはどの様な事も段々と   神の思惑皆説き聞かす
verses.en: Then I will teach you, one by one, any and every intention of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though the mind of God hastens day after day, to what avail if the ten performers do not assemble?
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro wa seta tote   ninju ju nin soroi nakeneba
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心わせゑたとて
verses.jp2: 人ぢう十人そろいなけねば
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心は急いたとて   人衆十人揃い無けねば
verses.en: However impatiently the mind of God may hasten day by day,if the number of ten performers cannot be completed,

verses.en_6th_ed: Take warning: fire, water, and wind will withdraw from the three deemed as right-hand men among the ten.
verses.ro: ju nin no naka ni san nin kataude wa   hii mizu kaze tomo shirizoku to shire
verses.jp1: 十人のなかに三人かたうでわ
verses.jp2: 火水風ともしりそくとしれ
verses.kanji: 十人の中に三人片腕は   火水風とも退くと知れ
verses.en: I warn you: fire, water and wind shall withdraw altogether from the three persons who are deemed as right-hand men among the ten.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever happens, it is the work of God. Never think it is an illness.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Kami no suru koto ya   kore o yamai to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でも神のする事や
verses.jp2: これをやまいとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも神のする事や   これを病と更に思うな
verses.en: Whatever kind of thing may happen, it is all the work of God. Never take it to be an illness!

verses.en_6th_ed: I work all matters because I truly desire to let you know of the free and unlimited workings of God.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo shinjitsu Kami no juyo o   shirashitai kara shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: なにもかもしんぢつ神のぢふよふを
verses.jp2: しらしたいからしてみせるでな
verses.kanji: 何もかも真実神の自由を   知らしたいからして見せるでな
verses.en: Any and everything do I manifest, because I desire to make you know the true omnipotence of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, no matter what path you may have been on, I kept still because the day had not yet come.
verses.ro: koremade wa ika naru michi o toritemo   hi ga kitarande izumi ita nari
verses.jp1: これまでハいかなるみちをとふりても
verses.jp2: ひがきたらんでいづみいたなり
verses.kanji: これ迄は如何なる道を通りても   日が来たらんでいずみ居たなり
verses.en: Hitherto, whatever kinds of ways you may have been walking over, I was rather inactive because the day had not yet come.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall tell you the real truth of all matters step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   honshinjitsu o yute kikasuru
verses.jp1: このさきハどのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ほんしんぢつをゆうてきかする
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事も段々と   本真実を言うて聞かする
verses.en: Henceforth I will tell you the prime truth of any and everything one after another.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, people have worshipped and prayed to a great many gods.
verses.ro: imamade wa ika naru Kami mo yamayama ni   ogami kito to yuta naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハいかなる神も山／＼に
verses.jp2: をがみきとふとゆうたなれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は如何なる神も山々に   拝み祈祷と言うたなれども
verses.en: Until now there have been many gods to whom people bowed or offered prayers.

verses.en_6th_ed: Should there be anyone who knows the origin, God permits you to seek and inquire.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono ga aru naraba   tazune ite miyo Kami ga yurusuru
verses.jp1: このもとをしりたるものかあるならば
verses.jp2: たづねいてみよ神がゆるする
verses.kanji: この元を知りたる者が有るならば   訪ね行って見よ神が許する
verses.en: If there is anyone who knows their origin, call upon him and ask about it! I, God, permit it.

verses.en_6th_ed: In the future when the main path is opened, I shall teach you everything step by step.
verses.ro: matasaki wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   honmichi tsuketa koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: またさきハとのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ほんみちつけた事であるなら
verses.kanji: また先はどの様な事も段々と   本道付けた事で有るなら
verses.en: In the future when the main road is opened, I will teach you everything step by step.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to tell you solely of that which had never existed before, and teach you the Service for universal salvation.
verses.ro: imamade ni nai koto bakari yui kakete   yorozu tasuke no Tsutome oshieru
verses.jp1: いまゝでにない事ばかりゆいかけて
verses.jp2: よろづたすけのつとめをしへる
verses.kanji: 今迄に無い事ばかり言い掛けて   万救けの勤め教える
verses.en: Beginning to tell everything which has never existed before, I will teach you the Service for universal salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: Among the ten performers of this Service, there are those who take the role of the Parent of the beginnings of origin.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome ju nin ninju sono naka ni   moto hajimari no Oya ga iru nari
verses.jp1: このつとめ十人にんぢうそのなかに
verses.jp2: もとはじまりのをやがいるなり
verses.kanji: この勤め十人人衆その中に   元初まりの親が居るなり
verses.en: Among the ten members of this Service, there are those who take the role of the original Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: I drew forth Izanagi and Izanami and taught them the providence of how to begin human beings.
verses.ro: Izanagi to Izanamii to o hikiyosete   ningen hajime shugo oshieta
verses.jp1: いざなぎといざなみいとをひきよせて
verses.jp2: にんけんはぢめしゆごをしゑた
verses.kanji: いざなぎといざなみとを引き寄せて   人間初め守護を教えた
verses.en: I, God the Parent, called forth both Izanagi and Izanami and taught them the providence how to create human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: At the origin were a fish and a serpent in the muddy ocean. I drew them up and began the first couple.
verses.ro: kono moto wa doroumi naka ni uo to mi to   sore hikidashite fufu hajimeta
verses.jp1: このもとハどろうみなかにうをとみと
verses.jp2: それひきだしてふう／＼はちめた
verses.kanji: この元は泥海中に魚と巳と   それ引き出して夫婦初めた
verses.en: Originally it was a muddy ocean and I found therein a fish and a serpent. Drawing them forth, I created the first husband and wife.

verses.en_6th_ed: In the beginnings of origin, this universe was a muddy ocean. Therein were only loaches.
verses.ro: kono yo no moto hajimari wa doro no umi   sono naka yori mo dojo bakari ya
verses.jp1: このよふの元はじまりハとろのうみ
verses.jp2: そのなかよりもどぢよばかりや
verses.kanji: この世の元初まりは泥の海   その中よりも泥鰌ばかりや
verses.en: The origin of this universe was a muddy ocean, living therein were nothing but a large number of loaches.

verses.en_6th_ed: Among them were a fish and a serpent. Looking closely, I saw that they had human faces.
verses.ro: sono uchi ni uo to mii to ga majiriiru   yoku misumaseba ningen no kao
verses.jp1: そのうちにうをとみいとがまちりいる
verses.jp2: よくみすませばにんげんのかを
verses.kanji: その内に魚と巳とが混じり居る   良く見澄ませば人間の顔
verses.en: Among them I found a fish and a serpent. And after gazing at them, I found that they had the faces of human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: Seeing this, an idea came to none other than the sincere mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: sore o mite omoi tsuita wa shinjitsu no   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp1: それをみてをもいついたハしんぢつの
verses.jp2: 月日の心ばかりなるそや
verses.kanji: それを見て思い付いたは真実の   月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.en: By seeing them, an idea came to no one but the truly sincere mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: If I should add instruments to them and teach them My providence step by step,
verses.ro: kono mono ni dogu o yosete dandan to   shugo oshieta koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このものにどふくをよせてたん／＼と
verses.jp2: しゆこふをしゑた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この者に道具を寄せて段々と   守護を教えた事で有るなら
verses.en: It should be good, if I call together instruments to add to them, and teach them My providence one by one.

verses.en_6th_ed: These instruments being Kunisazuchi and Tsukiyomi, if I should put them into their bodies,
verses.ro: kono dogu Kunisazuchii to Tsukiyomi to   kore minouchi e shikomitaru nara
verses.jp1: このどふくくにさづちいと月よみと
verses.jp2: これみのうちゑしこみたるなら
verses.kanji: この道具くにさづちと月よみと   これ身の内へ仕込みたるなら
verses.en: These instruments were Kunisazuchi and Tsukiyomi; if I put them into their bodies,

verses.en_6th_ed: And call together Kumoyomi, Kashikone, %Otonobe, and Taishokuten,
verses.ro: Kumoyomi to Kashikonee to Otonobe   Taishokuten to yoseta koto nara
verses.jp1: くもよみとかしこねへとをふとのべ
verses.jp2: たいしよく天とよせた事なら
verses.kanji: くもよみとかしこねとおおとのべ   たいしょく天と寄せた事なら
verses.en: If I call Kumoyomi, Kashikone, Otonobe and Taishokuten altogether,

verses.en_6th_ed: Then, after holding counsel, God came to the firm decision to begin this world.
verses.ro: sorekara wa tashika sekai o hajime yo to   Kami no sodan shimari tsuitari
verses.jp1: それからハたしかせかいを初よと
verses.jp2: かみのそふだんしまりついたり
verses.kanji: それからは確か世界を初めようと   神の相談締まり付いたり
verses.en: Then after a counsel with them I, God, came to the conclusion that the creation of this world must be positively commenced.

verses.en_6th_ed: Since that time, the providence of God has been by no means an easy matter.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no shugo to yu mono wa   nami taitei na koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: これからわ神のしゆごとゆうものハ
verses.jp2: なみたいていなことでないそや
verses.kanji: これからは神の守護と言うものは   並大抵な事で無いぞや
verses.en: Since then the providence of God has been by no means easy.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is indeed difficult to explain how I began things which had never existed.
verses.ro: imamade ni nai koto bakari hajimeru wa   nani o yu no mo mutsukashiki koto
verses.jp1: いまゝてにない事ばかりはちめるわ
verses.jp2: なにをゆうのもむつかしき事
verses.kanji: 今迄に無い事ばかり初めるは   何を言うのも難しき事
verses.en: It was indeed difficult, because I was beginning things which had never existed before.

verses.en_6th_ed: There may be no one who knows the truth of the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime kaketaru shinjitsu o   tare ka shiritaru mono wa arumai
verses.jp1: このよふをはちめかけたるしんぢつを
verses.jp2: たれかしりたるものハあるまい
verses.kanji: この世を初め掛けたる真実を   誰か知りたる者は有るまい
verses.en: I suppose that there is no one who knows the truth of the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall tell you everything step by step. Never take it to be false.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   yute kikasuru uso to omouna
verses.jp1: これからハとのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ゆうてきかするうそとをもうな
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な事も段々と   言うて聞かする嘘と思うな
verses.en: Henceforth I will tell you any and everything one by one. Never take it to be false!

verses.en_6th_ed: I began human beings, taking a fish and a serpent as seed and seedbed.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime kaketa wa uo to mi to   kore nawashiro to tane ni hajimete
verses.jp1: にんけんをはぢめかけたハうをとみと
verses.jp2: これなわしろとたねにはじめて
verses.kanji: 人間を初め掛けたは魚と巳と   これ苗代と種に初めて
verses.en: I created human beings, taking a fish and a serpent as seed and seedbed.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi entered their bodies and taught them the providence step by step.
verses.ro: kono mono ni Tsukihi tainai irikonde   dandan shugo oshie konda de
verses.jp1: このものに月日たいない入こんで
verses.jp2: たん／＼しゆごをしゑこんだで
verses.kanji: この者に月日体内入り込んで   段々守護教え込んだで
verses.en: Entering into their bodies, Tsukihi taught them the providence step by step.

verses.en_6th_ed: The number of children was nine hundred million, ninety-nine thousand, nine hundred and ninety-nine.
verses.ro: kono kokazu kuoku kuman ni kusen nin   kuhyaku kuju ni ku nin naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このこかす九をく九まんに九せん人
verses.jp2: 九百九十に九人なるそや
verses.kanji: この子数九億九万に九千人   九百九十に九人なるぞや
verses.en: The number of these children amounted to nine hundred million, ninety-nine thousand, nine hundred and ninety-nine.

verses.en_6th_ed: The children were conceived in three days and three nights, and there Izanami stayed for three years and three months.
verses.ro: kono nin o mikka miyosa ni yadoshi komi   san nen mi tsuki todomarite ita
verses.jp1: この人を三か三よさにやどしこみ
verses.jp2: 三ねん三月とゝまりていた
verses.kanji: この人を三日三夜に宿し込み   三年三月留まりて居た
verses.en: It took three days and three nights to conceive these children, and Izanami stayed there for three years and three months.

verses.en_6th_ed: The first children born were five bu tall and grew taller gradually.
verses.ro: soreyori mo umare dashita wa go bu kara ya   go bu go bu to shite sejin o shita
verses.jp1: それよりもむまれだしたハ五分からや
verses.jp2: 五分五分としてせへぢんをした
verses.kanji: それよりも生まれ出したは五分からや   五分五分として成人をした
verses.en: The first born was five bu, or about half an inch, tall, and grew up by five bu repeatedly.

verses.en_6th_ed: By this providence once taught, the children were conceived in the same body three times.
verses.ro: kono mono ni ichido oshieta kono shugo   onaji tainai sando yadorita
verses.jp1: このものに一どをしゑたこのしゆごふ
verses.jp2: をなぢたいない三どやどりた
verses.kanji: この者に一度教えたこの守護   同じ胎内三度宿りた
verses.en: By this providence once taught, children were conceived into the same womb three times.

verses.en_6th_ed: The true and real God of this universe is Tsukihi. The others are all instruments.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu no Kami Tsukihi nari   ato naru wa mina dogu naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このよふのしんぢつの神月日なり
verses.jp2: あとなるわみなどふくなるそや
verses.kanji: この世の真実の神月日なり   後なるは皆道具なるぞや
verses.en: The true and real God of this universe is Tsukihi. The others are all instruments.

verses.en_6th_ed: Drawing them forth one after another, I used them to begin human beings and gave to each a sacred name.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime yo tote dandan to   yosete tsukota kore ni kamina o
verses.jp1: にんけんをはしめよふとてたん／＼と
verses.jp2: よせてつこふたこれに神なを
verses.kanji: 人間を初めようとて段々と   寄せて使うたこれに神名を
verses.en: To create human beings, I called together these instruments, and gave a sacred name to each of them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Izanagi and Izanami are the prime instruments. They are the basis of the Grand Shrine of Teshoko.
verses.ro: Izanagi to Izanamii to ga ichi no Kami   kore Teshoko no Daijingu nari
verses.jp1: いざなぎといざなみいとが一の神
verses.jp2: これてしよこの大じんくゝなり
verses.kanji: いざなぎといざなみとが一の神   これ天照皇太神宮なり
verses.en: Izanagi and Izanami are the names of the prime providence in the creation. In relation to this providence, the supreme god of this country is enshrined and respected in the Teishoko-no-Daijingu.

verses.en_6th_ed: In the days to come, I shall teach you everything step by step. It will be solely about things you have never known.
verses.ro: matasaki wa nanika dandan toku keredo   imamade shiran koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: またさきハなにかたん／＼とくけれど
verses.jp2: いまゝてしらん事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: また先は何か段々説くけれど   今迄知らん事ばかりやで
verses.en: Henceforward I will teach you step by step any and everything of which you have never heard.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, whatever I say will be solely about the beginnings of human beings.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo ningen o   hajime kaketaru koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このさきハなにをゆうてもにんげんを
verses.jp2: はぢめかけたる事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この先は何を言うても人間を   初め掛けたる事ばかりやで
verses.en: Henceforth I will tell you exclusively about the creation of human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: This is the Residence where I began this world. Therein lives the original Parent of human beginnings.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru yashiki nari   ningen hajime moto no Oya nari
verses.jp1: このよふをはぢめだしたるやしきなり
verses.jp2: にんけんはじめもとのをやなり
verses.kanji: この世を初め出したる屋敷なり   人間初め元の親なり
verses.en: This is the Residence where I created this human world. She is the original Parent who gave birth to all human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: Discerning this, Tsukihi descended from the desire to teach about all matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sore o misumashi amakudari   nanika yorozu o shirashitai kara
verses.jp1: 月日よりそれをみすましあまくだり
verses.jp2: なにかよろづをしらしたいから
verses.kanji: 月日よりそれを見澄まし天下り   何か万を知らしたいから
verses.en: After identifying this Preordination, I, Tsukihi, revealed Myself at this place to teach the truth of any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Truly, the thought in the mind of Tsukihi is to receive the shrine of each.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni Tsukihi no kokoro omou niwa   meme no yashiro morota koto nara
verses.jp1: しんぢつに月日の心をもうにわ
verses.jp2: めへ／＼のやしろもろた事なら
verses.kanji: 真実に月日の心思うには   銘々の社貰ろた事なら
verses.en: I, God, truly desire that each providence is presented with a temple.

verses.en_6th_ed: Then I would teach exactly as I wish, freely and unlimitedly at any time.
verses.ro: soreyori mo juyojizai ni itsu nari to   omou mama naru hanashi shiyo mono
verses.jp1: それよりもぢうよぢざいにいつなりと
verses.jp2: をもうまゝなるはなしゝよもの
verses.kanji: それよりも自由自在に何時なりと   思う侭なる話しようもの
verses.en: Then I will tell you freely any and everything that I please at the time that I desire.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though having firmly received the Shrine of Tsukihi, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no yashiro shikkari to   morote aredomo izumi ita nari
verses.jp1: いまゝでも月日のやしろしいかりと
verses.jp2: もろてあれどもいづみいたなり
verses.kanji: 今迄も月日の社確りと   貰うて有れどいずみ居たなり
verses.en: Already I have firmly taken the Shrine of Tsukihi, but have been rather inactive.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall surely reveal Myself openly and tell you the truth of all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tashika omote i arawarete   nanika yorozu o mina yute kikasu
verses.jp1: このたびハたしかをもていあらハれて
verses.jp2: なにかよろつをみなゆてきかす
verses.kanji: この度は確か表へ現れて   何か万を皆言うて聞かす
verses.en: This time, however, I really reveal Myself to the fore, and teach you any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, since I kept Myself behind a bamboo screen, nothing was able to be seen.
verses.ro: imamade wa misu no uchira ni itaru kara   nani yono koto mo miete nakeredo
verses.jp1: いままでハみすのうぢらにいたるから
verses.jp2: なによの事もみへてなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は御簾の内らに居たるから   何よの事も見えて無けれど
verses.en: Hitherto I have been sitting behind a bamboo screen, so nothing has yet appeared.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as I have come out into brightness, everything will be seen quickly.
verses.ro: konotabi wa akai tokoro i detaru kara   dono yona koto mo suguni mieru de
verses.jp1: このたびハあかいところいでたるから
verses.jp2: とのよな事もすぐにみゑるで
verses.kanji: この度は明い所へ出たるから   どの様な事も直ぐに見えるで
verses.en: But now, as I have come into the light, everything shall immediately be realized.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think of these red clothes? Tsukihi dwells within.
verses.ro: kono akai kimono o nanto omote iru   naka ni Tsukihi ga komori iru zo ya
verses.jp1: このあかいきものをなんとをもている
verses.jp2: なかに月日がこもりいるそや
verses.kanji: この赤い着物を何と思うて居る   中に月日が篭り居るぞや
verses.en: What do you think of these red clothes? There is Tsukihi dwelling within.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though everything was under the rule of Tsukihi, things were overlooked because the day had not yet come.
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no mama de aru naredo   hi ga kitarande miyurushite ita
verses.jp1: いまゝでも月日のまゝであるけれど
verses.jp2: ひがきたらんでみゆるしていた
verses.kanji: 今迄も月日の侭で有るけれど   日が来たらんで見許して居た
verses.en: Even until now everything has been managed by Me, Tsukihi. But I have been tolerant of this because the day has not yet come.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now that the time is sufficiently full, I shall manage everything as I intend.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo jubun ni hi mo kitari   nanika yorozu o mamani suru nari
verses.jp1: このたびハもふぢうふんにひもきたり
verses.jp2: なにかよろづをまゝにするなり
verses.kanji: この度はもう十分に日も来たり   何か万を侭にするなり
verses.en: Now the day has come enough. So I will manage any and everything as I intend.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, what is the thinking of the high mountains who are managing everything as they please?
verses.ro: sore shirazu takayama nitewa nanimo kamo   nanto omote mamani suru zo ya
verses.jp1: それしらす高山にてハなにもかも
verses.jp2: なんとをもふてまゝにするぞや
verses.kanji: それ知らず高山にては何もかも   何と思うて侭にするぞや
verses.en: Unaware of this, with what thought are those who are on the high mountains managing any and everything as they please?

verses.en_6th_ed: In any concerns, never think that there is a human mind at this place.
verses.ro: nani goto mo kono tokoro niwa ningen no   kokoro wa sarani aru to omouna
verses.jp1: なに事もこのところにハにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心ハさらにあるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 何事もこの所には人間の   心は更に有ると思うな
verses.en: Never think that I have a human mind at this place in whatever kinds of matters!

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may say or write by the tip of My brush, it is none other than directions from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu nimo fudesaki mo   Tsukihi no kokoro sashizu bakari de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうにもふでさきも
verses.jp2: 月日の心さしすばかりで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うにも筆先も   月日の心指図ばかりで
verses.en: Whatever I may say or write with the tip of My writing brush, it is indeed nothing but the directions of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever the high mountains may say or think, it is all from their human thoughts.
verses.ro: takayama wa nani o yutemo omou nimo   mina ningen no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp1: 高山ハなにをゆうてもをもうにも
verses.jp2: みなにんけんのこころばかりで
verses.kanji: 高山は何を言うても思うにも   皆人間の心ばかりで
verses.en: Whatever the upper people may say or think, it is all from their human thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: They banned the name given by Tsukihi. What do you think of this regret of Mine?
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori tsuketa namai o toriharai   kono zannen o nanto omou zo
verses.jp1: 月日よりつけたなまいをとりはらい
verses.jp2: このさんねんをなんとをもうぞ
verses.kanji: 月日より付けた名前を取り払い   この残念を何と思うぞ
verses.en: They rejected the name given by Tsukihi. What do you think of this deep regret of Mine?

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that in truth the anger and regret of Tsukihi are not small matters.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Tsukihi rippuku zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: しんちづの月日りいふくさんねんわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 真実の月日立腹残念は   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.en: Understand that the true anger and regret of Tsukihi is not slight!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, the high mountains, boastful, have thrived and done as they pleased in every matter.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to habikarite   nanika yorozu o mamani shitaredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ高い山やとはびかりて
verses.jp2: なにかよろづをまゝにしたれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は高い山やと蔓延りて   何か万を侭にしたれど
verses.en: Until now those who are on the high mountains have been rampant and managing everything as they please.

verses.en_6th_ed: But from now on, I, Tsukihi, shall do as I please instead. Copy what I do if you can.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi kawarite mamani suru   nanika no koto o mane o shite miyo
verses.jp1: これからハ月日かハりてまゝにする
verses.jp2: なにかの事をまねをしてみよ
verses.kanji: これからは月日代わりて侭にする   何かの事を真似をして見よ
verses.en: But from now on, in their place I, Tsukihi, will reign as I intend. Copy whatever I do, if you can!

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may say or do at this place, it is none other than the thought of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro nani o yu nimo nasu koto mo   Tsukihi no omou koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このところなにをゆうにもなす事も
verses.jp2: 月日のをもう事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この所何を言うにも為す事も   月日の思う事ばかりやで
verses.en: Whatever I may do or say, it is nothing but things which Tsukihi intends.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall work solely on preparations to clear away the regret from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi no kokoro zannen o   harasuru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これからハ月日の心ざんねんを
verses.jp2: はらするもよふばかりするそや
verses.kanji: これからは月日の心残念を   晴らする模様ばかりするぞや
verses.en: Henceforth I will try to arrange single-heartedly to clear away the regret of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, whatever dust may be stirred up, never think it is an illness.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona hokori tatsu totemo   kore o yamai to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: このさきハどのよなほこりたつとても
verses.jp2: これをやまいとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な埃立つとても   これを病と更に思うな
verses.en: Whatever kind of dust may rise in the future, never take it to be an illness!

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall give returns for the regrets of Tsukihi piled mountainously high until now.
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi zannen yamayama ni   tsumorite aru o kayashi suru zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでも月日さんねん山／＼に
verses.jp2: つもりてあるをかやしするぞや
verses.kanji: 今迄も月日残念山々に   積りて有るを返しするぞや
verses.en: This is the return for My regret which has hitherto piled up like a mountain.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though I spoke of My returns, you have been wondering what it could mean.
verses.ro: imamade mo kayashi to yute toitaredo   nanno koto ya to omote ita nari
verses.jp1: いまゝでもかやしとゆうてといたれど
verses.jp2: なんの事やとをもていたなり
verses.kanji: 今迄も返しと言うて説いたれど   何の事やと思うて居たなり
verses.en: Hitherto I have often told you of My return. But you were wondering what it could mean.

verses.en_6th_ed: This is what My returns mean in truth. Beware, all of you on the high mountains!
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kayashi to yu wa kono koto ya   takayama wa mina shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: しんぢつにかやしとゆうハこの事や
verses.jp2: 高山ハみなしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: 真実に返しと言うはこの事や   高山は皆承知して居よ
verses.en: Truly, what was called My return is this. Be aware of it, all who are on the high mountains!

verses.en_6th_ed: This world was a muddy ocean. Therein was Tsukihi alone.
verses.ro: kono yo wa doroumi naka no koto narushi   naka ni Tsukihi ga itaru made nari
verses.jp1: このよふわどろうみなかの事なるし
verses.jp2: なかに月日がいたるまでなり
verses.kanji: この世は泥海中の事なるし   中に月日が居たる迄なり
verses.en: This world was a muddy ocean. And therein was I, Tsukihi, living alone.

verses.en_6th_ed: An idea came to Tsukihi: how promising it would be to begin a world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu omoi tsuitaru wa   nanto sekai o hajime kaketara
verses.jp1: 月日よりしんぢつをもいついたるわ
verses.jp2: なんとせかいをはじめかけたら
verses.kanji: 月日より真実思い付いたるわ   何と世界を初め掛けたら
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, was struck by an idea, imagining how hopeful it would be to create the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: It was difficult to begin a world which did not exist. I prepared to find what could be used as instruments.
verses.ro: nai sekai hajime kakeru wa mutsukashii   nanto dogu o midasu moyo o
verses.jp1: ないせかいはじめかけるハむつかしい
verses.jp2: なんとどふぐをみたすもよふを
verses.kanji: 無い世界初め掛けるは難しい   何と道具を見出す模様を
verses.en: It is indeed difficult to create a world which does not exist. I prepared to find what could be used as instruments.

verses.en_6th_ed: Looking carefully within, I found loaches, a fish and a serpent, and other creatures, too.
verses.ro: misumaseba naka ni dojo mo uo mii mo   hoka naru mono mo miete aru nari
verses.jp1: みすませばなかにどぢよもうをみいも
verses.jp2: ほかなるものもみへてあるなり
verses.kanji: 身澄ませば中に泥鰌も魚巳も   他なる者も見えて有るなり
verses.en: Looking carefully through the muddy ocean, I found loaches, a fish and a serpent and others, too.

verses.en_6th_ed: I called them together and conferred with them to begin My providence for human beings.
verses.ro: sono mono o mina hikiyosete danjiyai   ningen shugo hajime kaketara
verses.jp1: そのものをみなひきよせてたんぢやい
verses.jp2: にんけんしゆごはぢめかけたら
verses.kanji: その者を皆引き寄せて談じ合い   人間守護初め掛けたら
verses.en: I called those together and conferred with them how to begin to create human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: In order to begin a world which did not exist, I, Tsukihi, devoted Myself at every step.
verses.ro: nai sekai hajime yo tote kono Tsukihi   dandan kokoro tsukushi taru yue
verses.jp1: ないせかいはじめよふとてこの月日
verses.jp2: たん／＼心つくしたるゆへ
verses.kanji: 無い世界初めようとてこの月日   段々心尽くしたる故
verses.en: Because I, Tsukihi, have endeavored step by step to create this world which did not exist.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no one who knows of this path. What do you think of this regret of Tsukihi?
verses.ro: kono michi o shiritaru mono wa sarani nashi   Tsukihi zannen nanto omou zo
verses.jp1: このみちをしりたるものハさらになし
verses.jp2: 月日ざんねんなんとをもうぞ
verses.kanji: この道を知りたる者は更に無し   月日残念何と思うぞ
verses.en: There is no one who knows of this way. What do you think of this regret of Tsukihi?

verses.en_6th_ed: So much thought has gone into beginning this world, how deep is the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: kora hodoni omote hajimeta kono sekai   Tsukihi no kokoro nanto zannen
verses.jp1: こらほどにをもてはじめたこのせかい
verses.jp2: 月日の心なんとざんねん
verses.kanji: こら程に思うて初めたこの世界   月日の心何と残念
verses.en: This is the world which God created with so deep intention and strenuous efforts. What regret the mind of Tsukihi is feeling now!

verses.en_6th_ed: Only through the exhaustive efforts of Tsukihi, made step by step, have you become the humans you are.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori dandan kokoro tsukushi kiri   sono yue naru no ningen de aru
verses.jp1: 月日よりたん／＼心つくしきり
verses.jp2: そのゆへなるのにんけんである
verses.kanji: 月日より段々心尽くし切り   その故なるの人間で有る
verses.en: It is through the utmost exertion of Tsukihi that human beings have become what they are.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, the high mountains at present are rampant and doing as they please.
verses.ro: sore shirazu ima no tokoro wa takayama wa   mina habikarite mamani shite iru
verses.jp1: それしらす今のところハ高山ハ
verses.jp2: みなはびかりてまゝにしている
verses.kanji: それ知らず今の所は高山は   皆蔓延りて侭にして居る
verses.en: Unaware of this, at present those who are on the high mountains are rampant and manage everything as they please.

verses.en_6th_ed: This is the greatest regret of Tsukihi. There is no knowing what I may give in return.
verses.ro: kono Tsukihi daiichi kore ga zannen na   donna kayashi o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: この月日大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp2: どんなかやしをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: この月日第一これが残念な   どんな返しをするや知れんで
verses.en: This is the cause of the prime regret of Tsukihi. There is no knowing what kind of return I may give.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this world, landslides, thunder, earthquakes, and great winds are all from the anger of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono sekai yamague nazo mo kaminari mo   jishin okaze Tsukihi rippuku
verses.jp1: このせかい山ぐゑなそもかみなりも
verses.jp2: ぢしんをふかぜ月日りいふく
verses.kanji: この世界山崩え等も雷も   地震大風月日立腹
verses.en: In this world, land slides, thunder, earthquakes and typhoons are all the manifestations of the anger of Tsukihi.
