verses.en_6th_ed: Beware, you grand shrines and high mountains whoever! There is no knowing when Tsukihi will rush out.
verses.ro: dono yona taisha takayama yudan shina   nandoki Tsukihi tondederu yara
verses.jp1: どのよふなたいしや高山ゆたんしな
verses.jp2: なんとき月日とんてゞるやら
verses.kanji: どの様な大社高山油断しな   何時月日飛んで出るやら
verses.en: Be on the alert, grand shrines and peple on the high mountains! Because there is no knowing at what moment Tsukihi will rush out.

verses.en_6th_ed: Let all of you in the world take care, for Tsukihi will never hold back!
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa minamina waga mi ki o tsuke yo   Tsukihi enryo wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 一れつハみな／＼わがみきをつけよ
verses.jp2: 月日ゑんりよわさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: 一列は皆々我が身気を付けよ   月日遠慮は更に無いぞや
verses.en: Take care of your own bodies, all of you! Because I, Tsukihi, will work without reserve.

verses.en_6th_ed: Having warned you about all matters as much as I can, Tsukihi will begin to work.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo seeippai ni kotowarite   sorekara kakaru Tsukihi shigoto o
verses.jp1: なにもかもせへいゝバいにことわりて
verses.jp2: それからかゝる月日しことを
verses.kanji: 何も彼も精一杯に断りて   それから掛かる月日仕事を
verses.en: Having warned you on any and everything as much as possible, I, Tsukihi, will begin My work.

verses.en_6th_ed: In whatever things, bear no grudges. It is all a matter of your self-reproach.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo urami ni omouna yo   mina meme no miurami de aru
verses.jp1: とのよふな事もらみにをもうなよ
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼のみうらみである
verses.kanji: どの様な事も恨みに思うなよ   皆銘々の身恨みで有る
verses.en: Never bear a grudge against others in whatever kinds of matters! Rather reproach yourself in all matters.

verses.en_6th_ed: I have told you this talk repeatedly step by step. Please understand it thoroughly.
verses.ro: kono hanashi dandan kudoki tsumete aru   kore shikkari to kikiwakete kure
verses.jp1: このはなしたん／＼くどきつめてある
verses.jp2: これしいかりときゝわけてくれ
verses.kanji: この話段々口説き詰めて有る   これ確りと聞き分けて呉れ
verses.en: This talk I have repeatedly told you step by step. Listen attentively and comprehend it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: All humankind, everything depends on the heart of each of you. Know that Tsukihi is discerning it.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina meme no mune shidai   Tsukihi miwakete iru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 一れつハみなめへ／＼のむねしたい
verses.jp2: 月日みハけているとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 一列は皆銘々の胸次第   月日見分けて居ると思えよ
verses.en: Realize that I, Tsukihi, am distinguishing each of your hearts just as they deserve!

verses.en_6th_ed: Once Tsukihi has truly discerned your mind, I shall give you a return as soon as I have accepted it.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu kokoro misadamete   uketori shidai kayashi suru nari
verses.jp1: 月日よりしんぢつ心みさだめて
verses.jp2: うけとりしたいかやしするなり
verses.kanji: 月日より真実心見定めて   受け取り次第返しするなり
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will truly ascertain your sincerity, and as soon as I accept it, I will give a fair return.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, whatever you have said or thought, it was only from the human mind.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo omotemo   mina ningen no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにをゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp2: みなにんけんの心はかりで
verses.kanji: 今迄は何を言うても思うても   皆人間の心ばかりで
verses.en: Until now you have been speaking and thinking only with human thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, whether you do good or evil, I shall give you a return at once accordingly.
verses.ro: korekara wa yoki koto shite mo ashiki demo   sono mama suguni kayashi suru nari
verses.jp1: これからハよき事してもあしきでも
verses.jp2: そのまゝすぐにかやしするなり
verses.kanji: これからは善き事しても悪しきでも   その侭直ぐに返しするなり
verses.en: Henceforth I will give a return at once for whatever you have done, good or evil.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have looked on with understanding, but from now on there will be no allowances.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanika satori mo aritakedo   mo korekara wa satori nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにかさとりもありたけど
verses.jp2: もふこれからハさとりないぞや
verses.kanji: 今迄は何か悟りも有りたけど   もうこれからは悟り無いぞや
verses.en: Until now there have been some allowances, but from now on nothing shall be overlooked.

verses.en_6th_ed: The true Parent of this universe is Tsukihi. It is I who protect you in everything.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu no Oya Tsukihi nari   nanika yorozu no shugo suru zo ya
verses.jp1: このよふのしんぢつのをや月日なり
verses.jp2: なにかよろづのしゆこするぞや
verses.kanji: この世の真実の親月日なり   何か万の守護するぞや
verses.en: The true and real Parent of this universe is I, Tsukihi. I will protect you in any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, nothing I say will be false. Take all My words to be true and understand them.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo uso wa nai   mina shinjitsu to omote kikiwake
verses.jp1: このさきハなにをゆうてもうそハない
verses.jp2: みなしんぢつとをもてきゝわけ
verses.kanji: この先は何を言うても嘘は無い   皆真実と思うて聞き分け
verses.en: Henceforth there shall be nothing false, whatever I may say. Listen and comprehend it well, taking My words to be all true!

verses.en_6th_ed: Everything there is, was begun by the sincere thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi shinjitsu ni   omote hajimeta koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でも月日しんぢつに
verses.jp2: をもてはじめた事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも月日真実に   思うて初めた事ばかりやで
verses.en: Whatever kind of thing it may be, it was all commenced from the true sincerity of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, when there was illness, you turned to doctors and medicine. Though all of you have worried,
verses.ro: imamade wa yamai to yueba isha kusuri   mina shinpai o shitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハやまいとゆへばいしやくするり
verses.jp2: みなしんバいをしたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は病と言えば医者薬   皆心配をしたるなれども
verses.en: Until now when you fell ill, you immediately called in doctors and took medicine. Thus all of you have worried yourselves.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall save you from any pains, sufferings, or tumors by the Breath and the Hand Dance.
verses.ro: korekara wa itami nayami mo dekimono mo   Iki Teodori de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: これからハいたみなやみもてきものも
verses.jp2: いきてをどりでみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: これからは痛み悩みも出来物も   息手踊りで皆救けるで
verses.en: But henceforth, by means of the Iki, the Grant of Breath, and the Teodori, the Grant of Hand Dance, I will save you all from any pains, sufferings or tumors.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though you have never known such salvation until now, from now on, try it and see!
verses.ro: kono tasuke imamade shiranu koto naredo   korekara saki wa tameshi shite miyo
verses.jp1: このたすけいまゝでしらぬ事なれど
verses.jp2: これからさきハためしゝてみよ
verses.kanji: この救け今迄知らぬ事なれど   これから先は試しして見よ
verses.en: Even though you have been ignorant of such salvation until now, henceforth try it!

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how serious the illness may be, I shall save you by the truth of Breath.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashiki naru yamai demo   shinjitsu naru no Iki de tasukeru
verses.jp1: どのよふなむつかしきなるやまいでも
verses.jp2: しんぢつなるのいきでたすける
verses.kanji: どの様な難しきなる病でも   真実なるの息で救ける
verses.en: However critically ill you may be, I will save you by means of the truly sincere Iki, the Grant of Breath.

verses.en_6th_ed: When Tsukihi has ascertained your mind's sincerity, know that I shall grant you every kind of protection.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu kokoro misadamete   ikana shugo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 月日よりしんじつ心みさためて
verses.jp2: いかなしゆこふもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 月日より真実心見定めて   如何な守護もすると思えよ
verses.en: When I, Tsukihi, have truly ascertained the sincerity of your mind, I will work whatever protection.

verses.en_6th_ed: Your newborns shall be free from smallpox and measles. They shall live on without illness or death.
verses.ro: umare ko hoso hashika mo sen yoni   yamazu shinazu ni kurasu koto nara
verses.jp1: むまれこふほふそはしかもせんよふに
verses.jp2: やますしなすにくらす事なら
verses.kanji: 生まれ子を疱瘡麻疹もせん様に   病まず死なずに暮らす事なら
verses.en: I wish your newborn baby does not contact smallpox or measles, and grows up never falling ill nor dying early.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen carefully: whatever free and unlimited workings I may do, it is all from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: shikato kike ikana juyo suru totemo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp1: しかときけいかなぢうよふするとても
verses.jp2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け如何な自由するとても   月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.en: Listen attentively! Whatever kind of omnipotence I may work, it is all from the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now I have made most of My appeals, still more needs to be said of Tsukihi's thoughts.
verses.ro: imamade mo taite kudoki mo toitaredo   mada yuitaran Tsukihi omowaku
verses.jp1: いまゝでもたいてくどきもといたれど
verses.jp2: まだゆいたらん月日をもわく
verses.kanji: 今迄も大抵口説きも説いたれど   未だ言い足らん月日思惑
verses.en: Hitherto I have tried to persuade you ever so often, yet there remains something more untold of the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, because the regret of Tsukihi has piled up so high, you shall hear all of it.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nanika Tsukihi no zannen o   tsumori aru kara mina yute oku
verses.jp1: このたびハなにか月日のざんねんを
verses.jp2: つもりあるからみなゆうてをく
verses.kanji: この度は何か月日の残念を   積り有るから皆言うて置く
verses.en: This time I will tell you all of the regret of Tsukihi, because it has piled up so much.

verses.en_6th_ed: Since the single-hearted salvation is being stopped at this place, I cannot bear but to give a return.
verses.ro: kono tokoro tasuke ichijo tomerarete   nandemo kayashi sezu ni iraren
verses.jp1: このところたすけ一ぢよとめられて
verses.jp2: なんてもかやしせすにいられん
verses.kanji: この所救け一条止められて   何でも返しせずに居られん
verses.en: As My single-hearted salvation is forbidden at present, I cannot help but give a due return for all things.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this return, I shall clear away the grand shrines and high mountains. Let all of you be aware!
verses.ro: kono kayashi taisha takayama toriharai   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: このかやしたいしや高山とりはらい
verses.jp2: みな一れハしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: この返し大社高山取り払い   皆一列は承知して居よ
verses.en: In this return, grand shrines and those who are on the high mountains shall be all demolished. Remember this, all of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: What are you thinking on hearing this talk? Flames of heaven, rains of fire, and tidal waves in the seas...
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   tenbi hi no ame umi wa tsunami ya
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp2: てんび火のあめうみわつなみや
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて聞いて居る   天火火の雨海は津波や
verses.en: What do you think on hearing this talk? The flames of heaven and rain of fire shall come down from the sky, and the sea shall swell into tidal waves.

verses.en_6th_ed: Such is the great anxiety in the mind of Tsukihi. What is the whole world thinking?
verses.ro: kora hodono Tsukihi no kokoro shinpai o   sekaiju wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp1: こらほどの月日の心しんバいを
verses.jp2: せかいぢうハなんとをもてる
verses.kanji: こら程の月日の心心配を   世界中は何と思うてる
verses.en: What do all of you of the whole world think of this serious anxiety in the mind of Tsukihi?

verses.en_6th_ed: Though I appeal to you in sorrow over and over, I shall save you if you become of a sincere mind.
verses.ro: dandan to kudoki nageki wa toku keredo   shinjitsu naru no kokoro tasukeru
verses.jp1: たん／＼とくどきなけきハとくけれど
verses.jp2: しんぢつなるの心たすける
verses.kanji: 段々と口説き嘆きは説くけれど   真実なるの心救ける
verses.en: Even though I, God, teach you step by step so assiduously with lamentation, if your mind becomes truly sincere, I will surely save you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whoever you are, you are all My children. Awaken to the anxiety in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: dono yona mono mo ichiretsu waga ko nari   Tsukihi no kokoro shinpai o miyo
verses.jp1: どのよふなものも一れつハかこなり
verses.jp2: 月日の心しんばいをみよ
verses.kanji: どの様な者も一列我が子なり   月日の心心配を見よ
verses.en: All of you are My children, whatever kind of person you may be. Feel for the anxiety in the mind of Tsukihi!

verses.en_6th_ed: Everything in this universe is all by Tsukihi. All human bodies are things lent by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono yo wa ichiretsu wa mina Tsukihi nari   ningen wa mina Tsukihi kashimono
verses.jp1: このよふハ一れつハみな月日なり
verses.jp2: にんけんハみな月日かしもの
verses.kanji: この世は一列は皆月日なり   人間は皆月日貸し物
verses.en: This whole universe is the body of Tsukihi. So human bodies are all things lent by Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: If this truth is known all over the world, no one will remain selfish or greedy.
verses.ro: sekaiju kono shinjitsu o shirita nara   goki goyoku dasu mono wa nai
verses.jp1: せかいぢうこのしんぢつをしりたなら
verses.jp2: ごふきごふよくだすものわない
verses.kanji: 世界中この真実を知りたなら   強気強欲出す者は無い
verses.en: If the people of the whole world become awakened to this truth, no one will remain tenaciously selfish or avaricious.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only My mind is truly understood, there will be nothing fearful or dangerous.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu yori mo wakaritara   nanimo kowami mo abunaki mo nai
verses.jp1: こゝろさいしんぢつよりもわかりたら
verses.jp2: なにもこわみもあふなきもない
verses.kanji: 心さい真実よりも分かりたら   何も怖みも危なきも無い
verses.en: If your mind heartily comprehends this truth, there shall remain nothing fearful or dangerous.

verses.en_6th_ed: But you erased everything Tsukihi taught. What remains is only the human mind.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori oshieru koto wa mina keshite   ato wa ningen gokoro bakari de
verses.jp1: 月日よりをしゑる事ハみなけして
verses.jp2: あとハにんけん心ばかりで
verses.kanji: 月日より教える事は皆消して   後は人間心ばかりで
verses.en: Putting out all teachings which I, Tsukihi, taught you, you behaved with only human thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though I wished to teach you the truth of the beginning of this world,
verses.ro: imamade mo kono yo hajimeta shinjitsu o   oshiete oko to omota naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでもこのよはじめたしんぢつを
verses.jp2: をしへてをことをもたなれども
verses.kanji: 今迄もこの世初めた真実を   教えて置こうと思うたなれども
verses.en: Although until now I have often thought of teaching you the truth of creating this world,

verses.en_6th_ed: And though the mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, know that I am waiting for the appointed time.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   kokugen machite iru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめど
verses.jp2: こくげんまちているとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心急き込めど   刻限待ちて居ると思えよ
verses.en: And even though I, Tsukihi, impatiently hasten day by day, I wait for the fixed time to come.

verses.en_6th_ed: What are you thinking on hearing this talk? Great blessings are intended by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   Tsukihi omowaku fukai riyaku o
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp2: 月日をもわくふかいりやくを
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて聞いて居る   月日思惑深い利益を
verses.en: What do you think on hearing this talk? I, Tsukihi, intend to bestow a deep divine favor.

verses.en_6th_ed: Never take this to be ordinary. Great is the intent in the workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kore bakari hitonami ya towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no shigoto erai omowaku
verses.jp1: こればかり人なみやとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日のしごとゑらいをもわく
verses.kanji: こればかり人並やとは思うなよ   月日の仕事偉い思惑
verses.en: Just this, never take it to be the work of a human being! It is the work planned with the great intention of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi has often spoken of the free and unlimited workings, none of them has yet been seen.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori juyojizai to mama tokedo   mada imamade wa mieta koto nashi
verses.jp1: 月日よりぢうよちざいとまゝとけと
verses.jp2: まだいまゝでわみゑた事なし
verses.kanji: 月日より自由自在と間々説けど   未だ今迄は見えた事無し
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, have often told you of My omnipotence, but until now nothing has appeared.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, when I truly show you My free and unlimited workings, know that this is truth.
verses.ro: konotabi wa juyojizai o shinjitsu ni   shite miseta nara kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp1: このたびハぢうよぢざいをしんぢつに
verses.jp2: してみせたならこれかまことや
verses.kanji: この度は自由自在を真実に   して見せたならこれが誠や
verses.en: This time, when I really manifest My omnipotence, you will understand it to be true.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is done, it is all by Tsukihi, truly from My single intent to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi   shinjitsu yori no tasuke ichijo
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするのもみな月日
verses.jp2: しんぢつよりのたすけ一ぢよ
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも皆月日   真実よりの救け一条
verses.en: It is I, Tsukihi, who work any and everything. My aim is truly and single-heartedly to save all mankind.

verses.en_6th_ed: The conception of a baby is by Tsukihi. Giving birth to it, also, is by the work of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: tainai e yadoshi komu no mo Tsukihi nari   umare dasu no mo Tsukihi sewadori
verses.jp1: たいないゑやどしこむのも月日なり
verses.jp2: むまれだすのも月日せわどり
verses.kanji: 胎内へ宿し込むのも月日なり   生まれ出すのも月日世話取り
verses.en: It is I, Tsukihi, who make you conceive a baby. And also it is through the help of Tsukihi that you can give birth to it.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as I am revealed, I shall truly show you all of My workings in every matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu ni   mina arawarete shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: このたびハどのよな事もしんぢつに
verses.jp2: みなあらわれてしてみせるでな
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な事も真実に   皆現れてして見せるでな
verses.en: This time I will truly reveal Myself and do whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Be convinced when you see this, whoever you may be: My free and unlimited workings are according to your mind.
verses.ro: kore o mite ikana mono demo tokushin se   kokoro shidai ni ikana juyo
verses.jp1: これをみていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp2: 心したいにいかなぢうよふ
verses.kanji: これを見て如何な者でも得心せ   心次第に如何な自由
verses.en: Look at this and comprehand well, all of you! I will work My omnipotence just as your mind deserves.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may work, I shall work all things according to your mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo shinjitsu no   kokoro shidai ni mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をするのもしんぢつの
verses.jp2: 心したいにみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも真実の   心次第に皆して見せる
verses.en: Whatever kinds of things I may work, I will work everything just as your true sincerity deserves.

verses.en_6th_ed: Thirty-eight years ago, Tsukihi descended because of the causality of origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sanju hachi nen izen nite   amakudari taru moto no innen
verses.jp1: 月日より三十八ねんいぜんにて
verses.jp2: あまくだりたる元のいんねん
verses.kanji: 月日より三十八年以前にて   天降りたる元の因縁
verses.en: According to the original Preordination, I, Tsukihi, descended from Heaven thirty-eight years ago.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because this causality exists, Tsukihi desires to tell you all the truth in detail.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sono innen ga aru yue ni   nanika isai o hanashitai kara
verses.jp1: 月日よりそのいんねんがあるゆへに
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをはなしたいから
verses.kanji: 月日よりその因縁が有る故に   何か委細を話したいから
verses.en: Because of this Preordination, I, Tsukihi, desire to tell you all the details of the truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, those in the high places think My teachings all to be worldly common.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sore o shirazu ni nani goto mo   sekainami ya to omote iru nari
verses.jp1: 上たるハそれをしらすになに事も
verses.jp2: せかいなみやとをもているなり
verses.kanji: 上たるはそれを知らずに何事も   世界並やと思い居るなり
verses.en: Unaware of this, the upper people are thinking that everything I teach is worldly common.

verses.en_6th_ed: As this place is the Jiba of Origin, there is nothing unknown about the beginning.
verses.ro: kono tokoro moto naru Jiba no koto naraba   hajimari dashi o shiran koto nashi
verses.jp1: このところ元なるぢばの事ならば
verses.jp2: はぢまりだしをしらん事なし
verses.kanji: この所元なる地場の事ならば   初まり出しを知らん事無し
verses.en: As this is the Jiba, the place of origin, there is nothing unknown concerning the creation.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi desires to make this truth quickly known to the high places,
verses.ro: kami taru e kono shinjitsu o hayabaya to   shirashite yaro to Tsukihi omoedo
verses.jp1: 上たるゑこのしんぢつをはや／＼と
verses.jp2: しらしてやろと月日をもゑど
verses.kanji: 上たるへこの真実を早々と   知らしてやろと月日思えど
verses.en: Although I, Tsukihi, am hastening to let the upper people know this truth,

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, those in the high places are thinking only about their selfish concerns.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sore o shirazu ni meme no   waga mi shiyan o bakari omote
verses.jp1: 上たるハそれをしらすにめへ／＼の
verses.jp2: わがみしやんをばかりをもをて
verses.kanji: 上たるはそれを知らずに銘々の   我が身思案をばかり思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, the upper people are thinking with only selfish mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because Tsukihi sees a dreadful and dangerous path opening before you step by step,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan mieru michisuji ni   kowaki abunaki michi ga aru node
verses.jp1: 月日にハたん／＼みへるみちすぢに
verses.jp2: こわきあふなきみちがあるので
verses.kanji: 月日には段々見える道筋に   怖き危なき道が有るので
verses.en: Because I, Tsukihi, foresee the dreadful and dangerous paths to which you may be led step by step,

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that Tsukihi worries and is anxious to tell you quickly about that path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sono michi hayaku shiraso to   omote shinpai shite iru to koso
verses.jp1: 月日よりそのみちはやくしらそふと
verses.jp2: をもてしんバいしているとこそ
verses.kanji: 月日よりその道早く知らそうと   思うて心配して居るとこそ
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, am very anxious to warn you of the dangerous path awaiting you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Just as you humans worry about your children, I worry over your dreadful and dangerous path.
verses.ro: ningen no waga ko omou mo onaji koto   kowaki abunaki michi o anjiru
verses.jp1: にんけんのわが子をもうもをなぢ事
verses.jp2: こわきあふなきみちをあんぢる
verses.kanji: 人間の我が子思うも同じ事   怖き危なき道を案じる
verses.en: Just as human beings care for their own children, I fear lest you should take a dreadful course full of dangers.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, all of you everywhere are living your lives without heed.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   mina ukkari to kurashi iru nari
verses.jp1: それしらすみな一れハめへ／＼に
verses.jp2: みなうゝかりとくらしいるなり
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆一列は銘々に   皆うっかりと暮らし居るなり
verses.en: Unaware of this, all of you are listlessly leading a thoughtless life.

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that Tsukihi rules over everything in this world without exception.
verses.ro: kono sekai nanika yorozu o ichiretsu ni   Tsukihi shihai o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このせかいなにかよろすづを一れつに
verses.jp2: 月日しはいをするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この世界何か万を一列に   月日支配をすると思えよ
verses.en: Be convinced of the truth that, I, Tsukihi, am ruling any and everything of this world without exception!

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this talk is about? Watch the path which lies ahead.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   korekara saki no michi o mite iyo
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: これからさきのみちをみていよ
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に思うかな   これから先の道を見て居よ
verses.en: What are you thinking of this talk? Wait and see the way which shall appear in the future!

verses.en_6th_ed: However high the mountains, floodwaters will reach them. Yet in the low valleys there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona takai yama demo mizu ga tsuku   tanisoko ya tote abunage wa nai
verses.jp1: どのよふな高い山でも水がつく
verses.jp2: たにそこやとてあふなけわない
verses.kanji: どの様な高い山でも水が浸く   谷底やとて危な気は無い
verses.en: However high the mountains may be, they can be flooded with water. But even at the bottoms of the valleys there shall be no danger.

verses.en_6th_ed: As it is Tsukihi who rules over all, never say that this is large or that is small.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi shihai o suru kara wa   oki chiisai yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なにもかも月日しはいをするからハ
verses.jp2: をふきちいさいゆうでないぞや
verses.kanji: 何もかも月日支配をするからは   大き小さい言うで無いぞや
verses.en: It is I, Tsukihi, who rule any and everything. So never say that this is large or that is small!

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, from My desire for useful timber, I have searched most everywhere.
verses.ro: koremade mo nandemo yogi hoshii kara   taitei tazune itaru naredomo
verses.jp2: たいていたづねいたるなれども
verses.kanji: これ迄も何でも用木欲しいから   大抵尋ね居たるなれども
verses.en: Hitherto, because of My anxious desire to get timber, I have been seeking for it almost everywhere.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, in the low valleys I see promising trees in abundance.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tanisoko nitewa choto shitaru   kii ga tappuri miete aru nari
verses.jp1: このたびハたにそこにてハ一寸したる
verses.jp2: 木いがたあふりみゑてあるなり
verses.kanji: この度は谷底にては一寸したる   木がたっぷり見えて有るなり
verses.en: Now I can see many fairly good trees at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.en_6th_ed: When Tsukihi enters these trees and brings them to completion step by step, they will become pillars of nations.
verses.ro: kono kii mo dandan Tsukihi deirishite   tsukuri agetara kuni no hashira ya
verses.jp1: このきいもたん／＼月日でいりして
verses.jp2: つくりあけたらくにのはしらや
verses.kanji: この木も段々月日手入りして   作り上げたら国の柱や
verses.en: If I, Tsukihi, train them by entering into them step by step, these trees shall become pillars of the region.

verses.en_6th_ed: Then, looking closely day by day, Tsukihi will prepare for more timber.
verses.ro: sorekara wa nichinichi Tsukihi misadamete   ato no yogi no moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: それからハにち／＼月日みさだめて
verses.kanji: それからは日々月日見定めて   後の用木の模様ばかりを
verses.en: Since then, I, Tsukihi, will discern them, and arrange for succeeding timber day by day.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall nurture trees, starting with aged ones, and assemble them in preparation for the future.
verses.ro: soreyori mo hineta kii kara dandan to   teiri hikitsuke ato no moyo o
verses.jp1: それよりもひねた木からたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ていりひきつけあとのもよふを
verses.kanji: それよりも陳ねた木から段々と   手入り引き付け後の模様を
verses.en: Then I will draw aged trees to Me one by one, putting My hand on them, anMd then prepare for successors.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, as the intent of Tsukihi is deep, two or three trees will be found even at one place.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsukihi omowaku fukaku aru   onaji tokoro ni ni hon san bon
verses.jp1: にち／＼に月日をもわくふかくある
verses.jp2: をなじところに二ほん三ぼん
verses.kanji: 日々に月日思惑深く有る   同じ所に二本三本
verses.en: As I, Tsukihi, am searching with deep intention day by day, I will find two or three trees at a given place.

verses.en_6th_ed: Of these trees, I do not say whether male pine or female pine. Tsukihi has an intention for any tree.
verses.ro: kono kii mo mematsu omatsu wa yuwan de na   ika naru kii mo Tsukihi omowaku
verses.jp1: この木いもめまつをまつわゆハんでな
verses.jp2: いかなる木いも月日をもわく
verses.kanji: この木も雌松雄松は言わんでな   如何なる木も月日思惑
verses.en: I make no discrimination between male-pine and female-pine. I adopt any tree which accords with the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: What I shall talk about in the time to come will be nothing but the preparations for My timber.
verses.ro: kono ato i nanino hanashi o suru naraba   yogi no moyo bakari yu nari
verses.jp1: このあといなにのはなしをするならば
verses.kanji: この後へ何の話をするならば   用木の模様ばかり言うなり
verses.en: What do you think I will tell you from now on? It is nothing but arrangements for assembling My useful timber.

verses.en_6th_ed: Of these timbers, it is not to be just a few. I desire fifty or sixty in numbers of people.
verses.ro: yogi demo chotto no koto dewa nai karani   goju rokuju no ninkazu ga hoshi
verses.jp2: 五十六十の人かずがほし
verses.kanji: 用木でも一寸の事では無いからに   五十六十の人数が欲しい
verses.en: Speaking of My timber, its number is not small. I desire as many as fifty or sixty.

verses.en_6th_ed: I desire this number never to decrease but to continue without break through all generations.
verses.ro: kono nin mo itsuitsu made mo heran yo   matsudai tsuzuki kireme naki yo
verses.jp1: このにんもいつ／＼までもへらんよふ
verses.jp2: まつだいつゝききれめなきよふ
verses.kanji: この人も何時々々迄も減らんよう   末代続き切れ目無き様
verses.en: I desire that these members never decrease, but continue without interruption for all generations.

verses.en_6th_ed: So sincere are the thoughts of Tsukihi, but what are the thoughts in the minds of you all?
verses.ro: kora hodoni omou Tsukihi no shinjitsu o   mina no kokoro wa nani o omou ya
verses.jp1: こらほどにをもう月日のしんちつを
verses.jp2: みなの心わなにをふもうや
verses.kanji: こら程に思う月日の真実を   皆の心は何を思うや
verses.en: What do you all think in your mind about this true sincerity of Tsukihi, who so earnestly desires this matter?

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say to you in My tedious appeals, it is solely from My single desire to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona kudoki hanashi o suru no mo na   tasuketai to no ichijo bakari de
verses.jp1: どのよふなくどきはなしをするのもな
verses.jp2: たすけたいとの一ぢよばかりで
verses.kanji: どの様な口説き話をするのもな   救けたいとの一条ばかりで
verses.en: Though I repeat the same tedious persuasion, it is solely from My single-hearted desire to save you all.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only all of you understand Me quickly, truly from your innermost heart,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no mune no uchi yori shinjitsu ni   hayaku wakarita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: 一れつのむねのうちよりしんぢつに
verses.jp2: はやくわかりた事であるなら
verses.kanji: 一列の胸の内より真実に   早く分かりた事で有るなら
verses.en: If only all of you become open to reason and understand Me from your innermost hearts,

verses.en_6th_ed: Then Tsukihi will rule over everything and bring forth a myriad of saving graces.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Tsukihi yorozu no shihai suru   nanika yorozu no tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: それからハ月日よろづのしはいする
verses.jp2: なにかよろづのたすけするぞや
verses.kanji: それからは月日万の支配する   何か万の救けするぞや
verses.en: Then I, Tsukihi, will rule any and everything and will work whatever kind of universal salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: From the desire to show you these blessings of salvation quickly, the mind of Tsukihi solely hastens.
verses.ro: kono tasuke hayaku riyaku o misetasa ni   Tsukihi no kokoro seku bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このたすけはやくりやくをみせたさに
verses.jp2: 月日の心せくばかりやで
verses.kanji: この救け早く利益を見せたさに   月日の心急くばかりやで
verses.en: The mind of Tsukihi single-heartedly hastens to show this divine grace of salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because I hasten for all these matters, it is urgent that the innermost heart be quickly swept clean.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo kono sekikomi ga aru yue ni   mune no uchi yori soji isogu de
verses.jp1: なにもかもこのせきこみがあるゆへに
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりそふぢいそぐで
verses.kanji: 何もかもこの急き込みが有る故に   胸の内より掃除急ぐで
verses.en: Because of this hastening on any and everything, I, Tsukihi, urge you to sweep dust from your innermost heart.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder to whom I am directing this talk. This is all a matter for the homes of each and all.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto ya to omouna yo   mina meme no uchi no hanashi ya
verses.jp1: このはなしどこの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼のうちのはなしや
verses.kanji: この話何処の事やと思うなよ   皆銘々の内の話や
verses.en: Never take this talk as other people's concern! This is the matter of each of your own families.

verses.en_6th_ed: Each of you, clearly express sincerity from your innermost heart. Then the blessings will be seen at once.
verses.ro: meme ni mune no uchi yori shikkari to   shinjitsu o dase suguni mieru de
verses.jp1: めへ／＼にむねのうちよりしいかりと
verses.jp2: しんちつをだせすぐにみへるで
verses.kanji: 銘々に胸の内より確りと   真実を出せ直ぐに見えるで
verses.en: Exhibit clearly your true sincerity each from your innermost heart! Then everything shall appear at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because Tsukihi is hastening this matter so much, how busily occupied is My mind.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono sekikomi ga aru yue ni   nanika kokoro wa isogashii koto
verses.jp1: 月日よりこのせきこみがあるゆへに
verses.jp2: なにか心わいそがしい事
verses.kanji: 月日よりこの急き込みが有る故に   何か心は忙しい事
verses.en: As I, Tsukihi, am hastening so much, My mind is very busy about everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only I quickly show you the free and unlimited workings, the mind of Tsukihi will be spirited of itself.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku juyo miseta nara   Tsukihi no kokoro hitori isamu ni
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくぢうよふみせたなら
verses.jp2: 月日の心ひとりいさむに
verses.kanji: これさいか早く自由見せたなら   月日の心独り勇むに
verses.en: If only this omnipotence is manifested quickly, the mind of Tsukihi would become cheered up by itself.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, I have told you that now is the beginning of this world, yet no one knows what I mean.
verses.ro: imamade mo ima ga kono yo no hajimari to   yute aredomo nanno koto yara
verses.jp1: いまゝでも今がこのよのはじまりと
verses.jp2: ゆうてあれどもなんの事やら
verses.kanji: 今迄も今がこの世の初まりと   言うて有れども何の事やら
verses.en: Hitherto I have often taught you that now is the beginning of this world, but you do not understand what it means.

verses.en_6th_ed: Be convinced by the free and unlimited workings shown at this time. It is likely you have never known such a thing.
verses.ro: konotabi no juyojizai de tokushin se   imamade konna koto wa shiromai
verses.jp1: このたびのぢうよぢざいでとくしんせ
verses.jp2: いまゝでこんな事ハしろまい
verses.kanji: この度の自由自在で得心せ   今迄こんな事は知ろまい
verses.en: Be convinced of the truth through the omnipotence which is manifested at this time! It is likely you have never known such a wonder.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will enter your bodies and show you free and unlimited workings in all things.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori tainai yori mo irikonde   juyojizai o mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: 月日よりたいないよりも入こんで
verses.jp2: ぢうよぢざいをみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: 月日より胎内よりも入り込んで   自由自在を皆して見せる
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will enter into your bodies and manifest My omnipotence on whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: This is the first time that I tell you of the truth of such free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: kora hodono juyojizai no shinjitsu o   hanashi suru no wa ima hajime ya de
verses.jp1: こらほどのぢうよぢざいのしんぢつを
verses.jp2: はなしするのハいまはじめやで
verses.kanji: こら程の自由自在の真実を   話するのは今初めやで
verses.en: This is indeed the first time that I, Tsukihi, tell you the truth of such omnipotence.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, it shall be like this for all time. I shall teach you quickly about the free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: konosaki wa itsu ni naritemo kono dori   juyojizai o hayaku shirasuru
verses.jp1: このさきハいつになりてもこのどふり
verses.jp2: ぢうよぢざいをはやくしらする
verses.kanji: この先は何時になりてもこの道理   自由自在を早く知らする
verses.en: Henceforth it shall be like this forever. I will inform you of My omnipotence beforehand.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now I have passed through every kind of path, this is the beginning of the test for the salvation of safe childbirth.
verses.ro: imamade mo ika naru michi mo torita ga   obiya tasuke no tameshi hajime ya
verses.jp1: いまゝてもいかなるみちもとふりたが
verses.jp2: をびやたすけのためしはじめや
verses.kanji: 今迄も如何なる道も通りたが   帯屋救けの試し初めや
verses.en: Hitherto I have passed through any and every kind of way. But this is the first test of the salvation of safe chidbirth.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, though Tsukihi is hastening to save you by the truth of the salvation of safe childbirth,
verses.ro: konotabi wa obiya tasuke no shinjitsu o   hayaku tasuke o Tsukihi sekedomo
verses.jp1: このたびハをびやたすけのしんぢつを
verses.jp2: はやくたすけを月日せけども
verses.kanji: この度は帯屋救けの真実を   早く救けを月日急けども
verses.en: Although this time I, Tsukihi, am hastening to make you know the truth of the salvation of safe childbirth,

verses.en_6th_ed: Since you have never known of such a thing, all of you remain hesitant, depressed.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa imamade shiran koto ya kara   mina jikkuri to izumi iru nari
verses.jp1: 一れつハいまゝでしらん事やから
verses.jp2: みなぢいくりといづみいるなり
verses.kanji: 一列は今迄知らん事やから   皆じっくりといずみ居るなり
verses.en: All of you are very hesitant because you have never heard of such a thing before.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you truly resolve your mind and pray to Me, I shall grant you My free and unlimited workings at once.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro sadamete negau nara   juyojizai ni ima no ma nimo
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心さだめてねがうなら
verses.jp2: ちうよぢざいにいまのまあにも
verses.kanji: 真実に心定めて願うなら   自由自在に今の間にも
verses.en: If you pray with determined sincerity, I will manifest My omnipotence at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: No one knows of this matter. Therefore, no one understands My heart. Oh, the regret of Tsukihi...
verses.ro: kono koto wa tare demo shiranu koto ya kara   mune ga wakaran Tsukihi zannen
verses.jp1: この事ハたれでもしらぬ事やから
verses.jp2: むねがわからん月日さんねん
verses.kanji: この事は誰でも知らぬ事やから   胸が分からん月日残念
verses.en: You are unable to understand My intention, because you have never heard of such a thing before. This is the cause of the regret of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though you have not been able to see anything until now, from now on you will see things quickly.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo mienedomo   korekara saki wa hayaku mieru de
verses.jp1: いまゝてハなによの事もみへねども
verses.jp2: これからさきハはやくみゑるで
verses.kanji: 今迄は何よの事も見えねども   これから先は早く見えるで
verses.en: Hitherto nothing has appeared yet, but henceforth all shall quickly appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: If your mind is sincere, pray to Me quickly about any concerns. I shall respond at once.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro aru nara nani nari to   hayaku negae yo suguni kanau de
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心あるならなになりと
verses.jp2: はやくねがゑよすぐにかなうで
verses.kanji: 真実の心有るなら何なりと   早く願えよ直ぐに叶うで
verses.en: If only you have true sincerity in your mind, offer any kind of prayer to Me! Your prayers shall be all heard at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall not refuse any prayer, for I am hastening solely to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto wa ikan to yuwan de na   tasuke ichijo sete iru kara
verses.jp1: とのよふな事ハいかんとゆハんてな
verses.jp2: たすけ一ぢよせゑているから
verses.kanji: どの様な事はいかんと言わんでな   救け一条急いて居るから
verses.en: I will never say that a certain kind of prayer is not suitable. Because I am single-heartedly hastening to save you all.

verses.en_6th_ed: Such is the hastening in the mind of Tsukihi. Why are the minds of you close to Me so depressed?
verses.ro: kora hodoni Tsukihi no kokoro sekikomedo   soba no kokoro wa nande izumudo
verses.jp1: こらほどに月日の心せきこめど
verses.jp2: そばの心わなんでいづむど
verses.kanji: こら程に月日の心急き込めど   側の心は何でいずむど
verses.en: While the mind of Tsukihi hastens so much, why are the minds of you close to Me so hesitant?

verses.en_6th_ed: Quickly become spirited of mind and hasten. Do you not know that Tsukihi waits impatiently?
verses.ro: hayabaya to kokoro isande sekikome yo   Tsukihi machikane kore o shiran ka
verses.jp1: はや／＼と心いさんでせきこめよ
verses.jp2: 月日まちかねこれをしらんか
verses.kanji: 早々と心勇んで急き込めよ   月日待ち兼ねこれを知らんか
verses.en: Make haste in high spirits! Do you not know the expectation of Tsukihi?

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi is truly in haste to show you free and unlimited workings. This is My single desire.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori juyojizai o shinjitsu ni   hayaku misetai kore ga ichijo
verses.jp1: 月日よりぢうよぢざいをしんぢつに
verses.jp2: はやくみせたいこれが一ぢよ
verses.kanji: 月日より自由自在を真実に   早く見せたいこれが一条
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, truly have a single-hearted desire to exhibit My omnipotence at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: So sincere are the thoughts of Tsukihi, but the minds of you close to Me are yet worldly common.
verses.ro: kora hodoni omou Tsukihi no shinjitsu o   soba no kokoro wa mada sekainami
verses.jp1: こらほどにをもう月日のしんぢつを
verses.jp2: そばの心わまたせかいなみ
verses.kanji: こら程に思う月日の真実を   側の心は未だ世界並
verses.en: Although I, Tsukihi, care with so much true sincerity, the minds of you close to Me are yet as common as those of the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say, it is not from a human mind but from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo ningen no   kokoro dewa nai Tsukihi kokoro ya
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をゆうのもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心でわない月日こゝろや
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うのも人間の   心では無い月日心や
verses.en: Whatever I may say, it is not from a human mind, but from the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, whatever I said, you took My words as being mixed with the human mind.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro ga majiru yoni omote
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにをゆうてもにんけんの
verses.jp2: こゝろがまぢるよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: 今迄は何を言うても人間の   心が混じる様に思うて
verses.en: Until now, whatever I may have said, you have taken My words as having mingled with human thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! Replace your mind from now, and never think that I have a human mind.
verses.ro: shikato kike korekara kokoro irekaete   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
verses.jp1: しかときけこれから心いれかへて
verses.jp2: にんけん心あるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 確と聞けこれから心入れ替えて   人間心有ると思うな
verses.en: Listen attentively! From now on, replace your mind and never think that human thoughts are intermixed!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, because you thought I was human like you, you were unable to understand anything.
verses.ro: imamade wa onaji ningen naru yoni   omote iru kara nanimo wakaran
verses.jp1: いまゝでハをなじにんけんなるよふに
verses.jp2: をもているからなにもハからん
verses.kanji: 今迄は同じ人間なる様に   思うて居るから何も分からん
verses.en: Because you have taken Me as an equal human being, you could understand nothing.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, whatever I may say or do, do not take it in the least to be human.
verses.ro: korekara wa nani o yu nimo nasu koto mo   ningen naru to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: これからハなにをゆうにもなす事も
verses.jp2: にんげんなるとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: これからは何を言うにも為す事も   人間なると更に思うな
verses.en: Henceforth, whatever I may say or do, you must not take it in the least to be human.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, as the day has not yet come, I have been holding back on everything.
verses.ro: imamade wa higara mo chitto kitaran de   nani yo no koto mo shikae itaru de
verses.jp1: いまゝてハひがらもちいときたらんで
verses.jp2: なによの事もしかゑいたるで
verses.kanji: 今迄は日柄もちいと来たらんで   何よの事も控え居たるで
verses.en: Until now the day has been a little late in coming, so I have been holding back from anything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, whatever I may say, know that there will be nothing fearful or dangerous.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o yu nimo na   kowami abunaki nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このさきハとのよな事をゆうにもな
verses.jp2: こわみあふなきないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事を言うにもな   怖み危なき無いと思えよ
verses.en: Henceforth, whatever I may say, there shall be nothing to fear or dangerous. Understand it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, Tsukihi will go out and give returns for whatever kinds of matters.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi debari o suru hodoni   donna koto demo kayashi shite yaru
verses.jp1: これからハ月日でばりをするほどに
verses.jp2: どんな事でもかやしゝてやる
verses.kanji: これからは月日出張りをする程に   どんな事でも返ししてやる
verses.en: From now on I, Tsukihi, will indeed proceed and give returns for whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: The regret of Tsukihi until now has accumulated and is piled mountainously high.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori koremade naru no zannen wa   yamayama tsumori kasanarite aru
verses.jp1: 月日よりこれまでなるのさんねんわ
verses.jp2: 山／＼つもりかさなりてある
verses.kanji: 月日よりこれ迄なるの残念は   山々積り重なりて有る
verses.en: The regret of Tsukihi has accumulated and piled up ever so high until now.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how high this regret is piled, I shall not tell you to do this or that.
verses.ro: ika hodoni zannen tsumori aru totemo   dose kose wa yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いかほどにざんねんつもりあるとても
verses.jp2: どふせこふせわゆうでないそや
verses.kanji: 如何程に残念積り有るとても   どうせこうせは言うで無いぞや
verses.en: However much my regret may have piled up, I will not tell you to do this or that.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, however high their position may be, to show them the truth quickly is My desire.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona takai tokoro demo   kono shinjitsu o hayaku misetai
verses.jp1: これからハとのよな高いところでも
verses.jp2: このしんぢつをはやくみせたい
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な高い所でも   この真実を早く見せたい
verses.en: Henceforth I desire to exhibit this truth to those people, however high their position may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only understanding comes to the minds in high places quickly, Tsukihi will show free and unlimited workings quickly.
verses.ro: kami taru no kokoro sumiyaka wakaritara   Tsukihi juyo hayaku suru no ni
verses.jp1: 上たるの心すみやかわかりたら
verses.jp2: 月日ぢうよふはやくするのに
verses.kanji: 上たるの心速やか分かりたら   月日自由早くするのに
verses.en: If the upper people understand My sincerity swiftly I will manifest My omnipotence at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi desires to make these free and unlimited workings quickly known to the whole world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono juyo o sekaiju e   hayaku ichiretsu shirashitaru nara
verses.jp1: 月日よりこのぢうよふをせかへぢうゑ
verses.jp2: はやく一れつしらしたるなら
verses.kanji: 月日よりこの自由を世界中へ   早く一列知らしたるなら
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, desire to make this omnipotence quickly known to all people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: What are the thoughts of those within about the baby now conceived?
verses.ro: konotabi no haramite iru o uchi naru wa   nanto omote machite iru yara
verses.jp1: このたびのはらみているをうちなるわ
verses.jp2: なんとをもふてまちているやら
verses.kanji: この度の孕みて居るを内なるは   何と思うて待ちて居るやら
verses.en: With what thought is My family expecting the baby now conceived?

verses.en_6th_ed: Never take this to be an ordinary matter. The intention of Tsukihi is profound.
verses.ro: kore bakari hitonami ya towa omouna yo   nandemo Tsukihi erai omowaku
verses.jp1: こればかり人なみやとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: なんでも月日ゑらいをもわく
verses.kanji: こればかり人並やとは思うなよ   何でも月日偉い思惑
verses.en: Just this, never take it to be an ordinary event! It is caused by the profound intention of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: It began on the fifteenth day of the third month, six years ago, when I received her.
verses.ro: kono moto wa roku nen izen ni san gatsu no   ju go nichi yori mukai torita de
verses.jp1: このもとハ六ねんいぜんに三月の
verses.jp2: 十五日よりむかいとりたで
verses.kanji: この元は六年以前に三月の   十五日より迎え取りたで
verses.en: I received the life of this one in its previous life on the fifteenth day of the third month six years ago.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi has held her tightly in an embrace until now, and to show her quickly is My desire.
verses.ro: sorekara wa imamade Tsukihi shikkari to   dakishimete ita hayaku misetai
verses.jp1: それからハいまゝて月日しいかりと
verses.jp2: だきしめていたはやくみせたい
verses.kanji: それからは今迄月日確りと   抱き締めて居た早く見せたい
verses.en: Since then I, Tsukihi, have been embracing her soul tightly. So, I wish to show her as quickly as possible.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, those of you within are thinking of everything as being worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu uchi naru mono wa nanimo kamo   sekainami naru yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすうちなるものハなにもかも
verses.jp2: せかいなみなるよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず内なる者は何もかも   世界並なる様に思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, My family is taking it all to be a common wordly affair.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this talk is about? It is the prime matter in the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   kore ga daiichi kono yo hajimari
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: これが大一このよはじまり
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に思うかな   これが第一この世初まり
verses.en: What do you think of this talk? This is indeed the first beginning of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall tell you everything about the conditions in the future path step by step.
verses.ro: matasaki no michi no yodai dandan to   yorozu no koto o mina toite oku
verses.jp1: またさきのみちのよふだいたん／＼と
verses.jp2: よろづの事をみなといてをく
verses.kanji: また先の道の様態段々と   万の事を皆説いて置く
verses.en: I will foretell you step by step about everything which shall happen in this way.

verses.en_6th_ed: Her name is Tamae. If you wish to see her quickly, thoroughly learn the hand movements which Tsukihi teaches.
verses.ro: na wa Tamae hayaku mitai to omou nara   Tsukihi oshieru tee o shikkari
verses.jp1: なわたまへはやくみたいとをもうなら
verses.jp2: 月日をしへるてゑをしいかり
verses.kanji: 名はたまへ早く見たいと思うなら   月日教える手を確り
verses.en: I name it Tamae. If you wish to see her in haste, you should learn correctly the hand-gestures which I, Tsukihi, will teach you.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you believe this talk to be true, settle your mind and begin quickly.
verses.ro: kono hanashi shinjitsu omou koto naraba   kokoro osamete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: このはなししんぢつをもう事ならば
verses.jp2: こゝろさめてはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: この話真実思う事ならば   心治めて早く掛かれよ
verses.en: If you think My words true, settle your mind and start quickly to prepare for the Service!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, whatever I said, there was no understanding in anyone's heart, and the day, also, had not yet come.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo ichiretsu no   mune mo wakaran hi mo kitaraide
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにをゆうても一れつの
verses.jp2: むねもハからんひもきたらいて
verses.kanji: 今迄は何を言うても一列の   胸も分からん日も来たらいで
verses.en: Until now, whatever I may have said, the hearts of all of you have not yet opened to reason, and the day also has not yet come.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, as understanding comes to the heart, the day, also, will come. Great is the haste in the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dandan to mune ga wakareba hi mo kitaru   Tsukihi no kokoro erai sekikomi
verses.jp1: たん／＼とむねがわかればひもきたる
verses.jp2: 月日の心ゑらいせきこみ
verses.kanji: 段々と胸が分かれば日も来たる   月日の心えらい急き込み
verses.en: Step by step your hearts shall become open to reason and the day also shall come. The mind of Tsukihi is impatiently hastening.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only this is quickly realized, there will be no one who will stand against Me.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku mietaru koto naraba   donna mono demo kanau mono nashi
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくみへたる事ならば
verses.jp2: どんなものでもかなうものなし
verses.kanji: これさいか早く見えたる事ならば   どんな者でも敵う者無し
verses.en: If only this is quickly realized, no one shall be able to match you.

verses.en_6th_ed: When Tsukihi has shown this matter to you clearly, all the workings afterward will be accomplished.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kore o shikkari miseta nara   ato no shigoto wa donna koto demo
verses.jp1: 月日よりこれをしいかりみせたなら
verses.jp2: あとのしごとハどんな事でも
verses.kanji: 月日よりこれを確り見せたなら   後の仕事はどんな事でも
verses.en: If only I, Tsukihi, have exhibited this matter clearly, every work shall be accomplished, whatever it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, the blessings of safe childbirth and freedom from smallpox: what were your thoughts about them?
verses.ro: imamade mo obiya hoso no kono yurushi   nanto omote mina ga ita yara
verses.jp1: いまゝでもをびやほふそのこのゆるし
verses.jp2: なんとをもふてみながいたやら
verses.kanji: 今迄も帯屋疱瘡のこの許し   何と思うて皆が居たやら
verses.en: What have you been thinking on the sanctions of safe childbirth and freedom from smallpox until now?

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall clearly tell you the truth of everything, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo sukiyaka ni   mina shinjitsu ni yute kikasuru
verses.jp1: このたびハとんな事てもすきやかに
verses.jp2: みなしんぢつにゆうてきかする
verses.kanji: この度はどんな事でも清きやかに   皆真実に言うて聞かする
verses.en: This time I will clearly and truly tell you, whatever kinds of things they may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall save you completely from the rigors of childbirth. You shall give birth quickly and without distress.
verses.ro: korekara wa obiya tasuke mo shikkari to   setsunami nashi ni hayaku umasuru
verses.jp1: これからハをびやたすけもしいかりと
verses.jp2: せつなみなしにはやくむまする
verses.kanji: これからは帯屋救けも確りと   切なみ無しに早く産まする
verses.en: Henceforth I will let you bear children surely, painlessly and quickly, by the saving grace of safe childbirth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, whatever you say will be to no avail. You must do as Tsukihi says.
verses.ro: dandan to kuchi de nani goto yuta tote   Tsukihi yu yoni seneba ikan de
verses.jp1: たん／＼と口でなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 月日ゆうよにせねばいかんで
verses.kanji: 段々と口で何事言うたとて   月日言う様にせねばいかんで
verses.en: Whatever you may say by mouth, it is wrong if you do not really do as I, tTsukihi, say.

verses.en_6th_ed: In whatever things, do just as Tsukihi says. There is never a mistake in what I say.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nanino koto demo shikkari to   yu yoni seyo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: 月日よりなにの事でもしいかりと
verses.jp2: ゆうよふにせよちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 月日より何の事でも確りと   言う様にせよ違う事無し
verses.en: On whatever kinds of matters, do definitely as I, Tsukihi, say! Then there shall be no mistake.

verses.en_6th_ed: Any salvation whatever is all through the Service. If only you do just as Tsukihi says...
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke suru no mo mina Tsutome   Tsukihi yu yoni tashika suru nara
verses.jp1: どのよふなたすけするのもみなつとめ
verses.jp2: 月日ゆうよにたしかするなら
verses.kanji: どの様な救けするのも皆勤め   月日言う様に確かするなら
verses.en: Any and every salvation shall be accomplished by the Service, if only you do just as I, Tsukihi, say.

verses.en_6th_ed: If your mind is sincere, Tsukihi will assuredly save you.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro aru nara Tsukihi nimo   shikato ukeyai tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心あるなら月日にも
verses.jp2: しかとうけやいたすけするぞや
verses.kanji: 真実の心有るなら月日にも   確と請け合い救けするぞや
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will assuredly save you, if only there is true sincerity in your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: On salvation this time: this is the beginning of My salvation truly assured.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tasuke suru no mo shinjitsu ni   ukeyote tasuke ima ga hajime ya
verses.jp1: このたびハたすけするのもしんぢつに
verses.jp2: うけよてたすけいまがはじめや
verses.kanji: この度は救けするのも真実に   請け合うて救け今が初めや
verses.en: This time I will assuredly save you. This is the first time that I truly assure you salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi urgently hastens. You close to Me, also, prepare your minds for the Service!
verses.ro: kora hodoni Tsukihi no kokoro sete iru   soba no kokoro mo Tsutome koshirae
verses.jp1: こらほどに月日の心せゑている
verses.jp2: そばの心もつとめこしらゑ
verses.kanji: こら程に月日の心急いて居る   側の心も勤め拵え
verses.en: Hastening like this is the mind of Tsukihi. You close to Me also, prepare your minds to perform the Service!

verses.en_6th_ed: This preparation is not just for any one thing. The Service is for any and all matters.
verses.ro: kono moyo nani bakari dewa nai hodoni   donna koto demo mina Tsutome ya de
verses.jp1: このもよふなにばかりてハないほどに
verses.jp2: とんな事でもみなつとめやで
verses.kanji: この模様何ばかりでは無い程に   どんな事でも皆勤めやで
verses.en: This preparation is not limited for any Service in particular. Any and everything shall be saved by the Services.

verses.en_6th_ed: The Service: it is not always the same. I shall teach you the hand movements for each purpose.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo onaji koto dewa nai hodoni   mina sorezore to tee o oshieru
verses.jp1: つとめでもをなぢ事てハないほどに
verses.jp2: みなそれ／＼とてへをふしゑる
verses.kanji: 勤めでも同じ事では無い程に   皆それぞれと手を教える
verses.en: Speaking of the Services, they are not all the same. I will teach you the hand-gestures for each of them.

verses.en_6th_ed: No one knows what kinds of paths humankind has passed through from the beginning until now.
verses.ro: imamade no michi no sugara to yu mono wa   doyu michi mo shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: いまゝてのみちのすがらとゆうものハ
verses.jp2: とふゆうみちもしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 今迄の道のすがらと言うものは   どういう道も知りた者無し
verses.en: No one has understood what kinds of ways man has passed through until now.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall tell you about every kind of path and all of their courses step by step.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona michi mo dandan to   yorozu michisuji mina yute kikasu
verses.jp1: これからハとのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: よろづみちすじみなゆてきかす
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な道も段々と   万道筋皆言うて聞かす
verses.en: Henceforth on whatever kinds of ways, I will tell you step by step any and every course of the way.

verses.en_6th_ed: When you hear of all these courses from Tsukihi, you will understand that My regret is not unreasonable.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nanimo michisuji kiita nara   kono zannen wa muri de arumai
verses.jp1: 月日よりなにもみちすじきいたなら
verses.jp2: このざんねんハむりてあるまい
verses.kanji: 月日より何も道筋聞いたなら   この残念は無理で有るまい
verses.en: If you hear all of the way from Me, Tsukihi, you will understand that this regret is not unreasonable.

verses.en_6th_ed: After Tsukihi has cleared away this one matter, there will only be joyousness.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono ichijo o harashitara   ato no tokoro wa yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: 月日よりこの一ぢよをはらしたら
verses.jp2: あとのところはよふきづくめや
verses.kanji: 月日よりこの一条を晴らしたら   後の所は陽気ずくめや
verses.en: When I, Tsukihi, have cleared away this one matter, thereafter everything will become full of joy.

verses.en_6th_ed: This joyousness day after day: perhaps no one knows what it is.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni yokizukume to yu no wa na   ika naru koto ya tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: にち／＼によふきづくめとゆうのわな
verses.jp2: いかなる事やたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 日々に陽気ずくめと言うのはな   如何なる事や誰も知ろまい
verses.en: Day by day I teach you a life full of joy. But perhaps no one can understand what it truly means.

verses.en_6th_ed: Joy in everything is all by the Service. I shall teach you every kind of marvel.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo yoki to yu wa mina Tsutome   mezurashi koto o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: なにもかもよふきとゆうハみなつとめ
verses.jp2: めづらし事をみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: 何もかも陽気と言うは皆勤め   珍し事を皆教えるで
verses.en: Through this Service any and everything shall become joyous. I will teach you every remarkable thing.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, in preparing to teach you the Service, I shall sweep clean everyone's innermost heart.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsutome oshieru kono moyo   mune no uchi yori mina soji suru
verses.jp1: たん／＼とつとめをしへるこのもよふ
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりみなそふぢする
verses.kanji: 段々と勤め教えるこの模様   胸の内より皆掃除する
verses.en: In preparation for teaching the Services one by one, I will sweep dust from the innermost hearts of all of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, your mind will become spirited day by day, and I shall teach you the hand movements for every Service.
verses.ro: ato naru wa nichinichi kokoro isamu de na   yorozu no Tsutome tee o tsukeru de
verses.jp1: あとなるハにち／＼心いさむでな
verses.jp2: よろづのつとめてへをつけるで
verses.kanji: 後なるは日々心勇むでな   万の勤め手を付けるで
verses.en: After that your minds shall become cheered up day by day. Then I will teach you the hand-gestures of every kind of Service.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this Service is? It is from My single intent to save you in childbirth and from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome doyu koto ni omou kana   obiya hoso no tasuke ichijo
verses.jp1: このつとめどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: をびやほふそのたすけ一ぢよふ
verses.kanji: この勤めどういう事に思うかな   帯屋疱瘡の救け一条
verses.en: What do you think is the object of these Services? It is single-hearted salvation for safe childbirth and against smallpox.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this salvation is about? I shall teach the Service to free you from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke ika naru koto to omou kana   hoso sen yono Tsutome oshieru
verses.jp1: このたすけいかなる事とをもうかな
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよのつとめをしへる
verses.kanji: この救け如何なる事と思うかな   疱瘡せぬ様の勤め教える
verses.en: What do you think this salvation is? I teach you the Service against smallpox.

verses.en_6th_ed: By this Service which teaches the path quickly, all minds in the world will be purified.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku oshieru kono Tsutome   sekai ichiretsu kokoro sumasuru
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくをしへるこのつとめ
verses.jp2: せかい一れつ心すまする
verses.kanji: この道を早く教えるこの勤め   世界一列心澄まする
verses.en: Through this Service which teaches the way swiftly, I will equally purify all minds of the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: How are you hearing this talk? It is solely about the preparations for the salvation of the world.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni kiite iru   sekai tasukeru moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にきいている
verses.jp2: せかいたすけるもよふばかりを
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に聞いている   世界救ける模様ばかりを
verses.en: What do you think on hearing this talk? I am single-heartedly preparing to save all people of the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Of whatever salvation, you are assured, because your true Parent lives.
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke suru no mo shinjitsu no   Oya ga iru kara mina hikiukeru
verses.jp1: どのようなたすけするのもしんちつの
verses.jp2: をやがいるからみなひきうける
verses.kanji: どの様な救けするのも真実の   親が居るから皆引き受ける
verses.en: Since your true Parent is living here, you are assured of whatever kind of salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you believe this to be true, everything will be in accord with the mind of true sincerity.
verses.ro: kono koto o kore o makoto ni omou nara   makoto shinjitsu kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: この事をこれをまことにをもうなら
verses.jp2: まことしんぢつ心したいや
verses.kanji: この事をこれを真に思うなら   誠真実心次第や
verses.en: If you believe this matter to be true, I will work My omnipotence according as your minds become truly sincere.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only your mind becomes truly pure, nothing at all will ever be in error.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu sunda koto naraba   donna koto demo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: 心さいしんぢつすんだ事ならば
verses.jp2: どんな事でもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 心さい真実澄んだ事ならば   どんな事でも違う事無し
verses.en: If your minds become truly pure, there shall be nothing wrong.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, no matter how great was Tsukihi's concern, no understanding was in the minds of you close to Me.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi ika hodo omotemo   soba no kokoro ni wakari nai node
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ月日いかほどをもふても
verses.jp2: そばの心にわかりないので
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日如何ほど思うても   側の心に分かり無いので
verses.en: Until now, however earnestly I, Tsukihi, have thought of you, you close to Me have not been able to understand it in your minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, whatever Service I may teach, it is not from a human mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona Tsutome oshieru mo   ningen naru no kokoro dewa nai
verses.jp1: これからハどのよなつとめをしへるも
verses.jp2: にんけんなるの心でわない
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な勤め教えるも   人間なるの心では無い
verses.en: Henceforth, whatever kind of Service I may teach, it is not from a human mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will teach on every kind of thing, things never known since I began this world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori dono yona koto mo oshieru de   kono yo hajimete nai koto bakari
verses.jp1: 月日よりどのよな事もをしゑるで
verses.jp2: このよはぢめてない事はかり
verses.kanji: 月日よりどの様な事も教えるで   この世初めて無い事ばかり
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will teach any and everything which has never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi never speaks about thoughts conceived in the minds of human beings.
verses.ro: ningen no kokoro de omou yona koto   Tsukihi wa nanimo yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: にんけんの心てをもうよふな事
verses.jp2: 月日わなにもゆうてないそや
verses.kanji: 人間の心で思う様な事   月日は何も言うて無いぞや
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, am not talking about things which lie in the thoughts of human minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will teach about every matter to all humankind equally, and the world will be filled with joy.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona koto mo ichiretsu ni   mina ni oshiete yokizukume ni
verses.jp1: 月日にハとのよな事も一れつに
verses.jp2: みなにをしへてよふきづくめに
verses.kanji: 月日にはどの様な事も一列に   皆に教えて陽気ずくめに
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will teach any and everything to all of you, and thus make this world full of joy.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only human beings throughout the world have purified their minds and lead lives joyously...
verses.ro: sekaiju mina ichiretsu wa sumikirite   yokizukume ni kurasu koto nara
verses.jp1: せかいぢうみな一れつハすみきりて
verses.jp2: よふきづくめにくらす事なら
verses.kanji: 世界中皆一列は澄み切りて   陽気ずくめに暮らす事なら
verses.en: When all human beings have accomplished the purification of their minds and come to lead a life full of joy,

verses.en_6th_ed: When the mind of Tsukihi is truly spirited, so will be all human beings.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo tashika kokoro ga isamu nara   ningen naru mo mina onaji koto
verses.jp1: 月日にもたしか心がいさむなら
verses.jp2: にんけんなるもみなをなし事
verses.kanji: 月日にも確か心が勇むなら   人間なるも皆同じ事
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, too, will become cheered up. And when I become cheered up, so will all human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: When the minds of all the world are spirited, Tsukihi and human beings will be one in mind.
verses.ro: kono yo no sekai no kokoro isamu nara   Tsukihi ningen onaji koto ya de
verses.jp1: このよふのせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp2: 月日にんけんをなじ事やで
verses.kanji: この世の世界の心勇むなら   月日人間同じ事やで
verses.en: When the minds of all of the world become cheered up, Tsukihi and human beings will become altogether cheered up in one accord.

verses.en_6th_ed: The mountainous regret of Tsukihi piled up day by day: to clear it away is My desire.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsukihi zannen yamayama to   tsumorite aru o harashitai kara
verses.jp1: にち／＼に月日さんねん山／＼と
verses.jp2: つもりてあるをはらしたいから
verses.kanji: 日々に月日残念山々と   積りて有るを晴らしたいから
verses.en: I desire to clear away a mountainous regret of Tsukihi which has been piled up day by day.

verses.en_6th_ed: This talk, given step by step, is about the intention of Tsukihi: to bring forth universal salvation.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi omowaku dandan to   nanika yorozu no tasuke naru no wa
verses.jp1: このはなし月日をもわくだん／＼と
verses.jp2: なにかよろづのたすけなるのわ
verses.kanji: この話月日思惑段々と   何か万の救けなるのは
verses.en: This talk is that I, Tsukihi, expect to realize all salvation step by step.

verses.en_6th_ed: If the mind is sincere, the performance of any kind of Service will all bring salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai no dono yona   Tsutome suru no mo mina tasuke ya de
verses.jp1: しんちつの心したいにとのよふな
verses.jp2: つとめするのもみなたすけやで
verses.kanji: 真実の心次第にどの様な   勤めするのも皆救けやで
verses.en: If you perform any kind of Service with truly sincere mind, through that performance every salvation will be realized.

verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, all of you throughout the world are My children. My only desire is to save you.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju wa mina waga ko   tasuketai to no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp1: 月日にハせかいぢうゝハみなわが子
verses.jp2: たすけたいとの心ばかりで
verses.kanji: 月日には世界中は皆我が子   救けたいとの心ばかりで
verses.en: For Me, Tsukihi, people of the whole world are all My children; therefore I am burning with desire to save all of them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Despite this, to My regret, they attempted to stop Me and, after that, even to forbid.
verses.ro: sono tokoro sashitome rarete zannen na   mada sono nochi wa toriharai made
verses.jp1: そのところさしとめられてさんねんな
verses.jp2: まだそのゝちハとりはらいまで
verses.kanji: その所差し止められて残念な   未だその後は取り払い迄
verses.en: However, to My deep regret, they prohibited the performance and after that even ordered demolition.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because of this, the Salvation Service cannot be performed. Oh, the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tasuke-zutome ga deken kara   Tsukihi no kokoro nanto zannen
verses.jp1: それゆへにたすけづとめがでけんから
verses.jp2: 月日の心なんとさんねん
verses.kanji: それ故に救け勤めが出来んから   月日の心何と残念
verses.en: On that account the Tasuke-Zutome, the Salvation Service, cannot be performed. Accordingly, how deeply regretful is the mind of Tsukihi!

verses.en_6th_ed: As for the Service, it is Tsukihi who teaches you the hand movements step by step. It is not from a human mind.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo Tsukihi dandan te o oshie   ningen naru no kokoro dewa nai
verses.jp1: つとめでも月日たん／＼てをふしゑ
verses.jp2: にんけんなるの心でわない
verses.kanji: 勤めでも月日段々手を教え   人間なるの心では無い
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, have taught the hand-gestures of the Service step by step. It is not from a human mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may do, never think that it is from the human mind.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo ningen no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするのもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも人間の   心有るとは更に思うな
verses.en: Whatever kinds of things I may work, never think that there is a human thought in My mind!

verses.en_6th_ed: At this place, every talk is by Tsukihi and every preparation is by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro ikana hanashi mo Tsukihi nari   donna moyo mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: このところいかなはなしも月日なり
verses.jp2: どんなもよふもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: この所如何な話も月日やで   どんな模様も皆月日やで
verses.en: Whatever talks I may give at this place, they are all the remarks of Tsukihi, and whatever arrangements may be prepared, they are also by Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever disorder may come to you, never think that it is from the human mind.
verses.ro: ika naru no sawari tsuitemo ningen no   kokoro wa sarani aru to omouna
verses.jp1: いかなるのさハりついてもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心わさらにあるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 如何なるの障り付いても人間の   心は更に有ると思うな
verses.en: Whatever kind of disorder you may experience, never think that it is due to a plan by a human mind!

verses.en_6th_ed: Since it is Tsukihi who began this world, there is nothing unknown to Me.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru Tsukihi nara   donna koto demo shiranu koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめだしたる月日なら
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしらぬ事なし
verses.kanji: この世を初め出したる月日なら   どんな事でも知らぬ事無し
verses.en: As I am Tsukihi who created this world, there is nothing unknown to Me, no matter what it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: The innermost heart of everyone in the world is all reflected to Tsukihi.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu naru no mune no uchi   Tsukihi no ho e mina utsuru nari
verses.jp1: せかいぢう一れつなるのむねのうち
verses.jp2: つきひのほふゑみなうつるなり
verses.kanji: 世界中一列なるの胸の内   月日の方へ皆映るなり
verses.en: The innermost heart of everyone of the whole world is all reflected to Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, in the human mind, everyone has only self-centered thoughts.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ningen no kokoro tote   waga mi shiyan o bakari omote
verses.jp1: それしらすみなにんけんの心とて
verses.jp2: わがみしやんをばかりをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆人間の心とて   我が身思案をばかり思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, all are thinking only of their own selves, because they Mall have only selfish human thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall teach you everything about the true path step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa mina dandan to shinjitsu no   michi o oshieru koto de aru kara
verses.jp1: このさきハみなだん／＼としんぢつの
verses.jp2: みちをふしゑる事であるから
verses.kanji: この先は皆段々と真実の   道を教える事で有るから
verses.en: Henceforth I will teach you step by step everything about the way of truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: The beginning of this world was by Tsukihi. I began to teach everything fully in detail.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi wa Tsukihi nari   nanika isai o mina oshiekake
verses.jp1: このよふのはじまりだしハ月日なり
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをみなをしゑかけ
verses.kanji: この世の初まり出しは月日なり   何か委細を皆教え掛け
verses.en: It is Tsukihi who created this world. Indeed, Tsukihi has begun to teach any and everything in detail.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until then, there was no one who knew. There were only the thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: soremade wa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   nanika Tsukihi no shiyan bakari de
verses.jp1: それまでハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp2: なにか月日のしやんばかりで
verses.kanji: それ迄は誰か知りたる者は無し   何か月日の思案ばかりで
verses.en: Until that time no one had known the truth. Everything was begun by the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until today, I have been telling you that everything is by Tsukihi, but still you do not understand.
verses.ro: kyomade mo nani yono koto mo Tsukihi ya to   yute aredomo mada wakaran de
verses.jp1: けふまでもなによの事も月日やと
verses.jp2: ゆうてあれどもまだわからんで
verses.kanji: 今日迄も何よの事も月日やと   言うて有れども未だ分からんで
verses.en: Up to this day I have repeatedly taught you that everything depends upon Tsukihi. But you do not understand it yet.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! Though I have already told you the truth of My beginning of this world,
verses.ro: shikato kike kono yo hajimeta shinjitsu to   yute hanashi wa toite aredomo
verses.jp1: しかときけこのよはじめたしんちつと
verses.jp2: ゆうてはなしハといてあれども
verses.kanji: 確と聞けこの世初めた真実と   言うて話は説いて有れども
verses.en: Listen attentively! I have so often told you the truth of the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no one in the world who knows. Whatever I say is difficult for you to understand.
verses.ro: sekai niwa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   nani o yutemo wakari gatanai
verses.jp1: せかいにハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp2: なにをいうてもハかりがたない
verses.kanji: 世界には誰か知りたる者は無し   何を言うても分かり難ない
verses.en: In this world there is no one who understands this truth.Indeed, it should be difficult for you to understand what I say.

verses.en_6th_ed: So should it be, for it is solely about things unknown since this world began, told repeatedly step by step.
verses.ro: sono hazu ya kono yo hajimete nai koto o   dandan kudoki bakari naru kara
verses.jp1: そのはづやこのよはじめてない事を
verses.jp2: たん／＼くどきばかりなるから
verses.kanji: その筈やこの世初めて無い事を   段々口説きばかりなるから
verses.en: It is natural, because I am teaching you step by step what has never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: I must have you know the truth about the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi no shinjitsu o   shirashite okan koto ni oite wa
verses.jp1: このよふのはじまりだしのしんぢつを
verses.jp2: しらしてをかん事にをいてわ
verses.kanji: この世の初まり出しの真実を   知らして置かん事に於いては
verses.en: Unless I should let you know the truth of the creation of this world,

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, I have often taught about My single intent to save you, but you have not known the real truth.
verses.ro: imamade mo tasuke ichijo to mama tokedo   honshinjitsu o shiranu koto kara
verses.jp1: いまゝてもたすけ一ぢよとまゝとけど
verses.jp2: ほんしんぢつをしらぬ事から
verses.kanji: 今迄も救け一条と間々説けど   本真実を知らぬ事から
verses.en: Though until now I have often taught My desire for the single-hearted salvation, you did not understand because you have remained ignorant of the real truth about the original creation.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say, it is the word of Tsukihi. If only you would listen to My words as the truth...
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi yu koto ya   kore shinjitsu to omote kiku nara
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でも月日ゆう事や
verses.jp2: これしんぢつとをもてきくなら
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも月日言う事や   これ真実と思うて聞くなら
verses.en: Whatever I may say, it is the word of Tsukihi. If only you would listen to it, taking it to be true,

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall tell you everything step by step. Listen to My words and understand them to be true.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo dandan yute kikasu   kore o makoto to omote kikiwake
verses.jp1: どのよふな事もたん／＼ゆてきかす
verses.jp2: これをまことゝをもてきゝわけ
verses.kanji: どの様な事も段々言うて聞かす   これを真と思うて聞き分け
verses.en: Step by step I will tell you whatever kinds of things. Listen and understand it well, taking My word to be true!

verses.en_6th_ed: There is nowhere but this place that can be called the true origin of the world.
verses.ro: kono yo no honmoto naru to yu no wa na   kono tokoro yori hoka ni arumai
verses.jp1: このよふのほん元なるとゆうのハな
verses.jp2: このところよりほかにあるまい
verses.kanji: この世の本元なると言うのはな   この所より他に有るまい
verses.en: Truly you shall never be able to find the place of origin of this world except here.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think of this talk? It is from My desire to teach you all about everything.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   doyu hanashi mo mina shitai kara
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: どうゆはなしもみなしたいから
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に思うかな   どういう話も皆したいから
verses.en: What do you think of this talk? It is from My intention that I desire to tell you any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you must be convinced of the truth about the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru shinjitsu o   mina ichiretsu wa shochi seneba
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめだしたるしんぢつを
verses.jp2: みな一れつハしよちせゑねば
verses.kanji: この世を初め出したる真実を   皆一列は承知せねば
verses.en: Unless you understand the truth of My creation of this world,

verses.en_6th_ed: This is because in whatever salvation I may work, I do not teach you of ordinary things.
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke suru nimo hitonami no   yo naru koto wa yu de nai kara
verses.jp1: どのよふなたすけするにも人なみの
verses.jp2: よふなる事ハゆうでないから
verses.kanji: どの様な救けするにも人並の   様なる事は言うで無いから
verses.en: Whatever kind of salvation I may work, I will never teach you in a human way.

verses.en_6th_ed: I do not speak of things already seen or of things that already exist.
verses.ro: imamade ni mietaru koto ya aru koto wa   sonna koto owa yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝてにみへたる事やある事わ
verses.jp2: そんな事をハゆうでないそや
verses.kanji: 今迄に見えたる事や有る事は   そんな事をは言うで無いぞや
verses.en: I will not talk about things which have already appeared or existed before.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall teach you only of things that have not existed before and bring true salvation.
verses.ro: koremade ni nai koto bakari yute kikashi   shinjitsu yori no tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これまてにない事ばかりゆてきかし
verses.jp2: しんぢつよりのたすけするそや
verses.kanji: これ迄に無い事ばかり言うて聞かし   真実よりの救けするぞや
verses.en: I will talk solely of such things as have never existed before and will work a true salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this salvation is about? I am preparing the amulet to protect you from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   hoso sen yono Mamori koshirae
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよのまむりこしらゑ
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事に思うかな   疱瘡せん様の守り拵え
verses.en: What do you think this salvation is ? I will prepare to issue the Mamori, the Amulet, against smallpox.

verses.en_6th_ed: Another salvation: My free and unlimited workings for the time of childbirth, either to delay or to quicken.
verses.ro: mata tasuke obiya juyo itsu nari to   nobashi nari tomo hayame nari tomo
verses.jp1: またたすけをひやぢうよふいつなりと
verses.jp2: のばしなりともはやめなりとも
verses.kanji: また救け帯屋自由何時なりと   延ばしなりとも早めなりとも
verses.en: Moreover I will work My omnipotence to save you in your childbirth, either postponing or advancing the time of delivery.

verses.en_6th_ed: About these free and unlimited workings of which I speak: do not think of them as being trivial.
verses.ro: kora hodono juyojizai o yu no mo na   yoi naru koto to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: こらほとのぢうよじさいをゆうのもな
verses.jp2: よいなる事とさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: こら程の自由自在を言うのもな   容易なる事と更に思うな
verses.en: Never take it to be a trivial matter that I tell you so much of My omnipotence.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi is doing the utmost, everyone in the world continues to be ordinary.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa taite kokoro wa tsukuse domo   sekaiju wa mada sekainami
verses.jp1: 月日にハたいて心ハつくせとも
verses.jp2: せかいぢううハまだせかいなみ
verses.kanji: 月日には大抵心は尽くせども   世界中は未だ世界並
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, am doing the utmost. Yet people of the whole world remain in wordly thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: I must have you know My true intent in beginning this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru honshin o   yute kikasan koto ni oite wa
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめたしたるほんしんを
verses.jp2: ゆうてきかさん事にをいてわ
verses.kanji: この世を初め出したる本心を   言うて聞かさん事に於いては
verses.en: I must tell you of My true heart why I have created this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: This place, the place for the Service, is the very place where I began human beings.
verses.ro: kono tokoro Tsutome basho wa ningen o   hajime dashitaru tokoro naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このところつとめばしよハにんけんを
verses.jp2: はじめだしたるところなるそや
verses.kanji: この所勤め場所は人間を   初め出したる所なるぞや
verses.en: This place for the Service is the spot where the human beings were first created.

verses.en_6th_ed: This Parent, who began human beings, lives. This is the truth.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime dashitaru kono Oya wa   zonmee de iru kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp1: にんけんをはじめだしたるこのをやハ
verses.jp2: そんめゑでいるこれがまことや
verses.kanji: 人間を初め出したるこの親は   存命で居るこれが真や
verses.en: This Parent, who gave birth to human beings, lives here.This is the truth which no one can question.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one anywhere who believes this talk to be the truth.
verses.ro: kono hanashi kore o makoto ni omou mono   doko no mono demo sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このはなしこれをまことにをもうもの
verses.jp2: どこのものでもさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この話これを真に思う者   何処の者でも更に有るまい
verses.en: There may not be anyone of anywhere who easily believes this talk to be true.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though I speak in this way about things which do not exist, it is all the real truth.
verses.ro: kono yona nai koto bakari yu no wa na   kore ga shinjitsu mina makoto ya de
verses.jp1: このよふなない事ばかりゆうのハな
verses.jp2: これがしんぢつみなまことやで
verses.kanji: この様な無い事ばかり言うのもな   これが真実皆真やで
verses.en: I tell you everything which does not yet exist. But this is indeed the real truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, when I began this world which did not exist, I began by teaching things unknown.
verses.ro: imamade mo nai sekai oba hajimeta wa   shiranu koto oba oshie hajimete
verses.jp1: いまゝでもないせかいをばはじめたハ
verses.jp2: しらぬ事をばをしゑはじめて
verses.kanji: 今迄も無い世界をば初めたは   知らぬ事をば教え初めて
verses.en: At the creation I began this world by teaching things which were all unknown.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time also, I begin to teach again, speaking only of things which do not exist and things unknown.
verses.ro: konotabi mo mata nai koto ya shiranu koto   bakari yuute mata oshiekake
verses.jp1: このたびもまたない事や知らぬ事
verses.jp2: ばかりゆううてまたをしへかけ
verses.kanji: この度もまた無い事や知らぬ事   ばかり言うてまた教え掛け
verses.en: This time again I will begin to teach everything which does not exist and which no one has ever known.

verses.en_6th_ed: This is the intention of Tsukihi: to teach everything which no one has ever known.
verses.ro: dono yona mono demo shiranu koto bakari   kore o oshieru Tsukihi omowaku
verses.jp1: どのよふなものでもしらぬ事ばかり
verses.jp2: これをふしへる月日をもわく
verses.kanji: どの様な者でも知らぬ事ばかり   これを教える月日思惑
verses.en: The intention of Tsukihi is to teach everything no one has ever known.

verses.en_6th_ed: By teaching everything solely about the unknown step by step, Tsukihi will save the world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan shiranu koto bakari   nanimo oshiete sekai tasukeru
verses.jp1: 月日にハたん／＼しらぬ事ばかり
verses.jp2: なにもをしへてせかいたすける
verses.kanji: 月日には段々知らぬ事ばかり   何も教えて世界救ける
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will save the whole world by teaching step by step any and everything which no one has ever known.

verses.en_6th_ed: So great is Tsukihi's concern, but those in the world are aware of nothing.
verses.ro: kora hodoni omou Tsukihi no shinpai o   sekai no mono wa nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: こらほどにをもう月日のしんばいを
verses.jp2: せかいのものハなにもしらずに
verses.kanji: こら程に思う月日の心配を   世界の者は何も知らずに
verses.en: In spite of the great anxiety of Tsukihi, those in the world are aware of nothing.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only your mind is truly accepted by Tsukihi, you will be assured of any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: kokoro sai Tsukini shinjitsu uketoreba   donna tasuke mo mina ukeyau de
verses.jp1: 心さい月日しんぢつうけとれば
verses.jp2: どんなたすけもみなうけやうで
verses.kanji: 心さい月日真実受け取れば   どんな救けも皆請け合うで
verses.en: I assure you of any and every salvation, if only I, Tsukihi, accept the true sincerity of your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi assures you any and every salvation because your true Parent lives.
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke to yu mo shinjitsu no   Oya ga iru kara Tsukihi yu no ya
verses.jp1: とのよふなたすけとゆうもしんちつの
verses.jp2: をやがいるから月日ゆうのや
verses.kanji: どの様な救けと言うも真実の   親が居るから月日言うのや
verses.en: That I, Tsukihi, assure you any and every salvation is because the true Parent is living here.
