verses.ro: kono tokoro dono yona Koki shitaru tomo   kore wa nihon no takara naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このところどのよなこふきしたるとも
verses.jp2: これハにほんのたからなるぞや
verses.kanji: この所どの様なこうきしたるとも   これは日本の宝なるぞや
verses.en: Whatever Koki, the Divine Record, may be made at this place, it should be the treasure accomplished in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: All humankind, settle your minds and ponder. Prepare quickly to wait for the Divine Record.
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kokoro sadamete shiyan seyo   hayaku Koki o matsu yoni seyo
verses.jp1: 一れつの心さだめてしやんせよ
verses.jp2: はやくこふきをまつよふにせよ
verses.kanji: 一列の心定めて思案せよ   早くこうきを待つ様にせよ
verses.en: Determine your minds, all mankind, and ponder over it well! And wait for the Koki, the Divine Record, to be quickly accomplished!

verses.en_6th_ed: When the true Divine Record has been accomplished, Tsukihi will spread everything whatever.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Koki ga deketa koto naraba   donna koto demo Tsukihi hiromeru
verses.jp1: しんぢつのこふきがでけた事ならば
verses.jp2: どんな事でも月日ひろめる
verses.kanji: 真実のこうきが出来た事ならば   どんな事でも月日広める
verses.en: When the true Koki, the Divine Record, is accomplished, I Tsukihi, will spread any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though I say that Tsukihi will spread it, the minds of all of you may not understand.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori hirome o suru to yuta tote   mina no kokoro wa shochi dekemai
verses.jp1: 月日よりひろめをするとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: みなの心ハしよちでけまい
verses.kanji: 月日より広めをすると言うたとて   皆の心は承知出来まい
verses.en: Even if I say that I, Tsukihi, will spread it, perhaps the minds of all of you cannot understand its true meaning.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this regard, I firmly request you, My inter-mediaries. Please comply.
verses.ro: soreyue ni toritsugi yori ni shikkari to   tanomi oku kara shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: それゆへにとりつきよりにしいかりと
verses.jp2: たのみをくからしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: それ故に取次よりに確りと   頼み置くから承知して居よ
verses.en: Therefore, I request it surely from the toritsugi, My mediators. So please comply with it!

verses.en_6th_ed: When the day of the appointed time comes, there will be no knowing when or where Tsukihi will go.
verses.ro: kono higara kokugen kitaru koto naraba   nandoki Tsukihi doko i iku yara
verses.jp1: このひがらこくけんきたる事ならば
verses.jp2: なんどき月日どこいゝくやら
verses.kanji: この日柄刻限来たる事ならば   何時月日何処へ行くやら
verses.en: When the fixed time of the fixed day comes, there shall be no knowing when and where I, Tsukihi, will go out.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, calm your minds firmly, My intermediaries, and begin quickly.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni toritsugi no hito shikkari to   kokoro shizumete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: にち／＼にとりつぎの人しいかりと
verses.jp2: 心しづめてはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: 日々に取次の人確りと   心静めて早く掛かれよ
verses.en: I request My Toritsugi to make their minds firm and calm day by day, and then quickly begin arrangements!

verses.en_6th_ed: What are all of you thinking of this path? It is not easy to understand it.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni mina no mono   omote iru yara choto ni wakaran
verses.jp1: このみちハどふゆう事にみなのもの
verses.jp2: をもているやら一寸にわからん
verses.kanji: この道はどういう事に皆の者   思うて居るやら一寸に分からん
verses.en: What are you all thinking of this way? It is never easy to understand it.

verses.en_6th_ed: By all means, Tsukihi will complete this path, holding fast to the mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nandemo kademo shinjitsu o   kokoro shikkari torinukeru de
verses.jp1: 月日にハなんでもかでもしんぢつを
verses.jp2: 心しいかりとふりぬけるで
verses.kanji: 月日には何でもかでも真実を   心確り通り抜けるで
verses.en: No matter what hardships there may be, I, Tsukihi, will go through My way with true sincerity held tight in My mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this path has reached the high places, I shall do My free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: kono michi o kami e nuketaru koto naraba   juyojizai no hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: このみちを上ゑぬけたる事ならば
verses.jp2: ぢうよぢざいのはたらきをする
verses.kanji: この道を上へ抜けたる事ならば   自由自在の働きをする
verses.en: When this way reaches through to the upper people, I will manifest all of My omnipotence.

verses.en_6th_ed: When Tsukihi begins the workings, however strongly a person may oppose Me,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono hataraki o shikaketara   ikana goteki taru to yutemo
verses.jp1: 月日よりこのはたらきをしかけたら
verses.jp2: いかなこふてきたるとゆうても
verses.kanji: 月日よりこの働きを仕掛けたら   如何な強敵たると言うても
verses.en: When I, Tsukihi, begin this work, however strong you may be,

verses.en_6th_ed: He will truly understand and be purified in mind, and will lean on the Parent in all matters.
verses.ro: kokoro yori shinjitsu wakari sumikirite   donna koto demo Oya ni motareru
verses.jp1: 心よりしんぢつハかりすみきりて
verses.jp2: とんな事でもをやにもたれる
verses.kanji: 心より真実分かり澄み切りて   どんな事でも親に凭れる
verses.en: You shall become purified and understand My intention well. Then, you shall lean upon the Parent on whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall set out to make the whole world brim with joy.
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa dokomade mo   yokizukume ni mina shite kakaru
verses.jp1: このさきハせかへぢううハどこまでも
verses.jp2: よふきづくめにみなしてかゝる
verses.kanji: この先は世界中は何処迄も   陽気ずくめに皆して掛かる
verses.en: Henceforth, I will lead everyone throughout the whole world to a life full of joy.

verses.en_6th_ed: Take each course of this path as your own matter and ponder.
verses.ro: dandan to kono michisuji no yotai wa   mina waga koto to omote shiyan se
verses.jp1: たん／＼とこのみちすじのよふたいハ
verses.jp2: みなハが事とをもてしやんせ
verses.kanji: 段々とこの道筋の様態は   皆我が事と思うて思案せ
verses.en: Taking each step of the course of this way as your own matter, ponder over it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: If a severe tightening of the chest comes upon you, it is the hastening of the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: muna saki e kibishiku tsukae kitaru nara   Tsukihi no kokoro sekikomi de aru
verses.jp1: むなさきへきびしくつかへきたるなら
verses.jp2: 月日の心せきこみである
verses.kanji: 胸先へ厳しく痞え来たるなら   月日の心急き込みで有る
verses.en: If you feel severe tightening in your chest, it is a sign of the impatience of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, all of you may receive disorders of the body step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa ichiretsu naru ni dandan to   minouchi sawari mina tsuku de aro
verses.jp1: このさきハ一れつなるにだん／＼と
verses.jp2: みのうちさハりみなつくであろ
verses.kanji: この先は一列なるに段々と   身の内障り皆付くで有ろう
verses.en: Henceforth all of you equally shall feel disorders one by one in your bodies.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever disorder you may receive, do not worry, for there is a great intention in the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona sawari tsuitemo anjina yo   Tsukihi no kokoro erai omowaku
verses.jp1: どのよふなさハりついてもあんぢなよ
verses.jp2: 月日の心ゑらいをもわく
verses.kanji: どの様な障り付いても案じなよ   月日の心偉い思惑
verses.en: But you need not worry about whatever kinds of disorders may strike you. They come from the profound intention of the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though a disorder may come to the body, I am making a distinction in each of your minds.
verses.ro: minouchi ni sawari tsuitemo meme no   kokoro sorezore mina wakeru de na
verses.jp1: みのうちにさハりついてもめへ／＼の
verses.jp2: 心それ／＼みなわけるでな
verses.kanji: 身の内に障り付いても銘々の   心それぞれ皆分けるでな
verses.en: Even though you feel disorders in your bodies, with these disorders I will distinguish each of your minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall distinguish those thoughts which are sincere from those which are concerned with only the self.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni omou kokoro to meme no   shiyan bakari o omoi iru to o
verses.jp1: しんぢつにをもう心とめゑ／＼の
verses.jp2: しやんばかりをふもいゝるとを
verses.kanji: 真実に思う心と銘々の   思案ばかりを思い居るとを
verses.en: I will clearly distinguish the minds which think sincerely of others from those which think of themselves.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever kind of mind you may have, Tsukihi will at this time make the distinction clear.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona kokoro iru mono mo   konotabi shikato wakete miseru de
verses.jp1: 月日にハどのよな心いるものも
verses.jp2: このたびしかとわけてみせるで
verses.kanji: 月日にはどの様な心で居る者も   この度確と分けて見せるで
verses.en: This time I, Tsukihi, will distinguish clearly, whatever kinds of minds you may have.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi clearly sees what kind of mind you have and will at this time make the distinction in all.
verses.ro: dono yona kokoro mo shikato mite iru de   Tsukihi konotabi mina wakeru de na
verses.jp1: どのよふな心もしかとみているで
verses.jp2: 月日このたびみなわけるでな
verses.kanji: どの様な心も確と見て居るで   月日この度皆分けるでな
verses.en: I see clearly whatever kinds of minds you may have. So, this time, I, Tsukihi, will clearly distinguish all of them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Words of flattery are unwanted. Tsukihi looks for the sincerity of the mind.
verses.ro: kuchi saki no tsuisho bakari wa iran mono   kokoro no makoto Tsukihi mite iru
verses.jp1: 口さきのついしよばかりハいらんもの
verses.jp2: 心のまこと月日みている
verses.kanji: 口先の追従ばかりは要らんもの   心の誠月日見て居る
verses.en: Mere flattery of the lips is useless. I, Tsukihi, look at the sincerity of your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though I have given you My teachings in various talks, the real truth has not been seen.
verses.ro: koremade mo iroiro hanashi toitaredo   honshinjitsu ga miete nai no de
verses.jp1: これまでもいろ／＼はなしといたれど
verses.jp2: ほんしんぢつがみゑてないので
verses.kanji: これ迄も色々話説いたれど   本真実が見えて無いので
verses.en: Although hitherto I have taught you ever so often, the true sincerity of My intention has not been realized yet.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, whatever talks I may give, I shall never tell you anything that will become false.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o shitaru tomo   chigau yo naru koto wa yuwanedo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをしたるとも
verses.jp2: ちがうよふなる事ハゆハねど
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何の話をしたるとも   違う様なる事は言わねど
verses.en: Today, whatever I may say, I will never tell you such words that may fail.

verses.en_6th_ed: What Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori ichido yute oita nara   itsu ni naritemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: 月日より一どふゆうてをいたなら
verses.jp2: いつになりてもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 月日より一度言うて置いたなら   何時になりても違う事無し
verses.en: Once told by Tsukihi, it shall never fail forever.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, even all of you close to Me think My words to be worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu soba no kokoro wa tare nitemo   sekainami naru yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすそばの心ハたれにても
verses.jp2: せかいなみなるよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず側の心は誰にても   世界並なる様に思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, even all of you close to Me are thinking My words to be worldly common.

verses.en_6th_ed: From your suffering at this time, be convinced, you and all the others.
verses.ro: konotabi no nayamu tokoro de tokushin se   mina no kokoro mo meme kokoro mo
verses.jp1: このたびのなやむところでとくしんせ
verses.jp2: みなの心もめゑ／＼心も
verses.kanji: この度の悩む所で得心せ   皆の心も銘々心も
verses.en: Minds of yourself and all the others: understand well from the suffering of this time!

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no error in My free and unlimited workings, but there must be understanding in everyone's mind.
verses.ro: kono koto o juyojizai wa chigawanedo   mina no kokoro ni shochi nakeneba
verses.jp1: この事をぢうよぢざいハちがハねど
verses.jp2: みなの心にしよちなけねば
verses.kanji: この事を自由自在は違わねど   皆の心に承知無けねば
verses.en: Although the free and unrestricted omnipotence shall never fail, if the minds of all of you do not understand, it shall never be realized.

verses.en_6th_ed: When understanding comes to all of you, Tsukihi will assuredly save you.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni shochi o shitaru koto naraba   Tsukihi ukeyote tashika tasukeru
verses.jp1: 一れつにしよちをしたる事ならば
verses.jp2: 月日うけよてたしかたすける
verses.kanji: 一列に承知をしたる事ならば   月日請け合うて確か救ける
verses.en: When all of you equally become convinced of it, I, Tsukihi, will assuredly save you.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think of this salvation? You will be able to go out of doors in three days.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   mikka me niwa soto i deru yo
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: 三かめへにハそといでるよふ
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事に思うかな   三日目には外へ出る様
verses.en: What do you think this salvation is? I will save her so that she will be able to go out of doors in three days.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though I called Myself Tsukihi and gave you My teachings step by step,
verses.ro: koremade mo Tsukihi to yute dandan to   hanashi mo toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: これまでも月日とゆうてだん／＼と
verses.jp2: はなしもといてきたるなれども
verses.kanji: これ迄も月日と言うて段々と   話も説いて来たるなれども
verses.en: Hitherto step by step I have told you My teachings, calling Myself Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Still, perhaps you cannot understand the core matter. At this time, I shall reveal all things whatever.
verses.ro: mada shin no tokoro wa sarani wakarumai   konotabi donna koto mo arawasu
verses.jp1: まだしんのところハさらにハかるまい
verses.jp2: このたびどんな事もあらわす
verses.kanji: 未だ芯の所は更に分かるまい   この度どんな事も現す
verses.en: Perhaps you cannot yet understand the core of the truth. This time I will realize whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even with My talks, if I give them at the same place, you might take them as being from a human mind.
verses.ro: hanashi demo onashi tokoro de yu naraba   nando ningen gokoro naru yo
verses.jp1: はなしでもをなしところでゆうならば
verses.jp2: なんどにんけん心なるよふ
verses.kanji: 話でも同じ所で言うならば   何ぞ人間心なる様
verses.en: If I always tell you My teachings at the same place, you may take them as coming from a human mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: So as not to cause you such pitiful thoughts, I shall give My talks at a different place this time.
verses.ro: mina no mono omou kokoro wa kinodoku ya   konotabi tokoro kaete hanashi o
verses.jp1: みなのものをもう心ハきのどくや
verses.jp2: このたびところかへてはなしを
verses.kanji: 皆の者思う心は気の毒や   この度所変えて話を
verses.en: It is a pity that all of you may think as such. So this time I will tell it to you at an entirely different place.

verses.en_6th_ed: On hearing it, be convinced, whoever you may be: the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi always work in this way.
verses.ro: kore kiite ikana mono demo tokushin se   Tsukihi juyo mina kono dori
verses.jp1: これきいていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp2: 月日ぢうよふみなこのどふり
verses.kanji: これ聞いて如何な者でも得心せ   月日自由皆この道理
verses.en: Hearing this, understand well, whoever you may be! The omnipotence of Tsukihi works always in this way.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi enters this body and speaks freely and unrestrictedly, but perhaps you are not convinced of it.
verses.ro: tainai e Tsukihi irikomi juyo o   yute iredomo shochi arumai
verses.jp1: たいないへ月日入こみぢうよふを
verses.jp2: ゆうていれどもしよちあるまい
verses.kanji: 体内へ月日入り込み自由を   言うて居れども承知有るまい
verses.en: Perhaps you do not know the truth that I, Tsukihi, have entered into this body and am speaking.

verses.en_6th_ed: Henceforth, after giving you as much notice step by step as I am able, I shall begin.
verses.ro: konosaki wa seeippai ni dandan to   kotowarita ue kakaru koto nari
verses.jp1: このさきハせゑいゝバいにたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ことハりたゆへかゝる事なり
verses.kanji: この先は精一杯に段々と   断りた上掛かる事なり
verses.en: Henceforth after giving you fair warning enough, I will begin My work step by step.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though I say Tsukihi makes things manifest, it is only after giving every notice of it step by step.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori araware deru to yuta tote   dandan nanimo kotowarita ue
verses.jp1: 月日よりあらハれでるとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: たん／＼なにもことわりたゆへ
verses.kanji: 月日より現れ出ると言うたとて   段々何も断りた上
verses.en: I say that things shall be realized through the working of Tsukihi. But it will be done step by step after My warning about everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: You are thinking that the suffering at this time is from illness, but the thought is wrong.
verses.ro: konotabi no nayamite iru o yamai ya to   omote iru no wa kore wa chigau de
verses.jp1: このたびのなやみているをやまいやと
verses.jp2: をもているのハこれハちがうで
verses.kanji: この度の悩みて居るを病やと   思うて居るのはこれは違うで
verses.en: It is a misunderstanding that you take the present suffering as a disease.

verses.en_6th_ed: Never think it is from illness or the like, but from the desire for you to know the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kore bakari yamai nazo towa omouna yo   Tsukihi juyo shirashitai yue
verses.jp1: こればかりやまいなぞとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日ぢうよふしらしたいゆへ
verses.kanji: こればかり病などとは思うなよ   月日自由知らしたい故
verses.en: Just this, never take it as a disease! It is because I, Tsukihi, desire to let you know My omnipotence.

verses.en_6th_ed: I inform you of all matters whatever because I have an intention for the future.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo shirasuru wa   saki no omowaku aru kara no koto
verses.jp1: なにもかもとのよな事もしらするハ
verses.jp2: さきのをもわくあるからの事
verses.kanji: 何もかもどの様な事も知らするは   先の思惑有るからの事
verses.en: I inform you of any and everything, because I have a profound intention for the future.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what this talk is about: Tsukihi will take charge of everything in the future.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto de aru naraba   saki no yorozu wa Tsukihi hikiuke
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事てあるならば
verses.jp2: さきのよろづハ月日ひきうけ
verses.kanji: この話どういう事で有るならば   先の万は月日引き受け
verses.en: What does this talk mean? You may wonder. I, Tsukihi, will take charge of everything in the future.

verses.en_6th_ed: I, Tsukihi, will take charge because she is causally related to the origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori hikiuke suru to yu no mo na   moto no innen aru kara no koto
verses.jp1: 月日よりひきうけするとゆうのもな
verses.jp2: もとのいんねんあるからの事
verses.kanji: 月日より引き受けすると言うのもな   元の因縁有るからの事
verses.en: The reason I, Tsukihi, take charge is that she has the affinity to the creation.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what the causality is about: she is an instrument of origin in the beginning of human beings.
verses.ro: innen mo doyu koto de aru naraba   ningen hajime moto no dogu ya
verses.jp1: いんねんもどふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp2: にんけんはぢめもとのどふぐや
verses.kanji: 因縁もどういう事で有るならば   人間初め元の道具や
verses.en: What does this affinity mean? She was one of the instruments in the creation of human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will train this person in all matters and bring about marvelous salvation.
verses.ro: kono mono ni Tsukihi yorozu no shikomi suru   sore de mezurashi tasuke suru no ya
verses.jp1: このものに月日よろづのしこみする
verses.jp2: それでめづらしたすけるのや
verses.kanji: この者に月日万の仕込みする   それで珍し救けするのや
verses.en: To this person, I, Tsukihi, will give any and every training, and then will work the remarkable salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of this lightly. It will become the Divine Record of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono koto wa chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   kore wa nihon no Koki naru no ya
verses.jp1: この事わ一寸事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: これハにほんのこふきなるのや
verses.kanji: この事は一寸の事やと思うなよ   これは日本のこうきなるのや
verses.en: Never take this as a trivial matter! This shall become the Koki, the Divine Record, accomplished in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you had only known earlier that she should have been returned home to be saved completely...
verses.ro: are inde kora hodo nanimo sukiyaka ni   tasukaru koto o hayaku shiritara
verses.jp1: あれいんでこらほどなにもすきやかに
verses.jp2: たすかる事をはやくしりたら
verses.kanji: あれ去んでこら程何も清きやかに   助かる事を早く知りたら
verses.en: If only you had known beforehand that she should return home and be surely saved,

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of it, you would not return her, but tried to care for her there.
verses.ro: sore shirazu dodo inasazu kono toko de   yojo sashite okoto omota de
verses.jp1: それしらずどふどいなさすこのとこで
verses.jp2: よふぢよさしてをことをもたで
verses.kanji: それ知らずどうぞ去なさずこの所で   養生させて置こうと思うたで
verses.en: Knowing nothing of it, you did not return her but tried to improve her health at that place.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you had known this earlier, there would have been no suffering or anxiety.
verses.ro: konna koto hayaku shiritaru koto naraba   setsunami mo nashi shinpai mo nashi
verses.jp1: こんな事はやくしりたる事ならば
verses.jp2: せつなみもなししんバいもなし
verses.kanji: こんな事早く知りたる事ならば   切なみも無し心配も無し
verses.en: If you could have known this reason beforehand, there would have been no pain or anxiety.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because you humans are shallow-minded, you did not heed the words of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   Tsukihi yuwareru koto o somuita
verses.jp1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp2: 月日ゆハれる事をそむいた
verses.kanji: 人間はあざない者で有るからに   月日言われる事を背いた
verses.en: Because human beings are so shallow-minded, you have disregarded the words of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, you must firmly lean on Tsukihi in all matters whatever.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna koto demo Tsukihi niwa   motare tsukaneba naran koto ya de
verses.jp1: これからハどんな事でも月日にハ
verses.jp2: もたれつかねばならん事やで
verses.kanji: これからはどんな事でも月日には   凭れ付かねばならん事やで
verses.en: Henceforth you must rely upon Tsukihi on whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: In doing anything, so long as you lean on Tsukihi, there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru nimo Tsukihi ni wa   motarete ireba abunaki wa nai
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をするにも月日にて
verses.jp2: もたれていればあふなけハない
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするにも月日には   凭れて居れば危な気は無い
verses.en: In doing anything, if you rely on Tsukihi, there shall be no danger.

verses.en_6th_ed: Your unawareness of such a splendid path as this has led to your remorse.
verses.ro: kono yona kekko naru no michisuji o   shirazu ni ita ga ato no kokwai
verses.jp1: このよふなけへこふなるのみちすしを
verses.jp2: しらすにいたがあとのこふくハい
verses.kanji: この様な結構なるの道筋を   知らずに居たが後の後悔
verses.en: It will be indeed a matter of later repentance that you remained ignorant of this splendid way.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, whatever you are told, you should never go against what Tsukihi says.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o yuwaretemo   Tsukihi yuwareru koto wa somukan
verses.jp1: このさきハどのよな事をゆハれても
verses.jp2: 月日ゆハれる事ハそむかん
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事を言われても   月日言われる事は背かん
verses.en: Henceforth you must determine that you will never disregard the word of Tsukihi, whatever it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: The chest of the one taken as a shrine by Tsukihi is blocked. What do you think of it?
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yashiro to naru no muna saki no   tsukaete aru o nanto omou zo
verses.jp1: 月日よりやしろとなるのむなさきの
verses.jp2: つかゑてあるをなんとをもうぞ
verses.kanji: 月日より社となるの胸先の   痞えて有るを何と思うぞ
verses.en: Why do you think the chest of the Shrine of Tsukihi is so choked?

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of this blocking as being ordinary. The mind of Tsukihi is truly anxious.
verses.ro: kono tsukae hitonami naru to omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro makoto shinpai
verses.jp1: このつかへ人なみなるとをもうなよ
verses.kanji: この痞え人並なると思うなよ   月日の心真心配
verses.en: Never think that this choking is ordinary common! The mind of Tsukihi is truly anxious.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, all of you everywhere are doing your own work only with self-centered thoughts.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   waga mi shiyan de shigoto bakari o
verses.jp1: それしらずみな一れつハめへ／＼に
verses.jp2: わがみしやんでしことばかりを
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆一列は銘々に   我が身思案で仕事ばかりを
verses.en: Unaware of this, all of you are equally working with selfish thoughts, thinking only of yourself.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi sees all paths whatever, but no one in the world thinks about it.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona michi mo miete aru   sekaiju wa sore o omowazu
verses.jp1: 月日にハどのよなみちもみへてある
verses.jp2: せかいぢううハそれをふもハす
verses.kanji: 月日にはどの様な道も見えて有る   世界中はそれを思わず
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, can see through whatever kinds of ways, but people of the whole world do not think about it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over this path, all My children! There is no knowing what kind of path will appear.
verses.ro: kono michi o kodomo ichiretsu shiyan seyo   dono yona michi ga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: このみちをこども一れつしやんせよ
verses.jp2: どのよなみちがあるやしれんで
verses.kanji: この道を子供一列思案せよ   どの様な道が有るや知れんで
verses.en: All of you children, equally ponder over this way! There is no knowing what kind of way shall appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall inform you of everything in advance. Make sure you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo saki e shirashi oku   ato de kokwai naki yoni seyo
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でもさきへしらしをく
verses.jp2: あとでこふくハいなきよふにせよ
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも先へ知らし置く   後で後悔無き様にせよ
verses.en: I warn you beforehand on whatever kinds of matters. So you must take care lest you should repent of it afterwards.

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you may be wondering why I say such things. It is from My love for My children.
verses.ro: konna koto nani o yu ya to mina no mono   omou de aro kodomo kawaii
verses.jp1: こんな事なにをゆうやとみなのもの
verses.jp2: をもうであろふこどもかハいゝ
verses.kanji: こんな事何を言うやと皆の者   思うで有ろう子供可愛いい
verses.en: All of you may wonder why I tell you such things. But it is from My affection for My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: All My many children in the world, is there not a way I can make you understand from your innermost heart?
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no kodomo mune no uchi   wakaru moyo ga kore wa nai ka yo
verses.jp1: せかいぢうをふくの子共むねのうち
verses.jp2: わかるもよふがこれハないかよ
verses.kanji: 世界中多くの子供胸の内   分かる模様がこれは無いかよ
verses.en: Can I not find the way to make My numerous children all over the whole world understand My will from their innermost hearts?

verses.en_6th_ed: I tell you these things so repeatedly because I fear the path you are taking.
verses.ro: kono yona koto o kudokudo yu no mo na   michi o anjite iru moyo kara
verses.jp1: このよふな事をくど／＼ゆうのもな
verses.jp2: みちをあんぢているもよふから
verses.kanji: この様な事をくどくど言うのもな   道を案じて居る模様から
verses.en: I tell you these things repeatedly, because I fear your way in the future.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall tell you about everything. Never think of it as being false.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona koto mo yute kikasu   kore o kanarazu uso to omouna
verses.jp1: これからハとのよな事もゆてきかす
verses.jp2: これをかならすうそとをもうな
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な事も言うて聞かす   これを必ず嘘と思うな
verses.en: From now on I will tell you any and everything. Never take it to be false!

verses.en_6th_ed: Hear Me clearly on the present work of Tsukihi! I shall do nothing evil.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsukihi no shigoto shikato kike   ashiki no yona koto wa sen zo ya
verses.jp1: このたびの月日のしごとしかときけ
verses.jp2: あしきのよふな事わせんぞや
verses.kanji: この度の月日の仕事確と聞け   悪しきの様な事はせんぞや
verses.en: Hear Me clearly on the working of Tsukihi at present! I do nothing evil to you.

verses.en_6th_ed: I began the work because I desired to teach you marvelous salvation by all means.
verses.ro: dodo shite mezurashi tasuke oshietasa   sokode kakarita shigoto naru zo ya
verses.jp1: どふどしてめつらしたすけをしへたさ
verses.jp2: そこでかゝりたしごとなるぞや
verses.kanji: どうかして珍し救け教えたさ   そこで掛かりた仕事なるぞや
verses.en: I commenced this working, because of My earnest desire to teach you the remarkable salvation by all means.

verses.en_6th_ed: Firmly replace the mind you have had until now and become of the mind filled with joy.
verses.ro: imamade to kokoro shikkari irekaete   yokizukume no kokoro naru yo
verses.jp1: いまゝでと心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp2: よふきつくめの心なるよふ
verses.kanji: 今迄と心確り入れ替えよ   陽気ずくめの心なる様
verses.en: Definitely replace your mind, which you have used until now, with the mind full of joy!

verses.en_6th_ed: You may be wondering how to become of such a mind. If Tsukihi enters the body,
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshite naru to omou kara   Tsukihi tainai irikonda nara
verses.jp1: この心どふしてなるとをもうかな
verses.jp2: 月日たいない入こんだなら
verses.kanji: この心どうしてなると思うかな   月日体内入り込んだなら
verses.en: You may wonder how it is possible to become such a mind. It will be possible when I, Tsukihi, enter into your bodies.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, the mind will be spirited of itself and become the mind filled with joy.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni hitori kokoro ga isamu nari   yokizukume no kokoro naru yo
verses.jp1: にち／＼にひとり心がいさむなり
verses.jp2: よふきづくめの心なるよふ
verses.kanji: 日々に独り心が勇むなり   陽気ずくめの心なる様
verses.en: Day by day, your mind shall naturally become more cheerful. Grow to the mind full of joy!

verses.en_6th_ed: Making the mind spirited day by day, Tsukihi will work to make the world be filled with joy.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro isame kake   yokizukume ni shite kakaru de na
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心いさめかけ
verses.jp2: よふきつくめにしてかゝるでな
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心勇め掛け   陽気ずくめにして掛かるでな
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will cheer up your mind day by day, and will begin to make everything joyous.

verses.en_6th_ed: What are your thoughts on hearing this talk? It is solely the preparation for single-hearted salvation.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   tasuke ichijo no moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp2: たすけ一ぢよのもよふばかりを
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて聞いて居る   救け一条の模様ばかりを
verses.en: I am solely hastening arrangements for the single-hearted salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi sees everything. Whatever I say, you must comply with it.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori donna koto demo mite iru de   nani o yutemo mina shochi seyo
verses.jp1: 月日よりどんな事でもみているで
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもみなしよちせよ
verses.kanji: 月日よりどんな事でも見て居るで   何を言うても皆承知せよ
verses.en: As I, Tsukihi, am looking through whatever kinds of things, comply with Me, whatever I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: From this year forward, if you, husband and wife, live on for seventy more years, neither falling ill nor weakening,
verses.ro: kotoshikara shichiju nen wa fufu tomo   yamazu yowarazu kurasu koto nara
verses.jp1: ことしから七十ねんハふう／＼とも
verses.jp2: やまずよハらすくらす事なら
verses.kanji: 今年から七十年は夫婦共   病まず弱らず暮らす事なら
verses.en: If you, husband and wife, live on for seventy more years from this year, neither falling ill nor becoming weak,

verses.en_6th_ed: There can perhaps be no greater happiness. Look forward to it as coming true.
verses.ro: soreyori no tanoshimi naru wa arumai na   kore o makoto ni tanoshunde iyo
verses.jp1: それよりのたのしみなるハあるまいな
verses.jp2: これをまことにたのしゆんでいよ
verses.kanji: それよりの楽しみなるは有るまいな   これを真に楽しんで居よ
verses.en: There shall be no greater happiness. Wait and expect this with hopeful delight!

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will speak solely about things which have never existed before at any place. Listen with this understanding.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa imamade doko ni nai koto o   bakari yu zo ya shochi shite kike
verses.jp1: 月日にハいまゝでどこにない事を
verses.jp2: ばかりゆうぞやしよちしてきけ
verses.kanji: 月日には今迄何処に無い事を   ばかり言うぞや承知して聞け
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will tell you everything which has never existed before at any place. Listen to Me with this undersanding!

verses.en_6th_ed: Though I speak solely about such things that do not exist, watch the future: everything is the truth.
verses.ro: kono yona nai koto bakari yu keredo   saki o mite iyo mina makoto ya de
verses.jp1: このよふなない事ばかりゆうけれど
verses.jp2: さきをみていよみなまことやで
verses.kanji: この様な無い事ばかり言うけれど   先を見て居よ皆真やで
verses.en: Even though I tell you everything which does not yet exist, look to the future! All shall turn out to be true.

verses.en_6th_ed: Since I do new and marvelous things in any case, whatever I say is about things that do not yet exist.
verses.ro: nani bun ni mezurashi koto o suru kara wa   ikana hanashi mo nai koto bakari
verses.jp1: なにぶんにめづらし事をするからハ
verses.jp2: いかなはなしもない事ばかり
verses.kanji: 何分に珍し事をするからは   如何な話も無い事ばかり
verses.en: At any rate, as I will manifest remarkable working, I tell you everything which does not yet exist.

verses.en_6th_ed: I speak solely of those things that do not exist, but watch the future: the wonders you shall see.
verses.ro: dono yoni nai koto bakari yuta tote   saki o mite iyo mieru fushigi ya
verses.jp1: とのよふにない事ばかりゆうたとて
verses.jp2: さきをみていよみゑるふしぎや
verses.kanji: どの様な無い事ばかり言うたとて   先を見て居よ見える不思議や
verses.en: Even though I tell you everything which does not yet exist, keep looking to the future! It shall all marvelously be realized.

verses.en_6th_ed: Your suffering at this time must be trying, but the future will bring delight to your mind.
verses.ro: ima naru no nayamite iru wa tsurakeredo   korekara saki wa kokoro danoshimi
verses.jp1: いまなるのなやみているわつらけれど
verses.jp2: これからさきハ心だのしみ
verses.kanji: 今なるの悩みて居るは辛らけれど   これから先は心楽しみ
verses.en: Your suffering must be painful now, but you can expect the future that will bring delight to your heart.

verses.en_6th_ed: I give you these talks repeatedly because they are to be the Divine Record for eternity.
verses.ro: kono yona hanashi kudokudo yu no mo na   kore wa matsudai Koki naru no ya
verses.jp1: このよふなはなしくと／＼ゆうのもな
verses.jp2: これハまつたいこふきなるのや
verses.kanji: この様な話くどくど言うのもな   これは末代こうきなるのや
verses.en: That I tell you these talks so repeatedly is also the Koki, the Divine Record, for eternity.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi is revealed at this place and time and speaks about all matters, so that,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori konotabi koko de arawarete   donna koto omo hanashi suru no wa
verses.jp1: 月日よりこのたびこゝであらハれて
verses.jp2: とんな事をもはなしするのハ
verses.kanji: 月日よりこの度此処に現れて   どんな事をも話するのは
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, reveal Myself now at this place and tell you any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: By teaching you about whatever matters step by step, I shall make all of the Divine Record of Nihon.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo dandan shirashitasa   nihon no Koki mina koshiraeru
verses.jp1: とのような事もたん／＼しらしたさ
verses.jp2: にほんのこふきみなこしらゑる
verses.kanji: どの様な事も段々知らしたさ   日本のこうき皆拵える
verses.en: Because I desire to let you know any and everything, I will make all of the Koki, the Divine Record, in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: The very beginning of this world was at Shoyashiki village of Yamabe county in Yamato province.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi wa Yamato nite   Yamabe kori no Shoyashiki nari
verses.jp1: このよふのはじまりたしハやまとにて
verses.jp2: やまべこふりのしよやしきなり
verses.kanji: この世の初まり出しは大和にて   山辺郡の庄屋敷なり
verses.en: This world was first created at Shoyashiki Village, Yamabe County in Yamato Province.

verses.en_6th_ed: There, at the place known as the Nakayama Residence, appear instruments of human beginnings.
verses.ro: sono uchi ni Nakayama uji to yu yashiki   ningen hajime dogu mieru de
verses.jp1: そのうちになかやまうぢとゆうやしき
verses.jp2: にんけんはじめどふくみへるで
verses.kanji: その内に中山氏と言う屋敷   人間初め道具見えるで
verses.en: There is a Residence called the Nakayamas. There appear those who were the instruments in the creation of human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: These instruments are Izanagi, Izanami, Kunisazuchi, and Tsukiyomi.
verses.ro: kono dogu Izanagiii to Izanami to   Kunisazuchii to Tsukiyomi to nari
verses.jp1: このどふぐいざなぎいゝといざなみと
verses.jp2: くにさづちいと月よみとなり
verses.kanji: この道具いざなぎといざなみと   くにさずちと月よみとなり
verses.en: These instruments are Izanagi, Izanami, Kunisazuchi and Tsukiyomi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Discerning this, Tsukihi descended and began preparations to train them in all matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sore o misumashi amakudari   nanika yorozu o shikomu moyo o
verses.jp1: 月日よりそれをみすましあまくたり
verses.jp2: なにかよろづをしこむもよふを
verses.kanji: 月日よりそれを見澄まし天下り   何か万を仕込む模様を
verses.en: Making sure of it, I, Tsukihi, descended from Heaven, and began arrangements to train them in any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: At this place, whatever is done and however it is done, all is by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro nani o suru nimo dono yona   koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi nari
verses.jp1: このところなにをするにもとのよふな
verses.jp2: 事をするのもみな月日なり
verses.kanji: この所何をするにもどの様な   事をするのも皆月日なり
verses.en: It is all I, Tsukihi, who work any and everything and perform whatever kinds of things at this place.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say, it is all by Tsukihi. You, who are close to Me, imitate Me if you can.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu nimo mina Tsukihi   soba naru mono wa mane o shite miyo
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をゆうにもみな月日
verses.jp2: そばなるものハまねをしてみよ
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うにも皆月日   側なる者は真似をして見よ
verses.en: Whatever I may say, it is all the words of Tsukihi. You may try to imitate Me, you who are close to Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: From the time I began this world until today, I have not yet told the real truth.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani kyomade wa   honshinjitsu o yuta koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからにけふまでハ
verses.jp2: ほんしんぢつをゆうた事なし
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに今日迄は   本真実を言うた事無し
verses.en: Ever since I created this world, I have never told you the real truth of My intention.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, the time has come when I must tell you the truth of all matters.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   yuwaneba naran yoni naru kara
verses.jp1: けふの日ハどのよな事もしんぢつを
verses.jp2: ゆハねばならんよふになるから
verses.kanji: 今日の日はどの様な事も真実を   言わねばならん様になるから
verses.en: But today the time has come when I must tell you the truth of whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is said, do not wonder. It is said just as Tsukihi intends.
verses.ro: meme ni nani o yu towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no omou yoni yu no ya
verses.jp1: めへ／＼になにをゆうとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日のをもうよふにゆうのや
verses.kanji: 銘々に何を言うとは思うなよ   月日の思う様に言うのや
verses.en: Never think that I speak from a human mind! I am speaking just as Tsukihi intends.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whenever you return, never think that it is caused by your individual minds.
verses.ro: nandoki ni kairite kitemo meme no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp1: なんどきにかいりてきてもめへ／＼の
verses.jp2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 何時に帰りて来ても銘々の   心有るとは更に思うな
verses.en: Whenever anyone returns, never think that it is caused by a human mind!

verses.en_6th_ed: Everyone, whoever one may be, will return, convinced from the heart. Wait and see.
verses.ro: dono yona mono mo shin kara tokushin o   sashite kairu de kore o mite iyo
verses.jp1: どのよふなものもしんからとくしんを
verses.jp2: さしてかいるでこれをみていよ
verses.kanji: どの様な者でも芯から得心を   させて帰るでこれを見て居よ
verses.en: Everyone will return home after being convinced from the heart, whatever kind of person one may be. Wait and see!

verses.en_6th_ed: However powerful or clever one may be, no one can resist the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki taru mo hatsume demo   Tsukihi no kokoro kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: いかほとのこふてきたるもはつめても
verses.jp2: 月日の心これハかなハん
verses.kanji: 如何程の強敵たるも発明でも   月日の心これは敵わん
verses.en: However strong and clever one may be, no one can match the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: From today, discerning the heart of everyone in this world, Tsukihi will begin the cleansing.
verses.ro: kyokara wa sekai o Tsukihi misadamete   mune no soji ni kakaru koto nari
verses.jp1: けふからハせかいを月日みさだめて
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢにかゝる事なり
verses.kanji: 今日からは世界を月日見定めて   胸の掃除に掛かる事なり
verses.en: From today I, Tsukihi, will ascertain all the hearts of the world, and begin to sweep dust from them.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this cleansing, there shall be no discrimination between those within and the world. I shall manifest all of the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: kono soji uchi mo sekai mo hedate nai   meme no kokoro mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このそふぢうちもせかいもへだてない
verses.jp2: めゑ／＼の心みなあらわすで
verses.kanji: この掃除内も世界も隔て無い   銘々の心皆現わすで
verses.en: In this sweeping, there shall be no discrimination between the people who are familiar with Me and other people of the world. I will show each and every mind of all of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, to the mountainous regret of God, much dust is piled in your heart.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami no zannen yamayama to   mune ni hokori ga tsumori aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ神のさんねん山／＼と
verses.jp2: むねにほこりがつもりあれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は神の残念山々と   胸に埃が積り有れども
verses.en: Hitherto, to the mountainous regret of God, much dust has piled up in the hearts of all people.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is sad. The day has not yet arrived. I cannot speak about anything, though it is My desire.
verses.ro: nasake nai higara mo chitto kitaran de   dono yona koto mo yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp1: なさけないひがらもちいときたらんで
verses.jp2: どのよな事もゆうにゆハれん
verses.kanji: 情けない日柄もちいと来たらんで   どの様な事も言うに言われん
verses.en: It is a pity that I cannot say anything in spite of My earnest desire to speak, because the day is a little late in coming.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, Tsukihi truly cannot bear to look on. I shall manifest all things whatever.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Tsukihi shinjitsu mikaneru de   dono yona koto mo mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このたびハ月日しんぢつみかねるで
verses.jp2: どのよな事もみなあらハすで
verses.kanji: この度は月日真実見兼ねるで   どの様な事も皆現すで
verses.en: This time, as I, Tsukihi, cannot remain a mere spectator, I will make whatever kinds of things appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, however thriving selfishness and willful acts may be, know that Tsukihi may withdraw.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa ika hodo waga mi habikarite   mamani shita tote Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: けふの日ハいかほとわがみはびかりて
verses.jp2: まゝにしたとて月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: 今日の日は如何程我が身蔓延りて   侭にしたとて月日退く
verses.en: However arbitrary and rampant you may be today, I, Tsukihi, may withdraw from your bodies.

verses.en_6th_ed: To say what this talk is about: it is equally about Nihon, Kara, and Tenjiku.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto oba yu naraba   nihon mo kara mo tenjiku no koto
verses.jp1: このはなしなにの事をばゆうならば
verses.jp2: にほんもからもてんぢくの事
verses.kanji: この話何の事をば言うならば   日本も唐も天竺の事
verses.en: If I am to say what this matter is about, it is all equally about the regions where My teachings spread early, later and last.

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that from now on Tsukihi will cleanse everyone in the whole world.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekaiju o ichiretsu ni   Tsukihi soji o suru de shochi se
verses.jp1: これからハせかいぢううを一れつに
verses.jp2: 月日そふぢをするでしよちせ
verses.kanji: これからは世界中を一列に   月日掃除をするで承知せ
verses.en: Henceforth I, Tsukihi, will sweep dust away equally from all people of the whole world. Be aware of it!

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though Tsukihi has tried to the utmost to reason with you step by step,
verses.jp1: これまでもせへいゝばいにことハりを
verses.jp2: 月日だん／＼ゆうてあれども

verses.en_6th_ed: Since I only told you by the spoken word, no one was able to understand clearly.
verses.ro: kuchi saki de yutaru made wa tare nitemo   tashika shochi o suru mono wa nai
verses.jp1: くちさきでゆうたるまでハたれにても
verses.jp2: たしかしよちをするものハない
verses.kanji: 口先で言うたる迄は誰にても   確か承知をする者は無い
verses.en: As long as I speak only by mouth, no one does firmly comply with it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though I, Tsukihi, have been exerting My mind for you to the utmost step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no kokoro dandan to   seeippai ni tsukushi iredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでも月日の心だん／＼と
verses.jp2: せへいゝばいにつくしいれども
verses.kanji: 今迄も月日の心段々と   精一杯に尽くし居れども
verses.en: Even until now I, Tsukihi, have been continously exerting My sincerity to the utmost.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no one in the world who knows of it. This time, Tsukihi cannot bear it.
verses.ro: sekai niwa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   domu konotabi Tsukihi zehi nai
verses.jp1: せかいにハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp2: とふむこのたび月日せひない
verses.kanji: 世界には誰か知りたる者は無し   どうもこの度月日是非無い
verses.en: But there is no one who knows of My effort. This time for Me, Tsukihi, it is inevitable.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I give you notice throughout the world unto its farthest places: Tsukihi shall withdraw!
verses.ro: soreyue ni sekaiju o dokomade mo   kotowarite oku Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: それゆへにせかいぢううをとこまても
verses.jp2: ことハりてをく月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: それ故に世界中を何処迄も   断りて置く月日退く
verses.en: Therefore I warn you throughout the whole world that I, Tsukihi, will withdraw.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what talk I shall give today: it is solely about the beginning of My useful timber.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o suru naraba   yogi no hajime koto bakari yu
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをするならば
verses.jp2: よふ木のはぢめ事ばかりゆう
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何の話をするならば   用木の初め事ばかり言う
verses.en: You may wonder what topic I am going to speak today. I will speak solely of the beginning of My useful timber.

verses.en_6th_ed: About this timber: I do not indicate anyone in particular. From one trunk, there are eight branches.
verses.ro: yogi demo nin wa tare tomo yuwane domo   moto wa ippon eda wa hachi hon
verses.jp1: よふぎでもにんわたれともゆハねども
verses.jp2: もとハ壹ほんゑだわ八ほん
verses.kanji: 用木でも人は誰とも言わねども   元は一本枝は八本
verses.en: Of this timber I will not indicate any person in particular. However, the tree has one trunk and eight boughs.

verses.en_6th_ed: The urgent desire to graft this tree quickly, oppresses the breast of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono kii o hayaku tsugitai sekikomi de   Tsukihi no mune ga tsukaekiru nari
verses.jp1: この木をはやくつぎたいせきこみで
verses.jp2: 月日のむねがつかゑきるなり
verses.kanji: この木を早く接ぎたい急き込みで   月日の胸が痞え切るなり
verses.en: Because of the impatient desire to graft this tree, the chest of Tsukihi is choked.

verses.en_6th_ed: If one branch of this tree is securely grafted, the others will all quickly settle.
verses.ro: kono kii mo hito eda shikato tsuida nara   ato naru wa mina hayaku sadamaru
verses.jp1: このきいも一ゑだしかとついだなら
verses.jp2: あとなるハみなはやくさだまる
verses.kanji: この木も一枝確と接いだなら   後なるは皆早く定まる
verses.en: Speaking of this tree, if one bough is grafted surely, all of the remaining ones will soon be settled.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen carefully to whatever Tsukihi says: once you have settled it in the mind,
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi yu koto shikato kike   kokoro ni sadame tsuketa koto nara
verses.jp1: なにもかも月日ゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp2: 心にさだめつけた事なら
verses.kanji: 何もかも月日言う事確と聞け   心に定め付けた事なら
verses.en: Listen attentively to the word of Tsukihi, whatever it may be! If only your minds are firmly determined,

verses.en_6th_ed: Then the sufferings of the body will disappear. The mind will be but spirited step by step.
verses.ro: soreyori mo minouchi nayami sarani nashi   dandan kokoro isamu bakari ya
verses.jp1: それよりもみのうちなやみさらになし
verses.jp2: だん／＼心いさむばかりや
verses.kanji: それよりも身の内悩み更に無し   段々心勇むばかりや
verses.en: Thereafter all diseases shall be cleared away from your bodies, and step by step your minds shall become cheered up.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, the mind of everyone, whoever one may be, bespeaks only the worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina no kokoro wa tare nitemo   sekainami naru koto bakari yu
verses.jp1: それしらすみなの心ハたれにても
verses.jp2: せかいなみなる事ばかりゆう
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆の心は誰にても   世界並なる事ばかり言う
verses.en: But unaware of this, the mind of everyone, whoever one may be, speaks only of worldly things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of this place as being worldly common. There is only the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro sekainami towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このところせかいなみとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.kanji: この所世界並とは思うなよ   月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.en: Do not think that at this place anything is worldly! I have nothing but the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: This regret in the mind of Tsukihi today: know that it is not a small matter.
verses.ro: konnichi no Tsukihi no kokoro zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 今日の月日の心さんねんわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事てないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 今日の月日の心残念は   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.en: Be aware that the regret of Tsukihi today is not a slight one!

verses.en_6th_ed: Because of the shallowness of human beings, there is no one who knows what Tsukihi does.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   Tsukihi suru koto shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp2: 月日する事しりたものなし
verses.kanji: 人間はあざない者で有るからに   月日する事知りた者無し
verses.en: As human beings are shallow-minded, there is no one who knows what Tsukihi does.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi has already given you notice about each and every matter step by step. Do you understand?
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nanika yorozu o dandan to   kotowarite aru kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp1: 月日にハなにかよろつをだん／＼と
verses.jp2: ことハりてあるこれがしよちか
verses.kanji: 月日には何か万を段々と   断りて有るこれが承知か
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, have already warned you step by step on any and everything. Do you remember it?

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though I have repeatedly appealed to you about the regret of Tsukihi,
verses.ro: imamade mo nanika Tsukihi no zannen o   taitei kudoki tsumete aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでもなにか月日のさんねんを
verses.jp2: たいていくどきつめてあれども
verses.kanji: 今迄も何か月日の残念を   大抵口説き詰めて有れども
verses.en: Although hitherto I, Tsukihi, have repeatedly told you almost everything of My regret,

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no one in the world who knows. Look at the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: sekai niwa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   Tsukihi no kokoro zannen o miyo
verses.jp1: せかいにハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp2: 月日の心ざんねんをみよ
verses.kanji: 世界には誰か知りたる者は無し   月日の心残念を見よ
verses.en: Yet, in the world there is no one who knows of it. Look at the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!

verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, I am giving you notice again, on top of My previous notices and appeals.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kotowarita ue mada kudoki   sono ue naru no kotowari de aru
verses.jp1: このたびハことハりたゆへまだくどき
verses.jp2: そのゆへなるのことわりである
verses.kanji: この度は断りた故未だ口説き   その故なるの断りで有る
verses.en: This time I warned you first and then tried to persuade you and after that I am warning you again.

verses.en_6th_ed: Alas, no matter how many notices I give and appeals I make, there is no one who understands.
verses.ro: ika hodoni kudoki kotowari yuta tote   tare ka kikiwake suru mono wa nai
verses.jp1: いかほどにくどきことハりゆうたとて
verses.jp2: たれかきゝわけするものハない
verses.kanji: 如何程に口説き断り言うたとて   誰か聞き分けする者は無い
verses.en: However often I may try to persuade you and warn you by turns, there is no one who listens to Me and understands My words.

verses.en_6th_ed: So the days come and go step by step, but at no time is there anyone who is able to understand My intention.
verses.ro: soreyue ni dandan higara tatsu keredo   itsu ka kore ya to wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp1: それゆへにだん／＼ひがらたつけれと
verses.jp2: いつかこれやとわかるめハなし
verses.kanji: それ故に段々日柄経つけれど   何時かこれやと分かるめは無し
verses.en: Therefore, although the days pass one by one, no one can understand My true intention.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, as the time has already come, Tsukihi will set out. Everyone, beware!
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo setsu ga kitaru kara   Tsukihi dekakeru mina shochi seyo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハもふせへつゝがきたるから
verses.jp2: 月日でかけるみなしよちせよ
verses.kanji: 今日の日はもう節が来たるから   月日出掛ける皆承知せよ
verses.en: Today, as the time has already come, I, Tsukihi, will set out. Be aware of it, all of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: Now I shall tell you about the course of the path ahead. No one knows what I shall say.
verses.ro: konosaki no michi no sugara o yute kikasu   ikana koto oba yu ya shiromai
verses.jp1: このさきのみちのすがらをゆてきかす
verses.jp2: いかな事をばゆうやしろまい
verses.kanji: この先の道のすがらを言うて聞かす   如何な事をば言うや知るまい
verses.en: Now I will tell you the course of this way in the future. Perhaps you cannot foretell what kinds of things I am going to say.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, whatever I say will be seen just as I say. This is the wonder.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni nani o yutemo sono mamani   miete kuru no ga kore wa fushigi ya
verses.jp1: にち／＼になにをゆうてもそのまゝに
verses.jp2: みゑてくるのがこれわふしぎや
verses.kanji: 日々に何を言うてもその侭に   見えて来るのがこれは不思議や
verses.en: It should be a marvel that whatever I say day after day will all turn out just as I say.

verses.en_6th_ed: You do not know the things I shall say. That is why I give you notices on everything repeatedly.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   sokode nandemo kotowari bakari
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: そこでなんでもことハりばかり
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うやら知れんでな   そこで何でも断りばかり
verses.en: There is no knowing what kinds of things I shall say. Therefore I give you warning on any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: My notices are not to be taken lightly. There is no knowing what will be seen.
verses.ro: kotowari mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   ikana koto oga miete kuru yara
verses.jp1: ことハりも一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp2: いかな事をがみゑてくるやら
verses.kanji: 断りも一寸の事では無い程に   如何な事をが見えて来るやら
verses.en: My warning indeed is never a mere trifle. There is no knowing what kinds of things will appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: Since there is no knowing what will be seen, I feel deep pity for you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga mieru ya shiren de na   makoto kinodoku omote iredomo
verses.jp1: どのよふな事がみゑるやしれんてな
verses.jp2: まこときのどくをもていれども
verses.kanji: どの様な事が見えるや知れんでな   真気の毒思うて居れども
verses.en: There is no knowing what kinds of things will happen in the future, even though I feel serious pity for you.

verses.en_6th_ed: The time when things will be seen: this cannot be known. The mind of Tsukihi is filled to the brim.
verses.ro: nandoki ni mieru koto yara kore shiren   Tsukihi no kokoro tsumikirite aru
verses.jp1: なんときにみゑる事やらこれしれん
verses.jp2: 月日の心つみきりてある
verses.kanji: 何時に見える事やらこれ知れん   月日の心詰み切りて有る
verses.en: No one can foresee at what moment it shall happen. The mind of Tsukihi is seriously pressing.

verses.en_6th_ed: Great is the worry in the mind of Tsukihi. Yet you close to Me know nothing of it.
verses.ro: kora hodoni Tsukihi no kokoro shinpai o   soba naru mono wa nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: こらほどに月日の心しんばいを
verses.jp2: そばなるものハなにもしらずに
verses.kanji: こら程に月日の心心配を   側なる者は何も知らずに
verses.en: You close to Me are completely unaware of this great concern in the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: You close to Me think of your own work alone. But when things are seen, everything will change.
verses.ro: soba naru wa shigoto bakari o omote iru   mietaru naraba monku kawaru zo
verses.jp1: そばなるハしことばかりをふもている
verses.jp2: みへたるならばもんくかハるぞ
verses.kanji: 側なるは仕事ばかりを思うて居る   見えたるならば文句変わるぞ
verses.en: You close to Me are thinking only of human working. But when My omnipotence appears, everything shall be changed.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall inform you of everything in advance. Make sure you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo saki e shirashi oku   ato de kokwai naki yoni seyo
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でもさきゑしらしをく
verses.jp2: あとてこふくハいなきよふにせよ
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも先へ知らし置く   後で後悔無き様にせよ
verses.en: I inform you beforehand of whatever things that shall appear. So take care lest you should repent of it afterwards!

verses.en_6th_ed: To God, who began this world, all things whatever are seen.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no koto naraba   dono yona koto mo mina miete aru
verses.jp1: このよふを初た神の事ならば
verses.jp2: とのよな事もみなみゑてある
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の事ならば   どの様な事も皆見えて有る
verses.en: As I am the God who created this world, everything is visible in My sight, whatever it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as all matters are brimming over, there is no time at all to waver.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo tsumikirite   mo sashinuki wa sarani deken de
verses.jp1: このたびハとのよな事もつみきりて
verses.jp2: もふさしぬきハさらにてけんで
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な事も詰み切りて   もう差し抜きは更に出来んで
verses.en: This time any and everything is fully pressing. There is no time to lose.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, no matter what I had said to you, I have still been holding back.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto oba yuta tote   mada jikkuri to shitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとんな事をばゆうたとて
verses.jp2: またちいくりとしたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな事をば言うたとて   未だじっくりとしたるなれども
verses.en: Until now, whatever I may have said, I have been holding back My working.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, do not be off your guard even to look aside! There is no knowing what will happen or when.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa yokome furu ma mo yudan shina   nandoki donna koto ga aru yara
verses.jp1: けふの日ハよこめふるまもゆたんしな
verses.jp2: なんどきとんな事があるやら
verses.kanji: 今日の日は横目振る間も油断しな   何時どんな事が有るやら
verses.en: Today, never be off your guard even to look aside! There is no knowing what kinds of things are going to happen at any moment.

verses.en_6th_ed: The truth recorded by My writing brush: lo, it is seen! Your minds will be spirited.
verses.ro: imamade ni fude ni tsuketaru kotowari ga   sa miete kita kokoro isamu de
verses.jp1: いまゝでにふでにつけたることハりが
verses.jp2: さあみゑてきた心いさむで
verses.kanji: 今迄に筆に付けたる断りが   さあ見えて来た心勇むで
verses.en: Now, as the warning which I have written with My writing brush has come into sight, your minds will all become cheered up.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only this is seen, all of you will be filled with joy, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kore saika miekita naraba ichiretsu wa   donna mono demo yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: これさいかみへきたならば一れつわ
verses.jp2: とんなものでもよふきつくめや
verses.kanji: これさいか見え来たならば一列は   どんな者でも陽気ずくめや
verses.en: If only you can see this, all of you shall become equally joyous, whoever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you in the world, please understand these thoughts quickly. It is Tsukihi's request.
verses.ro: kono kokoro dozo hayaku ni ichiretsu wa   shochi shite kure Tsukihi tanomi ya
verses.jp1: この心どふぞはやくに一れつわ
verses.jp2: しよちしてくれ月日たのみや
verses.kanji: この心どうぞ早くに一列は   承知して呉れ月日頼みや
verses.en: Please quickly understand this intention, all of you equally! I, Tsukihi, request this from you.

verses.en_6th_ed: From today, I shall begin to speak of marvelous things. Perhaps you have no idea of what I shall say.
verses.ro: kyokara wa mezurashi koto o yuikakeru   nani o yu tomo choto ni shiremai
verses.jp1: けふからハめづらし事をゆいかける
verses.jp2: なにをゆうとも一寸にしれまい
verses.kanji: 今日からは珍しい事を言い掛ける   何を言うとも一寸に知れまい
verses.en: From today I will begin to tell you a completely remarkable thing. Perhaps you cannot foresee what I shall speak.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say in this talk, do not turn away. The intention of God is great.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nani o yutemo somukuna yo   Kami no onowaku erai koto ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしなにをゆうてもそむくなよ
verses.jp2: 神のをもわくゑらい事やで
verses.kanji: この話何を言うても背くなよ   神の思惑偉い事やで
verses.en: Never go against My words, whatever I may say! The intention of God is truly profound.

verses.en_6th_ed: My talks from now will be on the way to clear away the mountainous regret of God.
verses.ro: korekara no ato naru hanashi yamayama no   Kami no zannen harasu moyo o
verses.jp1: これからのあとなるはなし山／＼の
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんはらすもよふを
verses.kanji: これからの後なる話山々の   神の残念晴らす模様を
verses.en: Hereafter I will tell you about arrangements for cleaning away the mountainous regret of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, however serious an illness there may be, I shall save you all by the Breath and the Hand Dance.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nanbo mutsukashi yamai demo   Iki to Teodori mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: このさきハなんほむつかしやまいても
verses.jp2: いきとてをどりみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: この先は何ぼ難し病でも   息と手踊り皆救けるで
verses.en: Henceforth, through the Iki, the Grant of Breath, and the Teodori, the Grant of Hand Dance, I will cure any disease, however serious it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: However serious an illness there may be, never say that it will not be cured.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashiku naru yamai demo   kore naoran to yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: どのよふなむつかしくなるやまいでも
verses.jp2: これなをらんとゆうでないぞや
verses.kanji: どの様な難しくなる病でも   これ治らんと言うで無いぞや
verses.en: Never say that it is incurable, however serious the disease may be!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, as the day of the appointed time had not arrived, things were not all as I had said.
verses.ro: kyomade wa higara kokugen kitaran de   nanika chigai mo arita naredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわひがらこくけんきたらんで
verses.jp2: なにかちがいもありたなれとも
verses.kanji: 今日迄は日柄刻限来たらんで   何か違いも有りたなれども
verses.en: Until today, as the fixed time of the fixed day had not yet come, there was a difference between the actual state and My words.

verses.en_6th_ed: But now, I shall give you My teachings on every matter step by step. In nothing shall there be an error.
verses.ro: dandan to ikana koto omo toite oku   donna koto demo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: だん／＼といかな事をもといてをく
verses.jp2: どんな事てもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 段々と如何な事をも説いて置く   どんな事でも違う事無し
verses.en: But now one by one I will teach you any and everything beforehand. Whatever I may say, everything shall be realized without fail.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though the course of your path until now has truly been one of hardship,
verses.ro: koremade no michi no sugara to yu mono wa   makoto nanju na michi de aredomo
verses.jp1: これまてのみちのすがらとゆうものハ
verses.jp2: まことなんぢうなみちであれとも
verses.kanji: これ迄の道のすがらと言う物は   真難渋な道で有れども
verses.en: Even though the course of the way which you have been taking until now is truly full of hardships,

verses.en_6th_ed: In the path ahead, everything will raise your spirits. What a marvelous path it will be!
verses.ro: konosaki no michi wa nandemo ki ga isamu   donna mezurashi michi ga aru yara
verses.jp1: このさきのみちハなんてもきがいさむ
verses.jp2: どんなめつらしみちがあるやら
verses.kanji: この先の道は何でも気が勇む   どんな珍し道が有るやら
verses.en: In the near future you will come to the way which will cheer you up concerning anything. You may not be able to foresee what a remarkable way shall appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though you may see Me rush out by leaps and bounds, never be anxious of mind.
verses.ro: tonton to tobideru koto o mita totemo   kokoro anji wa suru ya nai zo ya
verses.jp1: とん／＼ととびてる事をみたとても
verses.jp2: 心あんちハするやないぞや
verses.kanji: とんとんと飛び出る事を見たとても   心案じはするや無いぞや
verses.en: Even if you may see something which springs out by leaps and bounds, there is no necessity for you to become anxious.

verses.en_6th_ed: Afterward, Tsukihi will take all matters in hand and will assure you a life full of joy everlasting.
verses.ro: ato naru wa yorozu Tsukihi ga hikiukete   itsuitsu made mo yokizukume ni
verses.jp1: あとなるハよろづ月日がひきうけて
verses.jp2: いつ／＼までもよふきつくめに
verses.kanji: 後なるは万月日が引き受けて   何時何時迄も陽気ずくめに
verses.en: After that I, Tsukihi, will take charge of any and everything and will assure you a life full of joy eternally.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, whatever talks I had given you, you thought they were about the future far away.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono hanashi shitaru tomo   itsu no koto naru yoni omote
verses.jp1: いまゝてわなによのはなししたるとも
verses.jp2: いつの事なるよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: 今迄は何よの話したるとも   何時の事なる様に思うて
verses.en: Until now, whatever I may have said, you have been wondering when the day will come.

verses.en_6th_ed: But, lo, how frightful! It appears even as you hear of it. You cannot be off your guard in anything.
verses.ro: yare kowaya kiku yori hayaku mo mieta   donna koto demo yudan deken de
verses.jp1: やれこわやきくよりはやくもふみへた
verses.jp2: どんな事てもゆたんでけんで
verses.kanji: やれ怖や聞くより早くもう見えた   どんな事でも油断出来んで
verses.en: But lo! How terrible it is! You had hardly heard it before it appeared. Never be off your guard on whatever kinds of matters!

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall make your minds spirited day by day. All things will be just as I say.
verses.ro: konosaki o nichinichi kokoro isameru de   donna koto demo yueba sono mama
verses.jp1: このさきをにち／＼心いさめるで
verses.jp2: どんな事でもゆへばそのまゝ
verses.kanji: この先を日々心勇めるで   どんな事でも言えばその侭
verses.en: Henceforth day by day I will cheer up your mind. Everything shall appear just as I say.

verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult things may appear, I shall save you all by the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: dono yoni mutsukashiku yo mieta tote   Yoki-zutome de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: どのよふにむつかしくよふみへたとて
verses.jp2: よふきつとめてみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: どの様に難しく様見えたとて   陽気勤めで皆救けるで
verses.en: However difficult it may look, I will save all of you in whatever kinds of matters through the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what workings I shall do from now on. In accordance with your minds, I shall do anything, however great.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona shigoto suru yara na   kokoro shidai ni donna koto demo
verses.jp1: これからわどのよなしことするやらな
verses.jp2: 心したいにとんな事でも
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な仕事するやらな   心次第にどんな事でも
verses.en: From now on there is no knowing what kinds of works I will manifest. I will do whatever works just as your minds deserve.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will clear away all the mind's regret step by step, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan kokoro zannen o   donna koto demo mina harasu de na
verses.jp1: 月日にわだん／＼心ざんねんを
verses.jp2: どんな事てもみなはらすでな
verses.kanji: 月日には段々心残念を   どんな事でも皆晴らすでな
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will clear away whatever kind of regret which has piled up.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. There is no knowing the workings I shall do.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ikana shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
verses.jp2: いかなしごとをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うのも皆月日   如何な仕事をするや知れんで
verses.en: Whatever I may say, I, Tsukihi, speak all of it. No one can foretell what working I will manifest.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever appears, it is all by Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
verses.ro: ika naru no koto ga mieru mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
verses.jp1: いかなるの事がみゑるもみな月日
verses.jp2: にんけん心あるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 如何なるの事が見えるも皆月日   人間心有ると思うな
verses.en: Whatever things may appear, they are all the working of Tsukihi. Never think My mind is that of a human being!

verses.en_6th_ed: From today, I shall hasten all matters. No one knows the workings I shall do.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo sekikonde   donna hataraki suru ya shiromai
verses.jp1: けふからハどのよな事もせきこんで
verses.jp2: どんなはたらきするやしろまい
verses.kanji: 今日からはどの様な事も急き込んで   どんな働きするや知ろまい
verses.en: From today I will hasten any and everything, and will work whatever thingMs which no one can foretell.

verses.en_6th_ed: These thoughts of Tsukihi are spoken through Her: the mouth is human, the mind is that of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: ima naru no Tsukihi no omou koto naru wa   kuchi wa ningen kokoro Tsukihi ya
verses.jp1: いまなるの月日のをもう事なるわ
verses.jp2: くちわにんけん心月日や
verses.kanji: 今なるの月日の思う事なるは   口は人間心月日や
verses.en: What I, Tsukihi, think now is spoken through Her mouth. Human is the mouth that speaks, but divine is the mind that thinks within.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! I, Tsukihi, am borrowing Her mouth wholly, and I, Tsukihi, am lending My mind wholly.
verses.ro: shikato kike kuchi wa Tsukihi ga mina karite   kokoro wa Tsukihi mina kashite iru
verses.jp1: しかときけくちハ月日がみなかりて
verses.jp2: 心ハ月日みなかしている
verses.kanji: 確と聞け口は月日が皆借りて   心は月日皆貸して居る
verses.en: Listen attentively to Me! It is because I, Tsukihi, borrow Her mouth, while I, Tsukihi, lend My mind to Her.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you are harboring doubts over this, Tsukihi will give a full return in whatever matters.
verses.ro: kore bakari urami aru nara dono yona   koto mo Tsukihi ga mina kayasu de na
verses.jp1: こればかりうらみあるならとのよふな
verses.jp2: 事も月日かみなかやすてな
verses.kanji: こればかり恨み有るならどの様な   事も月日が皆返すでな
verses.en: Just this, if you harbor a grudge in whatever kinds of matters, I, Tsukihi, will give a full return.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. Never is there mixed the least bit of a human mind.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro sarani mazen de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
verses.jp2: にんけん心さらにまぜんで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うのも皆月日   人間心更に混ぜんで
verses.en: Whatever I may say, it is all the talk of Tsukihi. Indeed, there is never mixed the least bit of human mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult you think matters to be, you need not worry. Tsukihi takes charge.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi yoni omota tote   Tsukihi hikiuke anji nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いかほどにむつかしよふにをもたとて
verses.jp2: 月日ひきうけあんちないぞや
verses.kanji: 如何程に難し様に思うたとて   月日引き受け案じ無いぞや
verses.en: However difficult you may think it is, there is nothing to worry about, because I, Tsukihi, take charge of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you in the world, look forward to the path ahead. If only the regret of God is all cleared away...
verses.ro: konosaki no michi o tanoshime ichiretsu wa   Kami no zannen harashitaru nara
verses.jp1: このさきのみちをたのしめ一れつわ
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんはらしたるなら
verses.kanji: この先の道を楽しめ一列は   神の残念晴らしたるなら
verses.en: Look forward to the way in the future with pleasure, all of you equally! If only the regret of God is all cleared away,

verses.en_6th_ed: When I set out to cleanse your heart day by day, there will be none able to resist Me.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mune no soji ni kakaritara   donna mono demo kanau mono nashi
verses.jp1: にち／＼にむねのそふぢにかゝりたら
verses.jp2: どんなものでもかなうものなし
verses.kanji: 日々に胸の掃除に掛かりたら   どんな者でも敵う者無し
verses.en: When I begin sweeping dust from your minds day by day, no one shall be able to stand against Me, whoever one may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this cleansing is about? Tsukihi will enter the bodies of all.
verses.ro: kono soji doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi tainai mina irikomu de
verses.jp1: このそふぢどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: 月日たいないみな入こむで
verses.kanji: この掃除どういう事に思うかな   月日体内皆入り込むで
verses.en: What do you think of this sweeping? I, Tsukihi, will enter into the bodies of all of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Where do you think this talk is about? I shall fully manifest My workings in the high places.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto ya to omou kana   takai tokoro de mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: 高いところでみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: この話何処の事やと思うかな   高い所で皆現すで
verses.en: You may wonder where is the place of which I speak. I will manifest all of My working at high places.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over everything Tsukihi says. There is not an error in anything I say.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi yu koto shiyan seyo   nani o yutemo kore chigawan de
verses.jp1: なにもかも月日ゆう事しやんせよ
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもこれちがわんで
verses.kanji: 何もかも月日言う事思案せよ   何を言うてもこれ違わんで
verses.en: Ponder over the words of Tsukihi, whatever they may be! Whatever I, Tsukihi, once said shall never fail.

verses.en_6th_ed: As I desire to purify the mind of everyone throughout the world, there is no knowing what Tsukihi will do.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu kokoro sumashitasa   donna koto oba Tsukihi suru yara
verses.jp1: せかいぢう一れつ心すましたさ
verses.jp2: どんな事をば月日するやら
verses.kanji: 世界中一列心澄ましたさ   どんな事をば月日するやら
verses.en: As I earnestly desire to sweep dust from the minds of all people of the whole world, there is no knowing what kinds of things I, Tsukihi, may work.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do, it is solely from Tsukihi's single desire to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo Tsukihi niwa   tasuketai to no ichijo bakari de
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするのも月日には
verses.jp2: たすけたいとの一ちよはかりで
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも月日には   救けたいとの一条ばかりで
verses.en: Whatever I, Tsukihi, may work, it is solely from My intention to save all of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you in the world, keep your eyes firmly on the future. The cleansing of the heart will be accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: konosaki o tashika mite iyo ichiretsu wa   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: このさきをたしかみていよ一れつわ
verses.jp2: むねのそふちがひとりでけるで
verses.kanji: この先を確か見て居よ一列は   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.en: Look at the events which shall appear in the near future! Then the sweeping of the minds of all of you equally shall be accomplished by itself.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this cleansing is thoroughly done, I shall begin at once to prepare for the Amulet.
verses.ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitaru koto naraba   sono mama suguni Mamori goshirae
verses.jp1: このそふちすきやかしたる事ならば
verses.jp2: そのまゝすぐにまむりごしらゑ
verses.kanji: この掃除清きやかしたる事ならば   その侭直ぐに守り拵え
verses.en: When this sweeping is clearly accomplished, I will begin at once to prepare the Mamori, the Amulet.

verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens daily for such a path to be, but no one is aware of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o Tsukihi no kokoro nichinichi ni   sekikonde iru tare mo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: このみちを月日の心にち／＼に
verses.jp2: せきこんでいるたれもしらずに
verses.kanji: この道を月日の心日々に   急き込んで居る誰も知らずに
verses.en: Day by day, the mind of Tsukihi impatiently hastens for this way. But there is no one who is aware of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you come onto this path quickly, all of you will be spirited, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono michi e hayaku tsuitaru koto naraba   donna mono demo mina isamu de na
verses.jp1: このみちゑはやくついたる事ならば
verses.jp2: どんなものでもみないさむてな
verses.kanji: この道へ早く付いたる事ならば   どんな者でも皆勇むでな
verses.en: If only you come to follow this way quickly, all of you shall become cheered up, whoever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder who is giving this talk. It is solely the mind of Tsukihi speaking.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ga suru towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari yu no ya
verses.jp1: このはなしたれがするとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日の心はかりゆうのや
verses.kanji: この話誰がするとは思うなよ   月日の心ばかり言うのや
verses.en: Never wonder who is giving this talk! It is no other than the mind of Tsukihi who speaks now.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is because I desire to make the truth of this world known by all means to the entire world.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu naru o sekaiju e   doshite nari to shirashitai yue
verses.jp1: このよふのしんちつなるをせかへちうへ
verses.jp2: とふしてなりとしらしたいゆへ
verses.kanji: この世の真実なるを世界中に   どうしてなりと知らしたい故
verses.en: It is because I earnestly desire to make the truth of this world known to all people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until today I have let the days go by and held back in whatever matters,
verses.ro: kyomade wa ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   dono yona koto mo shikae iredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわ一日なりとひをのばし
verses.jp2: とのよな事もしかゑいれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄は一日なりと日を延ばし   どの様な事も控え居れども
verses.en: Though until today each day I have postponed and held back whatever kinds of things,

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as the day is pressing, I cannot hold back even for a moment.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   domu shikaeru koto wa deken de
verses.jp1: このたびハもふひがつまりきるからハ
verses.jp2: どふむしかゑる事ハでけんで
verses.kanji: この度はもう日が詰り切るからは   どうも控える事は出来んで
verses.en: This time, as the day is pressing I cannot hold back even for a moment.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you hear and whenever you hear of it, it is the regret and anger of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: nandoki ni dono yona koto o kiita tote   kore wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku
verses.jp1: なんどきにとのよな事をきいたとて
verses.jp2: これハ月日のざねんりいふく
verses.kanji: 何時にどの様な事を聞いたとて   これは月日の残念立腹
verses.en: Whenever and whatever matters you may hear unexpectedly,they are all the manifestations of the regret and anger of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, everyone is My child, whoever you may be. Though I have been watching over you with nothing but love,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona mono mo waga ko nari   kawai bakari de mite wa iredomo
verses.jp1: 月日にわどのよなものもわが子なり
verses.jp2: かわいばかりでみてハいれども
verses.kanji: 月日にはどの様な者も我が子なり   可愛いばかりで見ては居れども
verses.en: For Me, Tsukihi, any and everyone is My child, whoever he may be. So I am looking after him with nothing but parental affection.

verses.en_6th_ed: And though each of you throughout the world has been pondering until now,
verses.ro: imamade wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   meme shiyan o shite wa iredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハせかいぢううハ一れつに
verses.jp2: めゑ／＼しやんをしてわいれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は世界中は一列に   銘々思案をしては居れども
verses.en: Until now each and everyone throughout the world has been concerned only with himself.

verses.en_6th_ed: To My sorrow, no matter how deeply you have pondered, you have no mind to save others.
verses.ro: nasake nai dono yoni shiyan shita totemo   hito o tasukeru kokoro nai node
verses.jp1: なさけないとのよにしやんしたとても
verses.jp2: 人をたすける心ないので
verses.kanji: 情け無いどの様に思案したとても   人を救ける心無いので
verses.en: How pitiful it is! You have no mind to help others, however hard you may think it over.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now, Tsukihi requests you, everyone in the world, to replace your mind firmly.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi tanomi ya ichiretsu wa   kokoro shikkari irekaete kure
verses.jp1: これからハ月日たのみや一れつわ
verses.jp2: 心しいかりいれかゑてくれ
verses.kanji: これからは月日頼みや一列は   心確り入れ替えて呉れ
verses.en: Henceforth, replace your mind definitely! I, Tsukihi, request it from you all equally.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what kind of mind it is to be: it is none other than to save the world single-heartedly.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doyu koto de aru naraba   sekai tasukeru ichijo bakari o
verses.jp1: この心どふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp2: せかいたすける一ちよばかりを
verses.kanji: この心どういう事で有るならば   世界救ける一条ばかりを
verses.en: If you ask what kind of mind it is, it is the mind to save single-heartedly all people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, if all of you throughout the world save one another in every matter,
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   yorozu tagaini tasuke suru nara
verses.jp1: このさきハせかいぢううハ一れつに
verses.jp2: よろづたがいにたすけするなら
verses.kanji: この先は世界中は一列に   万互いに救けするなら
verses.en: Henceforth, if only all people of the world equally help each other on any and every matter,

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that Tsukihi will accept that mind and will provide any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo sono kokoro oba uketorite   donna tasuke mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 月日にもその心をばうけとりて
verses.jp2: どんなたすけもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 月日にもその心をば受け取りて   どんな救けもすると思えよ
verses.en: Believe that I, Tsukihi, will accept your minds and will work any and every kind of salvation!

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this salvation is? It is My assurance of your freedom from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   hoso sen yoni tashika ukeyau
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよにたしかうけやう
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事に思うかな   疱瘡せん様に確か請け合う
verses.en: What do you think this saving grace is? I surely assure you freedom from smallpox.

verses.en_6th_ed: Another salvation I desire to teach: an equally abundant harvest everywhere at all times.
verses.ro: mata tasuke ryuke ichiretsu dokomade mo   itsumo hosaku oshietai kara
verses.jp1: またゝすけりうけ一れつどこまでも
verses.jp2: いつもほふさくをしゑたいから
verses.kanji: また救け立毛一列何処迄も   何時も豊作教えたいから
verses.en: One more salvation which I desire to teach you is that which assures you a rich harvest of all kinds of crops throughout the world and every time.

verses.en_6th_ed: To train you in such a path quickly is My desire, but there is no understanding in anyone's mind.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku shikomo to omoedomo   ichiretsu kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくしこもとをもゑども
verses.jp2: 一れつ心わかりないので
verses.kanji: この道を早く仕込もうと思えども   一列心分かり無いので
verses.en: In spite of My earnest desire to train you for this way quickly, all of your minds equally are yet closed to reason.

verses.en_6th_ed: I do not discriminate among any of you in the world. Please ponder, each of you.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko ni hedate wa nai hodoni   ichiretsu shiyan shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: せかいぢうどこにへだてわないほどに
verses.jp2: 一れつしやんしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: 世界中何処に隔ては無い程に   一列思案して呉れる様
verses.en: There is no discrimination indeed whatsoever in the whole world. Please ponder over it well, all of you equally!

verses.en_6th_ed: If a true resolve comes to your mind, and you do not turn away from the words of God,
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni sadame mina tsuite   Kami no yu koto somuki nakereba
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心にさだめみなついて
verses.jp2: 神のゆう事そむきなければ
verses.kanji: 真実に心に定め皆付いて   神の言う事背き無ければ
verses.en: If only you determine the true sincerity of your mind, and never go against the words of God,

verses.en_6th_ed: Then Tsukihi will firmly accept this mind and directly hasten your salvation.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Tsukihi no kokoro shikkari to   uketori shidai tasuke sekikomu
verses.jp1: それよりも月日の心しいかりと
verses.jp2: うけとりしだいたすけせきこむ
verses.kanji: それよりも月日の心確りと   受け取り次第救け急き込む
verses.en: Then I, Tsukihi, will hasten to save all of you, as soon as I accept it with certainty.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of this salvation as being trivial. It is the principal matter of the Divine Record of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono tasuke chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   kore wa nihon no ichi no Koki ya
verses.jp1: このたすけ一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: これわにほんの一のこふきや
verses.kanji: この救け一寸の事やと思うなよ   これは日本の一のこうきや
verses.en: Never take this salvation as trivial matter! This is the prime Koki, the Divine Record, which shall be written in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only I show this quickly and clearly, however high your place may be...
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku shikkari miseta nara   dono yona takai tokoro naru tomo
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくしいかりみせたなら
verses.jp2: とのよな高いところなるとも
verses.kanji: これさいか早く確り見せたなら   どの様な高い所なるとも
verses.en: If only this is quickly and clearly shown, you shall understand Me, however high your position may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: This indeed is not human workings. No one will be able to turn away from the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kore bakari ningen waza de nai karani   Tsukihi juyo somuki dekemai
verses.jp1: こればかりにんけんハさでないからに
verses.jp2: 月日ぢうよふそむきでけまい
verses.kanji: こればかり人間業で無いからに   月日自由背き出来まい
verses.en: Indeed, this one thing is not human work. No one shall be able to stand against the omnipotence of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: When it is shown, however high your place may be, you will not be able to imitate it. Ponder this.
verses.ro: shitaru nara ika hodo takai tokoro demo   mane wa dekemai shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: したるならいかほと高いところても
verses.jp2: まねハてけまいしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: したるなら如何程高い所でも   真似は出来まい思案して見よ
verses.en: Therefore, however high your position may be, it is impossible to imitate Me, Tsukihi. Ponder over it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi desires to show proof quickly against illness, death, and weakening,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yamazu shinazu ni yowaran no   hayaku shoko daso to omoedo
verses.jp1: 月日よりやますしなすによわらんの
verses.jp2: はやくしよこふだそとをもへど
verses.kanji: 月日より病まず死なずに弱らんの   早く証拠を出そうと思えど
verses.en: Although I, Tsukihi, impatiently desire to produce the proof against illness, death or becoming weak,

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you everywhere doubt Me and take My words as being worldly common.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina utagote tare nitemo   sekainami ya to omote iru node
verses.jp1: 一れつハみなうたごふてたれにても
verses.jp2: せかいなみやとをもているので
verses.kanji: 一列は皆疑うて誰にても   世界並やと思うて居るので
verses.en: Yet, all of you equally doubt My words, and take My words to be worldly.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is not at all a human mind at this place. There are only the thoughts of Tsukihi.
