verses.ro: kono tokoro ningen gokoro sarani nashi   Tsukihi no omou koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このところにんけん心さらになし
verses.jp2: 月日のをもう事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この所人間心更に無し   月日の思う事ばかりやで
verses.en: Here in My mind nothing human is mixed. All come from the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: But there is no one who knows this. That there is no understanding is the regret of God.
verses.ro: sono koto o tare demo shiranu koto ya kara   wakari nai no ga Kami no zannen
verses.jp1: その事をたれてもしらぬ事やから
verses.jp2: わかりないのが神のさんねん
verses.kanji: その事を誰でも知らぬ事やから   分かり無いのが神の残念
verses.en: As it is a matter which no one has ever known, you cannot understand it. This is indeed the cause of the regret of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Is there not a way that the minds of all of you can be truly purified?
verses.ro: kono kokoro dozo shinjitsu ichiretsu no   kokoro sumasuru moyo nai ka yo
verses.jp1: この心どふぞしんちつ一れつの
verses.jp2: 心すまするもよふないかよ
verses.kanji: この心どうぞ真実一列の   心澄まする模様無いかよ
verses.en: How can I find by any means the way to purify truly the minds of all of you equally?

verses.en_6th_ed: If only your minds quickly become open to reason, I shall show you the proof at once.
verses.ro: kokoro sai hayaku wakarita koto naraba   sono mama suguni shoko dasu no ni
verses.jp1: 心さいはやくハかりた事ならば
verses.jp2: そのまゝすぐにしよこだすのに
verses.kanji: 心さい早く分かりた事ならば   その侭直ぐに証拠出すのに
verses.en: If only your minds become open to reason, I will put forth the evidence at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have listened to all kinds of falsehood, but from now on I shall hear them no more.
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona uso mo kiite ita   mo korekara wa uso wa kikan de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとのよなうそもきいていた
verses.jp2: もふこれからハうそハきかんで
verses.kanji: 今迄はどの様な嘘も聞いて居た   もうこれからは嘘は聞かんで
verses.en: Until now I have heard whatever kind of falsehood, but henceforth no falsehood shall be heard.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, if you speak falsely, you yourself will become false. Beware!
verses.ro: korekara wa uso o yu tara sono mono ga   uso ni naru nomo kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp1: これからハうそをゆうたらそのものが
verses.jp2: うそになるのもこれがしよちか
verses.kanji: これからは嘘を言うたらその者が   嘘になるのもこれが承知か
verses.en: Henceforth, if you tell a falsehood, you yourself shall also become false. Are you aware of it?

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi dislikes falsehood and flattery. If you persist, Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa uso to tsuisho kore kirai   konosaki naru wa Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: 月日にハうそとついしよこれきらい
verses.jp2: このさきなるわ月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: 月日には嘘と追従これ嫌い   この先なるは月日退く
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, dislike falsehood and flattery. If you persist in them, God will withdraw.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I have postponed yet another day, overlooking almost all of them.
verses.ro: soreyue ni ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   taitei nanimo miyurushite ita
verses.jp1: それゆへに一日なりとひをのばし
verses.jp2: たいていなにもみゆるしていた
verses.kanji: それ故に一日なりと日を延ばし   大抵何も見許して居た
verses.en: Therefore I have postponed yet another day, and overlooked most of them.

verses.en_6th_ed: I say that I desire to show the proof quickly at this time. What do you think of My words?
verses.ro: konotabi no hayaku shoko dashitai to   yute iru no o nanto omou zo
verses.jp1: このたびのはやくしよこふだしたいと
verses.jp2: ゆうているのをなんとをもうぞ
verses.kanji: この度の早く証拠を出したいと   言うて居るのを何と思うぞ
verses.en: What do you think of My words, that at this time I want to produce the evidence quickly?

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think the proof is to be? I have put a clear test on the body.
verses.ro: shoko mo doyu koto ni omou kana   minouchi yori ni tashika tameshi o
verses.jp1: しよこふもとふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: みのうちよりにたしかためしを
verses.kanji: 証拠もどういう事に思うかな   身の内よりに確か試しを
verses.en: What do you think the evidence is? I will surely prove it by a test on your body.

verses.en_6th_ed: About this test: know that the regret of Tsukihi is no small matter.
verses.ro: kono tameshi makoto Tsukihi no zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このためしまこと月日のさんねんわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この試し真月日の残念は   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.en: Concerning this test I, Tsukihi, harbor regret which is far from slight. Remember it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: A body that had no disorder anywhere: Tsukihi bent it and caused you much trouble.
verses.ro: minouchi ni doko ni fusoku no nai mono ni   Tsukihi igamete kuro kaketa de
verses.jp1: みのうちにとこにふそくのないものに
verses.jp2: 月日いがめてくろふかけたで
verses.kanji: 身の内に何処に不足の無い者に   月日歪めて苦労掛けたで
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, made you lame, though you had to that time no bodily defect at all. This has given you much trouble.

verses.en_6th_ed: The time was thirty-nine years ago. Since then, I have given you worries, troubles, and suffering.
verses.ro: nengen wa sanju ku nen mo izen nite   shinpai kuro nayami kaketa de
verses.jp1: ねんけんハ三十九ねんもいせんにて
verses.jp2: しんばいくろふなやみかけたで
verses.kanji: 年限は三十九年も以前にて   心配苦労悩み掛けたで
verses.en: That was thirty-nine years ago. Ever since, I have caused you much anxiety, troubles and worries.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because of it, you doubt all the words of Tsukihi. It is not unreasonable.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi yu koto nani goto mo   utagote iru kore muri de nai
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日ゆう事なに事も
verses.jp2: うたこふているこれむりでない
verses.kanji: それ故に月日言う事何事も   疑うて居るこれ無理で無い
verses.en: Therefore you are doubting whatever words I, Tsukihi, may say. But, it is natural.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I am preparing to clear up your innermost heart. This is the first matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono mune no uchi sukiyaka ni   harasu moyo ya kore ga daiichi
verses.jp1: このたびハ此むねのうちすきやかに
verses.jp2: はらすもよふやこれがだい一
verses.kanji: この度はこの胸の内清きやかに   晴らす模様やこれが第一
verses.en: This time I am preparing to clear up your innermost heart. This is the prime matter.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unless your mind is turned toward Tsukihi, any talk will be to no avail.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Tsukihi no ho e shikkarito   tsuken koto niwa donna hanashi mo
verses.jp1: この心月日のほふゑしいかりと
verses.jp2: つけん事にハどんなはなしも
verses.kanji: この心月日の方へ確りと   付けん事にはどんな話も
verses.en: Unless I attract your mind to Tsukihi, any talk shall be to no avail.

verses.en_6th_ed: Everything that has been done is all by Tsukihi, but there is perhaps no one who knows this.
verses.ro: ika naru no koto o shitaru mo mina Tsukihi   konna koto oba tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: いかなるの事をしたるもみな月日
verses.jp2: こんな事をばたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 如何なるの事をしたるも皆月日   こんな事をば誰も知ろまい
verses.en: It is all I, Tsukihi, who have done whatever kinds of things. Perhaps no one is aware of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, there will be no time even to look aside. I shall show you the proof quickly.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa yokome furu ma mo nai hodoni   hayaku shoko dashite miseru de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハよこめふるまもないほどに
verses.jp2: はやくしよこふだしてみせるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は横目振る間も無い程に   早く証拠を出して見せるで
verses.en: Today there will be no time even for a side glance, because I will produce the evidence at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: When you see it, be convinced, whoever you are. All of My talks proceed in this way.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo tokushin se   nanino hanashi mo mina kono dori
verses.jp1: これみたらとんなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp2: なにのはなしもみなこのどふり
verses.kanji: これ見たらどんな者でも得心せ   何の話も皆この通り
verses.en: Looking at this, you must become convinced of the truth, whoever you may be. Any and every talk shall be realized in this manner.

verses.en_6th_ed: My regret up till now is not something that can be told in words.
verses.ro: imamade no kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでのこのさんねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: くちでゆうよな事てないぞや
verses.kanji: 今迄のこの残念と言うものは   口で言う様な事で無いぞや
verses.en: My regret which has piled up to the present is not slight, so it cannot be expressed by word of mouth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have passed through a mountain of regrets. If I clear them away at this time,
verses.ro: imamade wa yamayama zanen torinuke   konotabi kore o harashi taru nara
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ山／＼さねんとふりぬけ
verses.jp2: このたびこれをはらしたるなら
verses.kanji: 今迄は山々残念通り抜け   この度これを晴らしたるなら
verses.en: Until now I have been passing through a mountainous regret. If only I can clear it all away this time,

verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, whatever illness or whatever else may be troubling you, you shall be saved from them all.
verses.ro: ato naru wa donna yamai mo ika naru no   koto de aro ga mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: あとなるハどんなやまいもいかなるの
verses.jp2: 事であろふがみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: 後なるはどんな病も如何なるの   事で有ろうが皆救けるで
verses.en: Thereafter I will save you from any and every kind of disease or trouble, however serious it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: If I should make the origin of human beings known to the whole world,
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen moto o sekaiju   shirashite oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このよふのにんけんもとをせかいちう
verses.jp2: しらしてをいた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この世の人間元を世界中へ   知らして置いた事で有るなら
verses.en: If only I can teach the origin of human beings throughout the world,

verses.en_6th_ed: Then I shall provide any salvation whatever. With but a word, I shall save you all.
verses.ro: sorekara wa donna tasuke mo suru hodoni   hito koto made de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: それからハどんなたすけもするほとに
verses.jp2: 一事までゝみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: それからはどんな救けもする程に   一言迄で皆救けるで
verses.en: Then I will work whatever kind of salvation. Indeed, with a single word I will save you from any and every matter.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, though I have repeatedly taught the truth step by step, you do not understand the core.
verses.ro: koremade wa dandan kudoki kotowari o   yute aredomo shin ga wakaran
verses.jp1: これまでハたん／＼くどきことハりを
verses.jp2: ゆうてあれどもしんかわからん
verses.kanji: これ迄は段々口説き断りを   言うて有れども芯が分からん
verses.en: Hitherto I have so often tried to persuade and warned you, but you did not understand the core of the truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what this core is: the pondering of your heart is the primary concern.
verses.ro: kono shin wa doyu koto de aro nara   mune no shiyan o kore ga daiichi
verses.jp1: このしんハどふゆう事であろふなら
verses.jp2: むねのしやんをこれがたいゝち
verses.kanji: この芯はどういう事で有ろうなら   胸の思案をこれが第一
verses.en: What is the core? You may wonder. It is most important to ponder over in your heart.

verses.en_6th_ed: If the heart and the mouth differ in any matter, never will it accord with the mind of God.
verses.ro: nani nitemo mune to kuchi to ga chigote wa   Kami no kokoro ni kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: なにゝてもむねとくちとがちこふてハ
verses.jp2: 神の心にこれハかなわん
verses.kanji: 何にても胸と口とが違うては   神の心にこれは適わん
verses.en: On whatever kinds of matters, if there is a discrepancy between your heart and mouth, it will never comply with the intention of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: If your sincerity does not accord with the mind of God, in vain is devotion, however great it may be.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ga Kami no kokoro ni kanawaneba   ika hodo kokoro tsukushitaru tomo
verses.jp1: しんちつが神の心にかなハねば
verses.jp2: いかほど心つくしたるとも
verses.kanji: 真実が神の心に適わねば   如何程心尽くしたるとも
verses.en: If your sincerity does not comply with the intention of God, all shall be done in vain, however earnestly you may exhaust yourself.

verses.en_6th_ed: On this one matter, whoever may come and however he may plead, it cannot be accepted. Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: kore bakari ika hodo tare ga sodan mo   totemo kanawan Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: こればかりいかほどたれがそふたんも
verses.jp2: とてもかなハん月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: こればかり如何程誰が相談も   とても適わん月日退く
verses.en: Just this, whoever may come to consult, he will not be heard. My anger being so severe, I, Tsukihi, will only withdraw.

verses.en_6th_ed: In any matter, listen closely to the words of God. In whatever I say, there is never a mistake.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   nani o yutemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: なにもかも神のゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 何もかも神の言う事確と聞け   何を言うても違う事無し
verses.en: Listen attentively to whatever words I, God, may say! Nothing which I have ever said shall fail to appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: I truly desire to teach you marvelous salvation. That is why I tell you everything whatever.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni mezurashi tasuke oshietasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
verses.jp1: しんちつにめつらしたすけをしへたさ
verses.jp2: そこでとのよな事もゆうのや
verses.kanji: 真実に珍し救け教えたさ   そこでどの様な事も言うのや
verses.en: As I desire to teach you the truly remarkable salvation, I tell you any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: I desire to teach you everything that has been unknown since I began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nai koto o   donna koto omo oshietai kara
verses.jp1: このよふを初てからにない事を
verses.jp2: どんな事をもをしへたいから
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに無い事を   どんな事をも教えたいから
verses.en: As I desire to teach you any and everything which has never existed since the creation of this world,

verses.en_6th_ed: You must clearly understand the truth concerning the real origin of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no honmoto naru no shinjitsu o   shikkari shochi seneba ikan de
verses.jp1: このよふのほんもとなるのしんちつを
verses.jp2: しいかりしよちせねばいかんで
verses.kanji: この世の本元なるの真実を   確り承知せねばいかんで
verses.en: You must not remain without firm conviction of the truth of the real origin of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one anywhere who knows this origin clearly.
verses.ro: kono moto o shikkari shirite iru mono wa   doko no mono demo sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このもとをしいかりしりているものハ
verses.jp2: とこのものでもさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この元を確り知りて居る者は   何処の者でも更に有るまい
verses.en: There shall be found no one who knows of this origin clearly even if you search after one any and everywhere.

verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, I shall tell you the real truth. Whatever I say, you must understand clearly.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu o yute kikasu   nani o yutemo shikato shochi se
verses.jp1: このたびハほんしんちつをゆてきかす
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしかとしよちせ
verses.kanji: この度は本真実を言うて聞かす   何を言うても確と承知せ
verses.en: This time I will tell you the real truth of this origin. Understand it surely, whatever I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: Among the instruments used in the beginning of human beings at this Residence, Izanagi and Izanami,
verses.ro: kono yashiki ningen hajime dogu wa na   Izanagiii to Izanami to nari
verses.jp1: このやしきにんけんはじめどふぐハな
verses.jp2: いざなぎいゝといざなみとなり
verses.kanji: この屋敷人間初め道具はな   いざなぎといざなみとなり
verses.en: In this Residence, the instruments for the creation of human beings are Izanagi and Izanami.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukiyomi, Kunisazuchi, Kumoyomi, and Kashikone are the primary instruments.
verses.ro: Tsukiyomi to Kunisazuchii to Kumoyomi to   Kashikonee to ga ichi no dogu ya
verses.jp1: 月よみとくにさづちいとくもよみと
verses.jp2: かしこねへとが一のとふぐや
verses.kanji: つきよみとくにさずちとくもよみと   かしこねとが一の道具や
verses.en: Tsukiyomi, Kunisazuchi, Kumoyomi and Kashikone are each the prime instruments.

verses.en_6th_ed: Then, the one called Otonobe is the primary instrument for the crops.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Otonobee to yu no wa na   kore wa ryuke no ichi no dogu ya
verses.jp1: それよりもをふとのべへとゆうのハな
verses.jp2: これわりゆけの一のどふくや
verses.kanji: それよりもおおとのべと言うのはな   これは立毛の一の道具や
verses.en: Then Otonobe is the prime instrument for the harvest.

verses.en_6th_ed: Next, the one called Taishokuten is the scissors of the world.
verses.ro: tsugi naru wa Taishokuten to yu no wa na   kore wa sekai no hasami naru zo ya
verses.jp1: つきなるハたいしよく天とゆうのハな
verses.jp2: これわせかいのはさみなるぞや
verses.kanji: 次なるはたいしょくてんと言うのはな   これは世界の鋏なるぞや
verses.en: Next Taishokuten is the scissors in the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until this time, calling together all the instruments, I have passed through every kind of path.
verses.ro: koremade wa dogu issai mina yosete   dono yona michi mo torinuketa de
verses.jp1: これまでハどふぐいゝさいみなよせて
verses.jp2: とのよなみちもとふりぬけたで
verses.kanji: これ迄は道具一切皆寄せて   どの様な道も通り抜けたで
verses.en: Hitherto calling together all necessary instruments, I have passed through whatever kinds of ways full of hardships.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall distinguish the instruments called together and hasten preparations to train them.
verses.ro: konosaki wa yoseta dogu o miwake shite   shikomu moyo o isogu bakari ya
verses.jp1: このさきハよせたどふぐをみハけして
verses.jp2: しこむもよふをいそぐばかりや
verses.kanji: この先は寄せた道具を見分けして   仕込む模様を急ぐばかりや
verses.en: Henceforth I will distinguish the instruments called together and hasten single-heartedly to train them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder where they can be found. Here are two, both eleven years old.
verses.ro: kono mono wa doko ni aru ya to omouna yo   toshi wa ju ichi ni nin iru zo ya
verses.jp1: このものハとこにあるやとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: としわ十一二人いるぞや
verses.kanji: この者は何処に有るやと思うなよ   年は十一二人居るぞや
verses.en: Never wonder where these persons shall be found! Here are two boys both aged eleven years.

verses.en_6th_ed: One is an instrument used to begin human beings. The other is for the providence for all crops.
verses.ro: kono nin wa ningen hajime kaketaru to   ryuke issai shugo dogu ya
verses.jp1: この人ハにんけんはじめかけたると
verses.jp2: りうけいゝさいしゆごふどふぐや
verses.kanji: この人は人間初め掛けたると   立毛一切守護道具や
verses.en: One of them has the affinity to the instrument of the creation of human beings, and the other to the instrument that protects all crops.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, I shall speak about any and all matters. Whatever I say, understand Me, please.
verses.ro: kyonohi ni dono yona koto mo yu hodoni   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日にどのよな事もゆうほどに
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日にどの様な事も言う程に   何を言うても承知して呉れ
verses.en: Today I will tell you any and everything. Please understand well, whatever I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, there were many intentions of God, but as the day had not come, I have held back.
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no omowaku mama aredo   hi ga kitaran de shikae itaru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでも神のをもハくまゝあれど
verses.jp2: ひがきたらんでしかゑいたるで
verses.kanji: 今迄も神の思惑深く有る   日が来たらんで控え居たるで
verses.en: Hitherto also, I, God, often desired to speak My intentions. But, as the day had not yet come, I have been holding back.

verses.en_6th_ed: But as the day is pressing step by step, I shall give you all of My teachings.
verses.ro: dandan to mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   donna koto demo yute oku zo ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼ともふひがつまりきるからハ
verses.jp2: どんな事でもゆうてをくぞや
verses.kanji: 段々ともう日が詰り切るからは   どんな事でも言うて置くぞや
verses.en: But now step by step the day is pressing, so I will tell you any and everything beforehand.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, people everywhere have been alike. Whatever I said, all was doubted.
verses.ro: koremade wa doko no hito demo onaji koto   nani o yutemo mina utagote
verses.jp1: これまでハどこの人でもをなじ事
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもみなうたごふて
verses.kanji: これ迄は何処の人でも同じ事   何を言うても皆疑うて
verses.en: Until now everyone everywhere has equally doubted My words, whatever I may say.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, it is the real truth. If you turn away from it, I shall give you a return at once.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu de aru karani   kore somuitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp1: このたびハほんしんぢつであるからに
verses.jp2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで
verses.kanji: この度は本真実で有るからに   これ背いたら直ぐに返すで
verses.en: But this time it is the absolute truth. So, if you stand against Me, I will give a return at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: In the world, there are those who desire rain, but perhaps no one knows its origin.
verses.ro: sekai niwa ame o hoshii to omota tote   kono moto naru o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: せかいにわあめをほしいとをもたとて
verses.jp2: このもとなるをたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 世界には雨を欲しいと思うたとて   この元なるを誰も知ろまい
verses.en: There are people in the world who want rain. But perhaps there is no one who knows the origin of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to tell you clearly about this origin. If only you would understand all that I say...
verses.ro: kono moto o shikkari yute kakaru kara   donna koto demo shochi suru nara
verses.jp1: このもとをしいかりゆうてかゝるから
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしよちするなら
verses.kanji: この元を確り言うて掛かるから   どんな事でも承知して呉れ
verses.en: Now I will begin to tell you clearly about this truth. If only you understand My words, whatever I may say,

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, a talk never given since this world began: please listen to whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa kono yo hajimete nai hanashi   nani o yutemo kore kiite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日ハこのよはじめてないはなし
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもこれきいてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日はこの世初めて無い話   何を言うてもこれ聞いて呉れ
verses.en: Today I will give you a talk which no one has ever heard since the creation. So, please listen to Me, whatever I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: Though you are saying that this world is the world of God, you do not know the core of all matters.
verses.ro: kono yo wa Kami no sekai to yui nagara   donna koto demo shin wa shiran de
verses.jp1: このよふわ神のせかいとゆいながら
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしんわしらんで
verses.kanji: この世は神の世界と言いながら   どんな事でも芯は知らんで
verses.en: Even though you say that this is the world of God, you know nothing of the core of the truth of whatever things.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall truly manifest this core. When you see it, be convinced, all of you.
verses.ro: kono shin o makoto shinjitsu shite miseru   kore mita naraba mina tokushin se
verses.jp1: このしんをまことしんぢつしてみせる
verses.jp2: これみたならばみなとくしんせ
verses.kanji: この芯を誠真実して見せる   これ見たならば皆得心せ
verses.en: I will truly and really manifest this core of the truth. Looking at this, become convinced of it, all of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is done, it is all by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi   nani o yu no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をするのもみな月日
verses.jp2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも皆月日   何を言うのも皆月日やで
verses.en: Whatever I may do or say, it is all from the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall manifest all things which have never existed since the world began.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono yo hajimete nai koto o   donna koto demo mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このたびハこのよはじめてない事を
verses.jp2: どんな事でもみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: この度はこの世初めて無い事を   どんな事でも皆現すで
verses.en: This time I will manifest whatever things which have never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi is dwelling within the body. There is no knowing what workings I shall do.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa tainai yori mo komori ite   donna shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: 月日にわたいないよりもこもりいて
verses.jp2: どんなしごとをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: 月日には体内よりも篭り居て   どんな仕事をするや知れんで
verses.en: Being inside your bodies, I, Tsukihi, will work whatever things which no one can foresee.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may dream, it is all by Tsukihi. The reality seen, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona yume o miru no mo mina Tsukihi   makoto miru no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふなゆめをみるのもみな月日
verses.jp2: まことみるのもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: どの様な夢を見るのも皆月日   真見るのも皆月日やで
verses.en: Whatever things you may dream or actually see, they are all the providence of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Never yet have I spoken about the origin of water in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no mizu no moto naru koto oba na   mada koremade wa yuta koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふの水のもとなる事をばな
verses.jp2: まだこれまでわゆうた事なし
verses.kanji: この世の水の元なる事をばな   未だこれ迄は言うた事無し
verses.en: I have never told you yet the true origin of the water of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, on the real truth of water, there is no knowing what kind of talk I shall give.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu no mizu no koto   donna hanashi o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: このたびハほんしんぢつの水の事
verses.jp2: どんなはなしをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: この度は本真実の水の事   どんな話をするや知れんで
verses.en: This time there is no knowing what kind of talk I may begin on the true origin of water.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to tell you about this origin clearly, but I cannot tell it as long as you think in common worldly ways.
verses.ro: kono moto o tashikani yute kakaru kara   sekainami naru koto de yuwaren
verses.jp1: この元をたしかにゆうてかゝるから
verses.jp2: せかいなみなる事でゆハれん
verses.kanji: この元を確かに言うて掛かるから   世界並なる事で言われん
verses.en: But, this time I am going to tell you about this origin surely. So I cannot tell it as long as you think in worldly ways.

verses.en_6th_ed: From today, I shall begin to tell you about all matters whatever. Listen carefully to whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo yuikakeru   nani o yutemo shikato kiku nari
verses.jp1: けふからわどのよな事もゆいかける
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしかときくなり
verses.kanji: 今日からはどの様な事も言い掛ける   何を言うても確と聞くなり
verses.en: From today I begin to tell you any and everything. Listen attentively to whatever I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day and step by step, those on the high mountains will come to Me to request or inquire whatever things.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni takayama nitewa dandan to   donna koto oba tanomi tazuneru
verses.jp1: にち／＼に高山にてわだん／＼と
verses.jp2: どんな事をばたのみたつねる
verses.kanji: 日々に高山にては段々と   どんな事をば頼み尋ねる
verses.en: Day by day and step by step, those who are on the high mountains will come to Me to entreat or inquire whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this comes to be, there will be no danger in any matters whatever.
verses.ro: kore saika mie kita naraba dono yona   koto mo abunaki sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: これさいかみゑきたならばどのよふな
verses.jp2: 事もあふなきさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: これさいか見え来たならばどの様な   事も危なき更に無いぞや
verses.en: If only this is realized, there shall be nothing dangerous on whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, there is no knowing what talks I shall give. Please understand whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o suru yara na   donna koto demo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをするやらな
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何の話をするやらな   どんな事でも承知して呉れ
verses.en: Today there is no knowing what kind of talk I will tell you. Please comply with whatever I say!

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall make everything in the mind of each of you clearly manifest on your body.
verses.ro: meme no kokoro minouchi dono yona   koto demo shikato mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: めへ／＼の心みのうちどのよふな
verses.jp2: 事でもしかとみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: 銘々の心身の内どの様な   事でも確と皆現すで
verses.en: Whatever working of each of your minds, I will clearly show it in your bodies.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whoever you may be, when this is seen, the cleansing of the heart will be truly accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: これみたらどんなものでもしんぢつに
verses.jp2: むねのそふちがひとりてけるで
verses.kanji: これ見たらどんな者でも真実に   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.en: You looking at this, the sweeping of your hearts will be truly accomplished of itself, whoever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall bring all things clearly out into the open and demonstrate My working.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo sukiyaka ni   araware dashite mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: このたびハどんな事でもすきやかに
verses.jp2: あらわれだしてみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: この度はどんな事でも清きやかに   現れ出して皆して見せる
verses.en: Revealing Myself, this time I will positively manifest whatever kind of My working.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one who knows what exists inside the body.
verses.ro: tainai ni nani ga aru yara dono yona   mono demo shirita mono wa arumai
verses.jp1: たいないになにがあるやらどのよふな
verses.jp2: ものでもしりたものわあるまい
verses.kanji: 体内に何が有るやらどの様な   者でも知りた者は有るまい
verses.en: Whoever you may be, you do not know what really exists inside your own body.

verses.en_6th_ed: About this talk: look at the workings of Tsukihi! There is no knowing what I shall do in accordance with your mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no shigoto kore o miyo   kokoro shidai ni nani o suru yara
verses.jp1: このはなし月日のし事これをみよ
verses.jp2: 心しだいになにをするやら
verses.kanji: この話月日の仕事これを見よ   心次第に何をするやら
verses.en: Now I am talking about the working of Tsukihi. Look at this! I will do whatever working which no one can foresee, in accordance with your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, being aware of nothing, all people remain in a common worldly state.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanimo shirazu ni tare nitemo   sekainami naru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにもしらすにたれにても
verses.jp2: せかいなみなる事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何も知らずに誰にても   世界並なる事で有れども
verses.en: Today knowing nothing about it, you are all worldly.

verses.en_6th_ed: But what path will be seen tomorrow? The core of your mind will become apparent.
verses.ro: asunichi wa doyu michi o miru yara na   shin no kokoro ga arawarete kuru
verses.jp1: あすにちハどふゆうみちをみるやらな
verses.jp2: しんの心があらわれてくる
verses.kanji: 明日日はどういう道を見るやらな   芯の心が現れて来る
verses.en: There is no knowing what way shall come into sight tomorrow. My working shall appear in accordance with the true core of your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this mind is fully apparent, no one will ever be able to turn away.
verses.ro: kono kokoro araware detaru koto naraba   tare mo somuki wa sarani dekemai
verses.jp1: この心あらわれでたる事ならば
verses.jp2: たれもそむきわさらにてけまい
verses.kanji: この心現れ出たる事ならば   誰も背きは更に出来まい
verses.en: When the working of God appears in accordance with each of your minds, no one shall be able to stand against it.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this is seen, all of you, whoever you may be, will bow your head and truly ponder.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   atama katagete mina shiyan suru
verses.jp1: これみたらどんなものでもしんちつに
verses.jp2: あたまかたけてみなしやんする
verses.kanji: これ見たらどんな者でも真実に   頭傾けて皆思案する
verses.en: When you look at this, you shall truly ponder over it with your head bent, whoever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now ponder! If only the settling of this mind is definitely accomplished...
verses.ro: sa shiyan kono kokoro sai shikkari to   sadame tsuitaru koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: さあしやんこの心さいしいかりと
verses.jp2: さだめついたる事であるなら
verses.kanji: さあ思案この心さい確りと   定め付いたる事で有るなら
verses.en: Now, ponder over it well! If only your mind is firmly determined,

verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is solely from the mind of Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no kokoro bakari ya de   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
verses.jp1: このはなし月日の心ばかりやで
verses.jp2: にんけん心あるとをもうな
verses.kanji: この話月日の心ばかりやで   人間心有ると思うな
verses.en: This talk is from none other than the mind of Tsukihi. Never think that I have a human mind!

verses.en_6th_ed: If all of you in the world pray with this thought sincerely held, you shall receive any blessing, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: kono koto o mina ichiretsu wa shinjitsu ni   omote tanomeba donna koto demo
verses.jp1: この事をみな一れつハしんちつに
verses.jp2: をもてたのめばどんな事でも
verses.kanji: この事を皆一列は真実に   思うて頼めばどんな事でも
verses.en: If all of you equally pray to Me with this belief, I will answer all your prayers, whatever they may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have worried about many things. But from tomorrow, a broad path will open.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanika shinpai shita naredo   asunichi kara wa okwan no michi
verses.jp1: 一けふまでわなにかしんばいしたなれど
verses.jp2: あすにちからわをふくハんのみち
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何か心配したなれど   明日日からは往還の道
verses.en: Until today you have experienced anxiety about everything. But from tomorrow you will come up to a broad way.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, because I foresaw all the paths of hardship, My words were filled with warnings.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna nanju na michisuji mo   miete aru kara kotowari bakari
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんななんぢうなみちすちも
verses.jp2: みへてあるからことわりばかり
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな難渋な道筋も   見えて有るから断りばかり
verses.en: Until now I have been solely warning you, because whatever way of hardships has always been in My sight.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, as it is Tsukihi who firmly assures you, there will be no danger in anything at all.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tashika ukeyau Tsukihi niwa   donna koto demo abunaki wa nai
verses.jp1: このさきハたしかうけやう月日にハ
verses.jp2: どんな事でもあふなきハない
verses.kanji: この先は確か請け合う月日には   どんな事でも危なきは無い
verses.en: Henceforth I, Tsukihi, will guarantee everything assuredly. So there shall remain nothing dangerous in whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever tidings you may hear step by step, rejoice all the world. They are the workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dandan to donna hanashi o kiita tote   sekai tanoshime Tsukihi hataraki
verses.jp1: たん／＼とどんなはなしをきいたとて
verses.jp2: せかいたのしめ月日はたらき
verses.kanji: 段々とどんな話を聞いたとて   世界楽しめ月日働き
verses.en: Whatever talks you may hear one after another, rejoice in them, all of you of the world! Because they are the working of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: The work that Tsukihi will go forth to do from now on: perhaps no one knows what it will be.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   nani o suru tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: これからわ月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp2: なにをするともたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: これからは月日出掛ける働きに   何をするとも誰も知ろまい
verses.en: From now on I, Tsukihi, will go forth to work. Perhaps no one knows what I will do.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, looking throughout the world, I feel pity for all My children.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sekai no tokoro misumaseba   ichiretsu kodomo ijirashii koto
verses.jp1: にち／＼にせかいのところみすませば
verses.jp2: 一れつこどもいぢらしい事
verses.kanji: 日々に世界の所見澄ませば   一列子供いじらしい事
verses.en: Looking through all the the regions of the world day by day, I feel deep pity for all My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: All the efforts of Tsukihi made step by step are solely to hasten preparations for your salvation.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan donna koto demo na   tasukeru moyo seku bakari ya de
verses.jp1: 月日にわたん／＼どんな事でもな
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふせくはかりやで
verses.kanji: 月日には段々どんな事でもな   救ける模様急くばかりやで
verses.en: Step by step I, Tsukihi, am single-heartedly hastening arrangements to save you from any and every suffering.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have given you nothing but warnings. From now on, there will be warnings no longer.
verses.ro: koremade wa kotowari bakari yute oita   mo korekara wa kotowari wa nai
verses.jp1: これまでハことわりはかりゆてをいた
verses.jp2: もふこれからハことハりわない
verses.kanji: これ迄は断りばかり言うて置いた   もうこれからは断りは無い
verses.en: Hitherto I have always given you warning and nothing else. But henceforth there shall be no more of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, being aware of nothing, you have used only the human mind and worried yourselves.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ningen no   kokoro bakari de shinpai o shita
verses.jp1: けふまでわなにもしらすににんけんの
verses.jp2: 心ばかりでしんはいをした
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何も知らずに人間の   心ばかりで心配をした
verses.en: Unil today, being aware of nothing, you have experienced anxiety only with human thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now, firmly replace that mind, lean on God, and do the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekaete   Kami ni motarete Yoki-zutome o
verses.jp1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp2: 神にもたれてよふきつとめを
verses.kanji: これからは心確り入れ替えて   神に凭れて陽気勤めを
verses.en: Henceforth replacing your mind definitely, lean upon God and thus perform the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service!

verses.en_6th_ed: When it is done, I shall directly reveal blessings clearly. Watch for them.
verses.ro: shitaru nara sono mama suguni shikkari to   riyaku arawasu kore o mite kure
verses.jp1: したるならそのまゝすくにしいかりと
verses.jp2: りやくあらわすこれをみてくれ
verses.kanji: したるならその侭直ぐに確りと   利益現すこれを見て呉れ
verses.en: Then at once I will assuredly manifest the divine grace. Look at this!

verses.en_6th_ed: If only the blessings are clearly seen, thereafter all will be the Kanrodai for all time.
verses.ro: kore saika tashika riyaku ga mieta nara   ato wa itsu demo mina Kanrodai
verses.jp1: これさいかたしかりやくがみへたなら
verses.jp2: あとわいつてもみなかんろふだい
verses.kanji: これさいか確か利益が見えたなら   後は何時でも皆甘露台
verses.en: If only this divine grace assuredly appears, thereafter the world of the  Kanrodai shall be realized at any moment on whatever kinds of matters.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, you shall not be able to turn away from whatever words Tsukihi once says.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi ichido yuta koto   donna koto demo somuki dekemai
verses.jp1: このさきわ月日一どふゆうた事
verses.jp2: どんな事でもそむきでけまい
verses.kanji: この先は月日一度言うた事   どんな事でも背き出来まい
verses.en: Henceforth you shall never be able to go against the words which I, Tsukihi, have once said.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you erase the words of Tsukihi, I shall withdraw at once. Beware!
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yutaru koto o kesu naraba   suguni shirizoku shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: 月日よりゆうたる事をけすならば
verses.jp2: すぐにしりぞくしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: 月日より言うたる事を消すならば   直ぐに退く承知して居よ
verses.en: If you put out the words which I, Tsukihi, have once said, I will withdraw from your body at once. Be forewarned!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, in the minds of those within and those of the world, there has been no true understanding.
verses.ro: imamade wa uchi mo sekai mo shinjitsu no   kokoro ni wakari sarani nai node
verses.jp1: いまゝでハうちもせかいもしんちつの
verses.jp2: 心にわかりさらにないので
verses.kanji: 今迄は内も世界も真実の   心に分かり更に無いので
verses.en: Until now both you familiar with Me, and other people of the world could not understand My intention at all in your true mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. If I could somehow make your minds clear...
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nanto kore oba sumashitaru nara
verses.jp1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp2: なんとこれをばすましたるなら
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   何とこれをば澄ましたるなら
verses.en: For Me, Tsukihi,this has been the cause of My utmost regret. If only I can make your minds clear,

verses.en_6th_ed: How can I bring understanding to your minds? In any case I must admonish you.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshita naraba wakaru yara   nandemo iken seneba naran de
verses.jp1: この心どふしたならばわかるやら
verses.jp2: なんてもいけんせねならんで
verses.kanji: この心どうしたならば分かるやら   何でも意見せねばならんで
verses.en: How can I make your minds understand Me? In any case I must admonish you.

verses.en_6th_ed: This admonition is not just for a few. As it concerns the hearts of so many, it is indeed difficult.
verses.ro: iken demo chotto no hito dewa nai karani   oku no mune ga kore wa mutsukashi
verses.jp1: いけんでも一寸の人でわないからに
verses.jp2: をふくのむねがこれわむつかし
verses.kanji: 意見でも一寸の人では無いからに   多くの胸がこれは難し
verses.en: It is not just a few people whom I must admonish. It is indeed very difficult to purify the hearts of numerous people.

verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult it may be, I shall admonish My children, one and all.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   meme no kodomo iken suru zo ya
verses.jp1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: めへ／＼のこどもいけんするぞや
verses.kanji: 如何程に難し事と言うたとて   銘々の子供意見するぞや
verses.en: However difficult it may be, I will admonish you because you are all My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: What is the best way to accomplish it? By all means, I shall manifest the regret of God.
verses.ro: kono moyo doshita naraba yokaro zo   nandemo Kami no zanen arawasu
verses.jp1: このもよふどふしたならばよかろふぞ
verses.jp2: なんでも神のさねんあらわす
verses.kanji: この模様どうしたならば良かろうぞ   何でも神の残念現す
verses.en: By what means can I accomplish this admonition? By all means I will manifest the regret of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day and step by step, the dust piles up and fills the heart of God.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no mune niwa dandan to   hokori ippai tsumori aredomo
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のむねにハたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ほこりいゝばいつもりあれども
verses.kanji: 日々に神の胸には段々と   埃一杯積り有れども
verses.en: Day by day, so much dust has gradually been piled up that regret fills the heart of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: This dust is difficult to sweep away. But if you only begin the Service...
verses.ro: kono hokori soji suru no wa mutsukashii   Tsutome nari tomo kakaritaru nara
verses.jp1: このほこりそふぢするのハむつかしい
verses.jp2: つとめなりともかゝりたるなら
verses.kanji: この埃掃除するのは難しい   勤めなりとも掛かりたるなら
verses.en: It is difficult to clear this dust away. But if you only begin to perform the Service,

verses.en_6th_ed: If only your minds are truly accepted by God, I shall sweep away any dust whatever.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu Kami ga uketoreba   donna hokori mo soji suru nari
verses.jp1: 心さいしんぢつ神がうけとれば
verses.jp2: どんなほこりもそふぢするなり
verses.kanji: 心さい真実神が受け取れば   どんな埃も掃除するなり
verses.en: If only I, God, accept the sincerity of your mind, I will sweep away any and every dust, whatever it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only the innermost hearts of all humankind are swept clean,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no mune no uchi sai sukiyaka ni   soji shitateta koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: いちれつのむねのうちさいすきやかに
verses.jp2: そふちしたてた事であるなら
verses.kanji: 一列の胸の内さい清きやかに   掃除仕立てた事で有るなら
verses.en: If only I accomplish this sweeping of dust from the inner-most hearts of all of you,

verses.en_6th_ed: Then, the whole world will be spirited and joyousness will come of its own accord.
verses.ro: sorekara wa sekaiju wa ki ga isamu   yokizukume ni hitori naru zo ya
verses.jp1: それからわせかいぢううハきがいさむ
verses.jp2: よふきづくめにひとりなるぞや
verses.kanji: それからは世界中は気が勇む   陽気ずくめに独りなるぞや
verses.en: Thereafter all people of the whole world shall become cheered up, and this world shall become full of joy of its own accord.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! From the high mountains to the low valleys, I see no one but Tsukihi's children.
verses.ro: shikato kike takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   mireba Tsukihi no kodomo bakari ya
verses.jp1: しかときけ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: みれば月日のこどもばかりや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け高山にても谷底も   見れば月日の子供ばかりや
verses.en: Listen attentively! Looking over the high mountains and into the bottoms of the valleys, I, Tsukihi, find no one but My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: You human beings must all love your children. From this, please think of the regret of God.
verses.ro: ningen mo ichiretsu kodomo kawaikaro   Kami no zannen kore omote kure
verses.jp1: にんけんも一れつこともかハいかろ
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんこれをもてくれ
verses.kanji: 人間も一列子供可愛かろ   神の残念これ思うて呉れ
verses.en: Every one of you human beings must be loving your own children. From that feel for the regret of God!

verses.en_6th_ed: Hitherto, no matter what had been seen, God only looked on, keeping still.
verses.ro: koremade wa dono yona koto o mita totemo   Kami no ho niwa jitto mite ita
verses.jp1: これまてハどのよな事をみたとても
verses.jp2: 神のほふにハぢいとみていた
verses.kanji: これ迄はどの様な事を見たとても   神の方にはじっと見て居た
verses.en: Hitherto, whatever I may have seen, I, God, have overlooked it keeping quiet.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as the day is pressing, I shall speak out on everything, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna koto demo mina yu hodoni
verses.jp1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp2: どんな事でもみなゆうほどに
verses.kanji: この度はもう日が詰んで有るからな   どんな事でも皆言う程に
verses.en: But this time as the day is pressing, I will tell you any and everything, whatever it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi looks all over the world, there is no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju o miwatasedo   moto hajimari o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: 月日にわせかいぢううをみハたせど
verses.jp2: もとはじまりをしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 月日には世界中を見渡せど   元初まりを知りた者無し
verses.en: Looking all over the whole world, I, Tsukihi, find no one who knows the truth about the creation.

verses.en_6th_ed: Desiring to teach this origin to the world by all means, Tsukihi has become revealed.
verses.ro: kono moto o dozo sekai e oshietasa   sokode Tsukihi ga arawarete deta
verses.jp1: このもとをどふぞせかいへをしへたさ
verses.jp2: そこで月日があらわれてゞた
verses.kanji: この元をどうぞ世界へ教えたさ   そこで月日が現れて出た
verses.en: From My earnest desire to teach this origin to all people of the world, I, Tsukihi, have revealed Myself.

verses.en_6th_ed: About the regret of Tsukihi at this time: know that it is not a small matter.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsukihi zanen to yu mono wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このたびの月日ざねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この度の月日残念と言うものは   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.en: This time the regret of Tsukihi is not a slight one. Understand it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi desires to teach this truth throughout the world by all means.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   doshite nari to oshietai kara
verses.jp1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかへぢうゑ
verses.jp2: どふしてなりとをしへたいから
verses.kanji: 月日にはこの真実を世界中へ   どうしてなりと教えたいから
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, desire to teach this truth to all people of the whole world by all means.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of it, you erase all the words of Tsukihi, and all that remains is rampant human thinking.
verses.ro: sore shirazu Tsukihi yu koto mina keshite   ato wa ningen gokoro habikaru
verses.jp1: それしらず月日ゆう事みなけして
verses.jp2: あとわにんけん心はびかる
verses.kanji: それ知らず月日言う事皆消して   後は人間心蔓延る
verses.en: Unaware of this, you put out all the words of Tsukihi, and thereafter only selfish human thoughts grow rampant.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall clear away all the regret and anger of Tsukihi. Are you aware of it?
verses.ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku o   mina harasu de na kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp1: このさきハ月日のざねんりいふくを
verses.jp2: みなはらすでなこれがしよちか
verses.kanji: この先は月日の残念立腹を   皆晴らすでなこれが承知か
verses.en: Henceforth I will clear away all the regret and anger of Tsukihi. Are you well aware of it?

verses.en_6th_ed: After the regret and anger of Tsukihi are cleared away, I shall open a marvelous path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo zanen rippuku harashitara   ato wa mezurashi michi o tsukeru de
verses.jp1: 月日にもざねんりいふくはらしたら
verses.jp2: あとハめづらしみちをつけるで
verses.kanji: 月日にも残念立腹晴らしたら   後は珍し道を付けるで
verses.en: When the regret and anger of Tsukihi is cleared away, I will open a remarkable way.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this path is to be? It is solely mutual help among all people in all matters.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   yorozu tagaini tasuke bakari o
verses.jp1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: よろづたがいにたすけばかりを
verses.kanji: この道はどういう事に思うかな   万互いに救けばかりを
verses.en: What do you think this way is? It is a way solely to help each other in any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: If all the world comes to help one another, Tsukihi will accept all your minds.
verses.ro: sekaiju tagaini tasuke suru naraba   Tsukihi mo kokoro mina hikiukeru
verses.jp1: せかいぢうたがいにたすけするならば
verses.jp2: 月日も心みなひきうける
verses.kanji: 世界中互いに救けするならば   月日も心皆引き受ける
verses.en: If all people of the whole world help each other, I, Tsukihi, will heartily take charge of any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: If Tsukihi accepts your minds, I shall work in all matters whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo kokoro hikiuke suru kara wa   donna koto demo hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: 月日にも心ひきうけするからわ
verses.jp2: どんな事でもはたらきをする
verses.kanji: 月日にも心引き受けするからは   どんな事でも働きをする
verses.en: When I, Tsukihi, heartily take charge of, I will work My omnipotence on whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this working is to be? It is solely to distinguish between good and evil.
verses.ro: hataraki mo doyu koto ni omou kana   zen to aku to o wakeru bakari ya
verses.jp1: はたらきもどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: 善とあくとをわけるばかりや
verses.kanji: 働きもどういう事に思うかな   善と悪とを分けるばかりや
verses.en: What do you think of My workings? They are solely workings to distinguish good from evil.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, whatever wrongdoing there is said to be, perhaps none of you has known of it on your body.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna akuji to yuta tote   waga mi ni shirita mono wa arumai
verses.jp1: けふまでわどんなあくじとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: わがみにしりたものハあるまい
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな悪事と言うたとて   我が身に知りた者は有るまい
verses.en: Until today, whatever wrongdoing one may commit, no one has ever known how it shall appear in one's own body.

verses.en_6th_ed: God will teach you the truth about this. Ponder over it, all of you.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Kami ga shinjitsu yute kikasu   mina ichiretsu wa shiyan shite kure
verses.jp1: この心神がしんぢつゆてきかす
verses.jp2: みないちれつわしやんしてくれ
verses.kanji: この心神が真実言うて聞かす   皆一列は思案して呉れ
verses.en: I, God, will truly tell you about this kind of mind. Please ponder over it deeply, all of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: All of you throughout the world are brothers and sisters. There should be no one called an outsider.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu wa mina kyodai ya   tanin to yu wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: せかいぢういちれつわみなきよたいや
verses.jp2: たにんとゆうわさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: 世界中一列は皆兄弟や   他人と言うは更に無いぞや
verses.en: All people of the whole world are equally brothers and sisters. There is no one who is an utter stranger.

verses.en_6th_ed: That there is no one who knows the origin of this is the very cause of the regret of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node na   sore ga Tsukihi no zanen bakari ya
verses.jp1: このもとをしりたるものハないのでな
verses.jp2: それが月日のざねんばかりや
verses.kanji: この元を知りたる者は無いのでな   それが月日の残念ばかりや
verses.en: There is no one who has known the truth of this origin. It is the very cause of the regret of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Those living in the high mountains and those living in the low valleys: their souls are all the same.
verses.ro: takayama ni kurashite irumo tanisoko ni   kurashite irumo onashi tamahii
verses.jp1: 高山にくらしているもたにそこに
verses.jp2: くらしているもをなしたまひい
verses.kanji: 高山に暮らして居るも谷底に   暮らして居るも同じ魂
verses.en: The souls of all people are equal, whether they live on the high mountains or at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.en_6th_ed: Furthermore, the instruments you use daily are all things lent by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: soreyori mo dandan tsukau dogu wa na   mina Tsukihi yori kashimono naru zo
verses.jp1: それよりもたん／＼つかうどふぐわな
verses.jp2: みな月日よりかしものなるぞ
verses.kanji: それよりも段々使う道具はな   皆月日より貸し物なるぞ
verses.en: Furthermore, the instruments which you daily use are things which I, Tsukihi, lend you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, the thought in the minds of all human beings is that there are the high and the low.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ningen no kokoro dewa   nando takabiku aru to omote
verses.jp1: それしらすみなにんけんの心でわ
verses.jp2: なんどたかびくあるとをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆人間の心では   なんぞ高低有ると思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, through human mind you all have the misconception that there is discrimination between high and low.

verses.en_6th_ed: By all means, Tsukihi desires to make the truth of this matter clearly understood by the whole world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari shochi sashitai
verses.jp1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかいぢうへ
verses.jp2: どふぞしいかりしよちさしたい
verses.kanji: 月日にはこの真実を世界中へ   どうぞ確り承知さしたい
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, earnestly desire to make people of the whole world clearly understand this truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only this is clearly understood, the root of rebellion will be cut off.
verses.ro: kore saika tashikani shochi shita naraba   muhon no ne wa kirete shimau ni
verses.jp1: これさいかたしかにしよちしたならば
verses.jp2: むほんのねへわきれてしまうに
verses.kanji: これさいか確かに承知したならば   謀反の根は切れてしまうに
verses.en: If only you can clearly understand this truth, the root of rebellion shall be entirely cut off.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi sincerely desires only to end the wars among those on the high mountains.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu omou takayama no   tatakai saika osametaru nara
verses.jp1: 月日よりしんぢつをもう高山の
verses.jp2: たゝかいさいかをさめたるなら
verses.kanji: 月日より真実思う高山の   戦いさいか治めたるなら
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, sincerely desire to settle the war among the people on the high mountains.

verses.en_6th_ed: By what means can they be ended? If only you set forth on the Joyous Service...
verses.ro: kono moyo doshita naraba osamaro   Yoki-zutome ni detaru koto nara
verses.jp1: このもよふどふしたならばをさまろふ
verses.jp2: よふきづとめにでたる事なら
verses.kanji: この模様どうしたならば治まろう   陽気勤めに出たる事なら
verses.en: With what arrangements can it be settled? Peace shall come, if only you go forth to perform the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder from whose mind these words come. They are solely from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono kokoro tare ga yu towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp1: この心たれがゆうとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.kanji: この心誰が言うとは思うなよ   月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.en: Never wonder from whom these words come! They come from none other than the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is difficult to do this Service because of the high mountains, but God gives you firm assurance.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome takayama nitewa mutsukashii   Kami ga shikkari hikiuke o suru
verses.jp1: このつとめ高山にてハむつかしい
verses.jp2: 神がしいかりひきうけをする
verses.kanji: この勤め高山にては難しい   神が確り引き受けをする
verses.en: This Service may be interfered with by those on the high mountains. But God will assuredly take charge of its performance.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, in all matters, I shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo shinjitsu ni   tashika ukeyai hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: このたびわどんな事でもしんちつに
verses.jp2: たしかうけやいはたらきをする
verses.kanji: この度はどんな事でも真実に   確か請け合い働きをする
verses.en: This time I will truly and assuredly guarantee it and work My omnipotence, despite whatever kinds of things that may occur.

verses.en_6th_ed: When God goes forth and works throughout the world, there will be nothing to fear in doing any Service.
verses.ro: Kami ga dete sekaiju o hatarakeba   donna Tsutome mo kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 神がでゝせかいぢううをはたらけば
verses.jp2: どんなつとめもこハみないぞや
verses.kanji: 神が出て世界中を働けば   どんな勤めも怖み無いぞや
verses.en: When I, God, rush out to the fore and work all over the world, any and every Service can be performed without fear.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! Though the high mountains, boastful, have done as they pleased to the low valleys,
verses.ro: shikato kike takayama ya tote tanisoko o   mamani shirareta koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: しかときけ高山やとてたにそこを
verses.jp2: まゝにしられた事であれども
verses.kanji: 確と聞け高山やとて谷底を   侭にしられた事で有れども
verses.en: Listen attentively! Although the people on the high mountains have hitherto done as they please to the people at the bottoms of the valleys,

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, Tsukihi shall come out in their place. Let them try to do as they please if they dare.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi kawari ni deru hodoni   mamani shiyo nara sureba shite miyo
verses.jp1: これからわ月日かハりにでるほどに
verses.jp2: まゝにしよならすればしてみよ
verses.kanji: これからは月日代わりに出る程に   侭にしようならすればして見よ
verses.en: From now on, I, Tsukihi, will go forth instead of them. Let them act as they please, if they think it possible!

verses.en_6th_ed: Everything will be different from what it has been until now. From now on, it will be as God intends.
verses.ro: imamade to nanika monku ga chigau de na   korekara saki wa Kami no mama ya de
verses.jp1: いまゝでとなにかもんくがちがうてな
verses.jp2: これからさきハ神のまゝやで
verses.kanji: 今迄と何か文句が違うでな   これから先は神の侭やで
verses.en: The state of everything shall be changed from what it has been so far. In the future everything shall be realized as I, God, intend.

verses.en_6th_ed: Perhaps no one knows the intention of Tsukihi in descending from Heaven.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori amakudari taru kokoro na   nanno koto yara tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: 月日よりあまくだりたる心な
verses.jp2: なんの事やらたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 月日より天下りたる心はな   何の事やら誰も知ろまい
verses.en: Perhaps no one knows My intention, why I, God, have descended from Heaven.

verses.en_6th_ed: First, to help those who grow crops, I desired to teach you on the matter of the fertilizer.
verses.ro: daiichi wa ryuke tsukuru o tasuketasa   koe ichijo o oshietai kara
verses.jp1: 大一わりゆうけつくるをたすけたさ
verses.jp2: こゑ一ぢよふをしへたいから
verses.kanji: 第一は立毛作るを救けたさ   肥一条を教えたいから
verses.en: First, to help you cultivate crops, I desired to teach you on the matter of the fertilizer.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder why the fertilizer is effective. If only God accepts your mind...
verses.ro: koe demo na doshite kiku to omouna yo   kokoro o Kami ga uketorita nara
verses.jp1: こゑてもなどふしてきくとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: こゝろを神がうけとりたなら
verses.kanji: 肥でもなどうして効くと思うなよ   心を神が受け取りたなら
verses.en: Never wonder why the divine fertilizer is so effective! If only I, God, accept your mind,

verses.en_6th_ed: Though God has been speaking the truth until now, even those within only have doubts.
verses.ro: imamade wa shinjitsu Kami ga yute aredo   uchi kara shitemo utagau bakari
verses.jp1: いまゝてハしんぢつ神がゆてあれど
verses.jp2: うちからしてもうたがうはかり
verses.kanji: 今迄は真実神が言うて有れど   内からしても疑うばかり
verses.en: Although I, God, have hitherto been speaking the truth, even you familiar with me have always entertained a doubt.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, do not doubt whatever I say. If you doubt, Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nani o yutemo utagau na   kore utagaeba Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: 此のたびハなにをゆうてもうたがうな
verses.jp2: これうたがへば月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: この度は何を言うても疑うな   これ疑えば月日退く
verses.en: This time, never doubt whatever I say! If you doubt, I, God, will withdraw.

verses.en_6th_ed: I repeat this to you tediously. If you doubt, you will truly repent it.
verses.ro: kono koto wa akudoi hodomo yute oku   kore utagaeba makoto kokwai
verses.jp1: この事ハあくどいほともゆうてをく
verses.jp2: これうたがへばまことこふくハい
verses.kanji: この事はあくどい程も言うて置く   これ疑えば誠後悔
verses.en: This matter I repeat to you so tediously that it may seem excessive. If you doubt it, you will indeed repent of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: What Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori ichido yute oita koto   itsu ni naritemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: 月日より一どふゆうてをいた事
verses.jp2: いつになりてもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 月日より一度言うて置いた事   何時になりても違う事無し
verses.en: What I, Tsukihi, have once said shall never fail forever.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, all of you have only doubted whatever Tsukihi said, always erasing it by your words.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi nani goto yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ月日なに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日何事言うたとて   皆疑うて言う消すばかり
verses.en: Until now, whatever I, Tsukihi, may have said, all of you have only doubted and always put it out with your words.

verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. I shall correct this matter by all means.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nandemo kore o shikato kimeru de
verses.jp1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp2: なんでもこれをしかときめるで
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   何でもこれを確と決めるで
verses.en: This is the prime regret of Tsukihi. By all means I will settle this matter definitely.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, you must not turn away from whatever Tsukihi says. You must lean on God.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi yu koto nani goto mo   somukan yoni Kami ni motare yo
verses.jp1: これからハ月日ゆう事なに事も
verses.jp2: そむかんよふに神にもたれよ
verses.kanji: これからは月日言う事何事も   背かん様に神に凭れよ
verses.en: Henceforth never go against whatever I, Tsukihi, say! You must lean upon God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Then I, God, shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
verses.ro: shitaru nara Kami no ho nimo shinjitsu ni   tashika hikiuke hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: したるなら神のほふにもしんちつに
verses.jp2: たしかひきうけはたらきをする
verses.kanji: したるなら神の方にも真実に   確か引き受け働きをする
verses.en: If you do so, on My side I, God, will surely take charge of and manifest My working.

verses.en_6th_ed: As Tsukihi persuades you to such a degree, if your mind is in error, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kora hodo kudoki tsumeru kara   kokoro chigaeba suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: 月日にハこらほどくどきつめるから
verses.jp2: 心ちがゑばすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: 月日にはこら程口説き詰めるから   心違えば直ぐに退ぞく
verses.en: As I, Tsukihi, have repeatedly tried to persuade you to this degree; if your mind should err, I will withdraw at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: If your mind is truly sincere, there will never be a failure in any salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni makoto aru naraba   donna tasuke mo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: しんちつに心にまことあるならば
verses.jp2: どんなたすけもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 真実に心に誠有るならば   どんな救けも違う事無し
verses.en: If there is true sincerity in your mind, any and every salvation shall be realized without fail.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, in order that there be no failure in the fertilizer for the crops, please understand Me clearly.
verses.ro: konosaki wa ryuke no koe o chigawan yo   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: このさきハりゆけのこへをちがハんよ
verses.jp2: どふぞしいかりしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: この先は立毛の肥を違わん様   どうぞ確り承知して呉れ
verses.en: Henceforth you must clearly understand My teachings and not err in the fertilizer for the crops.

verses.en_6th_ed: From today, I shall begin to tell you the thoughts of Tsukihi on all matters whatever.
verses.ro: kyokara wa Tsukihi no omou koto oba na   dono yona koto mo mina yuikakeru
verses.jp1: けふからわ月日のをもう事をばな
verses.jp2: どのよな事もみなゆいかける
verses.kanji: 今日からは月日の思う事をばな   どの様な事も皆言い掛ける
verses.en: From today I will begin to speak any and everything which I, Tsukihi, am intending.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now I have told you almost everything, I have not yet told you Tsukihi's intention.
verses.ro: imamade mo taite hanashi mo toitaredo   Tsukihi omowaku mada yute nai
verses.jp1: いまゝでもたいてはなしもといたれど
verses.jp2: 月日をもハくまだゆうてない
verses.kanji: 今迄も大抵話も説いたれど   月日思惑未だ言うて無い
verses.en: Until now I have already told you almost everything. Yet I, Tsukihi, have not told of My intention.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, whatever talks I may give, never think that they are false.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna hanashi o shitaru tomo   kore o kanarazu uso to omouna
verses.jp1: これからハどんなはなしをしたるとも
verses.jp2: これをかならすうそをもうな
verses.kanji: これからはどんな話をしたるとも   これを必ず嘘と思うな
verses.en: Henceforth, whatever I may tell you, never take it to be false!

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I shall say, for the mind of Tsukihi hastens.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   Tsukihi no kokoro sete iru kara
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうやらしれんてな
verses.jp2: 月日の心せゑているから
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うやら知れんでな   月日の心急いて居るから
verses.en: There is no knowing whatever kinds of things I will say, because the mind of Tsukihi hastens impatiently.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think My thoughts are about? They are about Nihon, Kara, and Tenjiku.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doyu koto ni omou kana   nihon mo kara mo tenjiku made mo
verses.jp1: この心どふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: にほんもからもてんちくまでも
verses.kanji: この心どういう事に思うかな   日本も唐も天竺迄も
verses.en: What do you think of this mind? I, Tsukihi, hasten to save equally all the people in the regions where My teachings spread early, later and last.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though there are many leagues in between, I shall work even in a single night.
verses.ro: kono aida michinori yohodo aru keredo   ichiya no ma nimo hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: このあいだみちのりよほどあるけれど
verses.jp2: いちやのまにもはたらきをする
verses.kanji: この間道程余程有るけれど   一夜の間にも働きをする
verses.en: Although there is a long distance to cover, I will work My omnipotence even in a single night.

verses.en_6th_ed: What are you humans thinking of this talk? Your bodies are things lent by Tsukihi and you are all children of Mine.
verses.ro: kono hanashi ningen nanto omote iru   Tsukihi kashimono mina waga kodomo
verses.jp1: このはなしにんけんなんとをもている
verses.jp2: 月日かしものみなわがこども
verses.kanji: この話人間何と思うて居る   月日貸し物皆我が子供
verses.en: What are you human beings thinking of this talk? All of your bodies are things which I have lent and you are all My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: So long as Tsukihi keeps still, there will be no hope of a settling.
verses.ro: itsumade mo Tsukihi jikkuri shite ireba   itsu ni naritemo osamaru me nashi
verses.jp1: いつまでも月日ぢいくりしていれば
verses.jp2: いつになりてもをさまるめなし
verses.kanji: 何時迄も月日じっくりしていれば   何時になりても治まる目無し
verses.en: If I, Tsukihi, keep still without hurry, peace shall never come.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, Tsukihi will go forth to work. There is no one who knows where I shall go.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   doko e deru yara shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp2: とこへでるやらしりたものなし
verses.kanji: それ故に月日出掛ける働きに   何処へ出るやら知りた者無し
verses.en: Therefore I, Tsukihi, will go forth and manifest My working. No one can foresee where I am going to work.

verses.en_6th_ed: I say that I shall purify all minds throughout the world. Never think of it as a small matter.
verses.ro: sekaiju kokoro sumasu to yu kara wa   chotto no koto ya to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: せかいぢう心すますとゆうからわ
verses.jp2: 一寸の事やとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 世界中心澄ますと言うからは   一寸の事やと更に思うな
verses.en: I say that I will purify the minds throughout the world. Do not think that this is a trivial matter!

verses.en_6th_ed: In whatever matters, if the innermost heart of each of you is purified, there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo meme mune no uchi   sumashita naraba abunaki wa nai
verses.jp1: どのよふな事てもめへ／＼むねのうち
verses.jp2: すましたならばあふなきわない
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも銘々胸の内   澄ましたならば危な気は無い
verses.en: Whatever kinds of things may occur, if each of you has purified your innermost heart, there shall be nothing dangerous.

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the thought of Tsukihi is only to wait for a large number of people to come to Me step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsukihi nichinichi omowaku wa   oku no hito o matsu bakari ya de
verses.jp1: たん／＼と月日にち／＼をもハくわ
verses.jp2: をふくの人をまつばかりやで
verses.kanji: 段々と月日日々思惑は   多くの人を待つばかりやで
verses.en: Step by step and day after day, the intention of Tsukihi is only to wait expecting a huge number of people to gather.

verses.en_6th_ed: The reason I am waiting for these people is that I desire to save all of My children in the world.
verses.ro: kono hito o doyu koto de matsu naraba   ichiretsu waga ko tasuketai kara
verses.jp1: この人をどふゆう事でまつならば
verses.jp2: 一れつわがこたすけたいから
verses.kanji: この人をどういう事で待つならば   一列我が子救けたいから
verses.en: You may wonder why I am waiting so eagerly for them. It is because I desire to save all of My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: You cannot know what a marvelous path will come into sight this year.
verses.ro: kotoshi niwa donna mezurashi michisuji ga   miete kuru yara kore shiren de na
verses.jp1: ことしにハどんなめづらしみちすじが
verses.jp2: みゑてくるやらこれしれんてな
verses.kanji: 今年にはどんな珍し道筋が   見えて来るやらこれ知れんでな
verses.en: It is impossible to know beforehand what a remarkable way shall come into sight this year.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how I try to tell you the truth by words, there is no one who understands.
verses.ro: kuchi saki de nanbo shinjitsu yuta tote   tare ka kikiwake suru mono wa nai
verses.jp1: 口さきでなんほしんちつゆうたとて
verses.jp2: たれかきゝわけするものハない
verses.kanji: 口先で何ぼ真実言うたとて   誰か聞き分けする者は無い
verses.en: However earnestly I may try to persuade you of the truth by mouth, no one listens and understands Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, Tsukihi will at this time demonstrate the truth for you in all matters.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi konotabi dono yona   koto mo shinjitsu mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日このたびどのよふな
verses.jp2: 事もしんちつみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: それ故に月日この度どの様な   事も真実皆して見せる
verses.en: Therefore this time I, Tsukihi, will realize any and every-thing to show you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do, never think that there is any human mind mixed in it.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o shitaru mo ningen no   kokoro majiru to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をしたるもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心まぢるとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: どの様な事をしたるも人間の   心混じると更に思うな
verses.en: Whatever I may do, you must not think that there is any human mind mixed in it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi cannot bear to look on any longer. That is why I shall work in all matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa amari shinjitsu mikaneru de   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp1: 月日にハあまりしんぢつみかねるで
verses.jp2: そこでとのよな事もするのや
verses.kanji: 月日には余り真実見兼ねるで   そこでどの様な事もするのや
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, can no longer remain a mere spectator, so I am going to work whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: However strong or youthful you may be, never think that such a condition is reliable.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki tarumo wakaki demo   kore o tayori to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: いかほどのごうてきたるもハかきても
verses.jp2: これをたよりとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 如何程の強敵たるも若きでも   これを頼りと更に思うな
verses.en: However strong or youthful you may be, never think that such a condition is reliable!

verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, God is openly revealed and speaks to you freely without restriction.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i arawarete   juyojizai ni hanashi suru kara
verses.jp1: このたびハ神がをもていあらハれて
verses.jp2: ぢうよぢざいにはなしするから
verses.kanji: この度は神が表へ現れて   自由自在に話するから
verses.en: This time I, God, reveal Myself to the fore, and speak to you freely and unrestrictedly.

verses.en_6th_ed: As I shall work in truth in all matters, your innermost heart will, of itself, be made clear.
verses.ro: donoyo na koto mo shinjitsu suru kara wa   mune no uchi yori hitori sumikiru
verses.jp1: どのよふな事もしんぢつするからハ
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりひとりすみきる
verses.kanji: どの様な事も真実するからは   胸の内より独り澄み切る
verses.en: As I manifest any and everything truly and really, all of you shall become naturally purified from your innermost hearts.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, all humankind has been pondering only with the human mind.
verses.ro: imamade wa ichiretsu wa mina ningen no   kokoro bakari de shiyan shitaredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ一れつハみなにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心ばかりてしやんしたれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は一列は皆人間の   心ばかりで思案したれど
verses.en: Until now all of you have been pondering only with human thoughts.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, there is no need at all to ponder with the human mind on any matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo ningen no   kokoro shiyan wa sarani iran de
verses.jp1: このたびわどのよな事もにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心しやんわさらにいらんで
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な事も人間の   心思案は更に要らんで
verses.en: This time there is no need at all to ponder with human thoughts, on whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall tell you any and everything. Whatever I say, never take it to be false.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo yute oku   nani o yutemo uso to omouna
verses.jp1: なにもかもとのよな事もゆうてをく
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもうそとをもうな
verses.kanji: 何もかもどの様な事も言うて置く   何を言うても嘘と思うな
verses.en: I will tell you any and everything beforehand. Never take it to be a falsehood, whatever I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever kind of people may be rampant on the high mountains, no one knows the truth.
verses.ro: takayama de dono yona mono ga habikaru mo   kono shinjitsu o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: 高山でとのよなものがはびかるも
verses.jp2: このしんちつをたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 高山でどの様な者が蔓延るも   この真実を誰も知るまい
verses.en: Whatever kind of people may be rampant on the high mountains perhaps no one knows the true meaning of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Wherever you may be, Tsukihi clearly sees your innermost heart.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   mune no uchi oba shikato mite iru
verses.jp1: 月日にわどんなところにいるものも
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばしかとみている
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな所に居る者も   胸の内をば確と見て居る
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, clearly see your innermost hearts, wherever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: If your innermost heart accords with the mind of Tsukihi, I shall exert Myself in your favor forever.
verses.ro: mune no uchi Tsukihi kokoro ni kanotara   itsu made nari to shikato funbaru
verses.jp1: むねのうち月日心にかのふたら
verses.jp2: いつまでなりとしかとふんばる
verses.kanji: 胸の内月日心に適うたら   何時迄なりと確と踏ん張る
verses.en: If only your innermost heart is in accordance with the mind of Tsukihi, I will firmly exert Myself to protect you forever.

verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day. Yet there is no understanding in the minds of you close to Me.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   soba no kokoro ni wakari nai node
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめど
verses.jp2: そばの心にわかりないので
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心急き込めど   側の心に分かり無いので
verses.en: Although the mind of Tsukihi hastens so impatiently day by day, the minds of you close to Me do not understand it.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think My hastening is about? If you grow crops, you may be in need of water.
verses.ro: sekikomi mo nanino koto ya to omou kana   ryuke tsukureba mizu ga hoshikaro
verses.jp1: せきこみもなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: りゆけつくれば水がほしかろ
verses.kanji: 急き込みも何の事やと思うかな   立毛作れば水が欲しかろ
verses.en: On what matter do you think I hasten? When you grow crops, you may be in need of water.

verses.en_6th_ed: In the minds of all of you, with what thoughts are you pondering over this talk?
verses.ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu no kokoro niwa   nanto omote shiyan shite iru
verses.jp1: このはなしみな一れつの心にわ
verses.jp2: なんとをもふてしやんしている
verses.kanji: この話皆一列の心には   何と思うて思案して居る
verses.en: With what thoughts are the minds of all of you thinking over this talk?

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi desires first to help you in your needs. That is why I speak of all things whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore o tasuketasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
verses.jp1: 月日にわ大一これをたすけたさ
verses.jp2: そこでどのよな事もゆうのや
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これを救けたさ   そこでどの様な事も言うのや
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, desire to save you first from those hardships. Thereupon I say whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how Tsukihi tries to persuade you of all matters, no one listens to My words as the truth.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi ika hodo kudoitemo   makoto ni kiite kureru mono nashi
verses.jp1: なにもかも月日いかほどくどいても
verses.jp2: まことにきいてくれるものなし
verses.kanji: 何もかも月日如何程口説いても   誠に聞いて呉れる者無し
verses.en: On whatever kinds of things, however repeatedly I may try to persuade, no one listens to My words as the truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, the regret and anger of Tsukihi have piled up like a mountain.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi no zanen rippuku ga   yamayama tsumori kasanarite aru
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日のざねんりいふくが
verses.jp2: 山／＼つもりかさなりてある
verses.kanji: それ故に月日の残念立腹が   山々積り重なりて有る
verses.en: Therefore the regret and anger of Tsukihi has piled up like a mountain.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, as the month and day has not yet come, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi kitaran soreyue ni   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ月日きたらんそれゆへに
verses.jp2: ぢいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日来たらんそれ故に   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.en: Until now months and days have not yet come, so I have continued to keep still.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as the time is pressing, I shall quickly begin any work whatever.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna shigoto mo hayaku kakaru de
verses.jp1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp2: とんなしごともはやくかゝるで
verses.kanji: この度はもう日が詰んで有るからな   どんな仕事も早く掛かるで
verses.en: But this time, as the day is pressing, I will quickly begin whatever kind of work.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, on whatever path you may find yourself, never bear a grudge against others. Reproach yourself.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona michi ga aru totemo   hito o uramina waga mi urami ya
verses.jp1: このさきわどのよなみちがあるとても
verses.jp2: 人をうらみなハがみうらみや
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な道が有るとても   人を恨みな我が身恨みや
verses.en: Henceforth, whatever kinds of ways may appear, never bear a grudge against others, but only reproach yourself!

verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is not for a particular place. It is for the high mountains as well as for the low valleys.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   takayama nitemo tanisoko made mo
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんでな
verses.jp2: 高山にてもたにそこまても
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   高山にても谷底迄も
verses.en: I never make this talk, indicating anyone in particular. It applies equally to both the people on the high mountains and the people at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.en_6th_ed: Everything I say is from My desire to save you. That is the reason for My various and repeated persuasions.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo tasuketasa   sokode iroiro kudoki tsumeta de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうのもたすけたさ
verses.jp2: そこていろ／＼くどきつめたで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うのも救けたさ   そこで色々口説き詰めたで
verses.en: It is simply because I desire to save all of you that I say whatever kinds of things. Therefore I have earnestly tried to persuade you to My utmost in various ways.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, know that in whatever I say and in whatever matters, I say nothing evil.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo dono yona   koto demo ashiki koto wa yuwan de
verses.jp1: このさきわなにをゆうてもとのよふな
verses.jp2: 事でもあしき事わゆハんで
verses.kanji: この先は何を言うてもどの様な   事でも悪しき事は言わんで
verses.en: Henceforth, whatever kinds of things I may say, I will never speak of anything evil.

verses.en_6th_ed: The reason I admonished you step by step is only that I hasten for your true salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no tasuke bakari o seku karani   sokode dandan iken shita no ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつのたすけばかりをせくからに
verses.jp2: そこでたん／＼いけんしたのや
verses.kanji: 真実の救けばかりを急くからに   そこで段々意見したのや
verses.en: As I am hastening single-heartedly the true salvation, I have often admonished you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Once your mind has become truly purified, I shall quickly teach you the means to salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro sumashita sono ue wa   tasukeru moyo hayaku oshieru
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心すましたそのゆへわ
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふはやくをしへる
verses.kanji: 真実に心澄まするその故は   救ける模様早く教える
verses.en: After you have truly purified your minds, I will quickly teach you the way of salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what this salvation is about: it is the Service for the protection against smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto de aru naraba   hoso sen yono Mamori Tsutome o
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよのまむりつとめを
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事で有るならば   疱瘡せん様の守り勤めを
verses.en: You may wonder what salvation this is. It is the Service for the Mamori, the Amulet, to protect you against smallpox.

verses.en_6th_ed: Another salvation: I desire quickly to give you the Proof-Amulet that protects you from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: mata tasuke yamazu shinazu ni yowaran no   Shoko Mamori o hayaku yaritai
verses.jp1: またたすけやますしなずによハらんの
verses.jp2: しよこまむりをはやくやりたい
verses.kanji: また救け病まず死なずに弱らんの   証拠守りを早くやりたい
verses.en: One more salvation: I desire quickly to bestow on you the Shoko-Mamori, the Amulet in proof of returning to the Jiba, to protect you against falling ill, dying or becoming weak.

verses.en_6th_ed: As I am hastening universal salvation, I shall work in all matters according to your mind.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo yorozu tasuke o seku karani   kokoro shidai ni donna koto demo
verses.jp1: なにもかもよろづたすけをせくからに
verses.jp2: 心したいにどんな事ても
verses.kanji: 何もかも万救けを急くからに   心次第にどんな事でも
verses.en: As I am impatiently hastening any and every salvation,I will save you on whatever things in accordance with your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: All humankind, everything depends on the heart of each of you. There is nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina meme no mune shidai   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp1: 一れつわみなめへ／＼のむねしだい
verses.jp2: どんな事をがかなハんてなし
verses.kanji: 一列は皆銘々の胸次第   どんな事をが叶わんで無し
verses.en: Accordingly as each and every heart becomes sincere, there is no prayer which will not be heard.

verses.en_6th_ed: About the prayer for rain, though God has not said anything yet in truth,
verses.ro: amagoi mo imamade Kami ga shinjitsu ni   nanimo yutaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: あまごいもいまゝで神がしんぢつに
verses.jp2: なにもゆうたる事わなけれど
verses.kanji: 雨乞いも今迄神が真実に   何も言うたる事は無けれど
verses.en: Although I have not yet told you about the prayer for rain truly,

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, if you come seeking to Me, I shall tell you all the truth of all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   tazune kuru nara mina yute kikasu
verses.jp1: このたびハとのよな事もしんぢつを
verses.jp2: たづねくるならみなゆてきかす
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な事も真実を   尋ね来るなら皆言うて聞かす
verses.en: This time, if you come to Me, I will teach you any and every truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever it may be, Tsukihi will never say that it cannot be realized. It all depends on the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nani kanawan to yuwan de na   mina meme no kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: 月日にハなにかなハんとゆハんてな
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼の心したいや
verses.kanji: 月日には何叶わんと言わんでな   皆銘々の心次第や
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will never say that any prayer will not be heard. It depends all upon the mind of each and everyone of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may dream, it is by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona yume o miru no mo Tsukihi nari   nani o yu no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふなゆめをみるのも月日なり
verses.jp2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: どの様な夢を見るのも月日なり   何を言うのも皆月日やで
verses.en: Whatever you may dream, it is the working of Tsukihi. And whatever words Mmay be spoken, they are all working of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, but the minds of you close to Me are only depressed.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   soba no kokoro wa izumu bakari de
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめと
verses.jp2: そばの心わいづむばかりで
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心急き込めど   側の心はいずむばかりで
verses.en: In spite of the hastening of the mind of Tsukihi, the minds of you close to Me are only hesitant.

verses.en_6th_ed: Why are you depressed? It is because those in high places know nothing.
verses.ro: izumu no mo doshite izumu koto naraba   kami niwa nanimo shiran yue nari
verses.jp1: いつむのもどふしていつむ事ならば
verses.jp2: 上にハなにもしらんゆへなり
verses.kanji: いずむのもどうしていずむ事ならば   上には何も知らん故なり
verses.en: What is the reason they are so hesitant? It is because the upper people remain entirely ignorant.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, the whole world follows them in all matters and is depressed.
verses.ro: sekai niwa sore o shirazu ni nani goto mo   mina shitagote izumi iru nari
verses.jp1: せかいにハそれをしらすになに事も
verses.jp2: みなしたこふていつみいるなり
verses.kanji: 世界にはそれを知らずに何事も   皆従うていずみ居るなり
verses.en: Unaware of this, people of the world follow them in all things.

verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. That is why I do whatever things.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp1: 月日にわ大一これがさんねんな
verses.jp2: そこでどのよな事もするのや
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   そこでどの様な事もするのや
