verses.en: This is the cause of the prime regret of Tsukihi. Therefore I work whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, but I cannot tell of it in words, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro seta tote   kuchi dewa domu yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心せゑたとで
verses.jp2: くちでわとふむゆうにゆハれん
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心急いたとて   口ではどうも言うに言われん
verses.en: However impatiently I, Tsukihi, may hasten day by day, I cannot tell of it by mouth, even though I desire to do so.

verses.en_6th_ed: That is why I put the fragrance even into your dreams. Quickly ponder over it, please.
verses.ro: soreyue ni yume de nari tomo nioigake   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: それゆへにゆめでなりともにをいがけ
verses.jp2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: それ故に夢でなりとも匂い掛け   早く思案をして呉れる様
verses.en: Therefore I put the fragrance even into your dreams. So I request you to begin immediately to ponder over My intention.

verses.en_6th_ed: This regret of Tsukihi is not something that can be told in words.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 月日にハこのざんねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: くちてゆうよな事でないぞや
verses.kanji: 月日にはこの残念と言うものは   口で言う様な事で無いぞや
verses.en: This regret of Tsukihi is not so slight as I can tell it by mouth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, in My talks on whatever matters, I have taught you various things step by step.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna hanashi mo dandan to   iroiro toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわどんなはなしもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: いろ／＼といてきたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな話も段々と   色々説いて来たるなれども
verses.en: Although until today I have taught you whatever kinds of talks one by one in various ways,

verses.en_6th_ed: But as the day of the appointed time has not yet come, you have seen nothing.
verses.ro: nani yu mo higara kokugen kitaran de   nanimo mietaru koto wa nai node
verses.jp1: なにゆうもひがらこくけんきたらんで
verses.jp2: なにもみゑたる事わないので
verses.kanji: 何言うも日柄刻限来たらんで   何も見えたる事は無いので
verses.en: After all, as the fixed time of the fixed day has not yet come, nothing has really appeared.

verses.en_6th_ed: That is why all of you doubt and erase by your words whatever Tsukihi says.
verses.ro: soreyue ni nani o Tsukihi ga yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
verses.jp1: それゆへになにを月日がゆうたとて
verses.jp2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり
verses.kanji: それ故に何を月日が言うたとて   皆疑うて言い消すばかり
verses.en: Therefore you always doubt and put out by your words whatever I, Tsukihi, say.

verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. By all means, I shall clearly reveal what I have said.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nandemo kore o shikato arawasu
verses.jp1: 月日にハ大一これがさんねんな
verses.jp2: なんでもこれをしかとあらわす
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   何でもこれを確と現す
verses.en: This is the prime regret of Tsukihi. So by all means, I will clearly manifest what I have said.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now there was never a time that whatever I said was immediately seen,
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto oba yuta tote   suguni mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんな事をばゆうたとて
verses.jp2: すぐにみゑたる事わなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな事をば言うたとて   直ぐに見えたる事は無けれど
verses.en: Until now, of whatever I said, nothing appeared immediately.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, within three days, no one knows what you will hear in the talk of the world step by step.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mikka no uchi ni dandan to   sekai no hanashi nani o kiku yara
verses.jp1: このたびわ三かのうちにたん／＼と
verses.jp2: せかいのはなしなにをきくやら
verses.kanji: この度は三日の内に段々と   世界の話何を聞くやら
verses.en: This time within three days, one by one you will hear whatever talk about the world which no one can foresee.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, Tsukihi will work day after day. There is no knowing what work I shall do.
verses.ro: korekara wa nichinichi Tsukihi hataraku de   donna shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: これからハにち／＼月日はたらくで
verses.jp2: とんなしごとをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: これからは日々月日働くで   どんな仕事をするや知れんで
verses.en: From now on I, Tsukihi, will work day by day. There is no knowing whatever I may work.

verses.en_6th_ed: Never think in the least that curses, demons, or evil spirits exist in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo ni kamai tsukimono bakemono mo   kanarazu aru to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: このよふにかまいつきものばけものも
verses.jp2: かならすあるとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: この世にかまい憑き物化け物も   必ず有ると更に思うな
verses.en: Never think even in the least that curses, demons or apparitions exist in this world!

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall clear away all the regret of Tsukihi which has piled up mountainously until now.
verses.ro: imamade ni Tsukihi zannen yamayama to   tsumorite aru o mina harasu de na
verses.jp1: いまゝでに月日ざんねん山／＼と
verses.jp2: つもりてあるをみなはらすでな
verses.kanji: 今迄に月日残念山々と   積りて有るを皆晴らすでな
verses.en: I will completely clear away the regret of Tsukihi which has until now piled up mountainously.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain how it will be cleared away: I, Tsukihi, shall do all that I intend.
verses.ro: kono harashi doshite harasu koto naraba   Tsukihi no kokoro mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: このはらしどふしてはらす事ならば
verses.jp2: 月日の心みなしてみせる
verses.kanji: この晴らしどうして晴らす事ならば   月日の心皆して見せる
verses.en: You may wonder how I will accomplish this clearing. I, Tsukihi, will work to manifest all of My intention.

verses.en_6th_ed: Many days have passed since I began this world. Yet perhaps you do not know the truth of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kyomade wa kono yo hajimete hi wa tatedo   Tsukihi shinjitsu mada shiromai na
verses.jp1: けふまでハこのよはじめてひわたてど
verses.jp2: 月日しんちつまだしろまいな
verses.kanji: 今日迄はこの世初めて日は経てど   月日真実未だ知ろまいな
verses.en: Till today many days have passed since the creation of this world. But perhaps you do not know the true sincerity of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is done, is done by Tsukihi. Whatever happens, know that it is not an illness.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi suru koto ya   ikana koto demo yamai dewa nai
verses.jp1: とのよふな事でも月日する事や
verses.jp2: いかな事でもやまいでわない
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも月日する事や   如何な事でも病では無い
verses.en: Whatever may happen, it is all the work of Tsukihi. In any case, it is not an illness.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do to the body, it is not an illness but the care of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: minouchi ni dono yona koto o shita totemo   yamai dewa nai Tsukihi teiri ya
verses.jp1: みのうちにとのよな事をしたとても
verses.jp2: やまいでわない月日ていりや
verses.kanji: 身の内にどの様な事をしたとても   病では無い月日手入りや
verses.en: Whatever may happen in your body, it is by no means illness, but the hand of Tsukihi put in to repair your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: The world is saying that it is cholera, but it is Tsukihi informing you of the regret.
verses.ro: sekai niwa korera to yute iru keredo   Tsukihi zannen shirasu koto nari
verses.jp1: せかいにハこれらとゆうているけれど
verses.jp2: 月日さんねんしらす事なり
verses.kanji: 世界にはコレラと言うて居るけれど   月日残念知らす事なり
verses.en: In the world people call it cholera. But it is the means by which I, Tsukihi, let you know My regret.

verses.en_6th_ed: Everywhere in the world, people are the same: they only have depressed minds.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no hito demo onaji koto   izumu bakari no kokoro naredomo
verses.jp1: せかいぢうどこの人でもをなぢ事
verses.jp2: いつむばかりの心なれとも
verses.kanji: 世界中何処の人でも同じ事   いずむばかりの心なれども
verses.en: In the whole world, people everywhere are apt to have gloomy and depressed minds.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, firmly replace the mind and become the mind of joyousness.
verses.ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekaete   yokizukume no kokoro naru yo
verses.jp1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp2: よふきづくめの心なるよふ
verses.kanji: これからは心確り入れ替えて   陽気ずくめの心なる様
verses.en: But henceforth, determine to replace your mind definitely with the mind full of joy!

verses.en_6th_ed: The reason Tsukihi began human beings was the desire to see you lead a joyous life.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa ningen hajime kaketa no wa   yokiyusan ga mitai yue kara
verses.jp1: 月日にわにんけんはじめかけたのわ
verses.jp2: よふきゆさんがみたいゆへから
verses.kanji: 月日には人間初め掛けたのは   陽気遊山が見たい故から
verses.en: I created you human beings because I desired to see you lead a joyous life.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because the world does not know this truth, everyone sinks only deeper into depression.
verses.ro: sekai niwa kono shinjitsu o shiran kara   mina dokomade mo izumu bakari de
verses.jp1: せかいにハこのしんぢつをしらんから
verses.jp2: みなどこまでもいつむはかりで
verses.kanji: 世界にはこの真実を知らんから   皆何処迄もいずむばかりで
verses.en: Knowing nothing of this truth, all of you in the world continue to sink deep into the mire of despondency.

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi desires to bring joyousness to all. If anyone dares to stop this, the regret will grow enormous.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yokizukume to yu no o na   kore tometa nara zanen eronaru
verses.jp1: 月日よりよふきづくめとゆうのをな
verses.jp2: これとめたならさねんゑろなる
verses.kanji: 月日より陽気ずくめと言うのをな   これ止めたなら残念えろうなる
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, desire you to be full of joy. If you stop Me, My regret shall become enormous.

verses.en_6th_ed: I request you to understand this talk clearly and to ponder quickly.
verses.ro: kono hanashi dozo shikkari kikiwakete   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: このはなしどふぞしいかりきゝハけて
verses.jp2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: この話どうぞ確り聞き分けて   早く思案をして呉れる様
verses.en: Please listen attentively to the reason of this talk and ponder over it quickly!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I taught you by the name Tsukihi, but from today I shall use another name.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi to yute toitaredo   mo kyokara wa namai kaeru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ月日とゆうてといたれど
verses.jp2: もふけふからハなまいかゑるで
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日と言うて説いたれど   もう今日からは名前変えるで
verses.en: Hitherto I have taught you by the name of Tsukihi, but from today I will change My name.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, though the grand shrines and high mountains have thrived and done as they pleased,
verses.ro: kyomade wa taisha takayama habikarite   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでハたいしや高山はびかりて
verses.jp2: まゝにしていた事であれとも
verses.kanji: 今日迄は大社高山蔓延りて   侭にしていた事で有れども
verses.en: Although until today the grand shrines and the people on the high mountains have been rampant and managed everything as they please,

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I, the Parent, shall do as I please instead. Defy Me and I shall give a return at once.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya ga kawarite mamani suru   kore somuitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp1: これからわをやがかハりてまゝにする
verses.jp2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで
verses.kanji: これからは親が代わりて侭にする   これ背いたら直ぐに返すで
verses.en: Henceforth I, the Parent, will manage everything as I intend. If you go against Me, I will give you a return at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the regret of the Parent even before today has not been slight.
verses.ro: kyomade mo Oya no zanen to yu mono wa   chotto no koto dewa nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: けふまてもをやのさねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: 一寸の事でわないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 今日迄も親の残念と言うものは   一寸の事では無いと思えよ
verses.en: Understand that even before today the regret of the Parent has not been slight!

verses.en_6th_ed: Yet at this time, the world is only rampant in all matters, knowing nothing.
verses.ro: konotabi mo mada sekai niwa nani goto mo   habikaru bakari nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: このたびもまだせかいにハなに事も
verses.jp2: はびかるばかりなにもしらすに
verses.kanji: この度は未だ世界には何事も   蔓延るばかり何も知らずに
verses.en: This time also, knowing nothing of this truth, people of the world are simply as rampant as they please.

verses.en_6th_ed: With you humans, also, your children are dear to you. Think of this and ponder, please.
verses.ro: ningen mo kodomo kawai de aro ga na   sore o omote shiyan shite kure
verses.jp1: にんけんもこ共かわいであろをがな
verses.jp2: それをふもをてしやんしてくれ
verses.kanji: 人間も子供可愛いで有ろうがな   それを思うて思案して呉れ
verses.en: You human beings must love your own children. Thinking of this, please understand My love for you!

verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the concern of the Parent is only about the means to save you.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Oya no shiyan to yu mono wa   tasukeru moyo bakari omoteru
verses.jp1: にち／＼にをやのしやんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふばかりをもてる
verses.kanji: 日々に親の思案と言うものは   救ける模様ばかり思うてる
verses.en: The daily concern of the Parent is single-heartedly how best I can advance arrangements to save all of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, everyone in the world thinks that I am intending something evil.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   nando ashiki no yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすみなせかいぢうハ一れつに
verses.jp2: なんとあしきのよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆世界中は一列に   何と悪しきの様に思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, each and everyone throughout the world thinks that I am intending something evil.

verses.en_6th_ed: In all matters, think well about the Parent's regret, always being opposed by My own children.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Oya no zannen yoku omoe   kodomo bakari ni iken shirarete
verses.jp1: なにもかもをやのさんねんよくをもへ
verses.jp2: こ共はかりにいけんしられて
verses.kanji: 何もかも親の残念よく思え   子供ばかりに意見しられて
verses.en: Ponder deeply over the regret of the Parent on whatever kinds of matters! It is because I have always been admonished by My  own children.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, as the Parent is revealed, I shall not take opposition from wherever it may come.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna tokoro no iken demo   Oya ga dete iru ukeru koto nashi
verses.jp1: これからわどんなところのいけんでも
verses.jp2: をやがでゝいるうける事なし
verses.kanji: これからはどんな所の意見でも   親が出ている受ける事無し
verses.en: Henceforth I will never accept any admonition from whatever place it may come, because I, the Parent, am presenting Myself to the fore.

verses.en_6th_ed: This opposition: if anyone becomes rampant and directs it at Me, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: kono iken dono yona mono ga habikarite   yu to omoeba suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: このいけんとのよなものがはひかりて
verses.jp2: ゆふとをもゑばすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: この意見どの様な者が蔓延りて   言うと思えば直ぐに退く
verses.en: If anyone becomes rampant and directs an admonition to Me, I will withdraw at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may work, I shall give you as much notice in advance as I possibly can.
verses.ro: dono yona shigoto suru nimo saki i yori   seeippai ni kotowarite oku
verses.jp1: とのよふなしごとするにもさきいより
verses.jp2: せへいゝはいにことわりてをく
verses.kanji: どの様な仕事するにも先いより   精一杯に断りて置く
verses.en: Whatever kind of working I may do, I always warn you beforehand as possible as I can.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, though you have been worrying about all matters day after day,
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna koto omo nichinichi ni   shinpai shitaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまてハどんな事をもにち／＼に
verses.jp2: しんばいしたる事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな事をも日々に   心配したる事で有れども
verses.en: Even though until today you have been anxious about any and everything day by day,

verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow on, whatever you see and whatever you hear will only give you delight.
verses.ro: asukara wa donna koto oba mita totemo   nani o kiite mo tanoshimi bakari
verses.jp1: あすからわどんな事をばみたとても
verses.jp2: なにをきいてもたのしみばかり
verses.kanji: 明日からはどんな事をば見たとても   何を聞いても楽しみばかり
verses.en: From tomorrow on, whatever you see or hear will all be truly delightful.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until this time the high mountains have given directives on every matter,
verses.ro: koremade wa takayama kara wa nanimo kamo   donna sashizu mo uketa naredomo
verses.jp1: これまでハ高山からわなにもかも
verses.jp2: どんなさしすもうけたなれとも
verses.kanji: これ迄は高山からは何もかも   どんな指図も受けたなれども
verses.en: Although hitherto we have accepted any order from the people on the high mountains on whatever kinds of matters,

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, it is the Parent who will direct. Nothing said against Me shall I ever accept.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o yuwaretemo   Oya no sashizu ya sarani uken de
verses.jp1: このさきハとのよな事をゆハれても
verses.jp2: をやのさしすやさらにうけんで
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事を言われても   親の指図や更に受けんで
verses.en: Henceforth, whatever kind of order they may give, I will never accept it because this is the direction of the Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, as the day has not yet come, I have been keeping still on whatever matters.
verses.ro: imamade wa higara mo chitto kitaran de   donna koto demo jitto shite ita
verses.jp1: いまゝでわひがらもちいときたらんで
verses.jp2: とんな事てもちいとしていた
verses.kanji: 今迄は日柄もちいと来たらんで   どんな事でもじっとして居た
verses.en: Until now, as the day has been a little late in coming, I have kept still on whatever matters.

verses.en_6th_ed: But today, the time is fully pressing. I shall directly do whatever things as I intend.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa hi ga jubun ni tsunde aru   donna koto demo sono mamani suru
verses.jp1: もふけふハひがぢうふんにつんである
verses.jp2: とんな事でもそのまゝにする
verses.kanji: もう今日は日が十分に詰んで有る   どんな事でもその侭にする
verses.en: But today the time is sufficiently pressing. So I will work everything at once just as I intend.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, everything will be as the Parent intends. Just a word and it will be realized without fail.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya no omou koto bakari   hito koto yueba kore chigawan de
verses.jp1: これからハをやのをもふう事はかり
verses.jp2: 一事ゆゑばこれちがわんで
verses.kanji: これからは親の思う事ばかり   一言言えばこれ違わんで
verses.en: Henceforth everything shall become as I intend. If I say a word, it will always be realized without fail.

verses.en_6th_ed: Throughout the world unto its farthest places, no one knows what will happen.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu wa mina dokomade mo   donna koto oga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: せかいぢう一れつハみなとこまても
verses.jp2: どんな事をがあるやしれんで
verses.kanji: 世界中一列は皆何処迄も   どんな事が有るや知れんで
verses.en: I warn you all people of the whole world equally. There shall appear events which no one can foresee.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever may happen, there will be nothing to fear, depending on your mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo shinjitsu no   kokoro shidai ni kowai koto nashi
verses.jp1: どのよふな事がありてもしんちつの
verses.jp2: 心したいにこわい事なし
verses.kanji: どの様な事が有りても真実の   心次第に怖い事無し
verses.en: Whatever events may occur, you need fear nothing, depending on the sincerity of your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only the mind is purified completely, there will be nothing but delight in everything.
verses.ro: kokoro sai sukiyaka sunda koto naraba   donna koto demo tanoshimi bakari
verses.jp1: 心さいすきやかすんたことならば
verses.jp2: どんな事てもたのしみばかり
verses.kanji: 心さい清きやか澄んだ事ならば   どんな事でも楽しみばかり
verses.en: If only your mind becomes clear and clean, everything shall become full of delight.

verses.en_6th_ed: If you are of mind to doubt this talk, beware of the paths you may come upon.
verses.ro: kono hanashi utagau kokoro aru naraba   shochi shite iyo donna michi yara
verses.jp1: このはなしうたがう心あるならば
verses.jp2: しよちしていよとんなみちやら
verses.kanji: この話疑う心有るならば   承知して居よどんな道やら
verses.en: If you are of a mind to doubt this talk, be ready for what-ever kinds of ways to appear!

verses.en_6th_ed: Everyone throughout the world is a child dear to the Parent. There is no knowing what I may say out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: sekaiju wa Oya no ta niwa mina kodomo   kawai amarite nani o yu yara
verses.jp1: せかいぢうわをやのたあにハみなこ共
verses.jp2: かわいあまりてなにをゆうやら
verses.kanji: 世界中は親のたあには皆子供   可愛い余りて何を言うやら
verses.en: People all over the world are all children for Me, the Parent; therefore because of My overwhelming parental love I must say whatever kinds of things which no one can foresee.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this world, whether it be in the high mountains or the low valleys, everyone is a child of Mine, the Parent.
verses.ro: kono sekai takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   Oya no ta niwa kodomo bakari ya
verses.jp1: このせかい高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: をやのたにわこ共はかりや
verses.kanji: この世界高山にても谷底も   親のたあには子供ばかりや
verses.en: For Me, the Parent, people of this world are all My children whether they may be on the high mountains or at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I must have you know the mind of your true Parent.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu no   Oya no kokoro o shirashitai kara
verses.jp1: このたびわなんてもかてもしんぢつの
verses.jp2: をやの心をしらしたいから
verses.kanji: この度は何でもかでも真実の   親の心を知らしたいから
verses.en: This time I desire to make you know by all means necessary the true sincerity of the mind of the Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only you have understood it clearly, your life will be filled with joy forever.
verses.ro: kore saika tashikani shochi shita naraba   itsu made ite mo yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: これさいかたしかにしよちしたならば
verses.jp2: いつまでいてもよふきつくめや
verses.kanji: これさいか確かに承知したならば   何時迄居ても陽気ずくめや
verses.en: If only you can thoroughly understand it, your life will be full of joy, however long you may be living.

verses.en_6th_ed: Please become firmly convinced of this path. The Parent requests this of all humankind.
verses.ro: kono michi wa Oya ga tanomiya ichiretsu wa   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: このみちハをやがたのみや一れつわ
verses.jp2: どふそしいかりしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: この道は親が頼みや一列は   どうぞ確り承知して呉れ
verses.en: Please become firmly convinced of this way, all of you! Because I, the Parent, request you to do it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until today we have passed through every kind of path step by step,
verses.ro: kyomade mo dono yona michi mo dandan to   torinukete wa kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでもどのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: とふりぬけてわきたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄もどの様な道も段々と   通り抜けては来たるなれども
verses.en: Although until today, step by step we have passed through any and every way,

verses.en_6th_ed: The path from now on will be entirely new and marvelous. If we pass through this path,
verses.ro: korekara no michi wa nandemo mezurashii   kono michi tori nuketa koto nara
verses.jp1: これからのみちハなんてもめつらしい
verses.jp2: このみちとふりぬけた事なら
verses.kanji: これからの道は何でも珍しい   この道通り抜けた事なら
verses.en: In the future there will appear an entirely remarkable way. If only we can pass through this way,

verses.en_6th_ed: Then the mind of the Parent will spring forth spiritedly, and I shall begin any and every working.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Oya no kokoro ga isami dete   donna koto demo hajime kakeru de
verses.jp1: それからハをやの心がいさみでゝ
verses.jp2: とんな事でもはじめかけるで
verses.kanji: それからは親の心が勇み出て   どんな事でも初め掛けるで
verses.en: Thence, the mind of the Parent shall spring forth and will begin any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only I begin the workings, everyone, whoever one may be, will lean on the Parent.
verses.ro: kore saika hajime kaketaru koto naraba   donna mono demo Oya ni motareru
verses.jp1: これさいかはぢめかけたる事ならば
verses.jp2: とんなものてもをやにもたれる
verses.kanji: これさいか初め掛けたる事ならば   どんな者でも親に凭れる
verses.en: If only I begin this working, everyone shall lean upon Me, the Parent, whoever one may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: I have been preparing to open this path, but perhaps no one is yet aware of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o tsukeyo tote ni shikoshirae   donna mono demo mada shiromai na
verses.jp1: このみちをつけよふとてにしこしらゑ
verses.jp2: とんなものてもまたしろまいな
verses.kanji: この道を付け様とてに仕拵え   どんな者でも未だ知ろまいな
verses.en: To open this way, I have been preparing arrangements. Yet, perhaps no one is aware of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now begin! In the course of this path from now on, no danger will come to anyone, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: sa kakare mo korekara no michisuji wa   donna mono demo abunaki wa nai
verses.jp1: さあかゝれもふこれからのみちすじハ
verses.jp2: とんなものでもあふなきわない
verses.kanji: さあ掛かれもうこれからの道筋は   どんな者でも危なきは無い
verses.en: Now begin! Hereafter, on the course of this way, there shall be no danger to anyone of you, whoever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have brought anxiety to those within about various matters,
verses.ro: imamade wa uchi no mono nimo iroiro ni   shinpai kakete kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわうちのものにもいろ／＼に
verses.jp2: しんばいかけてきたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は内の者にも色々に   心配掛けて来たるなれども
verses.en: Although until now I have troubled My familiar people with anxiety in various ways,

verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow on, the Parent will go forth a step ahead of you and give a return for every matter.
verses.ro: asukara wa Oya ga ichihana deru hodoni   donna koto demo kayashi shite yaru
verses.jp1: あすからハをやが一はなでるほとに
verses.jp2: とんな事てもかやしゝてやる
verses.kanji: 明日からは親が一端出る程に   どんな事でも返ししてやる
verses.en: From tomorrow on I, the Parent, will go ahead of you and will give a return for whatever kinds of matters.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, you must explain My talks to others in detail step by step. The time has at last come.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa nanino hanashi mo dandan to   komakashiku yue mo setsu ya
verses.jp1: さあけふわなにのはなしもだん／＼と
verses.jp2: こまかしくゆへもふせへつうや
verses.kanji: さあ今日は何の話も段々と   細かしく言えもう節や
verses.en: Now you may explain whatever kinds of talks in detail step by step. The time has already come.

verses.en_6th_ed: There will be no understanding about anything unless you tell them. Tell them everything, all in detail.
verses.ro: nani nitemo yuwazu ni ite wa wakaran de   nanika isai o mina yute kikase
verses.jp1: なにゝてもゆハすにいてハわからんで
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをみなゆてきかせ
verses.kanji: 何にても言わずに居ては分からんで   何か委細を皆言うて聞かせ
verses.en: On whatever kinds of things, if one does not speak, no one will be able to understand. Teach them any and everything all in detail!

verses.en_6th_ed: Perhaps you do not know what this talk is about. Tell them all about the workings of the Parent.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto yara shiromai na   Oya no hataraki mina yute oke
verses.jp1: このはなしなにの事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: をやのはたらきみなゆうてをけ
verses.kanji: この話何の事やら知ろまいな   親の働き皆言うて置け
verses.en: Perhaps you do not know what the true meaning of this talk is. Teach them all the working of the Parent beforehand!

verses.en_6th_ed: Perhaps you do not know what My workings are. I shall make all minds in the world be revealed.
verses.ro: hataraki mo nanino koto yara shiromai na   sekai no kokoro mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: はたらきもなにの事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: せかいの心みなあらわすで
verses.kanji: 働きも何の事やら知ろまいな   世界の心皆表すで
verses.en: Perhaps you do not know what My working is. I will show clearly all the minds of all people of the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain how they are to be revealed: each of you will speak it by your own mouth.
verses.ro: kore oba na araware dasu to yu no mo na   meme no kuchi de mina yuikakeru
verses.jp1: これをはなあらハれだすとゆうのもな
verses.jp2: めゑめゑのくちでみなゆいかける
verses.kanji: これをばな現れ出すと言うのもな   銘々の口で皆言い掛ける
verses.en: You may wonder in what way these minds can be manifested. Each one of you will speak it by your own mouth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever kind of thing it may be, when you speak it by your own mouth, it may be impossible to deny.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo waga mi kuchi i yori   yu koto naraba zehi wa arumai
verses.jp1: どのよふな事てもわがみくちいより
verses.jp2: ゆう事ならばぜひハあるまい
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも我が身口より   言う事ならば是非は有るまい
verses.en: Whatever kind of thing it may be, if you speak it by your own mouth, it is inevitable.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, even if each of you keeps silent, the Parent will enter you and make you begin to speak out.
verses.ro: korekara wa meme ni nanimo yuwai demo   Oya ga irikomi yute kakaru de
verses.jp1: これからハめゑめになにもゆハいでも
verses.jp2: をやが入こみゆうてかゝるで
verses.kanji: これからは銘々に何も言わいでも   親が入り込み言うて掛かるで
verses.en: Hereafter, even though each of you may keep silent, I, the Parent, will enter into your body and make you begin to speak out.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall truly begin to sweep clean the heart of everyone of you, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: konosaki wa donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   mune no soji o mina shite kakaru
verses.jp1: このさきハどんなものでもしんちつに
verses.jp2: むねのそふちをみなしてかゝる
verses.kanji: この先はどんな者でも真実に   胸の掃除を皆して掛かる
verses.en: Henceforth I will begin truly to sweep dust from the hearts of all of you, whoever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: How do you think this sweeping is to be done? There is no knowing how I shall admonish you.
verses.ro: kono soji doshite suru to omou kana   donna iken o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: このそふぢどふしてするとをもうかな
verses.jp2: とんないけんをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: この掃除どうしてすると思うかな   どんな意見をするや知れんで
verses.en: You may wonder how I can accomplish this sweeping. There is no knowing what kind of admonition I may give.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever happens, do not worry. Everything that happens is an admonition by the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo anjina yo   nanika yorozu wa Oya no iken ya
verses.jp1: とのよふな事がありてもあんちなよ
verses.jp2: なにかよろすわをやのいけんや
verses.kanji: どの様な事が有りても案じなよ   何か万は親の意見や
verses.en: Whatever may happen, you need not become anxious. All these events are admonitions of the Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how I try to tell you the truth by words, there is no understanding. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: kuchi saki de nanbo shinjitsu yuta tote   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp1: くちさきでなんぼしんぢつゆうたとて
verses.jp2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん
verses.kanji: 口先で何ぼ真実言うたとて   聞き分けが無い親の残念
verses.en: However earnestly I may tell you My true sincerity by mouth, you do not understand My intention. This is the cause of the regret of the Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, the Parent will enter the body. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Oya ga tainai irikonde   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: それゆへにをやがたいない入こんで
verses.jp2: とんな事をばするやしれんで
verses.kanji: それ故に親が体内入り込んで   どんな事をばするや知れんで
verses.en: Therefore I, the Parent, will enter into your bodies. Thence there shall be no knowing whatever kinds of things I may work.

verses.en_6th_ed: However trying your condition may be, it is not an illness but the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona setsunai koto ga aritemo na   yamai dewa nai Oya no zanen ya
verses.jp1: とのよふなせつない事がありてもな
verses.jp2: やまいでわないをやのさねんや
verses.kanji: どの様な切ない事が有りてもな   病では無い親の残念や
verses.en: However painful your suffering may be, it is not an illness but the regret of the Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: I do not direct this talk at a particular place. You are all children of Mine, the Parent.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   Oya no ta niwa mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしどこの事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp2: をやのたあにわみなわがこやで
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   親のたあには皆我が子やで
verses.en: By this talk, I do not indicate any place in particular. For Me, the Parent, you are all My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: When the regret of the true Parent comes out, perhaps no one knows the way to settle it.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Oya no zannen deta naraba   kono osamekata tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: しんぢつのをやのさんねんでたならば
verses.jp2: このをさめかたたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 真実の親の残念でたならば   この治め方誰も知ろまい
verses.en: If the regret of the true Parent appears, perhaps no one can find the way to appease it.

verses.en_6th_ed: But if you are truly sincere, I shall teach you everything whatever.
verses.ro: kore oba na makoto shinjitsu aru naraba   donna koto demo yute kikasuru
verses.jp1: これをばなまことしんぢつあるならば
verses.jp2: どんな事でもゆうてきかする
verses.kanji: これをばな誠真実有るならば   どんな事でも言うて聞かする
verses.en: If only you have true sincerity, I will teach you any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I shall say, but should you reject it, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   kore somuitara suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: これそむいたらすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うやら知れんでな   これ背いたら直ぐに退く
verses.en: There is no knowing what kinds of things I will say. If you go against My word, I will withdraw at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I was stopped from whatever I did. There was nothing but rejection.
verses.ro: koremade wa nani o shita tote tomerarete   somuku bakari no koto de aru kara
verses.jp1: これまでハなにをしたとてとめられて
verses.jp2: そむくばかりの事であるから
verses.kanji: これ迄は何をしたとて止められて   背くばかりの事で有るから
verses.en: Hitherto whatever I have done, they have always stopped Me and you have always gone against Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, whatever I may do or whatever I may say, do not reject it.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto o shita totemo   nani o yutemo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハとのよな事をしたとても
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: 今日の日はどの様な事もしたとても   何を言うても背き無き様
verses.en: But today, never go against Me, whatever I may do or say.

verses.en_6th_ed: I earnestly request you to take this path. The Parent assures you, so there is no need for worry.
verses.ro: kono michi wa kuregure tanomi oku hodoni   Oya ga hikiuke anji nai zo ya
verses.jp1: このみちハくれ／＼たのみをくほとに
verses.jp2: をやがひきうけあんぢないぞや
verses.kanji: この道はくれぐれ頼み置く程に   親が引き受け案じ無いぞや
verses.en: I earnestly request you indeed to go on this way. There is nothing to be anxious about, because I, the Parent, will take charge of.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder what this is about. I need musical instruments for the Service quickly.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nanino koto ya to omouna yo   Tsutome narimono hayaku hoshii de
verses.jp1: この事ハなにの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: つとめなりものはやくほしいで
verses.kanji: この事は何の事やと思うなよ   勤め鳴り物早く欲しいで
verses.en: Never wonder what this means! I want to prepare the musical instruments for the Service as quickly as possible.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, whatever you may do, you need not worry, for the Parent assures you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa donna koto oba shita totemo   nanimo anjina Oya no ukeyai
verses.jp1: もふけふわどんな事をばしたとても
verses.jp2: なにもあんぢなをやのうけやい
verses.kanji: もう今日はどんな事をばしたとても   何も案じな親の請け合い
verses.en: Now today, never be anxious about whatever you may do! I, the Parent, will assure any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, because they know nothing, those in high places have always forbidden and opposed Me.
verses.ro: imamade wa kami niwa nanimo shiran kara   sashitome bakari iken shitaredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ上にわなにもしらんから
verses.jp2: さしとめはかりいけんしたれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は上には何も知らんから   差し止めばかり意見したれど
verses.en: Until now, because of their complete ignorance of My intention, the upper people have always tried to forbid and reproach My work.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, no one will be able to stand against Me. From anyone who is of mind to defy, the Parent will withdraw!
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna mono demo kanawan de   yu kokoro nara Oya ga shirizoku
verses.jp1: このたびハどんなものでもかなハんで
verses.jp2: ゆう心ならをやがしりぞく
verses.kanji: この度はどんな者でも敵わんで   言う心なら親が退く
verses.en: But this time no one can stand against Me, whoever he may be. If anyone intends to stand against Me, I, the Parent, will withdraw from his body.

verses.en_6th_ed: On this matter, hasten to resolve your minds firmly and begin quickly.
verses.ro: kono koto o hayaku kokoro o shikkari to   sadame o tsukete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: この事をはやく心しいかりと
verses.jp2: さだめをつけてはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: この事を早く心確りと   定めを付けて早く掛かれよ
verses.en: Awakening to this, hasten to determine your mind firmly, and quickly begin the Service!

verses.en_6th_ed: Hasten to prepare everything for the Service. Fear nothing, for the Parent gives you assurance.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo hayaku Tsutome no shikoshirae   Oya no ukeyai kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なにもかもはやくつとめのしこしらへ
verses.jp2: をやのうけやいこわみないぞや
verses.kanji: なにもかも早く勤めの仕拵え   親の請け合い怖み無いぞや
verses.en: Hasten to prepare all arrangements for the Service! Fear nothing! Because I, the Parent, am assuring it.

verses.en_6th_ed: On this matter, resolve your minds and ponder. I am in haste to assemble the performers.
verses.ro: kore oba na kokoro sadamete shiyan shite   hayaku ninju no moyo isogu de
verses.jp1: これをはな心さだめてしやんして
verses.jp2: はやくにんぢうのもよふいそぐで
verses.kanji: これをばな心定めて思案して   早く人衆の模様急ぐで
verses.en: So pondering over what I say with firmly determined mind, quickly hasten to complete the number of the performers!

verses.en_6th_ed: If you quickly unite your minds and do the Service correctly, the world will settle.
verses.ro: hayabaya to kokoro sorote shikkari to   Tsutome suru nara sekai osamaru
verses.jp1: はや／＼と心そろをてしいかりと
verses.jp2: つとめするならせかいをさまる
verses.kanji: 早々と心揃えて確りと   勤めするなら世界治まる
verses.en: If you quickly perform the Service correctly with your minds in harmony, peace shall reign all over the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, I have been biding My time, refraining from speaking out on whatever matters.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanino koto demo jikkuri to   yuwazu ni itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわなにの事でもちいくりと
verses.jp2: ゆハすにいたる事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何の事でもじっくりと   言わずにいたる事で有れども
verses.en: Although until today I have been keeping silent and have been in no hurry on whatever kinds of things,

verses.en_6th_ed: But today, I shall speak out on any and every matter. Please think of the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo yu hodoni   Oya no zannen kore omote kure
verses.jp1: もふけふわなんでもかでもゆうほどに
verses.jp2: をやのざんねんこれをもてくれ
verses.kanji: もう今日は何でもかでも言う程に   親の残念これ思うて呉れ
verses.en: Now today I will speak any and everything. Feel for the regret of your Parent!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have been thinking that whatever I said was from a human mind.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro no yoni omote itaredo
verses.jp1: けふまてハなにをゆうてもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心のよふにをもていたれど
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何を言うても人間の   心の様に思うて居たれど
verses.en: Until today, whatever I may have told you, you have been thinking that it comes from a human mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: But now, whatever I may say, do not think in the least that I have a human mind.
verses.ro: sa ima wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp1: さあいまわなにをいうてもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: さあ今は何を言うても人間の   心有るとは更に思うな
verses.en: But now, never think that there is a human mind within, whatever kinds of things I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: You do not know what I shall say, but whatever I may say, please comply.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うやら知れんでな   何を言うても承知して呉れ
verses.en: I shall say any kind of thing which no one can foresee. But please comply with Me, whatever I may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, whatever test I may put you through, resolve your mind firmly by it.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna tameshi o suru yara na   kore de shikkari kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp1: このたびハどんなためしをするやらな
verses.jp2: これでしいかり心さだめよ
verses.kanji: この度はどんな試しをするやらな   これで確り心定めよ
verses.en: This time, there is no knowing whatever test I may put to you. But through it determine your mind firmly!

verses.en_6th_ed: I do not indicate anyone in particular by this talk. It is for each of you to resolve the mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ga koto tomo yuwan de na   mina meme no kokoro sadame ya
verses.jp1: このはなしたれが事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp2: みなめゑ／＼の心さだめや
verses.kanji: この話誰が事とも言わんでな   皆銘々の心定めや
verses.en: I do not say that this talk indicates any person in particular. Each one of you must determine your own mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: However trying your condition may be, the Parent will work to the utmost. Take heart!
verses.ro: ika hodoni setsunai koto ga aritemo na   Oya ga funbaru shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: いかほどにせつない事がありてもな
verses.jp2: をやがふんばるしようちしていよ
verses.kanji: 如何程に切ない事が有りてもな   親が踏ん張る承知して居よ
verses.en: However painfully you may suffer, be convinced that I, the Parent, will exert Myself to the utmost to protect you!

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, please be firmly convinced of the words of the Parent. There is no need to worry.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya no yu koto shikkari to   shochi shite kure anji nai zo ya
verses.jp1: これからハをやのゆう事しいかりと
verses.jp2: しよちしてくれあんぢないぞや
verses.kanji: これからは親の言う事確りと   承知して呉れ案じ無いぞや
verses.en: Henceforth comply firmly with the word which I, the Parent, will tell you! Then there shall be nothing to fear.

verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow, the Parent will begin the workings. Perhaps there will be no one able to defy Me.
verses.ro: asukara wa Oya ga hataraki suru hodoni   donna mono demo somuki dekemai
verses.jp1: あすからハをやがはたらきするほどに
verses.jp2: どんなものでもそむきでけまい
verses.kanji: 明日からは親が働きする程に   どんな者でも背き出来まい
verses.en: From tomorrow on I, the Parent, will begin My working. Then no one will be able to stand against it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Forty-three years ago, the Parent became revealed and has been teaching even until now.
verses.ro: imamade mo yonju san nen izen kara   Oya ga araware hajime kaketa de
verses.jp1: いまゝでも四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: をやがあらハれはじめかけたで
verses.kanji: 今迄も四十三年以前から   親が現れ初め掛けたで
verses.en: From forty-three years ago till now I, the Parent, have revealed Myself to begin these teachings.

verses.en_6th_ed: Yet until today, despite My many regrets, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: kyomade wa taite zanen mo iku tabi mo   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまてハたいてさねんもいくたびも
verses.jp2: ちいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄は大抵残念も幾度も   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.en: Although until today I have very often kept still through much regret,

verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, though I have been holding back, the stomach of Tsukihi has burst open.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa Tsukihi no hara ga hajiketa de   shikaete itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: さあけふハ月日のはらがはぢけたで
verses.jp2: しかゑていたる事であれども
verses.kanji: さあ今日は月日の腹が弾けたで   控えて居たる事で有れども
verses.en: Now today the abdomen of Tsukihi has burst open in spite of My effort to hold back.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, with the thought that you are neighbors, I have been quiet in restraint.
verses.ro: imamade wa mura ya to omote jikkuri to   mada osamarite itaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ村やとをもてちいくりと
verses.jp2: まだをさまりていたるなれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄は村やと思うてじっくりと   未だ治まりて居たるなれども
verses.en: Although until now I have quietly forborne things with the thought that they are all the villagers of this same village,

verses.en_6th_ed: But this time, I shall discern your mind, whoever you are, and begin to work at once.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona kokoro iru mono mo   misadame tsukete suguni hataraku
verses.jp1: このたびハとのよな心いるものも
verses.jp2: みさだめつけてすぐにはたらく
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な心居る者も   見定め付けて直ぐに働く
verses.en: This time whatever mind you may have, I discern each of you and will begin to work at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though regret is so piled up within Me, I shall save all of you according to your minds.
verses.ro: kora hodoni zanen tsumorite aru keredo   kokoro shidai ni mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: こらほどにさねんつもりてあるけれど
verses.jp2: 心しだいにみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: こら程に残念積りて有るけれど   心次第に皆救けるで
verses.en: Even though My regret has piled up in My heart, I will save all of you according to your mind.

verses.en_6th_ed: However high My regret is piled, I shall work, holding fast to the utmost.
verses.ro: ika hodoni zanen tsumorite aru totemo   funbari kirite hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: いかほどにさねんつもりてあるとても
verses.jp2: ふんばりきりてはたらきをする
verses.kanji: 如何程に残念積りて有るとても   踏ん張り切りて働きをする
verses.en: However high My regret has piled up, to save all of you I will do My workings, holding fast to the utmost.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, there is no knowing what I may say. I shall reveal all the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani o yu yara shiren de na   Oya no zannen mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにをゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: をやのざんねんみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何を言うやら知れんでな   親の残念皆現す表すで
verses.en: Today there is no knowing what I may say. I, the Parent, will manifest all My regret.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now no one has known the truth of the human mind,
verses.ro: imamade wa hito no kokoro no shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ人の心のしんちつを
verses.jp2: しりたるものハさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は人の心の真実を   知りたる者は更に無けれど
verses.en: Although until now no one has known the truth of a human mind,

verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, whoever you may be, I shall clearly reveal your true innermost heart.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa donna mono demo shinjitsu no   mune no uchi oba tashika arawasu
verses.jp1: さあけふハどんなものでもしんちつの
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばたしかあらハす
verses.kanji: さあ今日はどんな者でも真実の   胸の内をば確か現す
verses.en: Now today I will show clearly the true innermost heart of everyone, whoever one may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only it is revealed entirely, the sweeping of the heart will be accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: kore saika mina arawashita koto naraba   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: これさいかみなあらハした事ならば
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢがひとりでけるで
verses.kanji: これさいか皆現した事ならば   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.en: If only I have manifested all of your mind, the sweeping of human hearts shall naturally be accomplished.

verses.en_6th_ed: From today on, whatever talks I shall begin and whatever I shall say, please comply.
verses.ro: kyokara wa donna hanashi o shikaketemo   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふからハとんなはなしをしかけても
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日からはどんな話を仕掛けても   何を言うても承知して呉れ
verses.en: From today on, whatever I may begin to say, please comply with it!

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I shall say step by step. I shall carry out My intentions on whatever things.
verses.ro: dandan to nani o yu yara kore shiren   donna koto demo omowaku o suru
verses.jp1: たん／＼となにをゆうやらこれしれん
verses.jp2: とんな事てもをもわくをする
verses.kanji: 段々と何を言うやらこれ知れん   どんな事でも思惑をする
verses.en: There is no knowing what I may say step by step. I will do everything as I intend.

verses.en_6th_ed: From forty-three years ago until now, I have caused your leg torment. This is My worry.
verses.ro: imamade wa yonju-san nen izen kara   ashi o nayameta kore ga shinpai
verses.jp1: いまゝてハ四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: あしをなやめたこれがしんはい
verses.kanji: 今迄は四十三年以前から   足を悩めたこれが心配
verses.en: From forty-three years ago until now I have afflicted your leg. This is My grave anxiety.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I shall restore it just as it was before.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo kore oba na   moto no tori ni shite kayasu de na
verses.jp1: このたびハなんでもかでもこれをはな
verses.jp2: もとのとふりにしてかやすでな
verses.kanji: この度は何でもかでもこれをばな   元の通りにして返すでな
verses.en: This time by all means I will restore it just as it was before.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this talk, whatever Tsukihi may say concerning any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nani o Tsukihi ga yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: このはなしなにを月日がゆうたとて
verses.jp2: どんな事てもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: この話何を月日が言うたとて   どんな事でも背き無き様
verses.en: This remark: whatever I, Tsukihi, may say, never go against it!

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, the Parent will request just one matter of you. I shall speak of nothing else.
verses.ro: korekara no Oya no tanomi wa kore bakari   hoka naru koto wa nanimo yuwan de
verses.jp1: これからのをやのたのみハこればかり
verses.jp2: ほかなる事わなにもゆハんで
verses.kanji: これからの親の頼みはこればかり   他なる事は何も言わんで
verses.en: From now on I, the Parent, request just this matter. I will speak of nothing else.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this request is? It is solely about the Service.
verses.ro: kono koto o nani o tanomu to omou kana   Tsutome ichijo no koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: この事をなにをたのむとをもうかな
verses.jp2: つとめ一ぢよの事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この事を何を頼むと思うかな   勤め一条の事ばかりやで
verses.en: What do you think My request can be? It is solely the single-hearted performance of the Service.

verses.en_6th_ed: This Service is the beginning of this world. If only this is realized...
verses.ro: kono Tsutome kore ga kono yo no hajimari ya   kore sai kanota koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このつとめこれがこのよのはぢまりや
verses.jp2: これさいかのた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この勤めこれがこの世の初まりや   これさい叶のうた事で有るなら
verses.en: This Service is indeed the beginning of this world. How satisfied I shall feel, if only this is fulfilled!

verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, you close to Me, let your minds not be opposed to the Parent's words on any matter.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa Oya no yu koto nani goto mo   soba no kokoro ni somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: さあけふハをやのゆう事なに事も
verses.jp2: そはの心にそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: さあ今日は親の言う事何事も   側の心に背き無き様
verses.en: Now today you close to Me must take care never to go against the words of your Parent, whatever they may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: If the minds of you close to Me are in error, there will be no help. That is why I speak so repeatedly.
verses.ro: soba naru no kokoro chigaeba zehi ga nai   sokode kudokudo yute oku zo ya
verses.jp1: そはなるの心ちがゑばぜひがない
verses.jp2: そこでくど／＼ゆうてをくぞや
verses.kanji: 側なるの心違えば是非が無い   そこでくどくど言うて置くぞや
verses.en: But, if you close to Me misuse your minds, there shall be no help. Accordingly I give you such repeated persuasion.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, though there is yet no one in the world who knows any and everything,
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani yono koto mo sekai niwa   shiritaru hito wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなによの事もせかいにハ
verses.jp2: しりたる人ハさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何よの事も世界には   知りたる人は更に無けれど
verses.en: Today in the world there is no one who knows any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is clearly seen in the eyes of the Parent. Perhaps no one is yet aware of what it might be.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni shikkari miete aru hodoni   donna koto yara tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: をやのめにしいかりみへてあるほどに
verses.jp2: とんな事やらたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 親の目に確り見えて有る程に   どんな事やら誰も知ろまい
verses.en: Indeed, it is clearly visible to the eyes of the Parent. Perhaps no one is yet aware of what it is.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is solely about things unknown from the time I began this world until now.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara ni imamade wa   tare demo shiranu koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからにいまゝてハ
verses.jp2: たれてもしらぬ事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに今迄は   誰でも知らぬ事ばかりやで
verses.en: From the creation to the present there are all such things which no one has ever known before.

verses.en_6th_ed: I desire to teach them to you. That is why I am doing all that I do step by step.
verses.ro: sono koto o oshietai kara dandan to   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp1: その事をふしゑたいからたん／＼と
verses.jp2: そこでとのよな事もするのや
verses.kanji: その事を教えようとて段々と   そこでどの様な事もするのや
verses.en: As I desire to teach them to you, step by step I work any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: After telling you any and everything about all matters, the Parent will work.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo yute oite   sorekara Oya ga hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: なにもかもとのよな事もゆてをいて
verses.jp2: それからをやがはたらきをする
verses.kanji: 何もかもどの様な事も言うて置いて   それから親が働きをする
verses.en: After having taught you any and everything beforehand, I, the Parent, will do My working.

verses.en_6th_ed: You might not know what this working is. The whole universe is the body of the Parent.
verses.ro: hataraki mo donna koto yara shiromai na   sekaiju wa Oya no karada ya
verses.jp1: はたらきもとんな事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: せかいちうハをやのからだや
verses.kanji: 働きもどんな事やら知ろまいな   世界中は親の体や
verses.en: Perhaps you may not know what My working is. Truly this whole universe is the body of the Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: I desire that you know the regret of the Parent up to now. So at this time, I shall reveal all of it.
verses.ro: imamade no Oya no zannen shirashitasa   sokode konotabi mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: いまゝてのをやのざんねんしらしたさ
verses.jp2: そこでこのたびみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: 今迄の親の残念知らしたさ   そこでこの度皆して見せる
verses.en: I desire to let you know the regret of the Parent in the past. Therefore, now I will work to show you all of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I am going to do. Take notice, each and everyone of you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru yara shiren de na   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするやらしれんてな
verses.jp2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするやら知れんでな   皆一列は承知して居よ
verses.en: There is no knowing what kinds of things I may work. Be aware of this, all of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: What are all of you thinking of this talk about My regret and appeals at this time?
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen kudoki no kono hanashi   mina ichiretsu wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp1: このたびのさねんくときのこのはなし
verses.jp2: みな一れつわなんとをもてる
verses.kanji: この度の残念口説きのこの話   皆一列は何と思うてる
verses.en: What are you all thinking of this persuading talk over My regret?

verses.en_6th_ed: The origin of it is forty-three years ago. It is then that I began a great test.
verses.ro: kono moto wa yonju san nen izen kara   erai tameshi ga kakete aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このもとわ四十三ねんいぜんから
verses.jp2: ゑらいためしがかけてあるぞや
verses.kanji: この元は四十三年以前から   えらい試しが掛けて有るぞや
verses.en: The beginning of this matter can be traced back forty-three years ago. From that time on I have been conducting a test of great importance.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only this matter is clearly understood, there will be nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: kore saika shikkari shochi shita naraba   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp1: これさいかしいかりしよちしたならば
verses.jp2: とんな事をがかなわんでなし
verses.kanji: これさいか確り承知したならば   どんな事をが叶わんで無し
verses.en: If only you understand this matter clearly, there shall be no prayer which cannot be heard.

verses.en_6th_ed: As I desire to save all people of the whole world, this test is of great importance.
verses.ro: sekaiju o mina ichiretsu o tasuketasa   sokode tameshi ga erai koto ya de
verses.jp1: せかいちうをみな一れつをたすけたさ
verses.jp2: そこでためしがゑらい事やで
verses.kanji: 世界中を皆一列を救けたさ   そこで試しがえらい事やで
verses.en: I earnestly desire to save all people of the whole world equally. Therefore the test is very momentous.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, while going through every kind of path, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: kyomade wa dono yona michi mo torinuke   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわとのよなみちもとふりぬけ
verses.jp2: ぢいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどの様な道も通り抜け   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.en: Although until today I have passed through whatever kinds of ways and yet have kept still,

verses.en_6th_ed: Now at last, I shall stop at nothing in beginning to reveal the truth. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu o   shite kakaru de na shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: もふけふハなんでもかでもしんぢつを
verses.jp2: してかゝるでなしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: もう今日は何でもかでも真実を   して掛かるでな承知して居よ
verses.en: Now today by all means I will begin to manifest the truth. Be aware of it!

verses.en_6th_ed: The path will change entirely from what it has been until now. All of you, settle your minds.
verses.ro: imamade to michi ga korori to kawaru de na   mina ichiretsu wa kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp1: いまゝでとみちがころりとかハるでな
verses.jp2: みな一れつわ心さためよ
verses.kanji: 今迄と道がころりと変わるでな   皆一列は心定めよ
verses.en: The way shall be entirely changed from what has been before. Determine your mind, all of you equally!

verses.en_6th_ed: This path does not discriminate between those within and the others. It is to sweep the heart of everyone in the world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa uchi mo sekai mo hedate nai   sekaiju no mune no soji ya
verses.jp1: このみちハうちもせかいもへたてない
verses.jp2: せかいちううのむねのそふぢや
verses.kanji: この道は内も世界も隔てない   世界中の胸の掃除や
verses.en: In this way there is no discrimination between those familiar with Me and other people of the world. This way is the sweeping dust of the hearts of all people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: From the time I began this world until today, I have not yet told the real truth.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani kyomade wa   honshinjitsu o yuta koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからにけふまでわ
verses.jp2: ほんしんぢつをゆうた事なし
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに今日迄は   本真実を言うた事無し
verses.en: Since the creation of this world until today, I have never told you the ultimate truth yet.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, I shall begin to tell you the real truth. Please understand it clearly.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa honshinjitsu o yuikakeru   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日ハほんしんちつをゆいかける
verses.jp2: とふぞしいかりしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日は本真実を言い掛ける   どうぞ確り承知して呉れ
verses.en: Today I wil begin to tell you the ultimate truth. I hope you will become firmly convinced of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is solely about the great test from forty-three years ago.
verses.ro: kono hanashi yonju san nen izen kara   erai tameshi ga kore ga ichijo
verses.jp1: このはなし四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: ゑらいためしがこれが一ちよ
verses.kanji: この話四十三年以前から   えらい試しがこれが一条
verses.en: These remarks are on the momentous test which I have been conducting since forty-three years ago.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this test is about? It is solely about the preparations to hasten the Service.
verses.ro: kono tameshi nanino koto ya to omou kana   Tsutome ichijo seku moyo ya de
verses.jp1: このためしなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: つとめ一ぢよせくもよふやで
verses.kanji: この試し何の事やと思うかな   勤め一条急く模様やで
verses.en: But why, you may wonder, do I make such a test? It is the preparation to hasten the single-hearted performance of the Service.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think about this Service? Prepare for the performers including the musical instruments.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome doyu koto ni omou kana   narimono irete ninju no moyo
verses.jp1: このつとめどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: なりもの入て人ちうのもよふ
verses.kanji: この勤めどういう事に思うかな   鳴り物入れて人衆の模様
verses.en: What do you think of this Service? I hasten to assemble the whole number of performers including those necessary for the musical instruments.

verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over this Service, whoever you are. If you dare to stop it, your life will be stopped.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome donna mono demo shiyan seyo   kore tometa nara waga mi tomaru de
verses.jp1: このつとめどんなものでもしやんせよ
verses.jp2: これとめたならわがみとまるで
verses.kanji: この勤めどんな者でも思案せよ   これ止めたなら我が身止まるで
verses.en: Ponder deeply over the significance of this Service, any and everyone of you! If anyone dares to stop it, he himself shall be stopped.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is the same as the way I began this world. I began human beings that never existed.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime kaketa mo onaji koto   nai ningen o hajime kaketa de
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめかけたもをなぢ事
verses.jp2: ないにんけんをはちめかけたで
verses.kanji: この様を初め掛けたも同じ事   無い人間を初め掛けたで
verses.en: I have commenced to create the human beings who had not existed before, the same as I had done in the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only this is begun, I shall assure you any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: kore saika hajime kaketaru koto naraba   donna tasuke mo mina ukeyau de
verses.jp1: これさいかはじめかけたる事ならば
verses.jp2: とんなたすけもみなうけやうで
verses.kanji: これさいか初め掛けたる事ならば   どんな救けも皆請け合うで
verses.en: If only you begin this Service, I will fully assure any and every kind of salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: You must clearly understand this matter. If it is stopped, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: kono koto wa shikkari shochi sen naran   kore tometa nara suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: この事ハしいかりしよちせんならん
verses.jp2: これとめたならすくにしりぞく
verses.kanji: この事は確り承知せんならん   これ止めたなら直ぐに退く
verses.en: You must be firmly convinced of this matter. If you stop it, I will withdraw Myself at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, the high mountains, boastful, have noisily done as they pleased.
verses.ro: imamade wa takayama ya tote kenken to   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝてハ高山やとてけん／＼と
verses.jp2: まゝにしていた事てあれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は高山やとて喧々と   侭にして居た事で有れども
verses.en: Although until now those who are on the high mountains have done anything as they please, scolding noisily,

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, however high the mountains may be, they will never be able to do as they please to the low valleys.
verses.ro: korekara wa ika hodo takai yama demo na   tanisoko mamani sarani dekemai
verses.jp1: これからハいかほどたかい山でもな
verses.jp2: たにそこまゝにさらにてけまい
verses.kanji: これからは如何程高い山でもな   谷底侭に更に出来まい
verses.en: Henceforth, however high their position may be, those who are on the high mountains shall never be able to do as they please to those who are at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.en_6th_ed: I see many useful timbers ahead, appearing in the low valleys step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tanisoko nitewa dandan to   oku yoki ga miete aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このさきわたにそこにてハだん／＼と
verses.jp2: をふくよふきがみゑてあるぞや
verses.kanji: この先は谷底にては段々と   多く用木が見えて有るぞや
verses.en: Henceforth at the bottoms of the valleys many useful timbers are appearing one by one.

verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, the Parent, who began this universe, will enter these useful timbers.
verses.ro: dandan to yoboku nitewa kono yo o   hajimeta Oya ga mina irikomu de
verses.jp1: たん／＼とよふぼくにてハこのよふを
verses.jp2: はしめたをやがみな入こむで
verses.kanji: 段々と用木にてはこの世を   初めた親が皆入り込むで
verses.en: Step by step I, the Parent, who created this universe will enter into all of My timber.

verses.en_6th_ed: When the Parent, who began this universe, enters them, there is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Oya ga irikomeba   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめたをやか入こめば
verses.jp2: どんな事をばするやしれんで
verses.kanji: この世を初めた親が入り込めば   どんな事をばするや知れんで
verses.en: When I, the Parent, who created this universe enter into your bodies, there is no knowing what kinds of wonders I may work.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do, do not worry. Any and everything is assured by the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o shita tote anjina yo   nanika yorozu wa Oya no ukeyai
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をしたとてあんぢなよ
verses.jp2: なにかよろつわをやのうけやい
verses.kanji: どの様な事をしたとて案じなよ   何か万は親の請け合い
verses.en: Never fear, whatever work I may do! I, the Parent, assure any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Quickly settle this matter firmly in your mind and hasten to begin.
verses.ro: kono koto o hayaku kokoro o shikkari to   sadame o tsukete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: この事をはやく心をしいかりと
verses.jp2: さだめをつけてはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: この事を早く心を確りと   定めを付けて早く掛かれよ
verses.en: Understand this matter, and quickly making up your mind, firmly hasten to begin the Service at once!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, there has been no one who has known what kind of a path this is.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna michi yara tare nitemo   shiritaru mono wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: けふまてハどんなみちやらたれにても
verses.jp2: しりたるものハさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな道やら誰にても   知りたる者は更に無けれど
verses.en: Until today there has been no one who has known what kind of way this is.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now at last, I shall fully reveal the mind's core step by step. Take notice!
verses.ro: mo kyo wa shin no kokoro o dandan to   mina arawasu de shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: もふけふハしんのこころをたん／＼と
verses.jp2: みなあらわすでしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: もう今日は芯の心を段々と   皆現すで承知して居よ
verses.en: But now today step by step the core of My mind shall entirely appear. Be aware of it!

verses.en_6th_ed: Those who are acceptable in the eyes of the Parent will grow only more spirited step by step and day by day.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni kanota mono wa nichinichi ni   dandan kokoro isamu bakari ya
verses.jp1: をやのめにかのふたものハにち／＼に
verses.jp2: だん／＼心いさむばかりや
verses.kanji: 親の目に適うた者は日々に   段々心勇むばかりや
verses.en: Those who meet the eyes of the Parent shall continue to become cheered up step by step and day by day.

verses.en_6th_ed: Those who are regrettable in the eyes of the Parent may be gone in a moment as in a dream.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni zanen no mono wa nandoki ni   yume mita yoni chiru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: をやのめにさねんのものハなんときに
verses.jp2: ゆめみたよふにちるやしれんで
verses.kanji: 親の目に残念の者は何時に   夢見た様に散るや知れんで
verses.en: Those who are regrettable in the eyes of the Parent may be gone at any moment as in a dream.

verses.en_6th_ed: By this talk, I do not indicate any particular place. All people in the world are My own children.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   sekaiju wa mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんでな
verses.jp2: せかいちううハみなわがこやで
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   世界中は皆我が子やで
verses.en: I do not give this talk indicating any place in particular. People of the whole world are all My children.

verses.en_6th_ed: All children in the world are equally dear to Me. Though there is no discrimination whatsoever,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kodomo wa kawai bakari nari   doko ni hedate wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: 一れつのこどもハかわいばかりなり
verses.jp2: とこにへたてわさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 一列の子供は可愛いばかりなり   何処に隔ては更に無けれど
verses.en: I love all My children equally with all My heart. Therefore there is no discrimination whatsoever.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! There will be no help if your mind is in error. That is why I am giving you My care step by step.
verses.ro: shikato kike kokoro chigaeba zehi ga nai   sokode dandan teiri suru no ya
verses.jp1: しかときけ心ちがゑばせひがない
verses.jp2: そこでだん／＼ていりするのや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け心違えば是非が無い   そこで段々手入りするのや
verses.en: Listen attentively! If you misuse your mind, there will be no help. Therefore I repeatedly put in My hand to repair.

verses.en_6th_ed: On this matter, you on the high mountains as well as in the low valleys, set your mind so as not to be unaware.
verses.ro: kono koto wa takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   yudan naki yoni kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp1: この事ハ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: ゆだんなきよに心さだめよ
verses.kanji: この事は高山にても谷底も   油断無き様に心定めよ
verses.en: On this matter, determine your minds without negligence, both those on the high mountains and those at the bottoms of the valleys!

verses.en_6th_ed: Now a request. What do you think I request? Quickly assemble the musical instruments and begin practice.
verses.ro: sa tanomu nani o tanomu to omou kana   hayaku narimono yosete keiko
verses.jp1: さあたのむなにをたのむとをもうかな
verses.jp2: はやくなりものよせてけいこふ
verses.kanji: さあ頼む何を頼むと思うかな   早く鳴り物寄せて稽古を
verses.en: Now I request. You may wonder what I am going to request. I begin to learn how to play them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until this time I have continued to keep still on whatever matters,
verses.ro: koremade wa donna koto demo jikkuri to   mada osamarite itaru naredomo
verses.jp1: これまてハとんな事てもちいくりと
verses.jp2: またをさまりていたるなれども
verses.kanji: これ迄はどんな事でもじっくりと   未だ治まりて居たるなれども
verses.en: Hitherto I have continued to hold Myself back without hurrying on whatever kinds of matters.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, by all means, you must quickly do the Service.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo hayabaya to   Tsutome seneba naran koto ya de
verses.jp1: もふけふわなんてもかてもはや／＼と
verses.jp2: つとめせゑねばならん事やで
verses.kanji: もう今日は何でもかでも早々と   勤めせえねばならん事やで
verses.en: But now today you must quickly perform the Service by all means.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have made requests of you in various matters step by step,
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto demo dandan to   iroiro tanomi kakete aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝてハどんな事でもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: いろ／＼たのみかけてあれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな事でも段々と   色々頼み掛けて有れども
verses.en: Until now I have made requests to you step by step in various matters of whatever kinds.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I request, no one understands. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: nani goto o tanonda totemo tare nitemo   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp1: なに事をたのんだとてもたれにても
verses.jp2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん
verses.kanji: 何事を頼んだとても誰にても   聞き分けが無い親の残念
verses.en: But whatever I may have requested, no one has complied with Me. This lack is regrettable to Me, the Parent.

verses.en_6th_ed: Please clearly understand this talk about My regret and appeals at this time.
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen kudoki no kono hanashi   dozo shikkari kikiwakete kure
verses.jp1: このたびのざねんくどきのこのはなし
verses.jp2: とふぞしいかりきゝわけてくれ
verses.kanji: この度の残念口説きのこの話   どうぞ確り聞き分けて呉れ
verses.en: This time I will persuade you talking over My regret. Please hear it attentively and understand it well!

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, whatever the Parent may say concerning any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa Oya ga nani goto yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハをやがなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: どんな事でもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: 今日の日は親が何事言うたとて   どんな事でも背き無き様
verses.en: Today, whatever I, the Parent, may tell you, never go against it, whatever it may be!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, whatever talks I gave and whatever I said were but a fragrance.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna hanashi o shita totemo   nani o yutemo nioi bakari ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんなはなしをしたとても
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもにをいはかりや
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな話をしたとても   何を言うても匂いばかりや
verses.en: Hitherto, whatever talks I have given you, they were mere fragrance.

verses.en_6th_ed: But My talks today are in the fullness of time. Everything I say will be seen at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi no hanashi to yu wa setsu ya   mo sono mamani suguni mieru de
verses.jp1: けふの日のはなしとゆうハせへつうや
verses.jp2: もふそのまゝにすぐにみへるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日の話と言うは節や   もうその侭に直ぐに見えるで
verses.en: But today I am talking to you in the due time which has at last come. Now everything shall soon appear just as I say.

verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is that, now, I shall clear away the regret piling in My heart for forty-three years.
verses.ro: kono hanashi yonju san nen izen kara   mune no zannen ima harasu de na
verses.jp1: このはなし四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: むねのざんねんいまはらすてな
verses.kanji: この話四十三年以前から   胸の残念今晴らすでな
verses.en: This talk is that now I will clear away My regret which has piled up for forthy-three years.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, those of you within are thinking of everything as being worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu uchi naru mono wa nanimo kamo   sekainami naru yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすうちなるものハなにもかも
verses.jp2: せかいなみなるよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず内なる者は何もかも   世界並なる様に思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, you familiar with Me are taking everything as if it were a wordly matter.

verses.en_6th_ed: This path has truly been a path of hardship for forty-three years.
verses.ro: kono michi wa yonju san nen izen kara   makoto nanju na michi o torita
verses.jp1: このみちハ四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: まことなんぢうなみちをとふりた
verses.kanji: この道は四十三年以前から   誠難渋な道を通りた
verses.en: For forty-three years the way has passed through extreme hardships.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though no one has known of it until now, this time I shall clear it all away.
verses.ro: sono koto o imamade tare mo shirai demo   konotabi kore o mina harasu de na
verses.jp1: その事をいまゝでたれもしらいでも
verses.jp2: このたびこれをみなはらすでな
verses.kanji: その事を今迄誰も知らいでも   この度これを皆晴らすでな
verses.en: Even though no one has known about it hitherto, this time I will make it all clear.

verses.en_6th_ed: To explain how it will be cleared away: I shall reveal everything solely by the Service.
verses.ro: kono harashi doshite harasu koto naraba   Tsutome ichijo de mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このはらしどふしてはらす事ならば
verses.jp2: つとめ一ぢよてみなあらハすで
verses.kanji: この晴らしどうして晴らす事ならば   勤め一条で皆現すで
verses.en: You may wonder how I can make it clear. I will realize it by means of the single-hearted performance of the Service.

verses.en_6th_ed: As to this Service, whatever the Parent may say about any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome Oya ga nani goto yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: このつとめをやがなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: とんな事てもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: この勤め親が何事言うたとて   どんな事でも背き無き様
verses.en: As to this Service, never go against My words, whatever I, the Parent, may say!

verses.en_6th_ed: I request you earnestly, especially in this matter, so you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: kore bakari kuregure tanomi oku hodoni   ato de kokwai naki yoni ya de
verses.jp1: こればかりくれ／＼たのみをくほとに
verses.jp2: あとでこふくハいなきよふにやで
verses.kanji: こればかりくれぐれ頼み置く程に   後で後悔無き様にやで
verses.en: Just this, I earnestly request you to bear it in mind lest you should repent of it afterwards.

verses.en_6th_ed: If anyone dares to stop this Service, I shall withdraw even from the proxy at once.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsutome ichijo tomeru nara   myodai nari to suguni chirizoku
verses.jp1: この度のつとめ一ちよとめるなら
verses.jp2: みよだいなりとすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: この度の勤め一条止めるなら   名代なりと直ぐに退く
verses.en: If anyone tries to stop this Service, even if he may be the proxy, I will withdraw from his body at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: You close to Me, what are you thinking about this talk? I cannot wait even for a breath.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote soba na mono   mo hitoiki mo machite iraren
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてそはなもの
verses.jp2: もふひといきもまちていられん
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて側な者   もう一息も待ちておられん
verses.en: How are you close to Me hearing these words? I can wait no more even for a breath.

verses.en_6th_ed: Quickly begin to bring out the musical instruments at least. I am hastening solely for the Service.
verses.ro: hayabaya to narimono nari to dashikake yo   Tsutome bakari o sete iru kara
verses.jp1: はや／＼となりものなりとたしかけよ
verses.jp2: つとめはかりをせへているから
verses.kanji: 早々と鳴り物なりと出し掛けよ   勤めばかりを急いて居るから
verses.en: Quickly begin to arrange the musical instruments at least! I am hastening single-heartedly for the performance of the Service.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, perhaps no one has known about the origin of human beings at the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: imamade wa kono yo hajimeta ningen no   moto naru koto o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: いまゝてハこのよはじめたにんけんの
verses.jp2: もとなる事をたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 今迄はこの世初めた人間の   元なる事を誰も知ろまい
verses.en: Until now perhaps no one has ever known the origin of human beings at the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, by all means, I wish to teach everything about this origin clearly to the world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono moto naru o shikkari to   dozo sekai e mina oshietai
verses.jp1: このたびわこのもとなるをしいかりと
verses.jp2: とふぞせかいゑみなをしゑたい
verses.kanji: この度はこの元なるを確りと   どうぞ世界へ皆教えたい
verses.en: This time I heartily desire to teach clearly to the world everything about this origin.

verses.en_6th_ed: The origin is performed by two members of the Kagura. Truly, this is the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono moto wa Kagura ryonin Tsutome wa na   kore ga shinjitsu kono yo hajimari
verses.jp1: このもとハかぐらりよにんつとめハな
verses.jp2: これがしんぢつこのよはしまり
verses.kanji: この元は神楽両人勤めはな   これが真実この世初まり
verses.en: This origin is represented by the two performers of the Kagura. Truly this is the beginning of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: What is called the Kagura this time is the Parent who began human beings.
verses.ro: konotabi no Kagura to yu wa ningen o   hajime kaketaru Oya de aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このたびのかぐらというハにんけんを
verses.jp2: はじめかけたるをやであるぞや
verses.kanji: この度の神楽と言うは人間を   初め掛けたる親で有るぞや
verses.en: The Kagura at this time is no other than the Parent who created human beings.

verses.en_6th_ed: There being no one who knows this origin, I shall teach you all of this truth.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node na   kono shinjitsu o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このもとをしりたるものハないのてな
verses.jp2: このしんぢつをみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この元を知りたる者は無いのでな   この真実を皆教えるで
verses.en: But there is no one who knows of this origin. So I will teach you all of this truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now I have tried to persuade you day after day and to teach you step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo nichinichi kudoki dandan to   yute kikashita koto wa aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝてもにち／＼くときたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ゆうてきかした事ハあれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄も日々口説き段々と   言うて聞かした事は有れども
verses.en: Even though until now I have persuaded you day after day and instructed you step by step,

verses.en_6th_ed: And yet today, no matter how Tsukihi strives to teach, there is no understanding in the minds of all.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa ika hodo Tsukihi yuta tote   ichiretsu kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp1: もふけふハいかほど月日ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 一れつ心わかりないので
verses.kanji: もう今日は如何程月日言うたとて   一列心分かり無いので
verses.en: Now today however earnestly I, Tsukihi, may speak, the minds of all of you do not understand Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, as the time has already come, I must now give you a return.
verses.ro: soreyue ni mo setsu ga kitaru kara   zehi naku ima wa kayashi suru zo ya
verses.jp1: それゆへにもふせへつうがきたるから
verses.jp2: せひなくいまわかやしするぞや
verses.kanji: それ故にもう節が来たるから   是非無く今は返しするぞや
verses.en: Therefore, as the time has already come, I am obliged to give a return to you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think this return is a small matter. It will appear here and there in a great number.
verses.ro: kono kayashi chotto no koto towa omouna yo   atchi kotchi ni oku mieru de
verses.jp1: このかやし一寸の事とハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: あゝちこゝちにをふくみゑるで
verses.kanji: この返し一寸の事とは思うなよ   あっちこっちに多く見えるで
verses.en: Never think that this return is a mere trifle! It will appear as many things here and there.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one anywhere, still, who knows the origin of human beginnings in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen hajime moto naru o   doko no hito demo mada shiromai na
verses.jp1: このよふのにんけんはじめ元なるを
verses.jp2: どこの人でもまだしろまいな
verses.kanji: この世の人間初め元なるを   何処の人でも未だ知ろまいな
verses.en: Perhaps no one anywhere knows the truth of the creation of human beings of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I wish to teach all of this truth clearly to the entire world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari mina oshietai
verses.jp1: このたびハこのしんちつをせかへぢうへ
verses.jp2: どふぞしいかりみなをしゑたい
verses.kanji: この度ハこの真実を世界中へ   どうぞ確り皆教えたい
verses.en: This time I sincerely desire to teach this truth clearly to all people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! This origin is the venerable Kunitokotachi and Omotari.
verses.ro: shikato kike kono moto naru to yu no wa na   Kunitokotachi ni Omotari sama ya
verses.jp1: しかときけこのもとなるとゆうのハな
verses.jp2: くにとこたちにをもたりさまや
verses.kanji: 確と聞けこの元なると言うのはな   くにとこたちとおもたり様や
verses.en: Listen attentively! The originators are Kunitokotachi and Omotari Sama.

verses.en_6th_ed: After looking through the muddy waters, these personages drew a fish and a serpent to them.
verses.ro: kono okata doromizu naka o misumashite   uo to mii to o soba i hikiyose
verses.jp1: このをかたどろみづなかをみすまして
verses.jp2: うをとみいとをそばいひきよせ
verses.kanji: このお方泥水中を見澄まして   魚と巳とを側に引き寄せ
verses.en: This couple, looking through the muddy water, drew near a fish and a serpent.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, My regret is at the heart's core. Is there not a means to clear it away?
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen to yu wa shin kara ya   kore o harasuru noyo nai kayo
verses.jp1: このたびのざねんとゆうわしんからや
verses.jp2: これをはらするもよふないかよ
verses.kanji: この度の残念と言うは芯からや   これを晴らする模様無いかよ
verses.en: This time My regret is deep from the core of My heart. How can I find a way of clearing it away?

verses.en_6th_ed: Of this matter, God will firmly take charge. Know that I shall give every kind of return.
verses.ro: kono koto o Kami ga shikkari hikiukeru   donna kayashi mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このことを神がしいかりひきうける
verses.jp2: どんなかやしもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この事を神が確り引き受ける   どんな返しもすると思えよ
verses.en: I, God, will assuredly take charge of this matter. Understand that I will give any and every kind of returen!

verses.en_6th_ed: When this return is seen, the heart of everyone in the world will be swept clean of its own accord.
verses.ro: kono kayashi mietaru naraba dokomade mo   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: このかやしみへたるならばどこまでも
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢがひとりでけるで
verses.kanji: この返し見えたるならば何処迄も   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.en: When this return appears, the sweeping of the dust from your hearts shall all naturally be accomplished throughout the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have been keeping still, overlooking every kind of thing,
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona koto mo miyurushite   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとのよな事をみゆるして
verses.jp2: ちいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今迄はどの様な事も見許して   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.en: Although until now, overlooking every kind of thing, I have been keeping still,

verses.en_6th_ed: Now, as the day is pressing, I shall give a return for all things at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna koto demo suguni kayasu de
verses.jp1: けふの日わもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp2: とんな事でもすぐにかやすで
verses.kanji: 今日の日はもう日が詰んで有るからな   どんな事でも直ぐに返すで
verses.en: Today as the time is pressing, I will give a return at once for whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: If anyone comes here with a mind to stop Me, there is no knowing where Tsukihi will at once appear.
verses.ro: kono tokoro tomeru kokoro de kuru naraba   sono mama doko i Tsukihi deru yara
verses.jp1: このところとめる心でくるならば
verses.jp2: そのまゝとこい月日でるやら
verses.kanji: この所止める心で来るならば   その侭何処へ月日出るやら
verses.en: If anyone comes here with intent to stop My work, there is no knowing where I, Tsukihi, will go out immediately.

verses.en_6th_ed: You may not know what My appearance means. Tsukihi will appear to take him away. Beware.
verses.ro: deru no mo na donna koto yara shiromai na   Tsukihi mukai ni deru de shochi se
verses.jp1: てるのもなどんな事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: 月日むかいにでるでしよちせ
verses.kanji: 出るのもなどんな事やら知ろまいな   月日迎いに出るで承知せ
verses.en: Perhaps you may wonder what it means for Me to go out. Understand that it means that I, Tsukihi, will go out to meet you!

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, the time is fully pressing. There is no knowing what kinds of paths there will be.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo jubun ni tsunde aru   dono yona michi ga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハもふぢうふんにつんてある
verses.jp2: とのよなみちがあるやしれんで
verses.kanji: 今日の日はもう十分に詰んで有る   どの様な道が有るや知れんで
verses.en: Today the time is sufficiently pressing. There is no knowing what kinds of ways will appear.

verses.en_6th_ed: Be aware, all of you throughout the world. There is no knowing when Tsukihi will appear to take you.
verses.ro: sekaiju mina ichiretsu wa shikato seyo   nandoki Tsukihi tsureni deru yara
verses.jp1: せかいぢうみな一れつハしかとせよ
verses.jp2: なんとき月日つれにてるやら
verses.kanji: 世界中皆一列は確とせよ   何時月日連れに出るやら
verses.en: Determine your mind firmly, all of you of the whole world! At any moment, I, Tsukihi, will go out to take you away.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, I shall begin to tell you of a marvelous thing. No one knows what I shall say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mezurashi koto o yuikakeru   nani o yu tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: けふの日ハめづらし事をゆいかける
verses.jp2: なにをゆうともたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 今日の日は珍し事を言い掛ける   何を言うとも誰も知ろまい
verses.en: Today I will begin to tell you a remarkable thing. No one knows what kinds of things I am going to say.
