verses.en_6th_ed: Everywhere in the world, people are alike: you prepare to marry off your children.
verses.ro: sekai niwa mina dokomade mo onaji koto   kodomo katazuke koshirae o suru
verses.jp1: せかいにハみなとこまてもをなし事
verses.jp2: 子共かたずけこしらゑをする
verses.kanji: 世界には皆何処迄も同じ事   子供片付け拵えをする
verses.en: In the world everyone everywhere is the same. People prepare to marry off their children.

verses.en_6th_ed: But no matter how well you prepare, no one knows what the future might be.
verses.ro: ika hodoni koshirae shita to yuta tote   sonosaki naru wa tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: いかほどにこしらゑしたとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: そのさきなるわたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 如何程に拵えしたと言うたとて   その先なるは誰も知ろまい
verses.en: However carefully you might have prepared, no one can know how it shall turn out thereafter.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever intention Tsukihi may have, there is no one who knows the course of its path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna omowaku aru yara na   kono michisuji wa shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: 月日にわどんなをもハくあるやらな
verses.jp2: このみちすじハしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな思惑有るやらな   この道筋は知りた者無し
verses.en: What intention I, Tsukihi, may have; there is no one who knows the course of the way.

verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what you may see in a dream. Hereafter, things will change and your mind will be spirited.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona yume o miru yara na   monku kawarite kokoro isamu de
verses.jp1: このさきハとのよなゆめをみるやらな
verses.jp2: もんくかハりて心いさむで
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な夢を見るやらな   文句変わりて心勇むで
verses.en: In the future you may see a dream which you have never expected. Thence everything shall be changed, and you shall become cheerful.

verses.en_6th_ed: You may dream of marvelous things. Take it as a sign to begin the Service.
verses.ro: dono yona mezurashi yume o miru yara na   kore o aizu ni Tsutome ni kakare
verses.jp1: とのよふなめづらしゆめをみるやらな
verses.jp2: これをあいつにつとめにかゝれ
verses.kanji: どの様な珍し夢を見るやらな   これを合図に勤めに掛かれ
verses.en: There is no knowing what a remarkable dream you may see. Taking it as a signal, begin to perform the Service!

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, you have heard Me on any and every matter. At any moment, things will change.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto mo kiite iru   nandoki monku kawaru koto yara
verses.jp1: けふの日ハとのよな事もきいている
verses.jp2: なんどきもんくかわる事やら
verses.kanji: 今日の日はどの様な事も聞いて居る   何時文句変わる事やら
verses.en: Today you have already heard any and everything. At any moment the state of things shall be changed.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever may happen, bear no grudge. It is all what you have done to yourselves.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo uramina yo   mina meme ni suru koto ya de na
verses.jp1: とのよふな事がありてもうらみなよ
verses.jp2: みなめゑ／＼にする事やでな
verses.kanji: どの様な事が有りても恨みなよ   皆銘々にする事やでな
verses.en: Whatever kinds of things may happen, never bear a grudge against others! Everything is the result of what each of you has done yourself.

verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, all of you equally are children of Mine. Though love for you fills My thoughts,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa mina ichiretsu wa waga ko nari   kawai ippai omote iredomo
verses.jp1: 月日にわみな一れつハわが子なり
verses.jp2: かハいいゝはいをもていれども
verses.kanji: 月日には皆一列は我が子なり   可愛い一杯思うて居れども
verses.en: For Me, Tsukihi, all people of the world are equally My children. Though I love them with all My heart,

verses.en_6th_ed: There can be no help for what each of you has done self-centeredly. I can only look on caringly.
verses.ro: meme ni suru koto bakari zehi wa nai   sokode jikkuri mite iru no ya de
verses.jp1: めへ／＼にする事ばかりせひハない
verses.jp2: そこでちいくりみているのやで
verses.kanji: めいめいにする事ばかり是非は無い   そこでじっくり見て居るのやで
verses.en: I cannot control things which are done by each mind selfishly. So I am patiently observing them.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though today you know nothing at all, look toward the morrow. A great broad path will open.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanimo shirazu ni iru keredo   asunichi o miyo erai okwan
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにもしらすにいるけれど
verses.jp2: あすにちをみよゑらいをふかん
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何も知らずに居るけれど   明日日を見よえらい往還
verses.en: Although today you know nothing at all, tomorrow a splendid broad way shall be opened before you.

verses.en_6th_ed: When this path comes to be seen, there will be no one able to stand against Me.
verses.ro: kono michi ga mietaru naraba dono yona   mono demo kanau mono wa arumai
verses.jp1: このみちがみへたるならばとのよふな
verses.jp2: ものでもかなうものわあるまい
verses.kanji: この道が見えたるならばどの様な   者でも敵う者は有るまい
verses.en: When this way has appeared, no one shall be able to stand against Me, whoever one may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever intent Tsukihi may have, there is perhaps no one who knows this mind.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna omowaku aru yara na   kono kokoro oba tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: 月日にハどんなをもハくあるやらな
verses.jp2: この心をばたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな思惑有るやらな   この心をば誰も知ろまい
verses.en: What intention do I, Tsukihi, have now? No one knows what it is.

verses.en_6th_ed: When it begins to be seen, the innermost heart of you everywhere will be purified of its own accord.
verses.ro: kore oba na miekaketa nara dokomade mo   mune no uchi oba hitori sumikiru
verses.jp1: これをばなみへかけたならとこまでも
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばひとりすみきる
verses.kanji: これをばな見え掛けたなら何処迄も   胸の内をば独り澄み切る
verses.en: When this intention begins to appear, you shall become thoroughly purified from your innermost hearts naturally.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall speak solely about all things unknown since this world began.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono yo hajimete nanimo kamo   nai koto bakari yuikakeru nari
verses.jp1: これからハこのよはじめてなにもかも
verses.jp2: ない事ばかりゆいかけるなり
verses.kanji: これからはこの世初めて何もかも   無い事ばかり言い掛けるなり
verses.en: From now on I will begin to tell you of any and everything which has never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now no one has known the truth of the human mind,
verses.ro: imamade wa hito no kokoro no shinjitsu o   tare ka shiritaru mono wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ人の心のしんちつを
verses.jp2: たれかしりたるものハなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は人の心の真実を   誰か知りたる者は無けれど
verses.en: Although until now there has been no one who knows the truth of the human mind,

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as God is openly revealed, I shall teach you everything about all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i deteru kara   donna koto demo mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このたびハ神がをもていでゝるから
verses.jp2: どんな事でもみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この度は神が表へ出てるから   どんな事でも皆教えるで
verses.en: This time because I, God, reveal Myself to the fore, I will teach everything whatever it may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: I do not indicate anyone in particular by this talk. I shall give notice through bodily disorders.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   minouchi sawari kore de shirasuru
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp2: みのうちさハりこれでしらする
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   身の内障りこれで知らする
verses.en: I do not tell you this indicating any place in particular. I will warn you through the disorders of your bodies.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder why I say such things. I speak out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: konna koto nande yu ya to omouna yo   kawai amarite yu koto ya de na
verses.jp1: こんな事なんでゆうやとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: かわいあまりてゆう事やでな
verses.kanji: こんな事何で言うやと思うなよ   可愛い余り言う事やでな
verses.en: Never wonder why I am speaking like this! It is indeed in the excess of My affection.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may do, there is nothing which is unknown to God.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo waga mi suru koto ni   Kami no shiran to yu koto wa nai
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でもわがみする事に
verses.jp2: 神のしらんとゆう事わない
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも我が身する事に   神の知らんと言う事は無い
verses.en: There is nothing of which I, God, do not know, whatever kinds of things you may do.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I shall give you notice of everything beforehand, and then begin My work.
verses.ro: soreyue ni nanimo yorozu o kotowarite   sono ue kakaru shigoto naru zo ya
verses.jp1: それゆへになにもよろづをことハりて
verses.jp2: そのゆゑかゝるしことなるぞや
verses.kanji: それ故に何も万を断りて   その故掛かる仕事なるぞや
verses.en: Therefore I warn you beforehand on any and every kind of thing. And then I begin My work.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have been patiently holding back in whatever matters,
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo jikkuri to   shikaete itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなによの事もぢいくりと
verses.jp2: しかゑていたることであれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は何よの事もじっくりと   控えて居たる事で有れども
verses.en: Although until now I have been patiently holding back on whatever kinds of things,

verses.en_6th_ed: Now hear Me! Until now, you have only listened to what I said in My talks.
verses.ro: shikato kike imamade naru no hanashi wa na   nani o yutemo kiita bakari ya
verses.jp1: しかときけいまゝでなるのはなしハな
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもきいたばかりや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け今迄なるの話はな   何を言うても聞いたばかりや
verses.en: Listen attentively! Hitherto you have only heard whatever I have told you.

verses.en_6th_ed: But today, as I am hastening the path, all things will quickly appear.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa michi ga isoide iru kara na   donna koto demo hayaku mieru de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハみちがいそいでいるからな
verses.jp2: どんな事てもはやくみへるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は道が急いで居るからな   どんな事でも早く見えるで
verses.en: But today, as I am hastening the way, everything shall appear quickly.

verses.en_6th_ed: Once they begin to appear, it will be too late. Therefore, all of you must ponder.
verses.ro: soreyue ni dekakete kara wa domunaran   sokode ichiretsu shiyan suru yo
verses.jp1: それゆへにでかけてからハとむならん
verses.jp2: そこで一れつしやんするよふ
verses.kanji: それ故に出掛けてからはどうもならん   そこで一列思案する様
verses.en: Therefore there will be no help after everything has occurred. So, I request all of you equally to ponder deeply.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now God has tried to persuade you by teaching you various things step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no kudoki wa dandan to   iroiro toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでも神のくどきわたん／＼と
verses.jp2: いろ／＼といてきたるなれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄も神の口説きは段々と   色々説いて来たるなれども
verses.en: Even though hitherto I, God, have tried to persuade you step by step and in various ways,

verses.en_6th_ed: However earnestly I appeal to you, no one understands. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: ika hodoni kudoita totemo tare nitemo   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp1: いかほとにくどいたとてもたれにても
verses.jp2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん
verses.kanji: 如何程に口説いたとても誰にても   聞き分けが無い親の残念
verses.en: However earnestly I have tried to persuade you, none of you understood Me. This caused Me serious regret.

verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, I made great efforts to persuade you. This time, indeed, you must ponder.
verses.ro: kokomade mo yoi na kudoki ya nai hodoni   konotabi koso wa shiyan suru yo
verses.jp1: ここまてもよいなくときやないほとに
verses.jp2: このたびこそハしやんするよふ
verses.kanji: 此処迄も容易な口説きや無い程に   この度こそは思案する様
verses.en: Hitherto it was not an easy task to try to persuade all of you. This time, ponder deeply from your innermost hearts!

verses.en_6th_ed: What are you thinking on hearing this talk? It is the result of matters accumulated and piled up.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   tsumori kasanari yue no koto ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp2: つもりかさなりゆへの事やで
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて聞いて居る   積り重なり故の事やで
verses.en: With what thoughts are you listening to these talks? They are because of My accumulated and piled up regret.

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the regret and anger of God on this day are not small matters.
verses.ro: kyonohi no Kami no zannen rippuku wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: けふの日の神のさんねんりいふくわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 今日の日の神の残念立腹は   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.en: Understand that today the regret and anger of God is not slight!

verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi is the Parent who began human beings and this world which did not exist.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nai ningen ya nai sekai   hajime kaketaru Oya de aru zo ya
verses.jp1: 月日よりないにんけんやないせかい
verses.jp2: はじめかけたるをやであるぞや
verses.kanji: 月日より無い人間や無い世界   初め掛けたる親で有るぞや
verses.en: I am the Parent, who as Tsukihi created human beings and the world which had never existed.

verses.en_6th_ed: Be that as it may, the drum is being stopped by children who know nothing. Behold My regret.
verses.ro: sono tokoro nanimo shirazaru kodomo ni na   taiko tomerare kono zanen miyo
verses.jp1: そのところなにもしらざる子共にな
verses.jp2: たいことめられこのさねんみよ
verses.kanji: その所何も知らざる子供にな   太鼓止められこの残念見よ
verses.en: However, the drum was prohibited by children who knew nothing of this truth. Behold My severe regret!

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall give a return for this. Beware of it, all of you, wherever you may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono kayashi oba suru hodoni   mina dokomade mo shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: このたびハこのかやしをばするほとに
verses.jp2: みなとこまでもしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: この度はこの返しをばする程に   皆何処迄も承知して居よ
verses.en: This time I will give them a return for this. Be aware of it, all of you, wherever you may be!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have known nothing. But now, things are beginning to appearﾑa great promise.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ita keredo   sa miekaketa erai tanoshimi
verses.jp1: けふまてわなにもしらすにいたけれと
verses.jp2: さあみへかけたゑらいたのしみ
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何も知らずに居たけれど   さあ見え掛けたえらい楽しみ
verses.en: Until today you have known nothing whatsoever. But now great delight is making its appearance.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this path is about? It is to cleanse the heart of everyone in the world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa donna koto ya to omou kana   sekai ichiretsu mune no soji ya
verses.jp1: このみちハどんな事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: せかい一れつむねのそふぢや
verses.kanji: この道はどんな事やと思うかな   世界一列胸の掃除や
verses.en: What kind of way do you think this is? This is the way of sweeping dust from the hearts of all people of the whole world equally.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this matter is about? It is to clear away God's regret.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nanno koto ya to omote iru   Kami no zannen harasu koto ya de
verses.jp1: この事ハなんの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんはらす事やで
verses.kanji: この事は何の事やと思うて居る   神の残念晴らす事やで
verses.en: What do you think the meaning of this work is? It is the way to clear away the regret of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall not indicate anyone in particular. I am watching the innermost heart of each of you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa doko no hito tomo yuwan de na   mune no uchi oba mina mite iru de
verses.jp1: このさきハとこの人ともゆハんでな
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばみなみているで
verses.kanji: この先は何処の人とも言わんでな   胸の内をば皆見て居るで
verses.en: Henceforth I do not indicate any person in particular. I am looking through the innermost hearts of all of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: From today, Tsukihi will go forth to work. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: kyokara wa Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: けふからわ月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp2: どんな事をはするやしれんで
verses.kanji: 今日からは月日出掛ける働きに   どんな事をばするや知れんで
verses.en: From today I, Tsukihi, will go out to work. There is no knowing what kind of work I will do.

verses.en_6th_ed: The work that Tsukihi will do from now on: perhaps no one knows where I shall do it.
verses.ro: imakara no Tsukihi hataraki suru no wa na   doko de suru tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: いまからの月日はたらきするのハな
verses.jp2: どこでするともたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 今からの月日働きするのはな   何処でするのも誰も知ろまい
verses.en: From now on I, Tsukihi, will begin My working. No one knows where I will begin.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall work in the high mountains as well as in the low valleys, here and there, throughout the world.
verses.ro: takayama mo tanisoko made mo sekaiju   ichiretsu o mina atchi kotchi to
verses.jp1: 高山もたにそこまてもせかいぢう
verses.jp2: 一れつをみなあゝちこゝちと
verses.kanji: 高山も谷底迄も世界中   一列を皆あっちこっちと
verses.en: I will work both on the high mountains and at the bottoms of the valleys here and there, all over the whole world equally.

verses.en_6th_ed: When Tsukihi works throughout the world, perhaps there is no one who knows how to settle matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sekaiju oba hatarakeba   kono osamekata tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: 月日よりせかいぢうをばはたらけば
verses.jp2: このをさめかたたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 月日より世界中をば働けば   この治め方誰も知ろまい
verses.en: If I, Tsukihi, go and work around the whole world, no one may know the way to appease Me.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I shall tell you how to settle matters. All of you in the world must ponder quickly.
verses.ro: soreyue ni kono shizumekata choto shirasu   ichiretsu hayaku shiyan suru yo
verses.jp1: それゆへにこのしづめかた一寸しらす
verses.jp2: 一れつはやくしやんするよふ
verses.kanji: それ故にこの鎮め方一寸知らす   一列早く思案する様
verses.en: Therefore I will tell you the way to appease Me. I hope all of you will ponder over it in haste.

verses.en_6th_ed: Concerning the Service: never think that I have any other intention. I have only the single desire to save all of you.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo hoka no koto towa omouna yo   tasuketai no ga ichijo bakari de
verses.jp1: つとめてもほかの事とわをもうなよ
verses.jp2: たすけたいのが一ちよばかりで
verses.kanji: 勤めでも他の事とは思うなよ   救けたいのが一条ばかりで
verses.en: Never think that I have any other object in the performance of the Service! It is singly from My earnest desire to save all of you.

verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, step by step, everyone is thinking that it is somehow evil.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina tare nitemo dandan to   nando ashiki no yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすみなたれにてもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: なんどあしきのよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆誰にても段々と   何ぞ悪しきの様に思うて
verses.en: Unaware of this, in various degrees everyone tends to regard it as something evil.

verses.en_6th_ed: As human beings are shallow, you speak about everything without knowing the core.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru kara na   nani o yutomo shin o shirazu ni
verses.jp1: にんけんハあざないものてあるからな
verses.jp2: なにをゆうともしんをしらずに
verses.kanji: 人間はあざない者で有るからな   何を言うとも芯を知らずに
verses.en: As human beings are shallow-minded, they chatter noisily without understanding the core of the truth.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, I have said nothing and remained still. Behold this regret of Mine.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna koto demo yuwananda   jitto shite ita kono zanen miyo
verses.jp1: けふまてわとんな事てもゆハなんだ
verses.jp2: ぢいとしていたこのさねんみよ
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな事でも言わなんだ   じっとして居たこの残念見よ
verses.en: Until today I have spoken nothing, but always kept patiently still. Behold this severe regret of Mine!

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I, God, shall carry out My intentions. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no omowaku suru kara wa   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: これからハ神のをもハくするからハ
verses.jp2: とんな事をばするやしれんで
verses.kanji: これからは神の思惑するからは   どんな事をばするや知れんで
verses.en: From now on I, God, will realize My intention. So there shall be no knowing what things I may work.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now you have said things and thought about things, doing as you pleased,
verses.ro: imamade wa nanimo yutari omotari   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝてハなにもゆうたりをもふたり
verses.jp2: まゝにしていた事てあれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄は何を言うたり思うたり   侭にして居た事で有れども
verses.en: Hitherto you have been managing everything, speaking and thinking as you please.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, as God will rule, you will not be able to do anything as you please.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Kami ga shihai o suru kara wa   donna koto demo mamani deken de
verses.jp1: このさきわ神がしはいをするからハ
verses.jp2: とんな事てもまゝにてけんで
verses.kanji: この先は神が支配をするからは   どんな事でも侭に出来んで
verses.en: Henceforth I, God, will control everything. So you can never manage anything as you please.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though nothing is visible to human eyes, everything is seen in the eyes of God.
verses.ro: ningen no me niwa nanimo mienedomo   Kami no me niwa mina miete aru
verses.jp1: にんけんのめゑにハなにもみへねども
verses.jp2: 神のめゑにハみなみへてある
verses.kanji: 人間の目には何も見えねども   神の目には皆見えて有る
verses.en: Nothing is visible to human eyes, but everything is visible to the eyes of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Please wait awhile before giving away what you have prepared. It is like throwing it into muddy water.
verses.ro: koshirae o yaru no wa shibashi machite kure   doromizu naka i hameru gotoku ya
verses.jp1: こしらゑをやるのハしばしまちてくれ
verses.jp2: とろみづなかいはめるごとくや
verses.kanji: 拵えを遣るのは暫し待ちて呉れ   泥水中へはめる如くや
verses.en: Please wait awhile before you send out what you have prepared. It is like throwing it away into muddy water.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have said nothing about any matter. Today, I must speak out on everything.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto demo yuwananda   kyo wa nandemo yuwaneba naran
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとんな事でもゆハなんだ
verses.jp2: けふハなんてもゆハねはならん
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな事でも言わなんだ   今日は何でも言わねばならん
verses.en: Until now I have never said any kind of things. But today by all means I must say any and everything.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, any and all things will appear. When the appointed time comes, Tsukihi will come to lead you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo mieru de na   kokugen kitara Tsukihi tsureiku
verses.jp1: もふけふハなんてもかてもみへるてな
verses.jp2: こくけんきたら月日つれいく
verses.kanji: もう今日は何でもかでも見えるでな   刻限来たら月日連れ行く
verses.en: Now today any and everything shall all appear. When the fixed time comes, I, Tsukihi, will lead Her away.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, the time has become sufficiently full. There is no knowing when I shall come to lead you forth.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo jubun ni tsunde kita   nandoki tsureni deru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハもふぢうふんにつんできた
verses.jp2: なんときつれにでるやしれんで
verses.kanji: 今日の日はもう十分に詰んで来た   何時連れに出るや知れんで
verses.en: Today the time is sufficiently pressing. There is no knowing at what moment I will go out to lead Her away.

verses.en_6th_ed: Leading you forth is no small matter. I see a great number of people but perhaps no one is aware.
verses.ro: tsureiku mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   oku mieru ga tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: つれいくも一寸の事てハないほとに
verses.jp2: をふくみへるがたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 連れ行くも一寸の事では無い程に   多く見えるが誰も知ろまい
verses.en: When I lead Her away, not a small but a huge number of people will gather. But no one knows it.

verses.en_6th_ed: No matter on how high a place you may be, today finally, things will change entirely.
verses.ro: ika hodono takai tokoro to yuta tote   mo kyokara wa monku kawaru de
verses.jp1: いかほとのたかいところとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: もふけふからわもんくかハるで
verses.kanji: 如何程の高い所と言うたとて   もう今日からは文句変わるで
verses.en: However high your position may be, from today the state of affairs will be entirely changed.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now ponder! From now you must replace your mind. It will not do, not to ponder and resolve!
verses.ro: sa shiyan korekara kokoro irekaete   shiyan sadamen koto ni ikan de
verses.jp1: さあしやんこれから心いれかへて
verses.jp2: しやんさだめん事にいかんで
verses.kanji: さあ思案これから心入れ替えて   思案定めん事にいかんで
verses.en: Now ponder well! There is no other way than replacing your mind to determine it firmly.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, no one has known what path this is. From this day on, you will understand the path.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanno michi yara shirenanda   kyokara saki wa michi ga wakaru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなんのみちやらしれなんだ
verses.jp2: けふからさきハみちがわかるで
verses.kanji: 今迄は何の道やら知れなんだ   今日から先は道が分かるで
verses.en: Until now no one could understand what this way is. But from today you will come to understand this way clearly.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this path is about? It is solely about the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   Kanrodai no ichijo no koto
verses.jp1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: かんろふたいのいちじよの事
verses.kanji: この道はどういう事に思うかな   甘露台の一条の事
verses.en: What do you think this way is? This is the way to set up the Kanrodai single-heartedly.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this Stand is? It is the prime treasure of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono dai o doyu koto ni omote iru   kore wa nihon no ichi no takara ya
verses.jp1: このだいをどふゆう事にをもている
verses.jp2: これハにほんの一のたからや
verses.kanji: この台をどういう事に思うて居る   これは日本の一の宝や
verses.en: What do you think this Stand is? This is the prime treasure in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.en_6th_ed: What is the thinking among all of you about this? Perhaps no one knows its origin.
verses.ro: kore oba na nanto omote mina no mono   kono moto naru o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: これをばななんとをもふてみなのもの
verses.jp2: このもとなるをたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: これをばな何と思うて皆の者   この元なるを誰も知ろまい
verses.en: What are all of you thinking of this Stand? No one may know the origin of this Stand.

verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, by all means, I truly wish to teach everything about this origin to the world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono moto naru o shinjitsu ni   dozo sekai e mina oshietai
verses.jp1: このたびハこのもとなるをしんぢつに
verses.jp2: とふぞせかいゑみなをしへたい
verses.kanji: この度はこの元なるを真実に   どうぞ世界へ皆教えたい
verses.en: This time I truly desire to teach this origin by all means to all people of the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: This origin is exactly the center of the bodies of Izanagi and Izanami.
verses.ro: kono moto wa Izanagiii to Izanami no   minouchi yori no hon mannaka ya
verses.jp1: このもとハいさなきいゝといざなみの
verses.jp2: みのうちよりのほんまんなかや
verses.kanji: この元はいざなぎといざなみの   身の内よりの本真ん中や
verses.en: Originally this place was exactly the center of the bodies of Izanagi and Izanami.

verses.en_6th_ed: There at the Jiba, I began all the human beings in this world.
verses.ro: sono toko de sekaiju no ningen wa   mina sono Jiba de hajime kaketa de
verses.jp1: そのとこでせかいぢううのにんけんわ
verses.jp2: みなそのぢばではじめかけたで
verses.kanji: その所で世界中の人間は   皆その地場で初め掛けたで
verses.en: At this place, the Jiba, I created all human beings of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: The Jiba in Nihon is the native place of all people in the world.
verses.ro: sono Jiba wa sekai ichiretsu dokomade mo   kore wa nihon no kokyo naru zo ya
verses.jp1: そのぢばハせかい一れつとこまても
verses.jp2: これハにほんのこきよなるぞや
verses.kanji: その地場は世界一列何処迄も   これは日本の故郷なるぞや
verses.en: Therefore, the Jiba, the place of origin, situated in the region where My teachings spread early is the native place for all people of the whole world equally.

verses.en_6th_ed: As proof of My beginning of human beings, I shall put the Kanrodai into place.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime kaketaru shoko ni   Kanrodai o suete oku zo ya
verses.jp1: にんけんをはじめかけたるしよこふに
verses.jp2: かんろふたいをすゑてをくぞや
verses.kanji: 人間を初め掛けたる証拠に   甘露台を据えて置くぞや
verses.en: I set up the Kanrodai as the evidence that I created human beings at this place.

verses.en_6th_ed: If only this Stand comes to completion, there will be nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: kono dai ga mina soroi sai shita naraba   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp1: このだいがみなそろいさいしたならば
verses.jp2: どんな事をがかなハんでなし
verses.kanji: この台が皆揃いさいしたならば   どんな事をが叶わんで無し
verses.en: If only this Stand is completed, any and every prayer shall be heard.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until then, the heart of everyone throughout the world must be swept clean.
verses.ro: soremade ni sekaiju o dokomade mo   mune no soji o seneba naran de
verses.jp1: それまでにせかいぢううをとこまでも
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢをせねばならんで
verses.kanji: それ迄に世界中を何処迄も   胸の掃除をせねばならんで
verses.en: Before that time the sweeping of the dust of human hearts must be accomplished thoughout the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: In this sweeping, there will be no discrimination. Know that Tsukihi is discerning you.
verses.ro: kono soji doko ni hedate wa nai hodoni   Tsukihi miwakete iru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このそふぢとこにへだてハないほとに
verses.jp2: 月日みハけているとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この掃除何処に隔ては無い程に   月日見分けて居ると思えよ
verses.en: As to this sweeping, I make no discrimination whatsoever. Be convinced of the fact that I, Tsukihi, discern everyone of you!

verses.en_6th_ed: Wherever you may be, Tsukihi will accept all of you in accordance with your minds.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   kokoro shidai ni mina uketoru de
verses.jp1: 月日にハどんなところにいるものも
verses.jp2: 心しだいにみなうけとるで
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな所に居る者も   心次第に皆受け取るで
verses.en: I, Tsukihi, accept your mind truly as it is, wherever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever mind you may have had until now, replace it, even in the span of a night!
verses.ro: imamade wa donna kokoro de itaru tomo   ichiya no ma nimo kokoro irekae
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとんな心でいたるとも
verses.jp2: いちやのまにも心いれかゑ
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな心で居たるとも   一夜の間にも心入れ替え
verses.en: Replace your mind even in a night, whatever mind you may have had until now!

verses.en_6th_ed: If you truly replace the mind in its entirety, Tsukihi will accept it, too, at once.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro sukiyaka irekaeba   sore mo Tsukihi ga suguni uketoru
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心すきやかいれかゑば
verses.jp2: それも月日がすぐにうけとる
verses.kanji: 真実に心清きやか入れ替えば   それも月日が直ぐに受け取る
verses.en: If you replace your mind truly and entirely, I, Tsukihi, will accept it too, at once.

verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, all of you in the world are My children. Love for you fills Me: this is My single heart.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju wa mina waga ko   kawai ippai kore ga ichijo
verses.jp1: 月日にハせかいぢううハみなわが子
verses.jp2: かハいいゝばいこれが一ちよ
verses.kanji: 月日には世界中は皆我が子   可愛い一杯これが一条
verses.en: For Me, Tsukihi, all people of the whole world are My children. So I love them single-heartedly with complete affection.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been no one who knows the innermost heart.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna mono demo mune no uchi   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんなものでもむねのうち
verses.jp2: しりたるものわさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな者でも胸の内   知りたる者は更に有るまい
verses.en: Until now there has been no one who knows My innermost heart.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, wherever you may be, I shall tell you all about the innermost heart.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   mune no uchi oba mina yute kikasu
verses.jp1: このたびハとんなところにいるものも
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばみなゆてきかす
verses.kanji: この度はどんな所に居る者も   胸の内をば皆言うて聞かす
verses.en: This time I will teach you everything of My innermost heart, wherever you may be.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, if you were set apart by even one wall, you would know nothing of whatever was said.
verses.ro: koremade wa kabe hito yo nite hedate tara   nani o yutemo choto mo shiromai
verses.jp1: これまでハかへひとにてへたてたら
verses.jp2: なにをゆうても一寸もしろまい
verses.kanji: これ迄は壁一重にて隔てたらﾀﾗ   何を言うても一寸も知ろまい
verses.en: Hitherto, if you were screened by a wall, you would know nothing of what others say.

verses.en_6th_ed: From today, there will be no time even to look aside. There is no knowing what will be accomplished as in a dream.
verses.ro: kyokara wa yokome furu ma mo nai hodoni   yume mita yoni nani o suru yara
verses.jp1: けふからハよこめふるまもないほどに
verses.jp2: ゆめみたよふになにをするやら
verses.kanji: 今日からは横目振る間も無い程に   夢見た様に何をするやら
verses.en: From today there shall be no time even to look aside. There is no knowing what I will work as rapidly as in a dream.

verses.en_6th_ed: The regret of Tsukihi until now has been by no means a small matter.
verses.ro: imamade no Tsukihi zanen to yu mono wa   nakanaka chotto no koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでの月日ざねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: なか／＼一寸の事で無いぞや
verses.kanji: 今迄の月日残念と言うものは   仲々一寸の事で無いぞや
verses.en: The regret of Tsukihi until now has been by no means slight.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, though you have known nothing, now, the great main path is coming into sight.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ita keredo   sa miete kita erai honmichi
verses.jp1: けふまでハなにもしらすにいたけれど
verses.jp2: さあみへてきたゑらいほんみち
verses.kanji: 今日からは何も知らずに居たけれど   さあ見えて来たえらい本道
verses.en: Until today you have known nothing. But now the splendid main road is coming into sight.

verses.en_6th_ed: Because I wished to see this path quickly, I have hastened. From this time forward, there will be joyousness in everything.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku mitote sekikonda   sa korekara wa yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくみとふてせきこんだ
verses.jp2: さあこれからハよふきつくめや
verses.kanji: この道を早く見とうて急き込んだ   さあこれからは陽気ずくめや
verses.en: I have impatiently hastened, because of My desire to see this way quickly. From now on everything shall become full of joy.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this talk is about? If only the tip of My writing brush begins to be seen...
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   fude no saki gana miete kita nara
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: ふでのさきがなみへてきたなら
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に思うかな   筆の先がな見えて来たから
verses.en: What do you think of this talk? If only the prophecy written with the tip of My writing brush appears,

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have listened to whatever things. This time, indeed, I shall clear My regret away.
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona koto mo kiite ita   konotabi koso wa zanen harasu de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとのよな事もきいていた
verses.jp2: このたびこそわざねんはらすで
verses.kanji: 今迄はどの様な事も聞いて居た   この度こそは残念晴らすで
verses.en: Until now I have overheard any and every kind of thing. But now I will clear My regret away.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this clearing away is to be? There is no knowing where or when I may withdraw.
verses.ro: kono harashi doyu koto ni omou kana   nandoki doko de shirizoku yara na
verses.jp1: このはらしとふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: なんどきどこでしりぞくやらな
verses.kanji: この晴らしどういう事に思うかな   何時何処で退くやらな
verses.en: What do you think this clearing away is? There is no knowing when and where I may withdraw My working.

verses.en_6th_ed: This regret from My long journey till now: know that it is not a small matter.
verses.ro: koremade no nagai dochu kono zanen   chotto no koto dewa nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: これまでのながいどふちうこのざねん
verses.jp2: 一寸の事でハないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: これ迄の永い道中この残念   一寸の事では無いと思えよ
verses.en: Understand that My regret which has piled up from the long past until now is not slight!

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall give returns for it. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono kayashi oba suru hodoni   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: これからハこのかやしをばするほとに
verses.jp2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: これからはこの返しをばする程に   皆一列は承知して居よ
verses.en: Henceforth I will give returns for this. Be aware of it, all of you equally!

verses.en_6th_ed: Without saying who it is to be, Tsukihi is watching everyone throughout the world closely.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no mono towa yuwan de na   Tsukihi shikkari mina mite iru de
verses.jp1: せかいぢうどこのものとハゆハんてな
verses.jp2: 月日しいかりみな見ているで
verses.kanji: 世界中何処の者とは言わんでな   月日確り皆見て居るで
verses.en: I do not indicate any person of any place in particular in the whole world. I, Tsukihi, am always watching clearly.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may say or think, there is nothing that Tsukihi does not know.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yutemo omotemo   Tsukihi shiran to yu koto wa nai
verses.jp1: どのふうな事をゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp2: 月日しらんとゆう事ハない
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うても思うても   月日知らんと言う事は無い
verses.en: Whatever you may speak or think, there is nothing which I, Tsukihi, do not know.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, whatever I shall do, Tsukihi will give you notice of it beforehand.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o suru nimo na   Tsukihi saki e to kotowarite oku
verses.jp1: このさきわどよな事をするにもな
verses.jp2: 月日さきゑとことわりてをく
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事をするにもな   月日先へと断りて置く
verses.en: Henceforth I, Tsukihi, will warn you beforehand whatever kinds of things I will do.

verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, if the regret of Tsukihi appears, there is no knowing what will happen.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi zannen deta naraba   dono yona koto ga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: これからハ月日ざんねんでたならば
verses.jp2: とのよな事があるやしれんで
verses.kanji: これからは月日残念出たならば   どの様な事が有るや知れんで
verses.en: Henceforth, if the regret of Tsukihi appears, there is no knowing what kinds of things may happen.

verses.en_6th_ed: Today, everything has piled up to its limit. Watch! I shall clear away the regret of God.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto mo tsunde kita   Kami no zannen harasu mite iyo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハどのよな事もつんできた
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんはらすみていよ
verses.kanji: 今日の日はどの様な事も詰んで来た   神の残念晴らす見て居よ
verses.en: Today the time is pressing for everything. Behold my working to clear away the regret of God!

verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, no one has known the Jiba of Origin, where I began the human beings of this world.
verses.ro: imamade wa kono yo hajimeta ningen no   moto naru Jiba wa tare mo shiran de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハこのよはしめたにんけんの
verses.jp2: もとなるぢばわたれもしらんで
verses.kanji: 今迄はこの世初めた人間の   元なる地場は誰も知らんで
verses.en: Hitherto no one has known of the Jiba, the place of origin, where human beings of this world were first created.

verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I wish to teach this truth clearly to the entire world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari oshietai kara
verses.jp1: このたびハこのしんちつをせかへちうゑ
verses.jp2: どふぞしいかりをしゑたいから
verses.kanji: この度はこの真実を世界中へ   どうぞ確り教えたいから
verses.en: This time by all means I desire to teach this truth clearly to all people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I began to set up the Kanrodai. It is for the place of the true origin.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Kanrodai o hajimeta wa   honmoto naru no tokoro naru no ya
verses.jp1: それゆへにかんろふたいをはじめたわ
verses.jp2: ほんもとなるのところなるのや
verses.kanji: それ故に甘露台を初めたは   本元なるの所なるのや
verses.en: Therefore I began to set up the Kanrodai here, because this is the place of the true origin.

verses.en_6th_ed: The reason I began such a thing is that I desire to save the whole world.
verses.ro: konna koto hajime kakeru to yu no mo na   sekaiju o tasuketai kara
verses.jp1: こんな事はじめかけるとゆうのもな
verses.jp2: せかいぢううをたすけたいから
verses.kanji: こんな事初め掛けると言うのもな   世界中を救けたいから
verses.en: The reason I have begun these things is My ardent desire to save all people of the whole world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Despite this, it was taken away by My children who knew nothing. Behold My regret!
verses.ro: sore oba na nanimo shirazaru kodomo ni na   toriharawareta kono zanen wa na
verses.jp1: それをばななにもしらさるこ共にな
verses.jp2: とりはらハれたこのさねんわな
verses.kanji: それをばな何も知らざる子供にな   取り払われたこの残念はな
verses.en: In spite of My intention the Stand was taken away by My children who knew nothing about it. How enormous My regret is!

verses.en_6th_ed: Listen carefully! There is no knowing what kinds of returns will be given hereafter.
verses.ro: shikato kike konosaki naru wa dono yona   kayashi aru yara kore shiren de na
verses.jp1: しかときけこのさきなるハとのよふな
verses.jp2: かやしあるやらこれしれんでな
verses.kanji: 確と聞けこの先なるはどの様な   返し有るやらこれ知れんでな
verses.en: Listen attentively! There is no knowing what kinds of returns shall be given in the future.

verses.en_6th_ed: This regret of Tsukihi: it is by no means a small matter.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono zannen to yu no wa na   nakanaka chotto no koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 月日よりこのざんねんとゆうのわな
verses.jp2: なか／＼一寸の事でないぞや
verses.kanji: 月日よりこの残念と言うのはな   仲々一寸の事で無いぞや
verses.en: This regret of Tsukihi is indeed far from slight.

verses.en_6th_ed: About the returns: do not think of them as small matters. There is no knowing what Tsukihi will do.
verses.ro: kayashi demo chotto no koto towa omouna yo   donna koto oba Tsukihi suru yara
verses.jp1: かやしても一寸の事とハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: どんな事をば月日するやら
verses.kanji: 返しでも一寸の事とは思うなよ   どんな事をば月日するやら
verses.en: Never take the return to be slight! There is no knowing what kinds of things I, Tsukihi, will work.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do all of you think of this talk? The regret of God is indeed great.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omouzo mina no mono   Kami no zannen erai koto ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもうぞみなのもの
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんゑらい事やで
verses.kanji: この話何と思うぞ皆の者   神の残念えらい事やで
verses.en: What do you think of this talk? The regret of God is indeed enormous.

verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have passed through every kind of path step by step,
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona michi mo dandan to   torinukete wa kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: とふりぬけてわきたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今迄はどの様な道も段々と   通り抜けては来たるなれども
verses.en: Although step by step I have passed through every kind of way until now,

verses.en_6th_ed: As the appointed time has not yet come, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: mo chitto no kokugen kitaran soreyue ni   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: もちいとのこくけんきたらそれゆへに
verses.jp2: ちといとしていたことてあれとも
verses.kanji: もう一寸の刻限来たらそれ故に   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.en: As the time is a little late in coming, I have kept still patiently.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now, the day is fully pressing. At the appointed time, I shall give the returns at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo jubun ni tsunde kita   kokugen kitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハもふぢうふんにつんてきた
verses.jp2: こくけんきたらすぐにかやすで
verses.kanji: 今日の日はもう十分に詰んで来た   刻限来たら直ぐに返すで
verses.en: But today the time has become sufficiently pressing, so I will give returMns at once when the fixed time comes.

verses.en_6th_ed: When do you think this day will come? When the twenty-sixth day has come.
verses.ro: kono hi wa na itsu no koto ya to omote iru   niju roku nichi ga kitaru koto nara
verses.jp1: この日ハないつの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: 廿六日がきたる事なら
verses.kanji: この日はな何時の事やと思うて居る   二十六日が来たる事となら
verses.en: When do you think this day will come? It shall appear when the twenty-sixth day comes.

verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, I shall reveal all the true mind of everyone of you by all means.
verses.ro: sorekara wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu no   kokoro sorezore mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: それからハなんてもかてもしんちつの
verses.jp2: 心それ／＼みなあらわすで
verses.kanji: それからは何でもかでも真実の   心それぞれ皆現すで
verses.en: After that by all means I will show clearly each of your true minds without any reserve.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder why I say such things. I speak out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: konna koto nande yu ya to omouna yo   kawai amarite yu koto ya de na
verses.jp1: こんな事なんでゆうやとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: かハいあまりてゆう事やでな
verses.kanji: こんな事何で言うやと思うなよ   可愛い余り言う事やでな
verses.en: Never wonder why I am telling  you these things! I tell you because My affection for you is so great.

verses.en_6th_ed: For all of you children in the world, there is only love in the thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju no kodomo wa na   kawai bakari o omote iru kara
verses.jp1: 月日にハせかいちううのこどもわな
verses.jp2: かハいばかりをふもているから
verses.kanji: 月日には世界中の子供はな   可愛いばかり思うて居るから
verses.en: Because I, Tsukihi, single-heartedly love My children all over the whole world,

verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I desire to sweep clean the heart of everyone throughout the world.
verses.ro: soreyue ni sekaiju o dokomade mo   mune no soji o shitai yue kara
verses.jp1: それゆへにせかいちううをどこまても
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢをしたいゆへから
verses.kanji: それ故に世界中を何処迄も   胸の掃除をしたい故から
verses.en: Therefore I desire to sweep dust from their hearts throughout the world.

verses.en_6th_ed: Why do you think I desire this sweeping? It is because My thoughts are only for your salvation.
verses.ro: kono soji doyu koto ni omote iru   tasuke bakari o omote iru kara
verses.jp1: このそふぢどふゆう事にをもている
verses.jp2: たすけばかりをふもているから
verses.kanji: この掃除どういう事に思うて居る   救けばかりを思うて居るから
verses.en: What do you think of this sweeping? I am intending single-heartedly to accomplish the salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: The salvation is not just to cure illness. I intend it to be a marvelous salvation.
verses.ro: tasuke demo ashiki naosuru made ya nai   mezurashi tasuke omote iru kara
verses.jp1: たすけでもあしきなをするまてやない
verses.jp2: めづらしたすけをもているから
verses.kanji: 救けでも悪しき直する迄や無い   珍し救け思うて居るから
verses.en: My salvation is not only to cure illness, but I intend it to be a remarkable salvation.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this salvation is? It is to be free from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yoni
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: やますしなすによハりなきよに
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事に思うかな   病まず死なずに弱り無き様に
verses.en: What do you think this salvation is? I will protect you from falling ill, dying or becoming weak.

verses.en_6th_ed: Such a thing has been unknown anywhere until now. I desire to show you the proof of it.
verses.ro: konna koto imamade doko ni nai koto ya   kono shoko o shirashitasa ya de
verses.jp1: こんな事いまゝでどこにない事や
verses.jp2: このよしよこふをしらしたさやで
verses.kanji: こんな事今迄何処に無い事や   この世証拠を知らしたさやで
verses.en: These things have never existed until now. It is because I desire to let you know the evidence of it.

verses.en_6th_ed: It is a thing not to be found anywhere until now. At this time, God desires to begin it.
verses.ro: koremade wa doko tazunetemo nai koto ya   konotabi Kami ga hajimetasa ya de
verses.jp1: これまてハどこたつねてもない事や
verses.jp2: このたび神がはじめたさやで
verses.kanji: これ迄は何処尋ねても無い事や   この度神が初めたさやで
verses.en: This has never existed before, wherever you may search. This time I, God, desire to begin it.

verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you did not know what path you were on. Hereafter, I shall let you know the path.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna michi yara shirenanda   korekara saki wa michi o shirasuru
verses.jp1: けふまでハとんなみちやらしれなんだ
verses.jp2: これからさきハみちをしらする
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな道やら知れなんだ   これから先は道を知らする
verses.en: Until today you have not known what way you were on. Henceforth I will teach you the way.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this path is about? The regret of Tsukihi is the single concern.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi zannen ichijo no koto
verses.jp1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: 月日ざんねんいちじよの事
verses.kanji: この道はどういう事に思うかな   月日残念一条の事
verses.en: What kind of way do you think this is? It is the way to clear away single-heartedly the regret of Tsukihi.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think My regret is about? The matter of the Kanrodai is My greatest regret.
verses.ro: kono zanen nanino koto ya to omou kana   Kanrodai ga ichi no zannen
verses.jp1: このざねんなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: かんろふ大が一のざんねん
verses.kanji: この残念何の事やと思うかな   甘露台が一の残念
verses.en: About what matter do you think My regret is concerned? The incident of the Kanrodai is the cause of My prime regret.

verses.en_6th_ed: This regret of Mine is no small matter. There is no knowing what returns Tsukihi will give.
verses.ro: kono zanen chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   donna kayashi o Tsukihi suru yara
verses.jp1: このざねん一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp2: どんなかやしを月日するやら
verses.kanji: この残念一寸の事では無い程に   どんな返しを月日するやら
verses.en: This regret is not slight indeed. There is no knowing what kinds of returns I will give.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever may happen, bear no grudge. It is what each of you has done to yourself.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo uramina yo   mina meme ni shite oita no ya
verses.jp1: どのよふな事がありてもうらみなよ
verses.jp2: みなめゑ／＼にしてをいたのや
verses.kanji: どの様な事が有りても恨みなよ   皆銘々にして置いたのや
verses.en: Never bear a grudge against Me, whatever may happen! They are all the result of your own deeds in the past.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, unto all places in the world however far, in the high mountains as well as in the low valleys,
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa dokomade mo   takayama nitemo tanisoko made mo
verses.jp1: このさきハせかへぢううハとこまでも
verses.jp2: 高山にてもたにそこまでも
verses.kanji: この先は世界中は何処迄も   高山にても谷底迄も
verses.en: Henceforth, throughout the whole world, from the high mountains to the bottoms of the valleys,

verses.en_6th_ed: Know that I shall sweep the heart of each of you in the world step by step.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekai ichiretsu dandan to   mune no soji o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: これからハせかい一れつたん／＼と
verses.jp2: むねのそふちをするとをもへよ
verses.kanji: これからは世界一列段々と   胸の掃除をすると思えよ
verses.en: I will sweep dust equally from all hearts of the world one by one. Be aware of it!

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think of this sweeping, all of you? No one knows the mind of God.
verses.ro: kono soji nanto omouzo mina no mono   Kami no kokoro o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: このそふぢなんとをもうぞみなのもの
verses.jp2: 神の心をたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: この掃除何と思うぞ皆の者   神の心を誰も知ろまい
verses.en: What do all of you think of this sweeping? No one knows the mind of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever regrets Tsukihi has borne, they were overlooked quietly until now.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna zanen ga aru totemo   imamade jitto miyurushite ita
verses.jp1: 月日にハどんなざねんがあるとても
verses.jp2: いまゝでぢいとみゆるしていた
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな残念が有るとても   今迄じっと見許して居た
verses.en: Whatever kind of regret, I, Tsukihi, may have borne, until now I have overlooked it and kept still patiently.

verses.en_6th_ed: Now the day is fully pressing. In any case, I cannot help but give returns.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa hi mo jubun ni tsunde kita   nandemo kayashi sezu ni iraren
verses.jp1: さあけふハ日もぢうふんにつんできた
verses.jp2: なんでもかやしせずにいられん
verses.kanji: さあ今日は日も十分に詰んで来た   何でも返しせずに居られん
verses.en: Now today the time has become sufficiently pressing. I cannot help but give returns by all means.

verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think the returns are about? They are solely about the regret of God.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanino koto ya to omote iru   Kami no zannen bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このかやしなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんばかりなるぞや
verses.kanji: この返し何の事やと思うて居る   神の残念ばかりなるぞや
verses.en: What are you thinking of this return? It is none other than the regret of God.

verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think this regret is a small matter. It is a result of causes accumulated and piled up.
verses.ro: kono zanen chotto no koto towa omouna yo   tsumori kasanari yue no koto ya de
verses.jp1: このざねん一寸の事とハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: つもりかさなりゆへの事やで
verses.kanji: この残念一寸の事とは思うなよ   積り重なり故の事やで
verses.en: Never think of this regret as slight! It is the result of the regret which has been accumulated and piled up.

verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, all of you in the world are My children. Though My thoughts for you are filled with love,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju wa mina waga ko   kawai ippai omote iredomo
verses.jp1: 月日にハせかいぢううハみなハが子
verses.jp2: かハいゝばいをもていれども
verses.kanji: 月日には世界中は皆我が子   可愛い一杯思うて居れども
verses.en: For Me, Tsukihi, all people of the whole world are My children. Although I single-heartedly love them,

verses.en_6th_ed: No one is aware of it, and the ponderings of each of you are only of dust.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   hokori bakari o shiyan shite iru
verses.jp1: それしらすみな一れつハめへ／＼に
verses.jp2: ほこりばかりをしやんしている
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆一列は銘々に   埃ばかりを思案して居る
verses.en: Unaware of this, each and everyone of them equally is thinking only of dust.

verses.en_6th_ed: Please think of the regret of God over such minds. Indeed, nothing more can be said, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Kami no zannen omote kure   domu nantomo yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp1: この心神のざんねんをもてくれ
verses.jp2: どふむなんともゆうにゆハれん
verses.kanji: この心神の残念思うて呉れ   どうも何とも言うに言われん
verses.en: Think of the regret of God over these dusty minds! It is far beyond expression of My words.

verses.en_6th_ed: I shall not repeat what I have said until now. From now on, you need only to be spiritually awakened.
verses.ro: imamade no yo naru koto wa yuwan de na   korekara saki wa satori bakari ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでのよふなる事ハゆハんでな
verses.jp2: これからさきハさとりばかりや
verses.kanji: 今迄の様なる事は言わんでな   これから先は悟りばかりや
verses.en: I will not repeat in the same manner what has been said before. Henceforth it is solely necessary to become spiritually awakened.

verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, there is no knowing what I shall say. I request that you ponder thoroughly.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yu yara shiren de na   dozo shikkari shiyan shite kure
verses.jp1: このさきハなにをゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: どふぞしかりしやんしてくれ
verses.kanji: この先は何を言うやら知れんでな   どうぞ確り思案して呉れ
verses.en: In the future there is no knowing what I may say. Please ponder over it definitely!

verses.en_6th_ed: Sato, Sato, Ta-oto, Ta-oto, Byo-sama, Byo-sama...
verses.ro: Sato Sato Taoto Taoto Byosama Byosama
verses.jp1: さと／＼たをと／＼びよさま／＼
verses.kanji: 里々田音々々平様々々
verses.en: Sato! Sato! Ta Oto, Ta Oto! Byo Sama!, Byo Sama!

verses.en_6th_ed: If this talk coincides sign for sign, know that everything proceeds in this way.
verses.ro: kono hanashi aizu tateyai deta naraba   nani ni tsuitemo mina kono tori
verses.jp1: このはなしあいづたてやいでたならば
verses.jp2: なにゝついてもみなこのとふり
verses.kanji: この話合図立て合い出たならば   何についても皆この通り
verses.en: This I state: when sign and event coincide, it is the same as this on whatever kinds of things.

verses.en_6th_ed: I earnestly request each and everyone of you to ponder deeply.
verses.ro: kore oba na ichiretsu kokoro shiyan tanomu de
verses.jp1: これをはな一れつ心しやんたのむで
verses.kanji: これをばな一列心思案頼むで
verses.en: I earnestly request each and everyone of you equally to ponder seriously over these teachings in your mind.

verses.ro: nichinichi ni kokoro tsukushita monodane o   Kami ga tashikani uketorite iru
verses.jp1: にち／＼に心つくしたものだねを
verses.jp2: 神がたしかにうけとりている
verses.kanji: 日々に心尽くした物種を   神が確かに受け取りて居る
verses.en: The seeds of your sincere devotion sown day after day, I have certainly accepted.

verses.ro: shinjitsu ni Kami no uketoru monodane wa   itsu ni naritemo kusaru me wa nashi
verses.jp1: しんぢつに神のうけとるものだねわ
verses.jp2: いつになりてもくさるめわなし
verses.kanji: 真実に神の受け取る物種は   何時になりても腐るめは無し
verses.en: The seed which God truly accepts will never decay through all eternity.

verses.ro: dandan to kono monodane ga haeta nara   kore matsudai no Koki naru zo ya
verses.jp1: たん／＼とこのものだねがはへたなら
verses.jp2: これまつだいのこふきなるそや
verses.kanji: 段々とこの物種が生えたなら   これ末代のこうきなるぞや
